item.text: gar skad du/ Ar+yapU sta pA la pr-its+tsha na mam
hAyAn sU tra/ bod skadadu/ 'phagazigs pa yul 'khor skyong
gis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa che
sangs rgyas dang byang chub sun sa dang 'thams
dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang/ byang chub sems dpa' lnga stong thams cad kyang
rgyal po zla 'od bram rnal dachubyin patsunas
spobs pa thogs pamed ba/ bzod pa thob pa/ bdud phyir rgol ba'i dgra bcom pa/ sas rgyas kyi chos thams cad la shin tu nye
ba gyur/ skye ba gcig gis thogs pa/ gzungs thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin thob pa/ spobs pa mtha' yas pa thob ba/ mi 'jigs pa
thogs pa med pa thob pa/ rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs dang/ dpang dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa nas/ yon tan gyi tshogs thams cad zad mi shes ba sha
stag la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang bo dang/ kun tu mig dang/ kun tu lta ba dang/ kun tu 'od zer
dang/ kun tu 'od dang/ blo gros mchog dang/ blo gros 'phel dang/ blo gros mtha' yas dang/ blo gros rgya chen dang/ blo grosami zad pa dang/ sa
@#rlu@#// 'an dang/ 'gro ba 'dzin dang// rgyal ba'i blo gros dang/ khyad par blo gros dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sa mas dang 'chen po
gzungs kyidabang phyug gi rgyal bo dang/ 'jam dpal la sogs pa sems dpa' dang med pa drug cu dang/ bzang skyong la sogs pa skyes bu dam ba bcu
drug dang/ mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi dang/ lha'i bu mtshams bzas dang/ lha'i bu
blo gros legs gnas dang/ lha'i dbang po thams cad dang klu'i dbang po dang/ mi 'am ci'i dbang po dang/ drawa'i dbang po dang/ gnod spyin gyi dbang
bo dang/ lham yin gyi dbang po dang/ nam mkha' lding gi dbang po 'khor brgya stong du ma yod pa thams cad 'khor de nyid du 'dus te/ 'khod pa rnams dang
thabs cig tu bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal gyi snying po'i sang ge'i khri la bzhugs te/ lhun po ltar 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams
cad las ni mngon par 'phags/ nyim ltar 'jig rten thams cad la na snang/ zlab ltar 'gro ba thams cad la snang ba ni mdzad/ tshangs pa ltar ba tu zhi bar na bzhugs/
brgya byin ltar sku ni bstan par dka'/ 'khor los sgyur ba ltar byang chub kyi yan lag gi rin po che bdun dang ni ldan/ sang ge ltar chos thams cad bdag med pa dang stong par ni
sgogs mi'i phung bo chen po ltar 'gro ba thams cad la snang ba'i sku dang ni/ lha thams cad snang ba'inor bu rin po che kun nas bsdus pa'i nor bu ni boji'i rgyal po ltar gzi brjid kyi
ni gan tu 'bar zhing/ stong gsum gyi stong chen bo 'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bas khyab par mdzod nas/ na ni tshu rnam par nges pa/ chos thams cad kyi dam pa'i
bal tu byon ba/ 'khor gyi nang na bzhugs ngashing/ tshangs pa'i sgra dbangs ba sgrags ba/ sems can thams cad gobar byed pa dang ldan pa'i dbyangs kyis chos ston te/ tshas
bar sod po (thog mar dgab/ bar du dgal/ tha mar dge ba/ don bzang bo/ tshig 'bru bzang po/ ma 'dres pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ yongs su dag pa/
yongaso su byang ba yang dag par rab tu ston to/ de nas bang chub sems dpa' sems dpo' chen po mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus par
gyur te/ 'dug pa des bcom ldan 'das sung ge'i khri la bzhugs ba/ nyim stong las lhag pa'i 'od kyis 'khor gyidakyil 'khor thams cad zil
gyis brlag par mdzad nas/ shin tu lha der bzhugs pa mthong ste/ dga' ba dang/ mgub dang/ dad pas 'dun pa'i sems kyis stan las langs nas/ thal mo
sbyarate/ bcom ldan 'das la tshul dang mthun pa'i tshogs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do// lha tshogs lha ma yin dang mi 'am ci// klu dang nyan thos dag dang/
sangs rgyas sras// 'gro ba 'di dag rgyal bas gzi yangs kyis// zil mnan khyod ni gser gyi ri ltar gasal// rgya mtsho'i dbus na bzhugs kyang rnam mikhros pa// lhun po
lha yi tshog sakyi gnas lta bur// thugs rje'i rgya mtsho'i dbus su de bzhugs te// 'od zer stong phrag brgya dag 'gyod pa mdzad// tshangs pa'i gnas la gnas pa'i tshangs pa de//
tshangs pa'i mdun na gnas te mngon mdzes ltar// bsam gtan rnam thar ting nge 'dzin bzhugs pa// sems can dam ba 'gro bkun la gsal// brgya byin sum cu rtsa gsum lha nang du/
gnas nas gakhri brjidi yangs pas mdzes pa ltar// mtshan gyis sbas pa yashes yon tan phyug/ thub pa'irgyal po 'gro ba kun la gsal// gling bzhi mi yi bdag po snang ldan pa//
'jig rten 'di la ston pa mdzes pa ltar// 'phags pa'i lam du 'dzud pa rab mdzad cing// thugs rjes dgongs pa'i thugs mnga' 'di yang mdzes// mkha' la nyi ma lamamathal
le ba// nor bu me 'od mog mog byed 'di ltar// nyis stongakhas khyad par 'phags pa'i 'od// sangs rgyas ma 'gro ba 'di nagasal// id zla ba nam gyi gung gsal ltar// shin tu rnam
dag 'gro ba kun lags l// rgyal ba'i zhal ras zla ba nyapa 'dra// kun 'od zil gyis mnan nas rnam par mdzes// ji ltar ri bo'i khrom lam 'bar ba// mtshan mo mal tsam na kun sna
ltar/ gti mug mun pa ma lus bcom nas ni// drang srong chen po'i yi shes 'od kyang gsal// sang ge sul brtan pa'i sgra sgrog cing// sa la ri dgas tshogs rnams skragabgyid/
ltar// mi dbang stong pa bdag med gsung sgrogacing// tharol mu stags can rnams skrag par mdzad// nor bu'i rgyal bo bzang bo gzi brjid 'bar// nor bu thams cad zilamanan lam
ma ltar// rgyal ba'i sku ni gsar gyi mdog 'dra ba// 'gro kun zil gyis mnan nas lamam bzhugs// 'jig rten gang na'ang khyod dang mtshungs ma mchis// lhag pa'i samasacan
mchis par ga la 'gyu'o// bsod nams ye shes brtson 'grus thabs rnams dang// yon tan kun gyis khyed dang mtshungs ma mchis// mi yi dpa' bo 'gro la lam me ba// mgon bo
yon tan rgya mtsho bdag gis mthong// gusab skyes shing dga' ba rnam par 'phel// rgyal ba'i zhabs kyi thil la bdag gis gtugs// yon tan kun gyi
'byung gnas 'jig rten sgron// grags pa dam pa rgya chen thugs mnga' ba// bdag gis bstod de bsod nams 'di'i thob des// 'gro ba thams cad byang chub mchog reg shog
de nas khyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal bos/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod nas/ thalamo sbyar te/
mig gnyis mi 'dzum par de bzhin gshegs ba'i sku la lta/ chos kyi dbyings nyid la ni rnam par spyod/ zab pa dang/ gting dpag dka'ab dang/ mthong bar dka' ba dang/ khong du chud/
par dka' ba dang/ brtagaminus ba dang/ rtog ge'i spyod pa ma yin pa dang/ zhi ba dang phra ba la ni 'jug/ sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa la ni rjes su rnam par dpyod/
rgyu de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes chos kyi dbyings thams cad du zhugs pa lan Dis su rnam par sams/ sangs rgyas kyi yul mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa lani yang dag par lta/ de bzhin/
gshegs pa'i thabs kyi yul bsam gyisami khyab pa la ni 'jug/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos kyi dbyangs gcig gis tshul gyi ngo bo nyid la 'jug pa la ni rtog/ sangs
rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi gnas mdab nam mkha'i spyod yul du ni yang dag par lta/ chos thams cad yang dag pa'i mtha'/ mtha'am yin pa'i rang bzhin la 'jug pa la ni mos/
sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pasgrib pa med pa ni mngon par 'dod/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sku rtag ba dang/ zhi ba dang/ ther zug pa la ni 'jug/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku
zhing rab 'byams thams cad kyi rjes su song ba dang/ sems can thams cad la mngon du phyogs pa la ni 'go/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yon tan phyi ma'i mtha' bskal pa'i
chur yang thug pa med pa nis sudran par byed/chos kyi dbyas nyid la rnam par dpyod cing/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dba' chen po mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal bo cang mi smabar 'dug par
gyur to// de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong mnyan yod du dbyar zla ba gsum gnas par dam bcas te/ de zla ba gsum 'dasanas/ chos gos byas te/ chos gos zinanas/ ri lhung bzod dung
chos gos thogs te/ ge slong gi dge 'dun dang/ gsar bu las dang bo ba rab tu byung nas ring bor ma lon ba dag dang lhan cig tu mthar gyis yul rgyu ba rgyu zhing/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer
chen bo ga la ba dang/ byargod kyi phung bo'i rig la ba der song ngo// de nas tshe dang ldan po yul 'khor skyong bcom ldan 'das ga la bder song ste/ phyin nasaM bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la
mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas kyang/ tshe dang ldan
pa yul 'khor skyong gis thal mo sbyar te/ tshigasasu gcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstodado// mi mchog 'od mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal lo// nam mkha'amatshung
pa'i thugs la phyag 'tshal go/ rgyal ba yid gnyis gcod la phyag 'tshal lo// srid gsum mthar byon thub la phyag 'tshal lo// zhing rnams bya ba'ab 'byams kun tu yang//
'dren pa dag ni khyod kyi bsngags ba gsung// rgyal ba'i sras kyis thos nas rab dga' zhing// yon tan rgya mtsho thub ba mchog tu mchi// bde gshegs tshul dang mthun pas mchod
bgyis te// thub pa che las rdul bral chos shes nas/ de dag khyod kyi yon tan 'phrang rjod cing// yid rab dga' nas rang gi zhang du mchi// byang chub dam pa mchog ni tshol ba na// khyod
kyi thugs ni skyo bami mnga'abar// bskal ba bye ba khrag khrig bsam yas su// sems can rnams kyi ched du spyod pa spyod// 'dren pa khyod kyis sbyin dang tshul khrims spyod// bzod dang
brtson 'grus dang na bsam gtanabaslabs// shes rab thabs dang dbang gi pha rolagshegs// des na rnam 'dren me la phyag 'tshal lo// rdzu 'phrul rkang dang mngon shes mchog la mkhru/
dbang po stobs dang rnam par thar pa bslabs// sems can kun gyi spyod pa thugs chud rtogs// mnyam med ye shes mtshol phyag 'tshal lo// 'gro ba rnams kyisams rgyud rab tu mkhyen//
spyod pa gang dang ji ltar las 'byung dang// tshul sgo gang gis rnam par grol 'gyurab// de ni bcom ldan mi yi mchog gis mkhyen// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug 'byung ba spong// gang
gos sems can ngan song gsum mchi dang// gang gis bde 'gror mchis par 'gyur ba las// 'gro bas legs ba bgyis dang mos bgyis mkhyen// 'gro ba phan mdzad gang dag 'dasa rnams
dang/ da ltar lha dang mi se mchod rnams dang// gang dag ma byon yon tan mchog mthor phyin// bde gshegs de dag thamasacud rab tu mkhyen// dag pa'i zhing dang phun sum tshogs 'khor dang/
byang chub soms dba'itshogs dang nyan thos dang// drang srong chen po rnams kyi sku tshe'i tshad// rnam pa kun tu m lus rnam par mkhyen// mya ngan 'das nas chos gnas ci 'dra dang// rgyal ba rang
bsralamachod pa ci 'dra dang// da ni chos madzod 'dzin ba ci 'dra ba// de dag ma lus mi yid m pas mkhyen// dus gsum rnams su rtag par stobs bcu yi// ye shes mkhyen ba sgrib pa mi
ma' 'jug/ chos rnams kun la thugs ni chags mi mnga'// phyag 'tshal rgyal ba ma shes ma khyod la// khyod dang mtshungs mnya mtshams ga la lhag/ skaram rnams kyis nam mkha'ispras
pa ltar// mtshan rnams kyis kyang skuni rab spras pa// mi mchog thub pa mchog la phyag 'tshal lo// gzugasakyang mtshungs pa ma mchis yid dumachi// lhar bcas 'gro
bzil du rlag par bgyid// tshangs pa brgya byin 'ogamin lha rnams kyis// khyod kyi spyan sngar de dgamadzes ma lags// khyod ni gsar gyi ri ltar dris ma'// dbu snum 'jam zhingagayas su 'khyil
bar gnas// lhun po rgyal po lta bur spyi gtsug 'phags// bsod nams rgya chen byung ba lam mer bzhugs// 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig rab 'gyed cing// khyod kyi spyinoma'i mtshams kyi mdzod spumadzra/
pa 'gro ba thugs rjod gos pas gang gzigs pa// spyanani ut+pal 'dra zhing yid dumachi// zla 1dri med mkha' la ji lta bar// rnam 'dren khyod kyi zhalan lam ma ste// lta ba'i skyo bo ngoms par mi
'gyur ba// zhal bzangs mi yi mchog la phyag 'tshol la// ngang pa rma bya ri dwags rgyal gyi skabs// glang po dregs pa dbal gyisamang stabs kyis// sa rnams g.yo bar mdzad cing rab gsheg
ba stobs bcu bal zhugs brtan la phyag 'tshal lo// phyag gisor mo rang zhang zlum lamadzes// sen mo zangs mdog dag cing dra bas spras// bzhengasakyang pus mo'i lha ngar reg cing/
bslabs// sku mdog gser mdog 'dra la phyag 'tshalal// 'khor lodra bas khyab pa'i zhabs 'dor bas// sasteng ri mor mdzad cing rab tu gshegs// zhabs kyi 'od zer gyis ni yongs
smin pa'i// mi rnams gus nas lha yi 'jig rtenamachi// chos kyi rgyal po bdun sbyin pa po// chos kyi sbyin bdag dul ba'i thugs mnga' ba// chos kyi spyod pas 'gro ba rjes ston pa// 'dren
bachos kyi rjel phyag 'tshal lo// byams pa'i gocha dran pa'i ral gri mchog/ tshul khrims gzhudang shes rab thabs kyi mda'// de yis skye 'chi sridasrid 'phel bgyid ba// nyon mongs
dgu dag rnam par brtson par gyur// brgal nas sems can khrag khrig rnams kyang sgrol// grol nas 'chingab las ni 'gro ba 'grel// bde gshegs gang gis zhiba'i gnas mchi ba//
bde ba 'amasan ma mchis lam yang ston// gang na skye dang 'chi ba ma mchis 'ang// 'bral ba'i sdug bsngal 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba// gnas mchog zhib 'dus ma bgyis pa de// thugs rje
bsnyes nas khyod kyis bstan ba mdzad// chos kun dbangag phal gshegs ba'i rgyal// thub pa chen po 'jig rtena mchog bsodropas// bdag gis 'dir nabasod nams gang bsags des//
'gro ba byang chub mngon par 'tshang rgya shog// de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon bar bstod nas/ thalamo
sbyar te/ stan las langs nas/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/ pusamogayas pa'i lhangs la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan
u/ 'das la 'di skad ces gsol te/ gal te zhus nas zhu b.lung bstan pa'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phyin/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
ba dgu bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdaga phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu lags so// de skad ces gsol ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong pa 'di
skad ces bka' stsal to// yul 'khor skyong khyed ci dang ci 'dod ba dris shig dang/ ngas dris pa de dang de nyid kyi lung bstan pas/ khyod kyisams rangs par bya'o// deskad ces bka' stsal pa dang/
tshodang ldan ba yul 'khor skyong gis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos du dang ldan na/ sa thamasacad kyi yon/
nagyi khyad par thob par 'gyur/ gzhan la rags las pa'i shes pa 'thob/ myur ba'i shes rab 'thob/ spobs pa rnam par nges pa thob/ snang ba 'thob/ thams cad mkhyen bad la 'jug
pa dang/ sems can yongs su smin par bgyid pa dang/ yid gnyis slong ba dang/ som nyi spang ba dang/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du rnam par nges pa 'thob/ sems can 'dzud pa la mkhasal
dang/ ji skad smos pa de bzhin du bgyid pa dang/ ldem po ngag yang dag pa dang/ sems can gyi khams lamakhas pa dang/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa thob pa dang/ zhub thams cad zhu ba dang/
chos thams cad 'dzin pa dang/ myur du thams cad mkhyenapa nyid 'thob par 'gyur/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis de'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis gsol to//
byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rab ngasab// yang dag nyid du ji ltar de 'byung dang// ye shes rgya mtshobaka' mchid rnam nges pa// mi mchog rgyal bas bdag la bshad du gsol// shin tu sbyangs pa'i
gas gyi gzugs lta bu// sems can dam pa bsod nams mchogabasags pa// khyod ni skyabs dnga gnas dang dbu gnyenalags// byang chub spyod mchog drimadadeng bdagagasungs// gzungs dang/
bdud rtsi byang chub 'byung ba yi// ye shes mi zad ji ltar 'thob par 'gyur// gang gis skye bo'i dogs pa gcod 'gyur ba// shes rab rgya mtsho ji ltar rnam par dag/ 'khor bar bskal ba brgya phragamang
bo ni// 'jig rten sdug bsngal nyenal lta bgyid kyang// skyo ba'i blonanam yang mi skyod cing// de dag don dge skyon bar 'gyur ba dang// dag pa'i zhing dang phun sum tshogs 'khor dang// tshe mchog
dang ni phun sum tshogs zhing drang// sems can ched kyis bka' mchod med dang// byang chub spyod pa dri med bshad du gsol// bdud 'joms mdzad ba lta ngan sbyong ba po// srid pa skams pa rnam
grol ga mdzad pa// chos kyi tshul yang bskyud par mi 'gyur ba// sems can rin chen spyoda mchog bstan du gsol// gzugs dang longs spyod spobs pa phun sumatshogs// snyam ba'i gsung
khyu// gis 'khor rnams tshim mdzad pa// bde gshegs rjin ltar 'gro ba tshim mdzad pa// sangs rgyas spyod yul legs par bstan du gsol// kal ba da'i sgranagasung
'byin pa// tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyis blo ngan rab 'jig pa/ ngos 'tshal gyur pa'i 'khor rnams lhags lags kyis// gtsobor bdud rtsi'i ri yis tshim par mdzod// byang chub dam pa mchog
la 'dun pa mchis// chos la 'dunub bzlog pa'i mi rigs te// 'dren pa bstan pa mdzad pa'i dus 'di lags// zhe chen dam pa bsgrags ba'i dus la bab// thub pa bgani byang chub 'i
bamachis// bdag gi bsam pa rgyalaM bas rab tu mkhyen// rgyal bco 'dris lags don du gnyer// spyod ba dam ba legs par bshad du gsol// de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'ad/
kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// yul 'khor skyong khyod legs so legs so// yul 'khor skyong khyod skye bo mang bo la phan pa'i phyi zhugs pa dang/ tshul
'khor skyob khyod spyi bomang po la bde ba dang/ lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang/ phan pa dang/ da ltar dang/ ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dba'asams dpa' chapo rnams yongs su gzung ba'i yi
de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di 'dri bar sams pan legs so// yul 'khor skyong khyod de'i phyir/ legs bar rab tu nyon la yid la zung zhig dang/ ngas khyod la bshad do// bcom ldan 'das/
0 legs so zhes gsol te/ tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// yul 'khor skyongabyang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ yongs su dag pa 'di'azlob bo// bzhi gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ bsam pa dang lhag pa'i bsam pas nan tan byed pa dang/ sems can
thams cad lasams mnyam pa dang/ stong pa nyid sgom pa dang/ ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed pa ste/ tshul 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/
yongs su dag pa 'di dag 'thob bo// 'di la 'di chos du yin te/ de la 'di skad ces bya'o// bsam pa thag bas rtag tu mngon brtson pa// byang chub lam lasam ldog yid ldan pa// g.yo
mad thaba medacing rgyumadapa// ye shes mtha' yas ldan la de dag yod// skye dang nu dang mdang 'chis gzir ba// sems can magon med sdugabasngala mthong nas ni// srid pa'i mtsho las 'gro ba
sgral ba'i phyir// de dgachos kyi thun mang dag sbyor// sa ba sems can kun la sems mnyam pa// bu gcig ba bzhin 'gro ba rnams la lto// 'di dag thams cad bdag gis dgrol lo zhes//
gang zaga mchog gi bsamab de 'dra'o// stong nyid rtag tu rtogs bar khong du chud// bdag yod ma yin sems can yod ma yin// 'dus byas sbyam rmi lam 'dra ba la// byis bami mkhas 'di
la rnam par rmongs// mkhas pa de dag ji skad tshig smras pa// de la nan tan byed cing kun tu gnas// dul zhing zhi la rtag tu skyon rnams sangs// rgyal ba'i sras rnams
[R ]byang chub lam la dga'// yul 'khor skyong ba bzhi bo 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbugs 'byin pa 'thob pa ste/ bzhi gang zhenaM/ gzungs 'thob pa dang/ dge ba'i bshes
gnyen rnyed pa dang/ chos khrab mo la bzod pa thob pa dang/ tshul khrims yongs su dag ba yang dgar spyod pa ste/ yul 'khor skyong bzhi po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis dbugs
'byin pa 'thob pa'o// 'di la 'di ni chos nyidaman te/ de la 'di skad ces bya'o// gang gis sangs rgyus kun gyis gsungs pa'i chos mchog 'dzin 'gyur ba// gzungs rnams grags pa chen po/
de dag gis ni rtag tu thob// nam yang chud zar mi 'gyur phyi'i dang blo gros rab tu 'phel// de dag la shes chags pa mad cing chos kun pha rol phyin// byang chub yan lag 'brel bar byed pa'i dge
ba'i bshesagatan red// de dag 'dren po rnams ni gang nas bzhud pa'i lam mchog ston// dedag sdig pa'i grogs po dga' ston pa ma yin te// tshags byed bdag nyid maltar de dag ring du
rnam par spong// dpa' bo stong ba nyid dang ldan pa'i zabamo'atshosathesanas// de dag bdag dang sems can srog tu lta ba kun mi 'byung// de dag tshul khrims skyonamed dul zhing zhi ba'i yidi dang ]
ldan sangs rgyas tshul khrims banamed la sems can rnams kyang sbyor// yul 'khor skyong ba'i po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ban 'khod pa rnams dga' bar byed pa'i chos te/
bzhi gang zhen/ yul 'khor skyong sangs rgyas mthong ba/ byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba na 'khod pa rnams dga' bar byed pa'i chos dang/ yul 'khor skyong rjes su mthun pa'i chos thos
pa/ byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ban 'khodapa rnams dga' bar byed pa'i chos dang/ yul 'khor skyong bdog pa thams cad yongs sugatong ba/ byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba na 'khod
b rnams dga' bar byed pa'i chos dang/ yul 'khor skyong dmigs sumad pa'i chos la bzedab/ byang chub sems dpa' 'khor bana'akhod pa rnams dga' bar byed pa'i chos te/ tshul
'khor skyong bzhi po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ban 'khod ba rnams dga' bar byed pa'i chos so// 'di la 'dan chos nyid yin te/ dil 'di skad ces bya'o// gzi brjid kyis
ni 'jig rten thams cad kun nas snang mdzad pa'i// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi mchog tshe rabs kun tu de dag mthong// byang chub dam ba mchogatsholatshon sems can dgrol ba'i phyir// dga'
zhing gus par gnas nias de ltar mi dbang rgyal bo mchod// 'dren pa rnams las zhib rjes su mthun pa'i chos kyang tan// thos nas bsam pa thag pas brtan pa tshul bzhin rab tu sbyor// dmig
mdachos thos chos 'di thams cad samasacan med ba dang// 'di la bdag med pa ni chos la som nyid ma skyo// de ni bdog pa thams cad yongasagatong rtagatugan 'dzin/
med// slong ba nya bar 'ongs pa mthong n sams ni rab tu dga'/ grong dang yul 'khor sa dang srog dang bu dang chung ma dang// thabs cad gtong zhing de yi sems ni gang du'ang g.yo ba med// yul
'khor skyong byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi la blta bar mi bya ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ yul 'go skyong byang chub sems dpas khyim gyi gnas la blta bar mi bya ba dang/ yul 'khor skyong byung chub
sems dpas rab tu byung nasared pa dang bkur sti la blta bar ma bya ba dang/ yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpas khyim la 'dres pa la blta bar mi bya ba dang/ mul 'khor skyong byang chub sems
dbas lus dang srog lo blta ba'am bya bste/ yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems dbas chos bzhi pod dag la blta bar mi bya'o// 'di la 'di ni ches nyid yin te/ la'adi skad ces bya'o// skyon gyis
gzings pa mtha' yas ldan pa'i khyim spangs rtag tunor mi blta// yon tan ldan ba des pa de dag dgon par dga' zhing dbang po dul// de dag gang du'ang bud med rnams dang skyes ba dag dang 'dris
mi byed// bas ltar gcig bu gnas shing bsam pa drimad dag la dri ma bral// de dgared ba rnams kyis dga' bar mi 'gyur mi thob yid zhum mad// 'dod pa chung ste ngan ngon tsam la dga' zhing sgyu
dang tshulatshos spangs// sems can don phyir brtson 'grus yid ldan sbyin dang rdul la rab tu gnas// sangs rgyas ye shes don gnyer bsam gtan brtson 'grus yon tan pha rol phyin// lus dang
de bzhin srog la mi blta sdug ba'i rtsa laga rnam spangs te// bsam ba rdo rje lta bur rab brtan rtag tu byang chub l sbyor// lus ni ma bu dum bur bcad kyang de dag sems la g.yo ba med// thams cad
mkhyen nyid deb phur zhing brtson 'grus shin tuban 'dir rtsom// yul 'khor skyong bzhi bo 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gdung ba med par byed pa'i chos te/ bzhi gang zhen/
yul 'khor skyong tshul khrims skyon med pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gdung ba med par byed pa'i chos dang/ yul 'khor skyong dgon pa la gnas pa mi 'dor ba byang chub sems dpa'
rnams kyi gdung ba med par byed pa'i chos dang/ ul 'khor skyong 'phags pa'i gis bzhi dang mthun par byed pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gdung ba med par byed pa'i chos dang//
tshul 'khor skyong mang du klos par thob par byed pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gdung ba med par byed pa'i chos te/ yul 'khor skyong bzhi po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
gdung ba med par byed pa'i tshos so// 'di la 'di ni chos 'di yin te/ de la 'di skad ces bya'o/ sangs rgyas tshul khrims dam pa 'di la 'dod byed cing// tshul khrims drimadanor bu rin chen
'drab srung// de dag ngani khrims ldan legs sdom yin mi shes// tshul khrims de nyid la ni rtag tu sems can sbyor// de dag stong padagon bar rtag tu gnas par byed//
de dag bdag gi 'du shes srog gi 'du shes med// gzugasakun rtswa dang shing dang rtsig pa 'dra bar mthong// 'di la skyes pa budamad bdag gi med pa mthong// 'bags 'gos bzhi la dga'
zhing g.yo mad tshul 'chos mad/ 3khagayod de dag bsam pa dag pas rab tu sbyor// thos dang yon tan rnams la rtag tu brtson pa khyed// bde bar gshegs pa'i yon tan mthu chen don du
gnyer/ bya sla'achibs bcom zhing yun ring nad gzir ba// 'gro ba mgon med srid pa'i btson ra 'di'i bltas nas// zhi ba dam ba mchog gis chos kyi gru sbyar te// srid ba'i rgya mtsho'i chu las
skya bo sgrol bar byed// 'dus byas gyur par 'jig rten 'khyamabs skyabs mgonadang// dpungagatan byed pa gzhan ni gang yang yod min gyis// bdagagis somasacan 'dadag thamasacad
yongs dgrol zhes// de phyir byang chub mchog tu bdag gis smon lam btab// yul 'khor skyong byang chub sams dpas bzhi bo 'di dag ni cang shes kyi 'gros su shes bar bya ste/ bzhigang zhu
na bde 'gro theb ste/ de yang sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang phrad pa dang/ blam la sri zhu byed de/ de yang zang zitshe med pa'i sems kyis bstan ba dang/ bas mtha'i gnas mal la mngon par dga' ste/
de yang rnyed pa dang bkur sti la mi blta ba dang/ slobs pa thobalta/ de yang zab mo la bzod pa dang ldan pa ste/ yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpas chos bzhi bo de dag ni/ cang shesakyi 'gros
su shes bar bya'o// 'di la 'di ni chos nyid yin te/ de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ brtan pa nags dngasul na rtag tu gnas par byed// de dag rtag tu kho mo'i nad pa don gnyer min// chags mdablo/
na rtag tu slobs dang ldan pa yin// zabamo'i chos lamakhas shing spros pa rnams dang bral// rtag tu khor mor bum rnams la sri zhu byed// de dag jiskad smras pa de bzhin de drag sbyor// bde gsheg
dpag tu med pa mang bomis kha 'byed// rgyal ba'i ye shes ched du mchod pa rgya chen byed// grogs pachen po rnams kyi 'gro ba gtso bor 'gyur// lhami rnams kyin ngan spyi boraphyin pa yin//rdzog
pa'i byang chub lam la rtag tu sems can 'dzud// dge ba bcu po dag la'ang yang dag sbyor bar byed// sas rgyas yon tan thos nas de dag dga' 'gyur te// de dga' po mi thogs de dag
bar 'gyur// de dag byang chub rdul bral dam pa sangs rgyas nas// sems can khrag khrig sdug bsngal matha' gas rnams las 'grol// gul 'khor skyong bzhi po 'di dag ni/ byang chub som/
dpa' rnams kyi byang chub semaMs dpa'i spyod pa yongs su sbyong ba'i chos yin te/ bzhi gang zhen/ khong khro ba med pa'i sems byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang/ tshul 'chos pa dang/ kha gsag
khyu// dang/ thob kyis 'jal ba yongs su spangs te dgon par gnas pa dang/ bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong zhing rnam par smin pa la re ba med pa dang/ nyin mtshan du skyes
'dod cing/ chos ba rnams la 'khrul pa mi tshol ba ste/ yul 'khor skyongabazhi po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su sbyong ba'i chos so/
denas bcom ldan 'asakyis de'i tsho tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// bla na med pa'i byang chub 'dod pan// tha ba drima med cing khro sems med// de ni su la'ang skyon tshol byed ma
yin// g.yo med tshul 'chos med cing sos sems med// khyim gyi blo gros pa yang mya pa ngan mya// skye bo ngan 'grogs tshul bzhin rang 'gyur ba// spangs te de lami blta rab byung nas// thar pa 'dod
ba'iri khrodo gnas bar byed// dgon pa bsamatha'i rnam pa bstan pa na// shes khe thob pa kun lami bstan zhing// lus dang srog la'ang lta bar mi byed la// seng ge lta bur gnas shing dgra las rgyal/
byang chub lamaphyir la shes tshol ba na// ngan ngon tsam gyis chog par 'dzin byed cing// rtag tu bya lta sogasapa sngangs nas nii// 'jigarten kun la gnas pa ma yin no// dbar nA bas ltar gacig
bu gnas byed cing// seng ge lta bur 'jigs pa yodam yin// ri dgas lta bur sar 'jigs yod mi ston// de ni mchod pas khengs bar 'gyur ba med/ galangasar ltung ba'i 'gro ba 'di bltas
nas// rab tu thar bar bya phyi'i 'bad par byed// gal te bag yod dge ba'i chos sbyong n// bdagakyang 'gro ba 'di yi dpung gnyen 'gyur// mi mchog spyod pa 'di dag 'dod bani// 'dzum pa'i
bzhin gyis ba sAn tshig sna zhing// sdug dang mi sdug rtag tu rtogasams med// rlung dang 'drab r chags pa dpar gnas// stong ba nyid dang mtshan ma yod la gnas// 'dus byas kun la
sgyum lta bur rtogs// yangs pa'i blo dong zhi dang dulaM la dga'// de ni rtag tu bdud rtsi'i 'o yis mgu// tsunas byang chub lamani grub byed cing// de ni rtag tu bsam pa yongs su sbyong//
gzungs dang spobs pa tshol bar byed pan// yon tan 'dodob sdug bsngal brgya dag bzod// byang chub sems dpa'i spyodab 'dibaltasanas// gapazhig don du gnyer ba de dga' 'gyur//
gang zhig byang chub 'di lamamos pa// blo chung de ni nyes pa brgya ya ngoskyed// yul 'khor skyong bzhi bo 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i g.yangs ste/ bzhi gzhan/ yul 'khor
skyong ma gus pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi g.yang sa dang/ yul 'khor skyong byas pa mi gzo zhing g.yo la bstan pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyig yangs dang/ yul 'khor skyong
rdodapa dang bkur sti la chags pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi g.yang sa dang/ yul 'khor skyong tshul 'chos pa dang/ khagasag gis red ba dang/ bkur sti sgrubapa byang chub sems
@#// dpa' rnams kyi g.yangs ste/ yul 'khor skyong bzhi po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi g.yang sa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ de'i tsho tshigs
su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// 'phags pa bla ma rnams dang pha ma la// de dag rtag tu gus pa med pa yin// de dag byas pa mi gzo g.yo can te// rtag tu kun tu ma bsdams byed cing
rmos// red la rtag tu chags shing zhen pa ste// de dag tshul 'chos pa dang g.yo sbyor dga'// kha cig tshul khrims brtul zhugs su bltasakyang// 'di na bdag dang mtshungs pa med ces
de dag phan tshun sdang bar sems bsta// glags tshol ba la rtag tu brtson pa yin// de dag zhing gi las dang tshong la dga'// de dag dge sbyong yon tan shin tu ringes// phyi ma'i dusan 'di ltar
ma bsdams pa'i// dge slong tshul khrims yon tan rab rang ba// de dag mtshang 'dru ba dang 'thab pa dang// phrag dog dbang gis chos 'di nub par byed// byang chub lam las rtag ba shin tu ring//
zla 'bags pa'i nor las de dag shanitu'ang// 'phags lamagya nom rnam par spangs nas nii// de dag 'gro ba lngar ni 'khyam par 'gyur/ yul 'khor skyong bzhi po 'di dagani/ byang chub sems
dpa' rnams kyi byang chub la bgegs byed pa'i chos te/ bzhi gang zhen/ yul 'khor skyong 'a' byang chub sams dpa' rnams kyi byang chub la bgegaso da pa'i chos dang/ yul 'khor skyong ma dad
ba byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub la bgegs byed pa'i chos dang/ yul 'khor skyong du rgyal byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub la bgegs byed pa'i chos dang/ yul 'khor skyong
pha rol gyi mchod pa la phrag dog dang/ ser sna'i sems dang ldan pa byang chub sems dpa rnams kyi byang chub la bgegs byed pa'i chos te/ ul 'khor skyong bzhi bo de dag/ byang chub sems dapa'
rnams kyi byang chub la bgegs byed pa'i chos so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tsho tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// mdud le lo rtag tu rmongs pa'i sems// de dag mngon pa'ing
can rtagatu khro// bzod ldan rtag brtson dge slong mthong nas ni// gtsug lag khang nas 'gretshe dbyug bsabag/ pha rol mchod phyir 'dir ni phrag dog skye// de dgasams gnas pa yod ma yin/

glags lta byed cing 'khrul pa tshol ba can// su la 'khrul yod gang lagleng bya snyam// de dag nga yi bstan pa 'di las ring// de dag yon tan sta zhing ngan songagazhol// de dag rgyal ba'i bstan pa bor nas

ni// n gnas ong shin tu mi bzad 'bar bar 'gro// de dag rnams kyi sdig pa'i spyod pa dang// chos min ldan 'gro ba sdig 'dir thos nas// rtagacu 'khor mor byang chub lam la sbyor// ngan 'gror skyes shing
gdung bar gyur ta re// sangs rgyas 'jig rten phan pa drang srong che// bskal pa bye mang brgya lam 'byung bar 'gyur// da ltar dal ba dam pa red pa la// gal te thar 'dod bag med spang bar gyis// yul
'khor skyong gang zag bzhi po 'di dag ni// byang chub sems dpas bstan par mi bya ba ste/ bzhi gang zhan/ yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpas sdig pa'i bshes
gnyen gyi gang zag bstan par mi bya ba dang/ yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpas dmigs bar lta ba can gyis gang zag bstan par mi bya ba dang/ yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpas dam pa'i

chos spong ba'i gang zag bstan par mi bya ba dang/ yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpas zang zing la brkam pa'i gang zag bstan par mi bya ba ste/ yul 'khor skyong gang zag bzhi po de dag ni/byang chub
sems dpas bstan par mi bya ba'o// de nas bcom ldan 'dasakyis de'i tsho tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// gang dag sdug ba'i bshes gnyen rnam spong zhing// gang dag dge ba'i bshesaM
gtan stan byed b// de dag rtag tu byang chub lam la 'phel// dbar namakha' la zla ba yar ngo bzhin// dmigs par lta la rtag tu zhen pa dang// bdag dang srog dang gso bar zhen pa dang// de dag dug/
byas bzhin du rtag tu srungs// gang dag sangs rgyas ye shes don miganyer// gang dag mi mchog rnams kyi zhi ba'i chos// 'dod chags bral ba bdud rtsi mthun slong ba// dedagadaparanangan skyugs lnga

bzhin sangs// gang zhig byang chub dam pa 'tshang rgyar 'dod// zang zing dag dang chos gos lhung bzed chags// rtag tu khyim la 'dris par byed bartson pa// de dag rnams dang 'dres par mi bya ste// de dag
me yi 'obs bzhin spang bar bya// gang zhig bdud ni gdul bar bya ba dang// 'khor lo dam pa bla med bskor ba dang// de ltar sems can don langs byed 'dod pa// des ni sdig pa'i bshes gnyen

sbyang bar bya// gang 'gabyang chub dam pa 'tshang rgya'adod// de yis rnyed dang sdug dang mi sdug dang// grags dang mtshang 'druphrag dog nga spangs te/ sangs rgyas yashes rtag tu btsal bar bya// yul
'khor skyong bzhi bo 'di dag ni// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sdug bsngal rnamabar snyan pa'i chos bzhi sku/ bzhi gang zhen/ yul 'khor skyong shes bas mngon par ma sems su byed pa
byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sdug bsngal rnam par sminapa'i chos dang/ yul 'khor skyong phrag dog dang ser sna dang ldan pa'i sems byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sdug bsngal rnam par smin
ba 'is dang/ yul 'khor skyong ma mos pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sdug bsngal rnam par smin pa'i chos dang/ yul 'khor skyong yongasasum dag pa'i shes ba dang/ bzod pa'i longs spyod
yongs su tshol ba byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sdug bsngal rnam par smin pa'i chos te/ yul 'khor skyong bzhi bo de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sdug bsngal rnam par smin pa'i
chos so// danag bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// gang dgas la chos ni 'dzin 'gyur zhing// 'gro ba thams cad kyis kyang mchod 'gyur ba// de lami shes
pas na bar s byed na// des na de ni sdug bsngal mtha' yas rnyed// ya rabs zhig gang zhig longs spyod tshol// shes pa ma dag rtag tu 'dun cing 'dod// gang zhig rtag tu
ngargyal khengs gyur la// bla ma 'phags pa'i skya bo mi 'dud cing// sangs rgyas la yang mos pa yong min pa// chos dang tshogos la de ni mos pa med// bslab dang sbyangs pa rnams la de mi mos//
sdig pa'i blo cani ngan song gsum phyogs pa// dminang 'di nas sha 'thos nas// las kyi dbang gis mi mkhas rnam par rmongs// dmyal ba'am 'on dud 'gro'i 'gro rnams sam// yi dgas
'gro ba rnams su sdug bsngal red/ gang zhig 'jig rten sgron 'gyur blo ldan zhing// mi yi dbang po'i sdug bsngal mthar 'byin pa/ de yis ngan song lam rnams rab spangs te// byang chub lam
ni rtag tu bstan par bo// bam po gnyis pa yu la 'khor skyong bzhi po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'ching ba ste/ bzhi gang
zlazhin/ pha'ol la brnyas pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'ching ba dang/ 'jig rten pa'i thabs kyis bsgom pa la sbyor ba drang/ mtshan ma'i 'du shes byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'ching ba dang/
u0f38kun 'dzin pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang/ ye shes dang bral ba dang/ bag med pa la bstan pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'ching ba dang/ phyir 'brang ba'i sems kyis khyim la 'dres par byed pa
byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'ching ba ste/ yul 'khor skyong bzhi po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dang 'a rnams kyi 'ching ba'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ de'i tsho tshigs su bcad pa 'di
dag bka' stsal te// rtag tu gzhan dag la ni bar s byed cing// rtag tu 'jig rten pa yi bsam gtan sgom// ltar gyur 'di dag gis ni de bcings te// glang po lus de 'dam du song ba bzhin//
khyim la 'dris byed 'ching dang ldan pa dang// gang zhig bag med rtag tu kun 'dzin sams// ye shes spangs shing blo gros rmongs gyur ba/ mi'igs spyod pa 'di dag rnams kyis bcings// gang zhig
sdug bsnga la 'jigs pa 'di dag dang// skye rga 'chil sogs las grol 'dod pa// banas par byed dang rlom sems bor nas ni// byang chub lam la rtag tu brtson par 'gyur// sdug bsngal
mtha' yas ma lus brjod byas te// bad ba kun la chags pa med gyur nas// sdug dang mi sdug mnyin pa ma lus btang// brtan pa dag ni sdug bral sangs rgyas 'gyur// pha rol phyin drug sa
dang yon tan dang// stobs dang dbang po dag dang shes la sbyor// yon tan kun dang rtog ldan gyur nas// gaba'i dra bgrolabasangs rgyas gyur// bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab sngon sbyong tsho/
sems can phan phyir byang chub mchog don du// sbyin dang dul dang des la rtag tu spyad// gnyen pa spangs nas bdeb gnas par gyur// bsamatha' gnas su rtag par nga dga' ste// byang chub
ched du bsam ba rnam par sbyangs// brgya laman yang brtson 'grus nyams ma gyur// skyes chen rnams kyi ye shes de 'dra'o// srid pa'i btson rar 'gro ba la 'khyam pas//
sems can 'khyam pa'i 'gro ba mthong nas nii// sngon chad 'di ni sing rje rgya cher bskyod// 'gro ba'i don du byang chub dam pa bsgrubs// bskal pa mang por byang chub mchog tshol zhing// rang
gi bu pho bu mo chung ma sdug/ 'phangs pa'i srog dang shin tu 'byor sa dang// grong khyer nor dang 'bru rnams mang po btang// mo tog 'bras bu chu 'byor nyams dga' ba'i// nags su thub pa
ngan bzod dgar gyur// sum tshan rgyal bos lag pa rkang pa bcad// de tshe nga ni sdang pa'i yid ma gyur// nags dang sulan spyobasangs zhes bya ba'i// thub pas bla ma rgas pa gso ba na//
mi yi dbang pos sri ba'i mdas bsnun kyang// yid kyis yongs su gnod par sems ma gyur// logs par gsungs pa'i ched du g.yang sa nas// lus la ma bltas rab tu mchongos par
rgyu gyur[}]nga ni byang chub mchog gi rgyu yi phyir// lus dang srog la bltas par ma gyur to// stag mo bu dang bcas pa'i srogagi phyir// lus btang nas nii stag mo tshim par byas// nam mkha'
las ni lha yi tshogs rnams kyis// skyes chen brtson 'grus brtan pa legs zhes bsgrags// gang tsho sngon chad sridapa'i spyod pa na// sbyin la rab dga' bram ze khye'u gyur tshe// ni chen ched du
rgya mtsho bskams nas ni// nor bu rnyed nas sems can bde bar byas// rgyal po zla ba'i bu zhes bya gyur te// brjod ba grags shing nga ni spyod pa'i tshe// nga yis bden pa'i tshul gyis rgyal po
brgya/ gsad par bya ba myur du tharapar byas// dbul zhing sdug bsngal lus ni btang byas te// nga yis nor rnyed de ni phyug bor byas// da tshong ni kun sbyin rgyal por gyur// nga 'dir mi yi rgyal
bor gyur pa'i tshe// skyabasaMsu 'ongs pa'i phug ron mthong nas ni/ yang gi lus las sha yang bcad byas te// rang lus M sabatang 'jigs pas 'phongs ma btang/ rgyal po ral pa can zhes/
sngon gyur tshe// sman pa mchog gis nga yiched du na// mtshungs med sman rnams ma lus sbyarab yang// srog btang sani de dag gzhan la byin// 'gro ba'i donaphyir sngon chad sdod pa na// rgyal
bu mchab bzazhes byagyur/ chung ma ma dri khyo las mi 'phyo ba// bur bcas bu mom gas ma bltas btang// gang tshe brtson 'grus 'bar zhes bya gyur tshe// nga ston lon stong du tshang bar
yang/ bya dka' brgyad cu rtsa bzhi bzod par byas// nor dang dbal yang sngon chad ngas btang ngo// rgyal po gzi brjid dri ma med gyur tshe// nga yis rgyal ba'i ring bsrel mchod rten bdun// mchog

n gnas bcom ldan 'das se dmigs su bcad pa 'di ga bka' stsal to// yang dag ma bsdams dod cinges pa can// ma gus nga rgyal ldan zhingachags shas che// nyon mongs zilatshon phra ba
nyon mongs bcas// de 'dradag la byang chub mchog rab ring// chags pas zil gyis nonan le la'aphel// la 'as zil gyisanonan dad panyams// dudapa nyamasan tshul khrims rab tu nyams//
tshul khrims 'chal bur gyuran bzang 'gro nyams// dbul por gyur pas rab tu byung gyur te// mchod pa rang nas dbul las grol bar 'gyur// de dag gsar gyi khun po gnas su// gso
ma'i bun len par byed dang mtshungs// rAdang naM du gnyer bsadagon par 'gro// nasong nas kyang gos dang 'du tshol// mngon shes sa dang spobs pa phun sum tshogs/ de nas ni
'i yang nya du 'ani// rmongs nas nga rgyal dbang gis ngan song la// ma bos 'gro rnams dang dbul bo dang// ma' ba'i rigs su skye zhing lengob dang/ mdog ldan pa dang mjuchung de dag 'dzin/
de dag tshul dang spyodopa yongs nyams dngos// bgamed re nas dran ba rab tu nyams// g.yang sachen po mi bzad ltung bar 'gyur// des bskal pa bye par thar pa med// gal te 'dirin thob pas byang chub
na/ de phyir lhas byin gyis kyadapyadachub thog/ rnam par 'thor rlung gsan bya ltung ltar// chags pas kyang nadi ltar mi rigs so// bsod nams nyams shing gazhan gyi chungamachags// tshulakhriso/
ma ga ge ba rnams las nyams// byang chub sems kyi ye shes gang la thob// de dag bstan la mdegs du shingebazhin// byungachub don gnyer sangs rgyas satshol ba// dper na thar pa de bzhin
mi gnaso ni rong gis sbe'u la dam bcas ltar// ngo rgyalazil non byang chub de 'dra'o// byang chub den duganyarabs tshes chog bar// nga na se rang gis srogani 'phas pa 'ang btang// sa de btang
ga brtson dang mi ldan pa// med gyur nas bstan 'a sa ltung bar 'gyur// ngani sngon chad legs par bshad don phyir// gangs chen ngom lu 'bar bar mchongs// dathosanas ni sdug da mi sdug pa//
thams cad rnam par sbas te na nags// bstan pa sna tshogs yon tan 'byor bres la// deng gnam yang 'dod pa ma skyen// chos min 'dod la byang chub la yod// dperanaleng ba lam gsal
mdang mtshungs// yul 'khor skyongasngon byung ba 'das pa'i dusan// bskal pa gras med pa'ichis grangs med pa/ rgya che ba/ bsam gyis ma khyab pa/ mtshus pamed pa// dbagatumed pa/ tshad
med par gyur pa de'i tshe de'i dus na/ de bzhin goshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa// bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jigertan mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul/
ba'i kha 'asgyur ba/ bla med pa/ ltadang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das don grub nas bya ba 'gag rten du byung ngo// yul 'khor skyong de'i tshe de'i dus na/

rgyal po 'od zer ldan zhes bya ba zhig byung ngo// yul 'khor skye rgyal po 'od zer ldan na 'dzam bu gling dpag tshad khri drug stong la rgyal srid byed// yul 'khoraskyong de'atshade'i dusan/'dzam bu gling na grong khyer

nyi khri dang khyim bye ba phrag stong yod do// yul 'khor skyong rgyal po 'dor du/de rgyal pos pho brang gsan gnas pa rgyal bo 'od zer ldan grong khyer ne por snang ba zhes bya ba la nub tu chur pag tshad bcu gnyis lo

hUM/ lho byang durgyar dpag tshad 'dun yod pa/ rin po chu sna bdun gyi phyir rim pa bdun dang/ mig mangs go su bris pas mdzes par byas pa yod do// 'otshesems can rnams kyi tsho'i tsho na'i bya ba phrag du cu thub par
'gyur te// yul 'khor skyong rgyal pa'od zer ldan gyi bu bsod nams 'od zer zhes bya bgazugs bzung ba/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ kha dogo bslang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa zhig yod// da ba sa

ma thag tu rin po che sna bdun gyi gterastong byung bar gyur to// rgyal po'i khong bzas zhing du yang ni bomasnaban gyi gter ma byecu'i tshodotsam byung bar gyur to// yul 'khor skyong rgyal bu gzhononung so nams kyi
'od zer de bas ma thag tu 'dzam bu gling po'i sems can thams cad yi rang bar gyur to// sems can gang dag pad ran 'bod pa dag kyang btson nas thar par gyur to// yul 'khor skyong rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod

kanams kyi 'od zer des zhim bdun gyis 'jig rten pa'i skyo tshul ji snyed pa de dag thams cad rtogs par gyur to// lul 'khor skyong de nas gnas gtsang ma'i resikyi lha rnams kyis nam gyi gdul bab pa dang/ rgyal du

gzhon nu se nags kyi 'od zer la gzhon nu khyod bag yod par gyis shige/ ma rtog pas so sor brtag pa la mkhas par gyisagi/ gzhon inamA kyi srog ni tshan po med pa ste/tsho'athos par 'gro yin gyi/'jig rten ra

rol la 'jigs par blta bar bzhi las dang bya ba dang 'og gi bar gyis shig ces bskul te/ de'atsholha'abu de dag gis tshog su bcad pa 'didig kyang smras so/ gnon nung ga med du 'gyur ta re/bag med dbang du song par gyur tar/

bde bar gshegs pas bag yod rab stod cing//bde gshegs rnams kyiseng gamed rnamA kya smad/des da gang dag 'di na nga ga yodacing//legs sdes dga' la ser sna med pa dang/ sems can kun la snying rje byams yid ldan//ded

ring por mi thogs ma mchog 'gyur//bde ba gshegs pa gang dag 'das pa dang/ 'azhi da ltar dag dang gang ma byon//dedag thams cad dge ba rnams kyis 'phags/ bag yod lamanyid la la shin tu gnas // bza' dang btung

dang tshes dang kha zas dang// gser dang dngul dang ner bumu tig rgyan// bskal pa bye bar de dag rnams kyis btang// byang chub dam pa 'di ni don du gnyer// rkang pa lag pa de bzhin na dang sna// slong ba rnams/
la rab tu dga' byonen/ byang chug yon tan kun gyis bsam rje gas nas// dag ring por ma thogs mi mchog 'gyur// rgyal srid bdung sdug pa'i bud med dang//
nor rnams thams cad du yang rnam sngangs te/ 'as byas gar la lta dang sgyu ma 'dras// kha dod pa med par dgon pa gnas par gyis// srog ni brtan pa med de
rtagatugayo/ 'jim pa'i bum pa lta bur 'jig pa can// brtan m 'dra zhing rtag tu ther zug min// gzhon nu 'di la rtagamed dag ma yin// na bgror ltung ba'i tshon 'dzin ni// pha dang ma
yang 'dzin par byed pa med/ mi yis dag dang ma dgagar byas pa// den rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur// 'dod pa'i rgyu sa bsalamang rgya mtsho ni// don med par yang gcig gis gcig
bsad de// khyod kyis ma phanam byas ni yang med// donamed nyid du la ba sten par 'gyur// daltar khyod kyis 'gro na byang tshu ba zhi// mtshus mad go 'phang dam pa btsal ba'i phyir// kang dang
shadang pags pa de bskams kyang// de lta na yang khyod ni de'am sems// bdebar gshegs pa 'byung ba red par dka'// zhi ba'achos thos ba yang ngashAn tu dka'// bsgrim pa byas te bdud kyi
phyogs bas lan// sa sa rgyas ye shes ring por ma thogs 'thob// bshes gnyen bzang la rtagatu+o sasten cing// sdig pa'i bshes gnyen yongs su spangs bar gyis// de dag rtag tu bsrong ma
khrid par byed// lam gol 'as kyang rtag tu blog par byed// brtson 'grus shin tu brtan pa leg khyes te// lus dang srog la 'dod pa rnam spangs nas// dodza lta bu'i snying gi bsam gtan par//
sangs rgyas lam 'di nyid la gnas par gyis// sngon gyi mi mchog dam pa 'od byed pa/// kun kyang ge'aphang dam pa bla med pa/// tshol ba'i tshon spyod yul dgon par dga'o// khyod kyang de dag spyod pa'i
lam du phyogs// dgen par gnas la rtag tu dgar bar gyis// pha dang ma dang sdug pa'i gnyen rnams dang// skye de snying du sdug pa kun sras la// lus dang srog la sred par m byed par//
bde gshegs ye shes rgya chen btsal bar gyis// yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer gyis de nas bzung ste lo bcu'i bar du nam yang chugs pa dang gnyid kyis non par ma gyur/
nam yang dgod bar ma gyur/ rtses par ma gyur/ dga' bar byed par ma gyur/ longs su spyad par ma gyur/ nam yang skyed mos tshal dum sod/ nam yang grogs po mthong nas ngo mtshar dum 'dzin/
nam yang sku la dga' bar ma gyur/ rgyal srid dang/ ro dang/ khyim dang/ grong khyer rnams la 'dod pa bskyed par ma gyur te/ de ltar dngos po thams cad la ma lta bar gcig pu sems shing gnas par
gyur te// nang du yang dag 'jog lhur len cing/ 'jig rten la snying po med pa dang/ 'jig pa dang/ dbugs 'an pa med pa dang/ ma sdug pa dang phrad pa dang/ sdug ba dang bral ba dang/ byis da
'di pa dang/ 'khor ba la dga' ba rebrib med pa dang/ rgyal srid kyi bde ba slu ba'i tshes na dang/ srid pa la mngon par dga' bas chog moshis pa dang/ so so'iskye bo de rtag tum mthun par rnam
par sems shing/ bdag ni byis pa'i skye ba mi brtson pa 2nang na gnas kyis/ bdag gis cung ma smra bas 'bar bya'o snyam nas/ de phyogs gcig tutsang ma sna bad+d+hagyur te/
! bag yod pa la sems shing sdug pa dang bral bar gcig du gnas par gyur to// yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal po 'od zer ldan gyis gzhon nu'i 'os spyod kyiphyir/ sa phyogs zhig tu grong khyer
dga' mchog ces bya ba byas to/ lha dang byang gi ngogs su lam srung bzhu ba bdun brgya byas so// rin po che sna bdun gyi phyir/ dri'i bu g.yer ka'i dra ba bres pa// mu tig gi dra ba dang/ rin

po tsha'i srog shing dang/ bla re dang ldan pa rim pa bdun gyis kun nas bskor// lam srang thams cad kyi sgor na nga rin po che'i srog 'dre stong btsugs go// rin po che'i srog shing thams cad kyang/ rin

de tsho'i skupa drag khris spel to// rin po che'i skud pa thams cad kyang phyogs bzhi nas shing ta la 'phreng ba bye bas sbrel te// de dag rlung gis bskyod de bsku lan/ 'di lta ste/ dper na rol mo' sel

snyan brgya stong gis sgra snyan pa lta bu'i sgra 'byung ngo/ lam srang gi sgo thams cad na bu me rlumakhas da/ gamakhas pa/ bang po dar la bab pa/ skye bo thams cad kyis spyad pa'i 'os su gyur pa lnga brgyalnga
brgya bkodo//de dag thamecad brgyal po'od zer ldan gyas/ khyed nyin mtshan du glu dang/ gar dang/ rol mo'i sgras gang dag phyogs bzhinas lhags pa'i sems can rnams yang dag par dga' bar bya zhing
[j]nas gzhon nu dga' bar bya ba'i sems bskyed pam gtogs par gtam gzhan m byed cig/ sems can gang la yang yid du 'od dro ma sna zhig ces bsgogo/ lam srang de dag ldan s cad kyi 'o
yang dbra rab 'dod pa rnams la na bubra' ba/ btung ba 'dod pa rnams la na be tung/ bzhon pa 'dod pa rnams la na ban pa/ gos dang/ spos dang/ 'phreng ba dang/ mal cha dang/ rgyab rten
dang/ 'tshong la yo byad dang/ gser dang/ dmu dang/ nor bu dang/ mu tig dang/ dezlurgyadang/ dung dang/ man shel dang/ byu rudang/ sa le sbram dang/ dngul sil ma dang/ glang po che dang

shing rta dang/ ba glangadang/ noradang/ rgyun thams cad byin zhing/ skye bo thams cad kyis yongs su spyad pa'i phyir/ rin po che'i phung po yang bzhag par gyur to/ de'i tshe grong khyer gyi dbusasu gzhon nu'i long
spyod kyi phyir/ khyim khor yug tu dbag tshad tsam yod pa ni po che sna bdunamig mangs ris su bres pa/ rtababs brgyas rab tu brgyanab byas so/ de'i nang du khang babras gcig byas te/ ra gzhon/
nu'i longs spyod kyi ri/ mal bye ba phrag bzhi bshams so// de'i dbus su skyed mos tshal byas te/ me tog gi shing ljon pa thams cad dung/ 'bras bu'i shing ldan pa thams cad dang/ ni bo'i
shing lenab thams cad kyis khyab par bakang po// yul 'khor skyong skye mos tshal de'i dbus su rin po che thams cakyi rdzong/ ni bo tshasna bzhi'i them skas dang ldan pa byas pa la 'di lta ste/ gses
dang dngul dang/ ba skrun dang shel 'go/ gang nas spos chu 'bab pa'i seng ge go ba brgya rtsa brgyad du tsugs so// rdzing deseng ge 'i deb brgya rtsa brgyad po des kyang chu
'bab bo// me tog ut+pal dang/ kumud dang/ pod+madang/ pad+madakar po rnams rtag par rgyun du rgyas so// ra lug tu yang rin poma'iro nga ldan pas yongs su bskor to// sa thamasacad pa'i me tog dang/

'bras bu'i shing ljon pa rnams kyis kyang yongs su rgyas so// rdzong de 'gram du na ngo ma'i shing ljon pa brgyadang rgyang skyod de/ na po che'i shing ljonapa thun skyod kyang rin po che'os pa rnams kyis spel ci

thams cad du yang shing ta la'i 'phreng ba bye bas sprel to// de dag kyi darlung gos bskyodacing rlung gis bskul na/ 'di lta ste/ dpe na rol mo sil snyan brgya stong bas pa lta bu'i sgra 'byung ngo// gzhon nu'i

lus las dang rdul rgyas bag du 'ong zhes/ rdzong de'i stang rin po che'i dri bas bkab par gyur to// de'i tshabang bzas der ni pomasnabadun gyi khri bye ba phrag bzhibashams te/ khri thamasatsod kyi steng du yang ras

rma bcos bu lnga brgya lnga brgya bting bar gyur to// gang du rgyal bu gzhon nubasodanams kyi 'od zer 'dug par gyur ba'i khri ni ngomasna bdun las byas pa// 'phang ma bdun tsam yodapa bshams pa dbus ma deg
sa bcos bu bye ba phrag brgyad cu rtsa bdun bting bar gyur to// khrithams cad kyi drung du mang pog pho nas a ka sa bdugs shing/ nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum dum ga 'grems par byed do//

gser gyi lnga ldes bris so// gser gyi pad+marab tu smras so// mu tig dang nor bu'i drabs bres so// nor bu rin po cha'i 'od kyis snang bar byas so// ni poma'i drab brgyad khri tu spyasaso// na po che'i
gshing ljon pa thams cad la lang ba ldan brgya brgya spus so// skyed mos tshal kun tu l nor bu ni po che 'od dpag tshad tsam yod pa/ 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu bzhag par gyur// dodag gi 'od kyis 'gi

rten thams cad snang bar gyur to// yul 'khor skyong skyed mos tshal de na bya'i tshogs mi'i skad du skye ba natso dang/ ri skegs dang/ khrung khrung dang/ khu byug dang/ rnabyadang/ ngang pa dang/ rab dang/ ku
na la dang/ kal bang+ge dang/ sha shang te'u 'khodad// dedag skad 'byin cing sgra sgrog na/ dga' tshal gyi lhan ms rgyags par 'gyur ba lta bu'i sgra 'byung// gzhon nu'i 'os spyod kyi 'i/ ro nam pa

thams cad phun sum tshogs pa/ ro rnam pa lnga brgya pa'i kha bras rnams rtag par rgyun du bshams par gyur to// de'atsho gzhonanul bcu drug len pa nas/ li to'u lenopa 'i skyed dang ldan pa dag grong khyer thams cad
nasabasdus nas grong khyer der btsud do// thams cad kyang bzo'i gnas dang/ las kyi sems kyi bya ba shes pa/ thams cad kyang 'jig rten pa'i de'ab dang/ 'tshog chas kyi bya ba shes pa byeb phrag brgyad

cu grong khyer der btsud bar gyur to// pha ma gnyis kyis de la bu mo bya ba byin no// nye du'i tshogs kyis bye ba dang/ grong rdal ba'i mis bye ba dang/ rgyal po thams cad kyis bu mo bye ba byin par gyur to// de dag thams
sudakyang gzugs bzang ba/ mdzas pa blta na sdug pa shastag go/ thams cad kyang na tshod la bcu drug lon pa glu ma khas pa/ rol tshon sgra mkhas pa/ garamakhas pa//
! dgod mkhas pa/ skyes pa'i gnang 'gromakhas pa drang ba gzhon pa/ mnyan po/ yan lag 'jam pa// gsong por skyab/ bzhin 'dzum po/ tshul mkhas ba/ sgyu rtsal thams cad kyi bya ba la mkhas
pa ha cang yang mi ring ba/ darung yang ma thung ba/ hacang ya ngam skem pa/ hacang yang mi sbom ba/ hacang yang m dkarab/ ha cang yang mi spro ba/ kha nas me tog ut+pa la'i ngesung 'byung ba/ lus
rnams las tsan dan gyi dri 'byung ba/ lha'i bum ltar gsal ba/ shin tu yid du 'ong nga 'i tshul dang ldan ba/ glu dbyangs len pa de dag gnang na rgya 'bu gan nu nga sod nasas kyi 'od zer gnas so// glu
dbyangs dang rol mo'i sgra de las kye ma'o bdag dang mamadza' ba'itshogs chen po dang/ bdag gi dge ba'i tshos lo ngos su nyams par byed pa byung ste/ blta bar mi bya'o snyam pa'i sems bskyed/ de tsho

'di lta ste/ dpar na gsadapar bya ba'i mos mthong na/ ngomatshar gyi sems m bskyed pa de bzhin du/ rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer yang bud med de dag mthong na ngomatshar ngu ma 'dzin tog grong khyer

dal yang glog dang lhan cig ngo mtshar 'dzin to/lebcu bo de dag gi bar du bdag nam zhig zhachimar ba'itshogs rnam pa 'di lta bu'i n gnas thar bar 'gyur snyam pa dang khaganam zhigazhabag yod pa 'aspyad pa spyod cing/ des bdag/

thar pa 'gyur zhig gusnyam pa de lta bu'i semA 'jug pa ma gtogo bar/nam yang gzugs kyis ma bzung ba mgyur te/ sgra'i mtshan ma dang dri'i mtshan ma dang/ de'i mtshan ma dang/ reg gi mtshan ma bzung ba ma gyur to/
de nas bu mo de ga gis rgyal po 'od bur ldan la lha gzhon nu ma re'o to// ngas par mi mdzad do// dgyes dgur mi spyod de zhes smras so//
gsum pa ste thaga'o// yul 'khor skyong nas rgyal bo 'od zer ldan rgyal po brgyad khri dang lhan cig tu rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer ga la ba der song ste zhi nas/ gdong las mtsho
'dzag cing lus 'dar te/ mya ngan gyis sa la 'gyel to// des las 'as nas/ rgyal bu gzhon nu bsonams kyi 'od zer la tshigs su bcad de sa pa/ bugacig zhiman dam pa nga laltos shing smos//
bani mya ngan gather te sanas laskyel// su yis khyod mi dga' byas ta myur nga 'a smos/ de'adi'i de'u cha pa chen pos gnad dar bya// khyod kyiched dus 'dir yid kyis smras pa// lha yi khyim ltar/
nyams dga'i grong khyer deng ltos shig 'di la yan lag ma tshang ni yod d myur smos// brgya byin lta bu'i 'byed pa de ring khyod la bstan/ pa'i mog can mi mdzesamya ngan nyam thag pa// lha ni
bu mo lta bu'i bud med tshogs smra zhes// mya na thul te dadag rnams dang de ring nus// ci'i phyir thug rngus zug bzhin lus dman sems shing 'dug/ de dag rab dga' tshulamakhas dbyangs kyi
yan lag stan/ glu dbyas phag rdob dus kyis rnam par nges par shes// khyod dga' dus la deng bdamya nam byed cig/ pad+madeb lta dur ci phyir deng dus an/ me tog 'bras
bu la 'bag 'dab rgyas skye dmes tshal/ smatshogs steng bzhag lha mi snatshogs shing rta'adra/ soms shig khyod na tshod 'dzin thogs la// dga' ba'i dus la bab kyis de nga' bu ga bgyis// khyod kyi

khrusachang rje 'di lha rnams kyi yang 'dra// ut+pal dag dad bdag gi tshal gyis gang// ba rnams kyang bung ba rgyas pa mag gseb na// de la bu sogs su zhig 'di la dga' ma byed// ngang pa rma bya ne tso'u
byug/ri skegs dang// ka la bi shang shang te'u dung kun la// yid 'ong sgra ldan gas nyesngos dad ldan 'dra ba// thos nas mi gang 'di la dga' ba thob 'gyur// gzhal med khang dgamu tis sngarabs nor bu

gtsug/ gser dang klanus sgras rnam rgyal khang pa 'dra// rin chen khri mchog dam pa rnams kyang rab bting ba// gsar dril g.yer ka tala'i 'phrangang sgra snyan pa// zab cing brtan ba mchog gi solasnyan sgra bsgrag

ga khyod kyi che du srung rnamasu yang spyi'i rgya che// bu mo stong dag glu mchog snyan pa'i sgo 'azhib// dga' tshal lha yis bumo rnams kyi'i drab sgrog mtho se 'dra ba'i gnas yid 'ong la chu yi phyig/ rnam/

par g.yeng ba'i sems kyis dga' ma khyod// gzhononu khyod kyi rtse grogs lha yi bu 'dra ba// bu pho de dag rnams dang lhan cig rtse mas rgyas// khyod kyi lo dngas gdamachims brnangs shing 'dug/ skyes bo

'di'i sdug bsngal snying rjemadadamani// 'aabyas pa de byung 'dod pas longs spyod yonamo gnyer// yon tan bsngags pa srid bskyonamagong sa snyam la// 'khor ba'i dra bar tshud pa'i 'gro ba 'di bltas nas/
tharapa zhiganyer ba la smras pa lab gson// lha nag sus kyang bdag la miga' bgyisomimachis// bdagan de ltar 'dopa'i yon tan mos ma lags// nyomongs gang ga dzana'agro'i g.yangs
ltung byed pa// sdug pa thams cad dag dang mtshungs te rjes ma srug/ mamakhas bus pa skye bobudamed de dag dga'// bdud gyi zhabs pa yon tan 'ching ba g.yang sa tshe/ rtag tu 'phags pa 'i skye bos
dag de ltar smad gosanas dma' na'agro mya ngan rtsa ba ru phyir ba sten/ bud med 'di dag pags pa'i bozugs kyi go dga' pas// bdag ni sargyas 'a bra' bo mi gtsang na mi gar// khrag
dang gcin dang mi gtsang ba dang drim 'dza// gsal bar dur khrod 'dra la ji ltar dgag 'bar ba// glu dang gar dang rol mo'i dbyas sgragazungam bgyi/ dag 'o ba rmi lam 'dra ba mi ma bas rdzogs bar na
kun tu rtog pa srod rgyur mim kha'adi brlag gis// du phyir byas ba'i skye ba lta bur nyon mongs 'o// gang lcag 'di dag thams cad dgun gyi dus byung na// gon du shing ltar 'gyur te dga' bar
'gyuram lags// mi rtag 'di yos dpal rnams thams cad bshig gyur to// srog gter gyur kyang gtitshug gsani bag med 'gyur// sems ni rgya mtsho lta bur tsham bar byed ma nus//
srid pa rab tu'apha' la dga' bas phyir zhing 'dod// 'dod rgyus mtshunagasad pa'i 'gro la bltas nas su// 'di ni ji ltar lhun po rlung gis mgayo bzhin// rgyal kho
khyod dang bdang lhan cig skyes pa dang// gnyen gyi skye bo chung ma nasong bdag skyes min// bdag cag thams cad rtsa'akhril pa 'drab ste// sems kyi dbang du 'gro bar ma gyur bag yod mdzod//
mi dbang dar la bab pa mi rtag cing mi rung// srog kyang de yi tshultar myur 'groNi 'dud// 'dus byas 'di khrod glog sun 'dra steci ma rung// rgyal po ma bas la sude gsum 'do la chags pa na/
lha rnams kyis ni de dag la bag yod 'gyur gyis shig/ byang chub sems dpa'i yul la chags pa min zhes bskul// 'jig rten phan pa'i snying brjes sangs rgyas 'di'i 'gyur ba kirgyal po'agamed spyod la
byang chub yongs lags// rgyal bo gang zhig 'dod g.yen spyod sems 'khol ba// don bsod nams cung zad go'azhi mtho sa ldeg/ 'tsho bashanitu rgyas pa nam yang spyad ma bgyi// sken par
bcug pa'i byaltar ji ltar dbugs phyin gyur// khams rnams sbrul dang 'dra zhing phung bo gshedam 'dra/ khrag dang bcas ba'asimasananomadagrong stosas// rgyal po 'din dug sdom tog
rgyas la lus// chubonomasakyi bsan bdag 'dir ji ltar dga'// datugasa'as 'ba'aganam mkha' lta bu dang// 'grob nazhugs khriba'a'i bdag ltasanas// rgyal po de ring/
la de dag dgrol ba dang// gnyid legs par bgyi dengand pa gso ba dang// zug rngu nas gnadang lam lego ngag pa'i yi// bdag gisazhi de tshos khyi'a myur du ra// stong chen pa'i byis pa/
mgrel ba bsgrubs nas// legs par bshad pas ring nas dbul batshan par bgyi// na 'gro'i lam du cung dag kyang gazhol bgyi// lengob mgo sbyin sred pa'i khrishingebaskam par bgyi// na
gro mchog phyir shes ba 'od zer mar ma byas// de yis srid gsum gar la lta ba 'a mthong 'gyur// byams dang snying rje ba'ol shi ba sprin// sems na de 'brug lhags thong glog gi 'phreng ba dang//
byang chub yan lag bde bsil char rgyun pha yis// 'gob yun ring dus nas gdungs pa bsil bar bgyi// rgyal po bdag de dran gyur nas 'di mchis te// bdag 'dus byas kun la 'dod pa smon ma mchis/
khyadachub don gter sems can ched du 'di'i spyod bgyi// gcig tu nges te ba gnas rod laga' mchis// rgyal bo 'daneshes bzhin su zhige dag khrod gnas// blo dang ldan pa su zhig 'jigs bcasa'am du
'gro mgo dang ldan pa su zhig 'dzin g.yang sar ltung/ byang chub lam shesanasazhasu gabag med 'gyur// 'gro ba thams cad rgyun 'grokhadaganargyunab zlog pa// rgyal po tshog tsamagyisun[S]chub thob
minus// lhun po tsA nas rgya mtsho'inang dumachong yi// bdag 'di'i 'dod pa rnams kyis 'ded/'a de lta min// rgyal po dam pa rang gnyen thangs kyi myur dubazhud// yul 'khora dga'ab thams cad

gon par dgyes pas rgyal bas byang chub la bsam na ga 'chag cing/ spyod lam gsum gyis gnasas/ 'jig rten kun la rtsol/ gang dag bsam pa ban blasanasamangar 'gyur/ gsang bdag bag med rgyal srid bye ba 'tshal ma lags/ bud med tshogs kyin du gnas pas
grubade zhi ba ba med gnas ni thob nas// gno par dgyes bas rgyal bas byang chung bas bsan// bdag ni dang nags khrodoms te gnas par bgyi// tshul 'khor skyong nas rgyal po

gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer khang bzangs nang na 'dug bzhin du yid byung ba dang ldan pa'i sems kyis dudamed de dag dang lhan cig brtag cing/ spyod lam gsum gyis gnas so// gsum gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/

'greng ba dang/ 'gro ba dang/ 'jug pa ste/ rmugs pa dang gnyid longs su spangs so// khang pa'i steng du song ste/ sa brgyad la gnas nas/ nam gyi gung la bab pa'i dus kyatshe/ gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha

rnams sangs rgyas kyi bsngags pa rgya cher brjod cing/ bar snang las 'grob dang/ o dang dge 'dun gyi bsngags pa rgya che brjod cing 'gro ba thos so// thos nas kyang yul 'khor skyong rgyal bu bad non nu bsod

nams kyi 'od zer spu khring zhes byed par rgyunas mchim brag cing/ skyob skyes te thal mo sbyar nas/ lha rnams la tshogs su bcad de smras pa// lha rnams sdug bsngal bdag la thugs rje bskyed nas ni// gal m+mo/

! mi mdzadonas cung zhig zhubar bgyi// su yin yon tan brjod cing bde bar 'ji nas bzhud// tshog 'adithosanas pa dag 'dir yid nibade bar gyur// yul 'khor skyengang nas lha de dag gis/ rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams

wa kyi 'od zer la tshigs su bcad pas slar smras pa// gzhon nu khyed kyis sangs rgyas nyes par ma gyur tam// don grub blo zhes bya ste skyabasamed rnams kyi bskyabs/ de bzhin sbyong mkhas bsod nams shes rab yon tan/
mchog/ de yi dge 'dun khrag khrig stobs bcu bsam gtanab// bsod nams kyi 'od zer gyis smras pa/ bdag ni rgyab lta'atshal de yi gzugs ci 'dra// de yi kha dog ci'i dra thams cad baka' stsol cig/ ji ltar
spyad na sems can kun mgon gcig 'gyur ba// byang chub spyod pa ci 'dra bdagan yongs su 'dri/ de nas lha de dag gis// rgyal bu gzhon nu bsonams kyi 'od zer la tshugs su bcad pas slar smras pa// de yi
gtsug tor ri yi rtse la gsar mdzes bzhin// dbu sa 'jam zhing mdzes la g.yas su 'khyil ba ste// de yi mad spum pab la mo las ma lta// nor bu shel lta rnam par dag cing g.yas su 'khyil/ sbyan

ga bu ngu 'tshogs dang ut+pal sngonapo 'dra// mi dbang sang ge'i 'gram pa rang byung ba yisgros// sems can lhan cig 'od zer bye ba mtha' yas 'gyed// stong gsum rgyas par 'gengasashing na 'gro rnams kyang
skyems// de la tshems ni rab dkar kha ba dung ltar dag/ bzhi bcun nyam zhing thogs bzang rmad byung legs par grub// rgyal ba dam pa mchog de'i tshoms kyi mcheb bzhi// de yi lngagasanib yangs rang gi
zhal gdong khebs// rgyal ba de yi gsungari mchog 'dra ba'i na// shin tu tshim byed 'brel ngo bya rgyu med pa ste// tshas sbyas shin tugs pa sil snyan stong 'dra ba// yid gnyis 'dzoms pa 'dod/
bya/ ] rnams tshim byed pa// rgyal ba'i gsuni lha yi sgra skad tshos byed pa// yon tan tshogs tshang ba byang chub yan lag mthun// chos kyi 'phreng ba yid 'ong brgya stong rab brgyus pa//

sil snyan ga' ba bsgrags pa lha klu nyams dga' b// ka' ba khu byug dur pa dang// rma bya ngang pa sgra snyan kun la ka'i sgra// tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs mici dbyangs kyi yan lag badra// ma 'khrul sngog mad don

rnams thams cad rtogs byed pa// rmad byung shel ltar 'jam zhing mkhas pa'i yid 'ong ba// sku la 'dul ba 'gyurang sbyong bdagar 'gyur ba// gzhan gyi spyod dang mthun pa zhus tshim byed dang// chos kyi dbang

thug de yi gsung gi yon lag 'di// ston pa'i mgul mdzes dung dang 'dra zhing dpung go zlog// dbyug pa lta bur phyag ring de tshobadun yang mtho// phyagams sna tshogi sa sor mo rnams na ring zhing zlum//

rgyal ba de gi sku'i ga'i gsar gyi mdog/ ba sdugayas su 'khyil cing rgyan du re re skyes// lta bamatha' dag zad cing gsang sbubs rta gi 'dra/ rang byung ecu'i byin pa glang po'i sna 'dra'i bla// zhabs
sku mthilamadzes par bris pa bkra shis 'khor lo kho na// glang po'i debang po'i 'gros stabs seng ge 'irtsa lagyi stabs// khyu mchogabaskyis pa'i stabs can dbang po'i mchod sdong rgyas//
mkha' las me tog char pas me tog gdugs su gyur// gshegs pa'i rjes 'gro 'dodig de yi rmad byung chos// rgyal ba red dang ma rab de dang sdug bsngal dang// grags dang ma grags de bzhin bstod
dang smad pa yis// pad+ma chu ltar thams cad du yang gos pa med// mi yi sang ga de 'dra mtshus pa'i sems can med// yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer gyis
sangs rgyas kyi bsngags pa thos shing/ chos dang dge 'dun gyi bsngags pa thos nas/ tsham zhing mgug rangs shing rab tu dga' ste/ dga' ba dang/ de bde ba skyes par gyur to/ yul 'khor
skyong de nas rgyal bu ga zhon nu bsod nams kyi 'khri 'disomadu sems te/ sas rgyas bcom ldan 'das de ci 'drag dang/ de'i dag 'an phun sum tshogs pa tsa'adra ba dang/ de man sum du byas
pa tshos ca 'a ba dad/ 'i slob ma phun sum tshogs pa ni 'dra ba dang/ ji ltar 'khor gang da dang phrad pa dang/ byas pa ma/ khro ba drang/ jaltar 'khor ba na byae pa so so'iskye bo dag byas pa mi
gzod dang/ ji ltar khyim gyi gnas nyes dmigs mang bo dang/ ji ltar 'dod pa dag nyes pas nga ba dang/ ji ltamakhas pa rnams kyi bag med pa spangs pa dang/ lta ma rig pa'i mun gazhag
mongs pa dang/ ji ltar 'du byed rnams tshogs par dka' ba dang/ ji ltar sems gdul dka' ba dang/ ji lta ming dang gzugs zab pa dang/ ltar skye mched drug dbugs 'azhi ba med pa
jiltar reg pa yongs su ma shes te/ sdug bsngal rnam par smin pa dang/ ji ltar tshor ba nyes dmigs mang ba dang/ ji ltar sred pa'i ching ba na ba dang/ ji ltar nye bar len pa las 'byung bar dka'
dang/ ltar srid pa'i sred pa 'phags pa ma yin pa dang/ ltar srid pa yodan/ skye ba rgyan gdadaka' pa dang/ ji lta dang rnam par 'gyur bar byed pa dang/ ji ltar/
[R ]nad kyis rnam par 'jig par byed pa dang/ ltar 'chi ba rjesasum srin pa dang/ ji ltar 'jug pa'i ri brob chung ba dang/ ji ltar srid pas na bar 'grub pa nyes dmigs mang ba dang/ jiltar de bzhi
'i bstan pa nyams dga' ba ltar 'dazhus te/ dod pa'i lo'i bono zhes pas rmongs ba/ sems tha da can/ bag med pa la dga' kha/ byas pan na 'gar/ tshul
bzhin ma yin pa'i sems dang ldan pa// 'khor ba la chags pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ skyegonorus pas ngan 'dug pas na/ bde 'gro'i lam yang dam par sbyang bar nusan/ bla med pa yang dag
par rdzogs pa'i byang chung man par rdzogs pa rasangs rgyas par ltag la 'gyur snyam mo// de yang 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag ge nas byunganan/ nyi bu tshig kyis bar chad byas su 'ong gis/
zla bdag bang ste 'anyis thuradun chod de snyam mo// tshul 'khor skyong nas rgyal bu gzhon nu bsodonams kyi 'od zer bcom ldan 'as de bzhin gshegs b na grub blo dag la ba de logs su phyogs te/
khang pa de nas machos nas ga 'di skad du/ gal te de bzhin gshegs pa de thams cad mkhyen cing/ thams cad gzigs shin/ de bzhin gshegs pa de bdag la dgongs su gsal zhes kyang/
sbas so// yul 'khor skyod de sa de bzhin ga shegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas don grub byos phyag g.yas pa brkyang ste 'od phyung nas/ de des rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod
mes kyi 'od zer la reg go/ 'od d lasakyang pad+ma 'dab ma brgya stong ba shing rta'i 'phang lo tsam byung bar gyurato// bad de las kyang 'od zer brgya stong byung// snang chen sa gyur nas/ snang ba/
sa rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer khyab par gyur to// yul 'khor skyong danas rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'owerapad+made 'dug nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nogrub blo legs su thul mo sbyar ba bdudad/ sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal zhes lan gsu mched du bdudo// yul 'khor skyong de nas de bzhin
gshegs pa nogrub glengos 'od de bdud pa dang/ gzhonan du sdod pa po cad pa skyel ba bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs kyi drung dub bas ti/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la lan brgya stod phyag 'tshal
to/ lul ba bor skyong nas rgyal bu gzhon nubasodazhams kyi 'od tsir0so/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shogrub bo latshesasu bcad de gsol pa// bdagazhirinas ni ster nas 'dod/
tshegs chos sman pa'i rgyal po khyed red do// ji ltar bde gshegs bstan la gnas nas ni// bdag gis theba'agyuramagon bo bstan du gsol/ 'dren pa bdag gis ba gamame khros pa ni// mtsha
ming gnyis bcad ngag sman ba'i rgyal po bdag gizug gsal// srog ni zad pa'i tshesas man+tis 'gyur// lta ba chungan
ka@#/ mo bar snang lha las shes lags te// thos nas skyo stabadag na'arimachis na//ma rnams bgamachis 'gyur ji lta bu/ (lamanyams pa la de ring ston gyur cig/ ldongs
par sgyur ba'amig tur gyur cig/ dad pa'i 'byung gnas gso mdzad thugs rje ldan// g.yangs chen po 'di las bdag phyung zhogo/ dbul po gyur pa dag bsdu bar mdzod// mgon po bcas
ba bdun ring sgrol mdzod// som bces pa yid gnyis bcad du gsol// byang chub lam la spyodAb bdag lung ston// chus khyor bdag la 'gram bstan du gsol// mun pa bdag
spen ma mdzad du gsol// rmar gyur bdag la rma mda mdzad du gsol// sman pa'i rgyal po bdag gi zug rngu phyung// khyod kyis ngan 'gro dag las bdag thar mdzod// srid par dmigs pa
'dzin pa gcad du gsol// zhan la gabargyad pa'i lam gyi lamtshan gyis// mya ngan chu chen pha rol bstsal du gsol// srog ni zad pa tshego can tsho yang thung// dge ba par chad mang po 'byung
ba ste bsod nams rnam smin ring por ma thogs 'grug/ bdag gis dul bgadod redatsag nges gsungs// byang chub sems dpa' ji ltar bgamachis 'gyur// ji ltar byang chung sudopa
bsod nams kyi 'od thar gyi lhag pa'i bsam pa mkhyen nas/ byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa rgya cher yang dag par bstan to// rgyal bu gzho nub nags kyi 'od zer gyis/de thosanas ma dar/
thar ba zhes bya ba'i gzus theb go mno pa shes pa la yang thob ste/ de nam mkha' la gnas niasam tog rnams man par sprul te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la gtor/ mngon bar gtor
te/ yul 'khor skyong nas rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer bar snang las babs te/ bcom ldan 'as de bzhin gshegs pa sho grub blo dol tshigs su bcad pas na no par
bstod pa// mtshan mchog ldan pa drimed zla ba'i zhal// gser mdog 'dra ba khyod la phyag 'tshal go/ rdul dra la khyod 'dra srid pa gsum mams// mnyam med mkhyen can khyod la phyag
'tshol lo// rgyal ba'i dbu skye 'amamadzes snyan zhing bzung// khyed kyi gtsug tor 'dinA rirgyal bzhini// gtsug tor ma mthong khyed dang mtshungs ma mchis// thub pa khyod kyi smanematshos/
mdzod spu mdzes// kun da blab kha ba dung ltar dkor// thugs rje gang gis 'gro ba 'digazigs pa// spyan mchog bzang po ut+pal sngon po 'dra// rgyal ba dri mad spyan la phyag 'tshal la
ljags yongs srab la zas kyi mdog 'drab// de las rang gi zhal gyigadang yang khebs// tshes gsung bsan 'gro ba 'dul bar bgyid// 'jam snum gsung ldan khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/
tshogs bab hashan tu ban pa rdo rje 'dra// bcu dang sum cu snyegs shing grags bzang ga/ 'dzum pa mdzad nas 'gro ba 'dul bar bgyid/ bden gtam snyan pa khyed la
phyag 'tshal lo// rgyal ba khyod kyi gzugs dang mtshus ma mchis// 'od kyis zhing brgyad dag kyang snang bar bgyid// 'ji'i rtagan nitshangs dbang skyong dag/ khacom ldan khyedakyi 'od kyis dri'i du
rlag erlag byen ba mnyam medabatsem ldan 'das// glang po'i rgyal po bya song bu'i stabs/ bcom ldan gnya' shing gang du gzigs shing gshegs// sa dngar dang ga pa ga go bar nadaM//
bcom ldan 'das sku mtshan gyis rgyas pa ste// khyod kyi pags pa 'am zhingags mdog 'dra// 'grob gabrugs 'debel bas ngomasami 'gyur// khyod mtshungs pamamachis gzugs dang ldan
khyed sngon bskal ba brgya ni dka' thub spyad// khyod gtong yul dang sbyin pa kun la gyis/ sems can kun lakhrug rje byams thugs ldan// mchog tu thugs rje can la phyag 'tshal lo// khyodon
sbyin dang tshul khrims rtag tu dgyes// khyod ni 'dod ng brtson 'grus dgyis rab brtan// khyod ni bsam gtan shes rab 'od gaTim 'a// mtshungs med le shis mnga' la phyag 'tshal la// khyodan
snab ban pa'i tshogs na 'dzomo// khyod seng ge lta bur 'khor du skyegs// khyod ni smon pa'i rgyal po dri gsum sol// mchog tu dga'a mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// thub pa sku gsung thugs
ni rnam bar dag// pad+machu ltar srid pa gsum mgis// khyod ni tshosadabyungs ka la ba'i skod// srid gsum pha rol gshegs la phyag 'tshala'// khyod kyis 'gro 'di sbyin lta bu dang// gar la/
ltang rmi lama'adrab dang// bdagamed sems can med cing srog 'gromed// chos rnams smig rgyu chu ba 'dra bar mkhyen// stong pa zhi ba skye bamed ba'i tshul// ma shes pas na'ogro ba 'khyama'agyur te//
thugs rje thabs tshul rigs pa brgya dag gis// de dag rnams ni 'dzud par mdzad pa lags// 'dodochags la sogs nang mang brgya dag gis// skrag bar gyur pa'i 'grel rtag gzigs te// bde/
gshegs sems can brgya dag yongs 'grel cing// zla med sman pa lta burnam par rgyu// skyedang rgadang 'chi dang mya ngan no// sdug dang braladang smre sngags 'don pa brgyas// rtag tun 'a'agrong
gzigs nas ni// thub pa thugs rjes yongs su 'grel cung rgyu// dud 'gro yi dgas dmyol ba'i 'gre rnams su// 'gro kun ngashing rta'i 'phang lo bzhin du 'khor// na pa mgis bun bsemagon/
ma mas// de la lam gyi dam pa ston pa mdzad/ gtso ba mtshungs pa med pas gang bstan pa// 'phags lamaded gang dag sngon chad kyis// chos kyi dbang phyug 'groba'i dona mdzad pa// rgyal ba de
dag rnams kyis rab tugasungs// 'jam zhing mnyen la yid du 'ong ba'i mchog// tshangs las lhag pa mchog tu da ga 'bgyid pa// d+deb mi lha yi bu mo mchog/ sgra de ba la gyis mnan nas gdung ba mdza
ban dang drang ba mi bzod thabs tshul gyis// sangs sbyang yon tan mtha' yos ldan pa'i gsung// de shos sems can khrag khrig brgyudag/ theg pa gsum gyis zhi bar mchi
bar ba'i// khyod 'amachod pas lha yi bde ba ni// rnam pa gang dang de bzhinemo yis thob// ma li bdag po 'grel phan bgyid/ phyug tsana'o che 'byor pa chen ra 'gyug/ mtshungs med khyodal
dad pa skyed pani// gling bzhi'i bdag po 'khor losasgyur ba'i mchog/ 'gro la dge ba bcubo kun 'byed pa// chen rab badrang ban ldan M thob par 'gyur// rgyal ba khyod lamachod pa bgyis pas ni
rtsatshangs po brgya byin 'jage rten bdag po dang// yongs su dga' ldan lha yi bdag po dag/ gzhan 'phrul pa dad 'thab bral rab dgar 'gyur// 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal rnams ma sel mdzad pa//
mnyam med khyod la mchod dang mthong ba dang// thos pa'i ng de ltar 'bras bums lags te// gnas mchog rga shi med pa thob par 'gyur// bcom ldan lam la mkhas shing las mkhyen pa//
'jig rten 'a ngan ba'i lam las bzlog/ bcom ldan 'kha gna'aphags pa'i 'od// bde ba zhib rdul dang bra'aga' 'god// bsod nams gter khyodabasodanams don gnyer ba'i//
! bsod nams bgyi ba rtag tubs te// byang chub la bam thob bar dun// bskal pa bye ba mang por bsam gyur// gzhan 'phrul 'drab rtag tu dga' bgyid pa// longs su dag cing mdzes pa
'a shog bar 'gyur// ma pa'i zhing du lus dang ngag yid kyis// sems can dag ni rnam par dag par 'gyur// rgyal ba mchod pa'i mi yis 'al sogs// yon tan rnam bdu 'thob par 'gyur//
mtho sa thar pa mi yi bde ba dang// 'gro ba kun gyi bsod nams gter thob 'gyur// khyod kyi brjod dang grags pa rgya chen bo/ phyogasa rnams kun gyi zhinges brgyar yang mas// rgyal ba khyed kyi
bsngags pa'i 'phreng ba/ bde bgshegs rnams 'khor du rtag par sgrogs// mis nad bral zhing 'grol thar mdzad pa// mthong na dga' ba thugs rje mchog ldan pa// bao ldan dbang po zhi ba zhigyis
ba mi mchog dam pa khyod la phyag 'tshal la// bdag gis rgyal ba khyod kyi gsung thos nas// mngon par shes pa lnga thobam las la gnas/ dpa' bo bde gshegs mtshungs par bdag 'gyur te//
drimadachos ni 'gro la rnam par dbye// lha dang mi dang klus mchod bde bar gshegs// yon tan kun gyi mthar phyin deng bstod bas// bsod nams rgya chen gang bsgrubs gyur pa'i// 'gro bas

rgyas ga'aphang thob par shog/ yul 'khor skyong da nasaMmatshamo de'i nam nus pa dang// rgyu la po 'od zer ldan gyiso gzhon nu'i bu dmod kyi la ro ngu ba'i sgra thos so/[ ]/thosaM nas kyang gyur bltab ri
pa'i ke zugs kyis grod khyer dga' mag ga la ba der song ste phyin nas 'di skad ces smras so// khyadaci'i phyir du/ de dag gisas pa// rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod namasakyi 'od zer mi gda'o ba'i srid du'o/
mu la 'khor skyong nas rgyal po 'od zer ldan gzhon nu'i phyir/ shing bcad ba skye la pa ltar sa la 'gyel te/ las nas ngu zhing grong khyer de nga lan stong du longs su btsal to/ khul 'a khor

skyong nas grong khyer gyi lha gang yin pa des/ rgyal po 'od zer ldan 'a 'ad skad ces smras so// rgyal po tshan pa gzhon nun de bzhin gshegs pa no grub blo la bltab dang/ phyag bya ba dang/ mchod pa dang bstan

bkur bya ba'i phyir/ shar gos logs su sod// chu la 'khor skyong nas rgya ga po 'od zer ldan gzhon nu ba tsal ba'i phyir/ btsunamo'i 'bor dang srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu/

sgo bzhidang lhan cig tu shar gyi phyogs chag la ba der song ste/ de bzhinagshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zho grub blo ga la ba der song nas phyin pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas kyang/ rgyal po 'od zer ldan gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la tshogs su dbas mno bar bstod pa/ sAde
gsum khyod mtshungs mams lhag pa ga la mchis// sems can ma la lhadabang lha min rgyal pos bkur/ skye ba khyod kyi gzugs la blta bas nas 'gyur// yon tan ye shes rgya mtsho dpa las
phyag 'tshal lo// rgyal ba byed sku sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan rab dag/ lhun po rini chen mchog gis sras ltar yongs su dag/ rgyal ba sdug cing 'jam pa gser gyi kha go 'dra// blta sdug gzugs

ma thub pa'i sku la phyag 'tshal lego/ bskal pa bye brgya bsam gyis mi khyab brtul zhugs sbyad// bskal ba bye ba brgya mang sangs rgyas bsti stang mdzad// sngon chadamachod sbyin brgya phrag bsam gyis mi
khyaba medo/ 'osan khyodaskubazang zhing shin tumadzes pa lags// sbyin dang tshul khranes ting nge 'dzin dang shes rab dang// bzodo dang brtson 'grus bsam patan thabs kyis khyod gzugs spyas//

khyod kyi sman sngar brgya byin tshasaM 'od gsal ma lags// chushel nor gyi glog gi 'od kyang mdzes ma lags// 'greba'i don du yid du mche pa'i gzugs kyang ston// chu zla 'dra zhing rgyun 'dra bar gda' ba
lags// rang gi phyogs rnams kun tu rgyal ba'i sku yang gda'// bde gshegs rnams kyi sku yi tshad ni gdan lags// khyodoni dga' ldan 'ga' zhigan yang nga zhugs par gdo'// 'chi 'pho
mdzad rung rab dkar glang po rtogs gyur nas ni// dpa' bo yun gyi lhums su gshegs bar gda' bar mdzad// thub chen nam mkha' lta bur thams cad rjes su zhugs// bcom ldan phyogs garngabaltachu
bar rten pa'i ng mdzad pa ste// sa 'ga' dag du gom pa bdun 'dor gda' ba mdzad// lha mi'i baa 'grazhong gtso'an tu lha// 'gro ba sdug bsngal mtsho las gdon ces gsung yang byung// thub
khyod chos gang la yang the tsom mi mnga' yang// yig shes pa slob ltar 'jig rten dag na gda'// bsam gtan ting 'dzin spyod yul zhi ba b.res gyur kyang// kha cig tu na bud med nang na bzhugs par
dga' yab dang khu ma dang sras dang bud med rnams kyang btang// gnyen rnamAmya nanon ti rnan par brgyal zhing du// sems can dam pa bye ba brgya lhas 'ongs bskor nas// nags/
gnas gcig po 'byung bar gda' ba'ang mdzad// khyed ni de dud ban re ba bar mdzad nas yun ring yang// zhing na bdud 'dul bar yang gad ra ba ston par mdzad/ sngon chad 'khor 'de bsam gyis ma khyab
mos bskor kyang// khyod ni thugs rjes 'a bor la bster bar gda' ba mdzad// rtag tu rtag lta 'du shes ldan pa'i 'gro gzigs nas// mya ngan bzla zhes 'khor tsazheng du tshig tu gsus// rtag tu
rgyu 'khor bar gad ra ba'i 'gro ba gzigs nas ni// khyon zhing bsil gyur gyi na 'dug pa gsung// khyod kyi bsonams ye shes shes rab thabs mtshungs med// thub pa khyod sku 'od kyis zhing nang rgyag
pa ra 'ges// phyogs rnams dgan 'dren pa khyod kyi sngags pa gsung// kun tu spyod yul thub pa 'o rgyal la phyag 'tshal 'go/ chos dam lus brnyes par gyur la thug 'tshud le/ sems
can kun gyi bgyi bar sgyu ma lta gda' yang// thub pa khyod ni gang du bzhud pa 'am byonam lags// skyama'i tshes tshul gnas la mngon par phyag 'tshal// 'gro ba'i don du gang gis byang chub mchog
thob pa// lam mtsho ma yi dpa 'a bo khyod legs gsung// bdag gis chos nyid 'di ni skyer dus ngas rgyas nas// mi dang ba 'gro ba'i don du chos de bshad par bgyi// mi mo dpa' bo thub pa kun
mkhyen rims bral ba// srid gsum mtshungs pa ma mchilhag pa ga la zhig/ bdug gis 'di'i bstod bsod nams mtha' yas gang bsgrubs des// 'jig rten byang chub bla med zhi mchog thob par shog
yul 'khor skyong de nas de bzhin gshegs pa don grub drodos rgyal bo 'od zer ldan de'i lhag pa'i bsam pa mkhyen nas/ ci nas thamasaM cad ba na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyi'i mi
ldog par 'gyur pa de lta de lta' chos bstan to// yul 'khor skyod nas rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer gyis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa don grub grol 'di skad ces gsol to//
