bcom ldan 'dis sa nga bdag gi grong khyer du gdugs tshod gsol bar gnang bar mdzad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer la thugs brtse bar dgongs te/ cang mi

gsung ba gyur du sa gnang bo/ yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer gyis/bam de gnyis dang/ grog de dag dang dbu med de dag la sab khyed cag thams cad rjes su yi rang bar gyis shig/
ci nas grong khyer dga' mtsheg brgyan te/ mgas par de bzhin gshegs pa la dbul du rung bar gyis shig/ de dag gis sgra skadagacig tu rjes suli rang ngo// yul 'khor skyod de nas rgyal bu gzhon
nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer gyis can s gror khyer dga' mchog brgyan te/ ma chags par de bzhin gshegs pa la phul lo// ro brob bkod pa lnga brgya pa'i zhal zas kyang de bzhin gnag pa dge slong gi
[r/ ]@#// dag 'anadang bcas pa de la gsol to// ge slong de dag thams cad mya phyi'i/ rinapo ches bdun gyis g.yogs pa'i gtsug lag khang nor bu'a'ichags bshams pa//
steng du rin po cha'adriba'i bla re bres pa/ g.yas g.yon du me tog gi ri ldan legs pa yongs su grub par byas pa// mi go ba dkar po'i rdzong gis mdzes par phyag pa// ras bcos bu mu gse

drim med pa brgya stong bting ba'i mi la bshags pa// ge slonga'i re la ges kha na ma tho ba med pa gang byin pa de phyi nyin gyi sbyin gyi/ nyin gcig bzhin gos gzhand ngagazhan spyan par 'gyur ba byas so// de la
rgyu byab brag gsum gyikhor rgyugs pa dang gnyid kyis nad ma gyur/ bdag la dga' ba ma byas/ sangs rgyas la mchod pa'i phyir/ gzhan yid la ma byas so// bar skabs der 'dod pa la rnam par rtog
pa dang/ gnod sems kyi rnam par rtog pa dang/ 'tsho ba'i rnam par rtog pas rnam par rtog pa ma gyur/ rgyal srid la sred bar ma gyur te/ lus dang srog la mang mibaltan/ das po gzhan lta smos kyang
zlacigos/ bar skabs der bcom ldan 'as kyis gang gsungs pa de thams cad kun tu bzung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la de lan/ nyis su ma zhus so// bar skabs der khrus ma byas/ 'bru mar gyis
lus ma bskus/ rkang pa ma bskus/ dal ba'i 'du shes ma bskyed de/ zan khra bdad/ bshang gci byed dam gtogos bsam yang 'dug par ma gyur to// gang gi tshe dang zhin gshegs pa de yi ngos su chu

na las 'das pa de tsho/ tsananadamar bo zhugs la bzhin pa byas so// gong du de nga zhin na/ shegs pa de zhugs la []zhen pa'i sa phyogs de nyid du/ 'dzam bu gling thams cad pa me togog thams cad dang/ 'phreng

ba thams cad dang/ sos thams cad d/ la mo 'asgre thams cad kyis lo brgya stong du ring bsrel la mchod pa byas par gyur pa nas/ rgyu dang rkyen thams cad bgos te/ i mchod rten bye ba phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi'i

bar du byas so// mchod rten de dag la yang rin po che sna bdun gyi na po tsha'adrebs g.yogs so// mu tig gi du ba 'a ba ri dag bris so// mchod rten re re la yang ni bo tsha sna bdun gyi gdugs lnga brgya lnga brgya bul

la mchod rten thamasazhung la si'i snyan brgya stong phul lo// 'dzam bu gling khor yug tume tog gi shing ljon pa bskrun to// mchod rten re re la yang m me'i rje bo brgya stong nas mar me dus so/ mar me'i

rdza borar nas kyang grosakyi 'dru mar ga cu rtsa bzhi pa stong gi mar me bus so/skyes dang/ 'phreng ba dang/ byug pa thams cad kyis kyang mdor byas so// tshul de lta bu s le bya ba'i bar du mchod pa byas

te/ phyis rab tu byung ngo// de 'og tu byung nas/ chos gos gsum par gyur cing/ rtag tu bsod snyoms spyod ba dang/ rtag tu tsog bu pa ste/ nam yang blosog phab bo// nam yang rgyugs pa dang gnyid kyis non par

mgyur to// de phong zang med pa'i sems kyis lo byi ba phrag bzhi'i beng chos kyi sbyin pa byin te/ des gzhan la na legs so zhes bya ba tsam la yang re bar ma gyur na/ rnyed pa dang bkur ste lta smos kyang ci dgos/
de chos nyan ba 'am/ sa bshad bas kyang ngal bar ma gyur to// de la lha rnams kyang bsnyen bkur byed do// yul gyim thams cad dang/ btsun mo'i 'khor dang/ nang mi thams cad dang/

! grogs po thams cad kyang de'i rjes su bsags te rab tu byung ngo// yul 'khor skyong de nas gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams 'di snyam dusems te/ bsod nams kyi 'od zer gyi rjes su slob cing/ yul gyi yi
thams cad rab tu byung gis/ bdag cag gis de la mgrodang/ bsan bkur byas nas/ dkon mchog gsum la rim gro byas da ra 'gyur ro snyam mo// de bzhin gshegs pa de yongs su mya ngan las 'das

nas kyang/ dam pa'i chos 'gro bye ba phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi'i bar du gnas te/ dge slong bsod nams kyi 'od zer gyis thams cad yongs su bzung ngo// tshul 'di lta bu s sas rgyas ba bye ba khrag khrig stong phrag

dgu bcu rtsa bzhi la rnam pa de lta bu'i mchedapa byas so// yul 'khor skyong de'i tshe dre'i dus na/ rgyal po 'od zer ldan zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin nga snyam du khyod de ltar dgos shange the tsam bra 'am
lod gsasu gyuran/ khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhin/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag mdade'atshopa'i dusan/ rgyal po 'od zer ldan zhes bya bar gyur to// yul 'khor sbyong
de da 'i dusan/ rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od brar zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig 5na pa snyam du khyod de ltar dogs shing the tshom bu bam/ yid gnyis su gyur na/ khyod kyis de ltar mi

! ba lta 'o// de'i phyir zhen/ nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rgya la bu gzhon nu ba so danams kyi 'od zer ces bya bar rgyug to// grong khyer gyi lha gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegab ma'i khrugs par gyur to//
yul 'khor skyong de lta bsan/ byang chub sems dba' sogs dab 'che bo bla na med pa yang dag pa rdzogs pa'i byang chub mgo par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par 'dodobs/ lhag pa'i bsam pas sgrub pa dang/

sdug pa dang sdug nga la ngos su spangs pa dang/ bag yod ba'i spyod pas rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer de'i rjes su bslab par bya'o// sapyadaka' baman par 'du bya ba de lta bu s ba'amed pa yang
gopar rdzogs pa 'byang chub thob go/ de lta bas na de dag ma brtson pa dang/ redapa dang/ bkur sti dang/ tshigs su bcad pa lhur len pa dang/ shes kyi khe la chags pa dang/ nga rgyal gyis bcom
ba dang/ 'dod pa'irgyus noms pa dag shathang ba dang/ 'dabab rgyus bstan pa las 'di gyur ba dang/ ge sbyong gun par byed ba dad/ byang chub sems dpa' yu rgod dang/ lus dang/ ga
dang sems ma drang bdong/ ltas lta ba dang/ khas 'che banor ba dang/ ring nas dam bcas pa las nyams pa dang/ gso dang/ bras dang/ mal tshe dang/ nang 'chad kyin dang/ bya dkyi
mtshan ma la chags pa dang/ ngo tshomi shis pa dang/ khrel med pa dang tshogs nyams pa dang/ ga pa'i chos ma yin pa 'a'ajug pa dang/ spyod yul dang bral ba dang/ sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul las 'di/
cha// du gyur pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang bral ba dang/ rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sems dang bral bar gyur to// gul 'khor skyod de lta bas na/ rnam pa 'di lta bu'i chos 'di thos
[Yi ]sa sdig pa 'i ba shes gnyen rigs pa med pa/ red pa no du gnyer ba dang/ mi bsten pa shes par bya'o// zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis de tsho tshigs su bcad pa 'di dog bka' stsal to// stobs bcu

mnga' ba'i spyod pa de bag mdan// sI ni 'gro ba dang shes kyi yol song// byang chub lon tanab rgyas khebs po nas ni// de dag 'thob phyir gzhan gyi khyim la dga'// zhwa 'dra sdang ba brel dang mas blo bralo//

ma shes kyi khe phyir bdud kyi debang du song// nyon mo ga rag lus srid ba'i 'gro dar gzhol// bdag 'di len tan ldan zhes de skadas+sa// lus ni dgon n dran pa grong khyer du// 'thob phyirede dag rnam par
rtog pas spyod// gnamadangasaltar tharalas ring ba ste// de 'dra'i de dag sprul ltar ring du spang// de dgasangs rgyas chos dang de bzhin du// dge 'dun yon tan rgyas gang dga' ma yani// mtho ris bor
nas na pa'il dusong// sdug pas 'phos nas srid pa'i 'gro bar 'khyams// nga po spyod pa nye bar bstan pa 'di thos nas// yang dag lhag pa'i bsam pa'i sgrub pas 'ad la sbyor// bskal pa bye
bamang ngos red dka' dalared kyis// de lta ji skad bstan pa'i chos nyid 'di'i ban gyis// gang zhig thega mchog byang chub dam pa 'tshang rgyur 'do// de yis rgyal po de yi yon tan dran par bya// bsams
0te yang dag ji bzhin tshul bzhin gnas par bya// de nas bde gshegs rnams kyi byang chub chags med 'grub// yon tan 'di dug rtogs pas 'phags pa'i rigs la bsten// rang gis 'di kun tu /
ba bskyed par bya// bstan pa yon tan snying po 'di 'dram sras shig/ shu po lta bur 'gro ldani'akhyams pa ste/ 'arini ri dang dgon ba khug tu gnas bar[S]// der gnas nas ni bdag ma bsams shing

gzhan mi spong// sngon chadasangs rgyas bye ba phrag brgyan nyos ma byas// rjes su shunas rtog par rgyun du bdag la spyod/ lus dang srog la srod pa ma chags spang bar bya// gus pa drag po bskyod nas chos
la brtson par gyis// gang gis mdo 'di'i bsgrub pa bshad pa 'di gnas nas// de dag rnams kyisophyin s byang chub ridam dka'// gang dag rgyal ba 'thig pa 'di la dga' brtson pa// thegos phyir 'di
ni 'jug par bya ba'i rigs// de lta bas na bstan la mos pa bskyed par bya// rnam par rgyu ba'i tshon se'agyod gyur tar/ yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpa' gang dag pha rol tu phyin pa lnga la spyod
kha yang gang zhig bdag 'di bslab bo// bdag sdom pa 'di la gnas par bya'o snyam du tshes kyi rnam grangs 'di lan tan gyisakhasgruban/ bsod nams kyi phung po de bsod nams kyi phung po 'di'i gin/

brgya char yang nye bar 'gro ste/ stong gi chadang/ brgya stong gi tshe dang/ bye ba brgya stong gi chadang/ grangs dang/ cha dang/ bgrango ba dang/ dpa dang/ rgyur yang nye bar ma bgro'o// bcon ldan 'dus
kyis tshes kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/ sngon sems ma bskyed pa'i lha dang/ mi dang/ lha ma yin du bcas pa'i skye dgu khrag khrig phrag sun du bla na med pa dag par rdzog
pa'i byang chub tu sams bskyed nas/ blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir ma ldog par gyur to// dge slong bdun steng na 'gab med par thug pa rnams la sems rnam par grol/
de nas bcom ldan 'das la/yul 'khor skyong gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i mi ngo ri lags/ 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ de skad
ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyongal 'di skad ces bka' stsal te// yul 'khor skyong de lta bas na/ khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di dam pa nus pa don yod/

bam par dag pa zhes bya bar zung zhig/ skyes bu dam pa rnam par rol pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rnam par nges pa zhes bya ngar la nga bung zhig/ don yongs su rdzogs pa zhes bya bar yang zung
bcom ldan 'as kyisade skad ces bka' stsalanas/ tshodang ldan pa lul 'khor skyong dang/ lha dang/ mi dang/ lha ma yin dang/ dri brar baa ba'i 'jig rten pa ras te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa yul 'khor skyong gis zhus pa zhes bya ba rdzogs so/// rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzin mi tra dang/ dA na shI la dang/ mun bar ma ra
zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa/ shel ka stong ste/ bam po gsum dang sho lo ka brgya//
rgya gar skad du/ o ah+phapa ra ni mahAyAn sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po theg pa chen po 'i mdo/ bam po dang bo/
sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshol lo// 'di skadapo dag gis thos pa dus gnyis n/ bcom ldan 'das grong khyer ku shan/ chu klung gser ldan gyi 'gram gyad kyi

'khor shing sA la zung gi tshul na bzhugs te/ de na bam ldan 'das dge slong bya ba 'bum phrag brgyad bcus bskor cing mdun gyis bltas te/ dpyid zla tha chung nyu'inang par yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i/
dus dang da bar gyur na/ sems can thams cad kyi nga rang gi lul gyi skad du// shin tu zur na par don brda spyod pa 'tshog rnams kyis srid pa'i rtsa mo man chad go ba mdzad de/ deng de bzhin gsheg
pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten thams cad la thugs brtse ba can/ 'jig rten thams cad skyob ba/ sems can thams cad la sgra gcan zin dang 'dra bar gzigs pa/
skyabs chen po'i gnas dang gzhi bor gyur pa// thub pa chen po yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro zhes bka' stsa la to// sems can thams cad kyi zhub lung bstan pa tha ma la dalta bu 'agasung/
0 @#// rnams byung bar gyur to// gzhan yang de'i tshibcom ldan 'das nyid kyi zhal nas 'od zer sna tshogs da lta ste/ sngon po dang/ ser po dang/ mar bo dang/ dkar po dang

la 'ashel gyi kha dog dang/ rdo'i snying pa'i kha dog lta bu dag byung ste/ 'od zer dug gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dang/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du sems can
dmyal ba dang/ dud 'gro dang/ yi dwags dang/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sems can de dag la bog nas/ de'i mod la nyon mongs pa'i mun pa thams cad dang bral te/ sa sris thams cad kyi na/

dbar gyur to// de nas mya ngan chen posanon te/ tshig ma shun par kye ma re bas so khengs so zhes kyang 'dzad do// kyi hud kyi byed ces kyang skadacher 'bodacing/ lag pa brkyang bas kyang ma go ba'i rdob
par byed de/ 'dar zhing 'di tu'o// de'i tshes chen po nags tshul dang bcas/ ri dang bcas pa rgya mtsho'i mthas gtugs pa yang rang du gagos te/ sems can de dag kyang gtsago la gcig 'dzin/
cing / 'di skad du/ grogs po dag ringes/ gyad yul gyi grong khyer ku shar 'dong 'dong ngo// de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ yongs su mya ngan 'da' bar gshegs pa las
bzlog la/ bsgrim mi dgos par bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa las lhag par yang bzhugs par gsol ba gdab bo zhes 'dzer to// gcig la gcig 'jus nas/ 'di skad du kyema'ajig rten stong

par 'gyur ro// kyis 'jig rten stongs par 'gyur ro/kyem sam can rnams kyi bsod nag kyi las kyi rnam par smin par zad do//las mi bzad par ni byung do/tshodang ldan pa dag myur tuge/tshe dang ldan pa dag gyur cig/
de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas deng gi yud tsam 'di la yongs su mya ngan las 'da'abar 'gyur ro/ kyis 'jig rtenaskos par 'gyur ro// kyen 'jige rten stongs par

'gyur ro/de bzhin gshegs pa mi bzhug/bdag cag mgon med pa dang/ rtsa lagamed pa dang/ 'phong par ji ltar mi 'gyur zhing/ bdag cag gi the tsom dang/ som nyi ci dang ci yod pa dedang de d gzhu bar bya'o zhes kyang
'dzor to// na shos chen po 'di dag kyang na 'khod de/ 'di lta ste/ gnas brtan ka t+ya yan chen po dang/ gnas brtan ba ku la dang/ gnas brtan nye dga' bo dang/ de dag la sogs pa gzhan
ngag kyang den 'a'od de/ de dag la 'od zer gyis phog nas/ 'dar rab du'adar/ a dam rab tungam a/ 'khrugs rab tu 'khrugs/ brtags rab tu brtags/ 'ur 'ur rab tu 'ur 'ur/
'khams rad tu 'a khams/ rgyugs rab tuchugs/ ris bdurings te/ de la sogs pa dag tu gyuras chas so// de'i tshe dge slong sa ya phrag brgyadagongashing bris nas phyir byung ste/ gnas
ban de dag la'od zer gyi snang ba dpog nas/ shin tu rings bar kha gdong bkrus te/ gcig la gcig 'drus so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras dedag thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/ dbang thob pa/
bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas la// cang shes pa/ gtsotshon bo chen po stong ba nyid kyis rang gi don thob pa// tsan dan chen po lta bu'i g.yog 'khor dang ldan b/ seng chen lta

bu'i g.yog 'khor dang ldan pa sha stag ste/ de la sogs pa'i yon tan dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa de dag thams cad snga dro nyi ma 'char kar yan lag thams cad kyi ba spu rgya skyegs kyi shing gi me tog ltar rtsa mar pa

mig ni mchi ma khrag lta bu s gang ste/ mchog tu sdug bsngal ba'i tshor ba dang ldan nas/ sems can thams cad la phan pa dang/ bde ba dang/ snying brtse ba'i phyir dang gdul bar byaba'i dbang gi don du theg pachen na/

mchog tu gsang ba/ stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa dgongs pa'i tshig rnam pa sna tshogs kyi tshes kyi sgo'i tshul bshad par bya ba'i phyi'i bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhagasanas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la
mgo bos phyag 'tshal tsa/ bcom ldan 'das la lan 'bum bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'dasag la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de'atshokita ka'i bu mo rab bzang

rgyug la sogs pa dge slong ma bye ba 'bum phrag drug thams cad kyang dag bcom pa/ zag pa zad/dbang thob pa bya ba byas ba byed pa byas pa/khubor ba/nyon mongs pa med pa// gtso bo tshanamo// chen po stong ba

nyid kyis rang gi nozlob pa sha stag ste/ 'di lta ste/ ko ta ka'i bu mo dge slongam rab bzang ma dang/ dge slong ma nyengaga' mo dang/ dge slong ma rgya mtsho blo gros dang/ de dag la sogs pa dge slongam bye ba 'bul

khrag drug snga sngon ma 'chakarayan lag thams cad kyi ba su rgya skyegs kyi shing me tog ltar tsa mar ba ni las/ mige ni ma mi 'khrug lta bu s gang ste// mchog tu sdug bsngal ba'i skyo ba dang ldan s/
sems can thams cad phan pa dang/ bde ba dang/ snying brtse ba'i phyi'i dang/ gdul bya ba'i debangag don du/ theg pa chen po'i chog tugasang ba/ stong ba nyid kyi rnam pa dgos ba'i tshig mang
sna tshogs kyi chos kyi sgo 'tshul bshad par bya ba'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'as la lan 'bum
bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de legs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de phyogs gtsake tu 'khod do// 'khor don dge slong ma 'khod pa rnams kyang/ byang chub sems dpa' ni mchog bcu thob pa/
stag ste/ gdul ba'i bang go'i bud med kyi gzugs dang/ budamedakyi dbyibs dang/ sha dang khragadang/ rgyus pa mang po dang/ rus pa'i lus 'chang ba/ rtag tu med pa bzhi bsgom pa dang ldan ga

bdag nyid kyi sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi tsho'abrul chen po'i 'o byed nus pa sha stag go/ gzhan yang de tsho byang chub sogs dba'i las bya la sogs ba/ byang chub sems dpa' ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed thams
cad kyang mi mtshogs bcu thob pa// thabs kyi lus 'chang ba sha stag la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen go rgya mtshos byin dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sogs dbang chen bo blo gros
0 @#/ mi zad pa dad/ dedag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyang theg pa chen po shes par 'dodob/ theg pa chen po la zhugs pa/ theg pa chen pos/
bkres pa/ theg pa chen po la sredal/ thegal chen gol se snyamed pa/ 'jig rten thams cad d nga mthun par byed nus pa sha stag dang/ bdag cag brgal nas gzhan bsgral bar bya'o snyam ste/ sngon

gyi bskal pa bye bsed du tshul khrims kyi bgrod pa'i dam bca' ba legs par blangs pa 'dzin pa'i spyad pa spyod ba sha stag dang/ de bzhin du nga dag cag grolanas gzhan dgrol bar bya'o snyam pa dang/ de bzhin

du dkon mchog gsum gyi dung ma 'tsha par bya'o snyam pa dang/ chos gyi 'khor 'khoskor bar bya 'o snyom ba dong gachachen po bgo bar bya'o snyam du sems pa sha stag dang/ de bzhin du yon tan dpag tu med pa

dang ldan pa dang/ bu gcig pa la bya ba da ni du/ sems can thams cad la snyoms par lta ba sha stagaste/ de dag thams cad snga dro nyi ma 'char kar yan lag thams cad kyi ba sdurgya skyegs kyi de'i game tog

ltar rtsa dgar ba ni las/ mig ni mchis khrag lta bu s gang ste/ mchog tu sdug bsngal ba'i tshor ba dang ldan s/ sems can thams cad la phan pa dang/ bde ba dang/ snying brtse ba'i phyir dang/ gdul bar bya ba'i
dbang gi don du theg pa chen po'i mchog tu gsang ba/ stong pa kyi rnam pa dgongs pa'itsho rnam pa snags kyi sgo'i tshul bshad par bya ba'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/
thab btsem ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan 'bum bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de phye sogs gcig tu 'khod
do khang de'abaslab pa'i gzhi lnga blangs shing/ tshul khrims dang/ tsheg dang/ yon tan dang ldan pa'i dge bsnyena'od drim med par grags pa'i rgyal po la sogs pa/ dge bsnyen gdabaklong

gnyis kyi bye ma snyed thams cad kyang zung dang zud du shes bar 'dod pa stag ste/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ bde ba dang/ rtog pa dang/ mi rtag pa dang bdag yod pa dgabadag med pa dang/ stong ba dang/ steng pham
yin pa dang/ de lon dang/ de 'go ma yin pa dang/ skyabs dang/ skyabs ma yin pa dang sems can dang sems can med pa dang/ brtan pa dang/ brtan pa ma zhi ba dad/ zhib dang/ zhi ba ma yin
pa dang/ 'dus byas dang/ 'asam byas dang/ thor zug dang/ ther zug ma yin pa dang/ gongasas mya na las 'das pa dang/ gos su mya ngan las 'das pas zhib la sogs ba'i khyod/
par dang ]khyadapar du 'phags pa shes par 'dod pa sha stag ste/ 'diltastege bsen 'od dAme med par grags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba dang/ dge bsnyen rab sbyin la sogs pa ge bsnye
theg pa chen po thos par 'dod la/ thos nas kyang gzhan dag la bstan par bya'o snyam du dam bcas shing/ tshul khrims blangs pa/ theg pa chen pos sgom la mosanas kyang/ gzhan sgom pa dag ngoms pa'
bya'osnyam du dam bcas pa/ theg pa chen po la sred pa// theg pa chen po la sarasna med pa/ 'jig rten thams cad dang mthun par byed nus pa sha stag dang/ bdag cag nga rgyal
nas gzhan bsgral bar bya'o// bdag cag spel nas gzhan dgrol bar bya'o// dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung ma 'chad par bya'o// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bya'o snyam du slob par 'dod pa/ gocha

chen po bgos pa/ bslab pa rnams la sems gus pa dang/ de bzhin du yon tan grangs med pa dang ldan pa/bugacig pa la bya ba bzhin du/ sems can thams cad la snying rje dang ldan pa sha stag ste/dedag byang/
ma 'char kar de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung zhugs M la zhen pa'i phyir/ re res kyang tsan dan dang/ a ka ru dang/ thang shing gi mchog dang/ tsan na sa mtshog pa'i bud shing rnams dang/ lam srog

shing dri bsung dang ldan pa/ yon tan lnga stong lnga stong khyer te 'ong//de la lam srogatashadzesna'i zhing yung gser gyi skud pa rin po che sna bdun rigs bdun dang ldan pas smras pa dkris pas/ ri mo la bris pa kho

sku/ na bzhin du 'jug pa rad bzhin gyis gzhon sha can legs par bcos pa sha stag ste/ sna re zhing ya nga 'od rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i phung po chen bo/ mdog sngo ba dang par bar kha cig tumadog/
dkor kha cig dusngo skya/ kha gcig tu dmar/ kha gcig du ser ba/ mig tu sdug par byas pa sha stag go bam pa'i'i g.yogs ma'aphur bu yang ne po 'dun las byas pa sha stag go/ nges

tshama'i bye bu mang bor re zhing yang/ ldong ros kyi mdog lta bu dang/ zarama'i me tog gamadog lta bu dang/ sngon po dang sar bo rnams kyis bar bar du spel pa sha stag go/ de la chis na ti shrI gu mang po rer
zhing lang gser thugs mchoga rnam bar g pa yul mang bor grags pa dag gis sbel ba sha stag go/ dal yam sreg shinges re re zhing yang sngos dri bsung zhim po dang// me tog 'phreng ba dang/
gur kum gyi khyim dang ldan bar byas pa/ gsor thags kyis g.yogs pa/ ra snas brgyan pa/ ni po che sna bdun gyi shubs sngon bo dang/ sar go dang/ rdo skya dang/ kur bodang/ bod ka
lta bu dag gi nang du bcug pa/ yul ka li de ka'i sa du/ bar ma ris dang/ bab dar dang/ rgyadag la tshig rnams kyis dkris pa/ me tog mang pos brgyan pa// byug pa dribasung zhim po dag

byugs pashastag go/ gam sregashing sna re'i shing rta re re zhing yang ni bo che sna bdun gyis brgyan pa/ gser gyisomadzes par byas pa// kha cig tu sngon bo dang/ dkar po dang/ bab 'a ra kho dag dang//

lo khri'i kha dog bas lhag pa'i 'od gsal ba dang ldan pa sha stag ge/ ka nga 'di dag gi gdu'angashing rnams kyang rin po che sna ba nagyis brgyan pa dang/ depa med pa rta cang shes mgyogo ba dag dang sbyar ba/
stag se// rta de dag kyang rlung gi shugs bsamagyogs pa/ sdu bduskyar gyi mdog dang ldango ris kyis dogo dang/ sprin gyi mdog can sha stag ste/ thabs de 'dra ba'areshang rta re re'i mdun legs dang/
rgyab legs dang/ rgyab logs su rgyal mtshan dang/ ban bsgring ste/ rgyalag tshan thams cad kyang ri bo chi las byas pa// gseragyi dra bas g.yogs pa sha stag go/ rgyal
mtshan gyi mdun legs su yang gdugs rtse bas dong/ rna ba nor bu dri ma med pa 'od can las byas pa// mu tig gi chun bo sbyangs pa sha stag khyer ro// gdugs re re'i mdun legs su lang gsar gyi
me tog kuu da dang/ ut+pa la dang/ pad+ma dkar po sdong bu bai DUrma las byas/ the ba rdo rje las byas pa bung ba mang po skad 'byin pa/ dri bsung zhim po dang ldan ba/ yid du 'ong ba/ 'od dang ldan
pa che ba mang bo sha stag dang/ lnga ldachen po sha stag khyer ro// lnga lde chen po rnams kyi mdun du yang byang chub sems dpa' skyes ba'i rebs kyi spyod pa ri mor bris pa chen po dag thogs so//
ri mo'i zurar re'i bo las g.yon nas kyang/ zlos gar gyi gar stabs yul dbus nas byung ba rnam pa snatshogs byed de/ garastados byed de'inangan/ sa'i snyan rinapotshalas byas pa'i rdza
dang/ 'khor dang/ ji blom dang/ pi wang dang/ gling bu dang/ lang rgyu gcig pa dang/ rje bo dang/ dung la sogs pa dag brdung zhing 'du dado/gar stabs kyi 'gan de dag la
kyang khyen 'jig rten stongs paro 'gyur ro zhes bya ba de lta bu'i rnam pa brjedatsango/ gdung gdung skad du dbyangs 'an to// gar stabs kyisil snyan re'i mdun du lad me tog dri zhim po snatshogs rnam
par 'tshor ba rnams kyi phyi mas ni bo tsha'i skon bu legs par bcos pa gzhon sha zhig gis bkang ba sha stag dad/ ma zhi ba'i skyon bu mang po ba lta na sdug pa/ gur kum gyi phyogasang kang pa/
mang bo sha stag thogs so// de dag mdun du'ang bcom ldan 'dras dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi 'a khor dang bcas pa khyab par 'gyur ba'i zhal zas dag khyer zhing 'dodogo/ zhal zas de dag kyang bud
nanadamar bo dang akaru dang/ thang shing gi me chung dus btsos pa dang/ gdabaklung gi chus bcos pa sha stag ste/ sgyur ba dang/ lanatshar dang/ mngar ba dang/ bskabadad tshab dang
kha ba'i ro dang ldan pa/ mdas skyod pa/ zha par gyur pa sha stag go/ sA la zung gi drung/ nye 'khor thams cad kyang gsar gyi byes 'jam bos bkram sta/ ga du sha'asadang/ snyam bu dang/
bcos sna dang/ dre'u rdzog dang ka ling ka'i ras dang/ zab dar 'jam zhing mdog dkarab rnams kyang bting go/ grub pa'i gnas de'i bzhi dpag tshadasum cu rtsa gnyis khor khor yug kyang gur
kum gyis byugs so/ khacom ldan 'das dge slong gi dag 'dzin dang bcas pa'i seng ga'i khri chen bo gsar las byas pa/ na po tshasna bdun gyis smras shing snang bar byas pa/ rirab ltache zhing 'bang
mtho ba dag kyang pagasaso// g.yog ma yang de dag gi rgyan du 'tshan pa sha stag gis g.yogs te/ gser gyi dril bu g.yeraka sgra sil la 'a khrol zhing gi sgra 'byung ba'i dra ba can gyi lo la ba rnams/
0@#// kyisan beskor/ rgya dar su lhag yug khyim chen po'i bla re namasan brel/ gdugs dkar po rnams kyis ni tshon bsgribs/ rnga yab dkar po rnams kyisan g.yabs/ rgyab

rten glang po che'i mche ba lachusen maka rarten pa 'a'i bsaM/ zla ba dang 'a 'od zer ltar dkar ba'amu tig gi chun po 'byung zhing sbas pa ldan ba rnams bas/ sa phyogs rnams ni mi rtog drizhig po 'i sa'i snyan
mas gtor to// dge bsnyen de dag re re nas kyang 'di la 'di samadu sems te/ bdag gis sems can thams cad la bas 'dod pa rnams la zas sbyin no// skom 'dod pa rnams la skom sbyin no//
mgo bo dngamig la sogs pa yan lag dang nying lag thams cad 'dod pa rnams la yang ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du sbyin// dbul po dang/ bkren pa dang/ 'a'ongs pa rnams la yang/ 'do pa dang/ gad/
gdab dang/ ma brtagaso ba'i smyon pa rnams ma gtogs par/ gang dang gang dgaci dang ci 'dod pa de dang de dag chog par sbyar rosnyam du sems kyi/ gzhan natiyang ma sems so// de bzhin du dge
khasnyen gyi sde tshan byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la gnas pa de dag thams cad kyicesams pa// de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gakhogos gsol te/ yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya go/ de bzhine
gshegs pa bdag cag gi bzhugs gso'ati/ bongs su mya ngan las 'aa bar bya'osnyam ste/ so so nas de 'ba' zhig snying la sems shing/ yan lag thams cad kyi ba su rgya skyegs kyishinge gi me tog/
[n ] ltar dmar ban longs/ mige mchache thag lta bu s gang ste/ mtshog dusdug bsngal ba 'tshor ba dad ldan nas rang rang gi mchod pa'i lo khyod bud de dang lam sreg shang dang/ ri rta dang/
rgyal mtshan dang/ gdugs dang/ gnanams dang chas te/ zhal zas kyiechog gis sbyar ba'i snod rnams thogs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'aa kyi zhabs
la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la skyes dang/ me tog 'phreng dang/ phyem dang/ phye ma ni bu dang/ gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang/ ba nang bla re rgya chen dag gis mdo zhes lan

'bum bskor ba byas te/ mig nas mchi ma rgyun mi chad bar char bzhin du phab nas/ badrag di la sdug bsnga la gyi rnam pa mang po byed cing/ kye ma 'ji'i rten stongs par 'gyur ro// kyen 'jig rten stongs par
'gyur re zhig de skadanguskadan bo'ano// de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs drungan/ srog chags shashum ra bzhin du 'gre ldeg cing/ gsol ba 'debs te/ bcom ldan 'as de bzhin gshegs pa dag
slong gi dge 'dun gyi 'khor dang bcas pas/ bdag gis sbyar ba'i bshos gsol bar ciganang/ gcom ldan 'das bdag la thugs brtse ba'amed du/ sbyin pa'i tho ma de bzhin gshegs pas bzhes
su gsol zhes gsol ba 'debs so/ nas bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyen bzhin du myang ma gsung bar gyur to// de dag sogs lan gnyis lan gsum du de skad ces gsol kyang
lanaganyis lan gsum du bcom ldan 'das cang ma gsung bar gyur to// de nas dge bsnyen gyi tshogs de dag re thag chad de nga mawi bar 'khod nas/ ngu gcig pa shas dur khrod du

b.rom thag pa'i pha ma 'gre ldog ba bzhin du shin tu sdug bsngal bar gyur to// de bzhin du dge bsnyen de dag thams cad mtsheg tu sdug bsngal ba gyur pa las langs te/ rangarang gi mchod pa ni yo byad rnams
bsdus nas phyogs gtisi tu 'khed do// gzhan yang de'i tsho bslab pa'i gzhi lnga blangs shing tshul khrims dang/ tshe ga dang/ yon tan dang ldan pa dang/ dam pa'i tshes kyi gces pa 'dzani

ba'oge bsnyen mtshong dpon gyi bu mo 'tshong 'i dpal la sogs pa dge bsnyen ma sang+gA'i klung gsum gyi bye ma snyed thams cad kyang/ bud med kyi gzugs kyis sems can bye ba phrag mang bo sa ba sgrol ba/ khyim gyi
gnas la sod bsha stag ste/ lus 'di ni nyes pa'i khams brgyad cu rtsa bzhi las lhags pas bsdus ba'o// lus 'di'i zin du rigs bye ba phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhibris so// lus 'di ni rgyal po'i khri mon du
khrubs pa'i dri mnam pa'o// lus 'dzin gyi ro rul ba'i dri bas kyang lhag par sbags pa'o// lus 'din sgo dgu nas mi gtsang ba'adzag pa'o// lus 'di nig dang/ chung dang/ rus pa dang/ khrag dang/
bags ban la zhal can/ rkang lag gi phyi sgo dang/ rab dang/ bgan dang/ mig gi skar khung dang/ mgo bo'i yang thog can/ yid rgyal bo lta bu'i pho brang grong khyer lta bu 'o/ lus 'dinimakhas
pa thams cad kyis spangs shing// byis ba'i skye bo dga' bar byed pa'i 'dod chags pa dang/ zhesngadadad/ gtilus la sogs pa'i shamodas ba bye ba snyed kyi ga'i bus bsten pa/ 'om bu dang/ e/
rand dang/ khu ba dang/ chu shing lta bur song bo med pa glog dang ri gzar bo'i 'dab chu'i dba' rlabs lta ni tumakho rten pa'o// sgyu ma dang smig rgyu dang brag cha dang zla ba'i gzugs
brnyan ltar sku b.labyed ba/ rlung shugs phra bas rnam par dkrugs pa'itshe'aTishugs kyis brkos pa 'a 'gram gyi sdong po ltar g.yungs na'og pa'i chis// spyang ki dang wa dang/ bya
rgodadang/ bya rog rnams kyi blos min na/ su zhis 'di lta bu tshang ba la dga' bar byed/ rgya mtsho'i chu thams cad skra'i rtse mos blangs te ba glang gi rjes su blugs bar mi nus srid kyi/ lus nad
brgya rtsa bzhisogazir nga 'dasnying po med pa dang/ mi gtsang ba ni tshig tsam gyis bstan par mi nus so// sachen po 'di rgya shug gi 'bras bu'i rdos pa'i 'bru g.yostagatubyas pa 'am/ lus 'bru
mnam/ rdul phra rab kyi rdul tsam sha stag tu byas pas khrid ba'agyurald sridakyi/ lus 'did kyi bar du 'di'i nyes dmigs ni mthar thug par mi 'gyur te/ dang san dam pa'i chos bsrung ba'i
phyir 'di ga'i ma bzhin du do bar bya'o snyam ste/ 'di ltar dge bsnyen ma de dag thams can bo stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ na ba med pa bsgoms pas sems bsgoms pa sha stag ste//
kha ]@#// 'dilta ste/ dge bsnyen ma 'tsho ba'i debal zhes bya ba dang/ dge bsnyen ma dbul 'phreng zhes bya ba dang/ geb nams ga zhes bya ba dang/ la sogs pa thams cad kyang theg pachen
bo thos par 'dod la/ thosanas kyang gzhan dag la bstan par bya'o snyam du dum bcas ba/ bsrung ba lhur len ba/ bud med kyi lus ngan snyam du skyod ba dang/ lus snying med dosnyam dusmod ba/ so so/

nas shas cher sgom pa dang/ lakhor ba'i 'khor lo gzhig go snyam du sems pa sha stag dang theg 'chan bos skom la mos nas gzhan skol ba dag ngomos bar bya snyam du dam bcatshapa sha stag dang/ theg pa chen pol
pa/ sred pa/theg pa chen po la ser sna mdaba'ajayi rten thams cad dang mthun bar slob par 'dob dang/ grol nas gzhan dgrol bar bya'o// brgal nas gzhan bsgral bar bya'o// dkon mchog gsum gyi
gdung tshadapar bya'o// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bya'o snyam du slob par 'dod pa sha stag dang gachachen po bgos pa/ bslab pa rnams la brtul zhugs brtan pa dang/ de bzhin du yon tan du
mdang ldan pa dang/ bu gcig pa la bya ba bzhin du sems can thams cad la snying rje dang ldan pa sha stag ste// de dag kyang ma 'char kar shin tu ris par gcig la gcig 'jus te/ bzhin gshegs
pa 'gadung zhugs la bzhin pa 'i phyir/ yan srog shing dge bsnyen pha rnams kyi nyis 'gyur khyer ba las/ bcom ldan 'as kyis zhal zas ma bzhes nas/ bushi ba bzhin du mchog dusngagabasngal
00 bar gyur te/ dus nas langs te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// gzhan yang de'i tsha'i tsa byi gzhon nu gtsang ma drim med pa'i snying bo la sogs pa yangs pa can n gnas pa'il tsa byi gzhon/

nu grong khyer gyi nang na gnas pa dang/ phyi rol na gnas pa dang bcas pa rnams/ 'dzam bu'i klong na gnas pa'i rgyal phran blon po dang bcas pa ga 'i klung bzhi'abyem snyed thams cad kyang dam pa'i tshes
bsrung ba la mkhas ba/ tshul khrims dang/ tsheg dang/ yon tan dang ldan pa/ dam pa 'chos sun 'byin cing rtags can 'chal po rnams kyi serab lta bur gyur pa sha stagal/ de dag thams cad kyang
'di lta bur 'dod de/ bdag cag gnor dang 'bru'i tshogs dang/ mdzod dang bang ba'i tshogs gang yin pa de dag thams cad na/ bdud rtsi mi zad pa bya ba dang/ bdud rtsi gnas par bya ba'i phyir yin gyis/
bdag cag gis dam pa'itshos lan tan bya'o// ma pa'is la sun 'byin cing/ log par lta ba rnams kyi lce gcad par bya'o zhes legs par dam bcas pa// tshul khrims 'chal pa/ tshul A
lami gnas pa rnams ni gos dkar bo gyon du bcug ste/ i pa'i las byed du gzhug gsum dusems brtul ba/ a pa'ichos skugs pa lan bla ma bzhin du me gror bya'o snyam du dam bcas pa// de
'an la phan pa dang bde bar gnas par bya ban los surjogs par byas tang des chog gsum du sems pa dang/ theg ba chen po wis bar do la so nas kyang gzhan dag la bstan bar byasnyam du yi dam
gabacas pa la brtan pa dang/ de la sogs pa'i yon tan dpag tumed pa dang ldan pa sha stag ste 'di lta ste/ mi gzhon nu gtsang ma dri med ba'i snying bo zhes bya ba dang/ sgrib pa
[H ]dag pa zhes bya ba dang/ gapachu dri ma med pas byin bzhes khyab dang/ de la sogs pa lo byi gzhon nu de dag khyad gcig la gcig 'jus te re res kyang gdug zhugs la zhen pa'i bud shing thangashing g
mchog dang/ tsan dan dang/ a ka ru rnams dang/ lam srog shing bye ba phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhidang/ mchod pa snga ma'it+tis 'gyura rnams khyer nas/ mchod pa rnams bsgrags te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bod/

du dong bo/ la te byi gzhon nu re re la yang glang po che brgyad khri bzhi stong dang/ rta brgyad khri bzhi stong dang/ shing rta brgyad khri bzhi stong dang nor bu chu shel brgyad khri bzhi stong dad chas so// glang bo cher re se'u
du lang cheg la 'os pa'i gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba na dang/ dar gyi blo rig bo rnams thogs so// gdugs rnams ni ngan thung ngu gang yin pa de la yang bor khor yug tu dbag tshad gzhi yod/

( to/ daratsho bla re chen po rnams kyin ng nachud du gang yin pa de la yang chu zheng du dpag tshad sum cu rtsa gnyis yod do/ rgyal mtshatsha rnams nangan thung ngu gang yin pa de la yang 'phad dudab tshad brgyu yod do//
ban rnams kyin ng na thud du gang yin pa des kyang dpag tshad stodadu phyin to// de ltar de dgamachod pa rnams dang chas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du dongs/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos
phyag 'tshal te/ zhal zas phul ba las/ bcom ldan 'das rung mi gsung ste/ ma bzhes nas/ mchog tu sdug bsngal bar gyur te rethag chad nas langs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus ta la ban gyi grodi

tsam du 'phags te 'bod do/ gzhan la nga de'i tsho'adzam bu gling pa 'i blon po dang/ tshong dpon dang/ khyim bdag gang+gA'i klung lnga'i bye ma snyed thams cad kyang theg pa chen po la dad pa/ tshul khris

dang/ tshog dang/ yon tan rnam par dag pa dang ldan pa/ a pa'i tsholo sun 'byin pa rnams kyi ser ba lta bur gyur pa sha stag ste/ 'di lta ste/ byis bdag gi rgyal bo rnam par snang byed ces bya ba dang/
'gro bskyod zhes bya ba dang/ chos skyong zhes bya ba dang/ de la sogs pa dag kyang de 'tshir lhags te/ de dag thams cad kyis kyang rang rang gi mchod pas/ mchod pa snga ma rnams khril gyis mnan nas/
bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa chen po'i tshogs kyis mchodag zhal khrus ma zhes pa'i phyir mchog tu sdug bsngal bar gyur te/ reg tshad nas langs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus ta la
bdun gyi srid tsam du 'phags te 'bod do// gzhan yang de ri tshirgyal po ma skyes dgram gtogos bar/ yangs pa can gyi rgyal bo zla ba dri ma med pa'i snying bo// grong khyer gyi nang na
gzhas pa dang/ phyi rol na gnas pa'i g.yog 'khor dang bcas pa la sogs pa/ 'dzam bu gling thams cad kyi grong khyer dang/ ri khrod kyi grong dang/ lul bo tshe dang/ kha lus kyi rgyal po/
[n ]@#// gang+gA'i klong drug gi bye ma snyedudang lhan cig tu dbung tshogs yan lag bzhi dang bcas te lhags so// rgyal bod rnams re re la yang dmag 'khrug sa ya phrag bco brgyad bco brgyad
yod do// de dag la glang bo ma rtag tu'agram bzhag rdul 'dag pa dang/ rta chung gi shugs bas lhag par mgyogos ba dag kyad yod do// de dag gi mchod pa'i yo byad gang yin pa de dag kyang/ med pali
byad sngam de dag las nyis 'gyur gyis ches bde la chos mang ste/ de lta bu'i mchod pa'i tshul dag khyer nas/ dbung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang bcas te lhags so/ de dag mchod pa de rnams kyi nangan

sgyu gdugs thung ngu gang yin pa de yang dag tshad brgyad cuchuzheng gab par 'dug go/ ba dan gnangan chung du gang zhi bas kyang dpag tshad brgya stong du phyin no// rgyal mtshan phal pa gang yin pa de la lad 'bad

dudapag tshad sum cu yod do// de ltar yangs ba can gyi rgyal bo zla ba dri med pa'i sod po dang/ nyi 'od ces bya ba dang/ de la sogs pa rgyal po rnams nyi ma 'char kar lha bas te/ dadag kyang ma pa'i chos
rgyu sun 'byin cing rtags cad 'chal pa rnams kyi ser ba lta bur gyur pa/ mthus kyang sems can rnams dam pa'i sa la 'god par byed pa dang/ bdag cag gnor dang 'bru'i tshogs dang/ mdzod dang
bang ba'i tshogs gang yin ba de dag ni dam pa'i chos gzhas par bya ba'i phyi'i 'osnyam du sems da pa/stag dang/ bdag cag gis dam pa'i chos lan tan bya'o// dam pa'is sun 'byinib rnams khyilci/
nadrung sa bcad donas dam bcas pa brtan por byas pa sha stag dang/ theg pa chen po 'dod pa dang/ 'jig rten thams cad la bde brtse ba sha stag ste/ de dag gi mchodapa rnams kyi so yangs pa can/

nas grong khyer ku sha'i bar thams cad kun tu gang bar gyur to// de dag gi gdugs kyi grib ma 'dab chags su 'dug bas ni/ nyi ma'i 'od kyise mi phog go/ de dag gi kha zas kyi dri bsung giso ni dpag tshad
bar byab gyur te/ de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la rang rang gis sbyar ba'i zhal zas bzhes pa'i lan gsum gyi bar du gsol ba btab kyang/ zhal zas ma bzhes nas yid mi dga' ste/ las nas
phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// gzhan yang de'i tshorgyal po ma skyes dgra'i btsunamo ma gtogs bar/ yangs pa can gyi rgyal po'i btsun mo 'jig rten gsum na mdzes ma la so ba/sa pa

'dzam bu glinge ba ri rgyal po dang/ tshong dpon dang/ khyim bdag rnams kyi chung ma gang+gA'i klung ba na spyi bye ma snyed dang lhan cig tu lhags te/ de dag thams cad kyang bud med kyigazugs kyis sems can mang po
nges par sgrol ba/ rtag tu lus bsgom pa dang ldan pa/ chen po stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pas sems rnamapar dag pa sha stag ste/ 'di lta ste/ yangs pa can gyi rgyal bo'i

btsun mo 'jig rten gsum na mdzes ma zhes bya ba dang/ btsun mo gi yang ku zhes bya ba dang/ de la sogs pa thams cad kyang sems can thams cad la bu gcig pa la bya ba bzhin du snying rje dang ldan pa sha stag ste
gcig la gcig 'dus nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung zhugs la zhen pa'i phyir/ lam sreg shade rnams khyer te/ mchod pa sdom thams cad rang rang gi mchod pa rnams

[# ]kyis zil gyis mnan nas/ bcom ldan 'das la nyis 'gyur dumachod pa byas te/ de dag gi mchod ba'i yo byad rnams kyi rgyal mtshan dang/ ba zhan dang/ gdugs rnams kyi 'phad dang/ chu zheng gi tshad kyang
snga ma'i 'gyur bas lhag go kha zas rnams kyi dri bsung can ni dpag tshad brgyad du khyab par gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas/ zhal zas bzhes par gsol ba btab kyang/ zhal
khas ma bzhes nas/ bcom ldan 'das la bskor bar byed cing/ sgra 'bul la/ rang rang gi rgyan rnams 'thor zhing/ skad ma ston pas dus te/ bu gcig pa shi ba bzhin du mchog tu sdug bsngal bar
rgyur nas/ bcom ldan 'as kyi mthus sA la zung gi drung nyid du phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ gzhan la nga de'atsholha mi'i langs zhes bya ba la sogs pa lha'atshigs gang+gA'i klong brgyad kyi bye
ma sad dang lhan cig tu lhags nas/ lha de dag gis 'di skad ces smras so// grogos po dag ltos/ grogs po dag lus/ mi rnams kyi mchod pa'i yo byadamatshog tu khyad par du 'phags la/ de bzhin
gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la mchod pa dang bkur sti tha mas natshod ba 'dod de/ mi rnams kyi zhal zas kyi tha ma bzhes pa'i phyir/ bcomo ldan 'das la gsol ba
'debs kyis/ grogs po dag bdag cag gis kyang/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la so so nas mchod pa bya zhing/ thama'i dus su zhal zas dbul bar byan
ji ltar bdag cag gis phul ba'i zhal zas de bzhin gshegs pas gsol te/ yongs su mya na las 'da' bar gshegs par mdzad cig gu/ grogs po dag sas rgyas 'byung ba shin tu dkon no//
debs kyang zhal zas kyi tha ma'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa phun sum tshogs pa nas dkon no// kye na bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya na las 'das nana'ajig rten stongs par 'gyur ro zhes smras so/
lha de dag thams cad kyang theg pa chen po wes pa 'dod la/ thos nas kyang gzhan dag la bstan to snyam du dam bcas pa/ theg pa chen pos sgom pa/ chos n kyag zhan skom pa rnams chos par bya'o
snyam du dam bcas pa// theg pa chen po la ser sna med pa/ theg pa chen po la phrag dog dang dus che ba dang/ 'chab pa dang/ sgyumed pa/ theg pa chen kho sun 'azhi pa 'a sems can rnams kyi ser ba
lta bur gyur pa/ dam pas bsrung pa'i tshul khrims blang ba/ 'jig rten dang mthun par slob par 'dod pa/ bdag cag nga rgal naso gzhan bsgral bar bya/ khadag cag grolo nas gan dgrol bar bya'o/
tshos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bya'o dazho mtshog gsum gyi gdung 'chad bar bya'osnyam du slob par 'dod pa/ gochachen bo bsegs pa/ bslab pa rnams la dam bcas ba brtan pa dang/ de bzhin du lon
tan dpag tumed ba dang ldan// bu gtiso ba la bya ba bzhin du 'jig rten thams cad la snying rje lta ba sha stag ste/ de dag kyang rima'acharakar ston pa yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'igang/

! zhugs la zhen pa'i phyir/ bud shing dang gnasrog shing rnams khyer te/ de dag kyang sngams lul ba'i yum sreg gi ngo gi nyis 'gyur nyis 'gyur ba'i bzang ba'i lha rdzas dri bsung dang ldan pa/ yid du 'ong pa mi
kon pa sha stag go/ u0f8bshing rta yang rta'i mchog mgyogs ba dag dang sbyar ba/ ra la dkar bos g.yogs pa// gzugs dang dbyibs ri mor bri bar mi nus pa la bu g.yer kha'i dro gyi yol bas bskor pa/

dar yug khyil chen bo'i blo re chen go/ rtsa ba ri mo can dag la btsugs pa dang/ gar stabs dang/ rol mo de 'odo ba rnams kyis mdun du ngus pa// kha zas zhim pomang po dag dang/ seng ge 'i khribi cha na'i

rgyab rten rtse mo nor bu'i 'od kyis snang bar byas pa/ zhabs rten gser las byas pa dag kyang bshanA dang/ sa phyogs kyang me tog dribasung zhim po sna tshogs kyis mdzes par byas la/ ma tog gi sil ma bkram zhing
bkod ba/ dbung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi bzhin 'bung bu sha stag ste/ so sonas mchi ma khrag lta bu mi thub rung/ mchog tu sdug bsngal bas gdungs nas/ sems can thams cad la bzhub dang/ bde ba dang/

snying brtse ba'i phyir/ gdul bar bya ba'i dbang gi zhedu theg pa chen po mchog tu gsang ba/ stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa dgos pa'i tshog rnam pa sna tshogs kyiso'i tshul bshad par bya ba'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
za bod du dong ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ mchod pa dang bkur sti'i mchog rnam pa mang po dag byas te/ bskor pa yang byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor rnams

kyi ri 'dabang gi bla gas sa la bting ste/ rang rang gi rgyan rnams bog cing gtor nas/ rang rang gi sku 'bar zhing skad cha snyan pas dus/ bcom ldan 'das la tshig ma thun par 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
ldan 'das kyis bdag cag gis sbyar ba rtogs te gos gsol te yongs su mya nazlada' bar mdzad du gsol zhes lan gnyis lan gsum du gsol ba btab kyang/ bzho ldan 'das kyis ma bzhes te/ cani
gsungan/ de dag re thag chad de lasanas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// gzhan yang de la tshoklu'i rgyal bo phyogs bzhin gnas pa klu'i rgyal po nor rgyas kyi bu dang/ dga' bo dang/

dga' la sogs pa klu'i rgyal po gang+gA'i klung dba'ibyis sud si tu rings par nyi ma 'char kar lha rnams kyi mchod pa las kyang nyis 'gyur bas lhag pa'i mchod pa'i lo khyod rang rang gi 'byor pa dang 'tshamal
ga khyer nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bod dudo ste/ phyag 'tshal nas zhal zas bzhes par gsol ba btab kyang/ bsam pa bzhin du ma grub nas langs te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/

gzhan la nga de'i tsho rnam thos kyi bu la sogs pa gnod sbyin gyi bdag po ga log 'khor dang bcas ba gang+gA'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed gcig la gcig 'dus nas/ rang rang gi mchod pa rnams kyis klu'i gyi lo bo rnams
rgyug mchod pa snga ma khril gyis mnanas/ tshogs chen po dang nas te lcagasanas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ zhal zas bzhes par gsol ba btab kyang/ bcom ldan
'das kyis zhal zas ma bzhes nas yid mi dga' ste/ langs nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// gzhan yang de'i tshonan mkha' ldinge gi kha dag po dgra'i mdza' ngo zhes bya ba la sogs pa nam
ma la' lding gi rgyal po gang+gA'i klung teshu'i bye ma snyed kyis rang rang gi mchod pas gnod sbyin rgyal po snga ma dag gi mchod pa rnams zil gyis mnan nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ zhal
zla khas bzhes bar gsol ba btab kyang/ zhal zasam bzhes nas yid mi dga' ste/ las nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// gzhan yang de ni khri'i bdag po misabyin gyi bu la sogs pa dri za'i bdag
bo ga'i klung sum cu'i byis snyed kyis mchod pa sngam thams cad pas kyang ches mchog tu gyur pa'i mchodab rnams khyer te 'os sa/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa byas te/ rol mo snyan dgu byas
sku nas phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la zhal zas bzhes par gsol ba btab kyang/ bcom ldan 'as kyis ma bzhes zhas/ dedag kyang yid ming 'bar gyur te/ las nas phyogs gtsahetu/
'khod do// gzhan yang de'i tshomi'am ci'i bdag po lags mthong la sogs pa mi 'am ci'i bdag po ga'i klung bzhi bcu'i bye ma snyed lhags te/ sngama rnams kyi mchod pa de dag bsdoms pa bas kyang dog
bza re re'i mchod pa ches khyab par 'phags par gyurato/ de dag kyang zhal zas ma bzhes nas/ yid mi dga' bar gyur te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// gzhan yang de'atshalto 'phye chen po'i bdag po 'ag
mthong chen po la sogs pa lto 'phye chen bo'i bdag bog 'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyis mchod ba sngama'inyis 'gyur khyer ba las/ sdug bzhin du zhal zas ma bzhes nas yidi ni gal te phyogs gcig

tu 'khod do// gzhan yang de'i tsho lha ma yin gyi bang 'bade mchog rigs la sogs pa lha ma yin gyi bdag bogatsA'i klung drug cu'i bye ma snyed lus re zhing snang ba chen po dang ldan pa/ lha ma yin gyi bsam pa
med pa sha stag gis mchod pa snga ma'i nyis 'gyugs 'gyu[@]mchod de dag khyer te 'on gnas /bam ldan 'dras la phyag 'tshal nas zhal bsam bzhes te/ yid ma dga' bar gyuranas langs te/ ri yA la

thung gi drung du'ang rang gis zi byin gyis snang bar byas te khod// gzhan yang de'i tsho sbyin byed ma bu'i bdag po gang+gA'i chu dri ma med pa rjes byin la sogs pa sbyin bye ma'i bu gang+gA'i klung ba na cu'i bye ma snyed lus

che zhing snang ba chen po dad ldan pa/ sbyin byed ma'i bu'i bsam bamed pa sha stag gis mchod pa snga ma thams cad las mchod ba nyis 'gyuranyis 'gyur bas bzung ba dag khyer ba las/sres bzhin du zhal khrus ma bzhes
nas/ yid mi dga' bar gyur te/ shing sA la zung gi drung du rang rang gi gzi brjid kyis snang bar bya'onas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// gzhan yang de sngon bo'i bdag po 'jigs byed la sogs pa
ka/ srin po[Y]bdag bo gang+gA'i klung brgyad cu'i byis snyad srin po'i bsam pa med pa shastagags/ gzi brjid chen po'i tshogs kyis sa la zung gi drung snang ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das

la phyag 'tshal ta/byog gi tu 'khod dog gzhan yang tsho'abras bu 'gi bdag bodrisire la log pa 'bras bu'i nga gibadag bo gapa'i klu dgubcu'ikhyim snyed kyis sdoman chodab thamAd pas nyis 'gyur 'gyur gyis lhag

ba'i mchod pa'i tshog khyer nas/khu byug po rgyags pa rnams dang/ bung bags skad bzhi pa dang ldan pa'i me tog 'tshong ba'i 'khri shigang po'i dgo pa dang/ lag ba 'dus pa rnams kyis sa phyogs brgyan te

phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// gzhan yang de'i tshe rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul chen po la sogs pa rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal bo gang+gA'i klong stong gi bye ma snyed kyis mchod pa snga ma'inyis 'gyur
khas lhag pa'i mchodab dag khyer nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// gzhan yang de'i tshe lha mo 'dod dgur sgyur ba'i go khrugs can legs ma'os ma la sogs pa gang+ga'i klung bye ba'i bye ma snyed kyis bas

rnal can gyi rgyal po'i btsun mo'i mchodaba'i rtos 'gyur bas lhag pa dag khyerata/ rang rang gi rgyun rnams btsi ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar sa la sbyangs nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// gzhan yang de'i tshe

lha'i bu mo mab+hadang/ utra sha la sogs pa lha'i bu mo gang+gA'i klung bye ba phrag brgya'i khyim snyed kyis mchod pa snga ma'inyis 'gyur nyis 'gyubasaM ches lhag bar mang zhing spabadag gis mdun du drangs te/

snga ma bzhi du phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// gzhan la nga de'i tshe 'byung po'i tshogs pa lnga sangs ltar 'khor ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa gang+gA'i klung bye ba phrag stong gi bye ma snyed snga ma bzhin du phyogs gcig tu 'khod/

to/ gzhan yang de'i tsho'ajig rten skyong ba bzhi'i lha'i bu gang+gA'i klung gi bye ba phrag 'bum dang lhan cig dumachod pa snga ma'i nyis 'gyur nyis 'gyur bas lhag pa dag khyer nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal

te/ zha' zas ma bzhes nas/ sdam bzhin du phyogs gcig tu khod do// gzhan yang de'i tsha rlung lha bzharlu gtong ba'i lha gang+gA'i klung bye ba phrag 'bum dang lhan cig tu/ dus ma yin bar la nga shing sman/
ba dang/ 'khri shing dang/ shing gel ba dang/ nags na rnams dang/ sel dang/ me tog gi 'khri shing dang/ byu ru nams kyis sa phyogs rgyan par byed cing/ dus tshog thums cad kyi me tog gso/
dpa la rnams phyogs su rgyas par byed la/ lam kha 'bus pa rtsal dam pa rnams kyis shing sA la zung ma 'char ka'i 'od zeraser bo ja hor kar 'dug pa bzhin du byas nas/ mchod pa snga ma'i si
'gyur bas lhag ba'i mchod pa dag khyer te/ bcom ldan 'das la mchodab byas nas/ snga ma bzhin du shing sA la zung gi drung du 'bod do// gzhan yang de'i tshochar pa 'bebs pa'i lha gang+gA'i keng

gi khyim nyid sprin chen bo dang/ chusbyar rnams phyi bzhin du 'brang zhing glog 'gyu ba'i gseb nas rma bya'i mgrin pa ltar ma dog sngo ba'i char gyi rgyun 'bab la/ 'brug sgra dal nas sgrogs pa'i srin dang/
[z/ ]@#// ]ldan bs/ char zim bu pa sil ba dang 'dres pa'i tog gi char 'bebs shing bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ zhal zasam bzhes re thag chad de/ de bzhin/
gshegs pa'i godung zhugs la zhen pa'i mi gsadapa'i phyi nam mkhar de la'akhodo// gzhan mde'i tshos kyi glang bo sgracan dang/ ludabatangamadogadang/ sbrang rtsi'i mdog sol dang/ 'dod
gu'i ses ldan la sogs pa grosakyi glang bo gang+gA klung nyi shubyamanyid theg pa chen po 'dod stag gse ston pa longs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i phyir/ gsakyisman dang/ pad+ma'i rtsa ba dang chu de
tochen bo pang latsam stag dang/ dgon pa chen po dag las pa dang/ ut+pa la dang/ ku mud dang gapa dkar bo dang/ rtsa ba dang/ 'bras bu dang/ rdzogasnathadad pa la dag sna'i thor tes byung

zhing khyer te rlung gi shugs bas kyang ches mgyogs pa dang/ shanetur nges par dbyar gyi 'brug sgra bzhin du sgrogs shing lhags nas/ bad+ma'i 'dab ma bcer ba'i seng ge 'i sro'i lnga lde dag bshams te/ btse
ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas zhal zasam bzhes bsare thag chad de/ phyogs gcig tu'akhodod// gzhan yang tshosing gsang ga'isgra sgrogs zhes bya ba la sogs pa song gika klung sum cu'i byis
snyad soms can thams cad lami'ajigs pa sbyin pa sha stag gis/ seng ge 'i rtsal chen pos smos kyi zlang po tsha rnams dang 'dra ba'ame tog dang 'bras bu rnams khyer te/ rings par lhags nas phyogs gcig
tu 'khod do// gzhan yang de'i tsho bya ngang pa dang khrung khrung dang/ dur pa dang/ ka dag pa dang/ zal mo dad/ bzhad dang khu byug dang/ ba laka dang/ kal bad+mo dang/ shang shang te'u la sogs

bas kyang sros kyi glang po rnams dang 'dra bar me tog dang 'bras bu khyer ti/ rang rang gi skad phyung nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// gzhan yang de'i tshosa'i ste na ba dang/ ma nyamo dang/ ram mo yod do cog gis
kyang num 'o mas bkang ste// b+ha tu ris par lhagasanas/ zhing sa lazung gi drung nas sa phyogs gshing zhig mthongonas der rang rang gso num 'o mas gang ba de dag las/ 'om gseg ma dang/ byig dang

banAs ma 'gags shing tshaba'i skyon du 'gyur ba med pa dag gzigs te 'om de dag gnang na sbrang bu dag bsal nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// gzhan yang de'i tshodrang srong bzod par sa ba la sogs pa gling/

bzhin gnas pa'i drang srong mngon pa shes pa lnga dang ldan pa theg pa chen po 'dod pa sha stag la/ ga'i klung dkrigs kyi byed snyadarangarang rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis lam srog shing dang zhal khras dag khyer nas/
bcom ldan 'as la phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// gzhan yang de'i tshe 'od srungs chen po la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun kha cig dang/ gnas brtan kun dga' la sogs pa ma gtogs
par[Y ]mu la phyogs na gnas pa'i dge slong dang dge slong ma ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad kyang ma lus par der lhags so// gzhan yang de tshor rab la sogs pa rinabo rnams dang/ lag rten gyi
khara mtshams kyirig pa'i krung grangs med pa'i byin stodakyang/ shing na pa dang/ khri rim bzhin khrib ma byed pa dang/ ba khring yas gribs cheb dang//
brag/bas 'bab pa'i chus gang ba dang nag shong rdog dang/ rtsa ba dang/ 'bras bus gang ba dag kyang der lhags so// lha 'bum thu bo 'amadunanachen khog kyang ring ba dang bcas te/ mchod
pa'i phyir lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// gzhan yang de tsalha'i bu mthu bo 'od manabo rgya mtshotshan bo bzhizhingana gnas pa dang/ chu klung chen

bo dag ginang na bags pa gang+ga'i klung grangs med pa'i bye ma snyedamachod pa snga ma bas chos nyis 'gyur gyisomadzes pa'i mchod pa sngon du btang nas/ tima'i 'od zil gyis mnan pa bzhin du/ rang rang
gi 'od kyisoma'i 'od zil gyis mnan te/ ma 'char ka'o sa shing mya ngan 'tshangag lam thams cad mar la ma tshar snang bar byed pa bzhin du/ rang rang gi 'od kyis chu klung gser ldan gyi chu thams
cad dmar lam morasnang bar byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// gzhan yang de'i tshe grong khyer kug nas shing sA la zung gi red gi bar skabs kyi bar
snang la/ khang bzangs ri'i dbang po'i rtse mo lta bu dang ba'i la gong ltar dakarab sha stag gis 'khrigs bar gyur to/ sa gzhin skyed mos tshal dang/ rdzing bu ba chu bas mdzes par byas ba dag gis

0 gong ba 'dug ste/ byang sgra mi snyan gyi skyed mos tshal bas kyang lhag par mdzes so// gcig tu dga' ba'i tshal dang/ shing rtosna tshogs can dang 'dra bar gyur te/ sa phyogs de dag de ltar dag 'jog la
ltar 'dug khyad/ lhadang/ lham mni nga/ mi de dag de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su rgya na las 'da' ba'i phyir shin tungu'o// gzhan yang de'i tsho rgyal chen bzhi'i gi gyi lha rnams r darang gi
'khor la la 'di skad ces 'dzarati/ grogs po ga ltas/ grogs po dag ltaso/ lha dang/ lha ma yin dang/ mi rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod pa las khyadapar bu lags la dbazhi
gshegs pa la zhal zas kyi tha ma 'bul ba la brtson gyis grogs po dag bdag cag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa 'i sangs rgyas la so so nas mchod par bya'o/
zhal zas kyi thog nang dbul bar bya'o// gal te bdag cag gis phul ba'i zhal zas kyi bla ma bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhes pa rgyun/ de las bdag cag gis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa chen po thob
bar 'gyur ro// zhes de dag gis de skad ces smras nas/ g.yog 'khor mang po grangs mdud pa dang bcas pas mchod pa snga ma'is 'gal gyi mchod pa dang / zhal zas mang bo dag khyer ro// me tog
mang bo dag kyang khyerate/ 'di lta ste/ man rab rnam dang/ mnar ba chen po rnams dang ke ke ru ka rnams dang/ ke ke ru ka chen po rnams dang/ ma shaka rnams dang/ maN+Dashaka chen po rnam dang/
san tan rnams dang/ sanatan gachen po rnams dang 'od can rnams dang/ 'o can chen po rnams dang/ kun tu 'od can rnams dang/ 'od mtha' yas pa rnams dang/ mdzes
sngaga rnams dang/ mdzes sdub chen po rnams dang/ dga' byo rnams dang/ dga' byed chen po rnams dang/ dri mchog rnams dang dri mchog chen po rnams dang/ sbos kyi ngad ldanganams dang/
spos kyi ngad ldang na po rnams dang/ tu dad ldang rnams dang/ kun tu ngad lda chen po rnams dang/ mtha' yas ngad ldanga rnams dang/ mtha' yas ngad ldangananams dang/ lha rdzas kyi 'dang
T+Tha ma rnams dang/ klu shing gi me tog rnams dang/ yongs 'du sa brtol rnams dang/ de lta bu gzhan dag kyang khyer nas/ bcom ldan 'am 'gal ba der dong ste/ ma ga'i byin gse srin bum khyer gyi do
zil gyis mnan pa bzhin du/ rang rang gi gzi byin gyis thams cad kyi 'od zil gyis mnan te/ zhal zas la bzhes nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'od to/ gzhan yang tsho lha'i dbang po brgya byin
sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi 'khor dang bcas pas/ mtsho deb snga ma de'inyis 'gyur de'i rkyen du 'tshal ba de na yod pa 'ame tog gi snagangs dutshabado du 'ong ba rnams dang/ yid du 'ong
chen bo rnams dang/ dri bsung zhim bo rnams khyego khang babs chen po rdothal gyi mdog ltar dkar ba/ them skas[@]rim pa dang ldan pa/ skar khung gi 'phreng ba dum phug ron
rtse ba dang ldan pa dag kyang sa la nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar
kha btud te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to khacom ldan 'das bdag cagani theg pa chen po'i mdo'i sde tshan srung ba lags na/ bdag cag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du/ bdag
cag gis phul ba'i zhal zas bzhes su gsol deskad ces gsol kyang/ zhal khrus ma bzhes nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// ka'aphags pa yongs su mya
ngan las 'das pa theg pa chen po'i mdo las bam po gnyis pa// de'i rjes la mthar gyis 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i ris drug bo rnams kyi sa steng gi bar snang la mchod ba dang/ 'od snga ma
las khyad par du 'phagasanas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste/ de dag gi mchod pa'i nang na/ gzugs phal pa gang yin pa de yang kho rakhor yug tu gling bzhi pa'i khyon tsam mo/ ba dan phal

ba gang yin pa de yang rgya mtsho chen po bzhi'i mthar thug ste/ shar phyogs kyi mtshonas/ nuba phyogs kyi rgya mtshor mthar thug ste/ rlung gas bskyod dam/ rlung gis phyakhan/ ba dan de dag las nga wang
gi sgra snyan pa kho bas 'khyig pa lta bur san pa dag 'byung ste/ de dag bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas/ zhal zas bzhes par gsol ba btab kyang/ bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung nas
re thag chad de/ phyogs gcig tu la bod do// de'i tshe srid pa'i rtse mor skyes pa rnams ma rtogs par/ gong ma gong ma'i sems can gzhan gang yin pa de dag thams
yi rud bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ mchod pa rgya chen po'i tshogs dbyas te lhags nas/ snga ma bzhin du phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// mi mjed bdag po tshangs pa yang tshas si
kyi lha'i bu dpag tu med pa dag gis bskor cing mdun du bdar te ]rang gi gzi byin gyis lha thams cad kyi gabri byin zil gyis mnan nas/ mchod tshog sachen bo dazhacas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
thad du dong ngo// de dag gi ba dan la pa gang yin pa de yang tshangs pa'i 'jig rten nas 'byung ste/ shings la zung gi drung duthug go/ des kyang bcom ldan 'das la zhal zas bzhes par gsol ba
las/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ma bzhes nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// danas po'i tsholha ma yin gyi dbang po thag bzangs ris ltamasin g.yog 'khor dpag dumed pa dang bcas pas
tshas pa dang/ dbang po gnyis ma gtogs ra/ de'i bar gyi lha bod do cog gi 'od rang gi 'od kyis mog mog por byas s/ rici du ba 'i mchod pa'i tshogs dang/ rgyun du 'tsham pa'i
ba zhal zas dag datsas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song ngo/ de'i galas phal pa mang chu zheng du 'jibag rtenagyims chung du skyob pa ste/ de khyadabcom ldan 'das la zhal zas bzhes
bar gasol bal/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ma bzhes s/ langs te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// nas bdud sdig can chud ma grus med pa ni 'khor dang bcas te/ sems can
dmyal ba thamI ra srong thams cad phyin s/ dedag la chu dang kha zas la sogs pa ci 'dod pa ni// dag la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sas rgyas na bar
gyis shig/ sprin ba'i tham la rjes su yi rang bar gyis shig ces smras nas/ de dag la khyed bde bar gyur cig ces kyang dbugs phyung// sems can dmyal ba'i grong khyer mtsho chas gang zhing/ ma
chen po 'bar ba rnams su yang sprin chen po bzhin du chutshan bo dbanas sems can myal ba pa rnams kyis sngon ma myong ba'i bde ba dang ldan pa'i 'du shes skyed du/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mkhrus/ bdud
kyisogs kyi gnas skabs de lta bur gyur to// de'i 'khor gang yin pa de dag gis kyang/ gzhudang ral gri dang/ bdang dgra stadang/ rdorjetso gcig pa dang/ mtshon kam panadang/ lcags
kyi bar ka dang lcags mda' dang/ sha ta gni dang mda' dang/ 'phang mdung dang/ mdung rtse gcig pa la sog pa mtshon cha rnams yongs su sus te/ sa lhur len par gyur to// de'i tshod

pa yang lha snga ma rnams la med pa de lta bur gyur to/ de'i gdugs phal ba'achu zheng du la nga 'jig rten gyi khams bar ma'i khyon tsam mo// de ltar des bu chen bo dang ldan zhidaM/ rang gi chung ma rnams kyis rda
dgyu yab kyis g.yob bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgoshos phyag 'tshal te/ thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces gsol to
bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa dang/ 'khor dang bcas pas bdag cag gis phul ba'i zhal zas zhes su gsol/ bcom ldan 'das pa dag gisod slan chad theg pa chen po'i slad du
yi dam bcas par 'tshal te/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mog su yang rung/ 'jigs pa'i slad du 'ag/ rnyed pa dang bkur su 'tshal ba'i slad du 'am/ thob tu re ba'i slad du ram/ gzhan gyis
bgyid du stsal ba 'am/ gzhan gyis yid bsrung ba'i slad du yang rung ste/ theg pa chen po rjod par bgyidan/ de'i don du 'jigs pa dang gar ba thams cad bsal ba'i gsang sngagasa bshad par 'tshal/
la// ta thug ke/ TiTar thagake/ ror ra/ mahAmodar/ AlamA la/ tA la sbahA ]chos sgrub 'khrul pa dang/ 'jigs pas gnod par gyur pa rnams chos kyi tshul la spobs ba bskyed par
bgyi ba dang/ mu stegs pa rnams myos par bgyi ba dang/ dam pa'i chos bsrung ba dang// bag dang gzhan bsrung ba'i sladadu/ bdag gis rang gi dam tshig gis smras pa'i gsang sngags 'di gling tsha'i
'jigs pa ma/ nags khung gi 'jigs pa 'am/ chu klung gi 'jigs pa 'am/ me'i 'jigs pa rnams kyi nang du/ bsrung ba gzungs sngagasan du brjod pa gang lags pa dedagazhabarjod pa tsam
sa[gyis ji ltar rus sbal rang gi lus bsrungs pa de bzhin du/ bdag gis g.yo dang sgyum mchis par ( de dag 'jigs pa tham sa cad las bsrungabar bgyi/ stobs dang ldan bar bgyid lags na/ bcom
ldan 'aakyis dazhalazas 'di bzhes par gsol zhes bsku la to/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ bdud sdig can l 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ sdig can khyod kha zas kyi phyir
gsol ba la 'debs shig/ gsang sngags kyi tshig ni sems can thams cad la phan pa'i phyir/ chos kyi sbyin par 'gyur bsan bzhes bar pa'i/ zang zing gi sbyin panade lta na lan gyis/ sdig can
khyod gsol ba 'debs shage ces bka' stsalanas/ bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bar gyur to/ lanaganyis lanagasum gyi bar du'ang/ bdud dang bdud kyi bu mo rnams sa bcom ldan 'das
la gsol ba btab pa las/ ma bzhes te/ re thag chad nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de nas de 'tsho lha'i bu dbang phyugachen po lha'i bu dbatumed ba/ mthu dpag tu yodrab dag
gse mdun du bdar te/ rang gi 'od kyis tshangs pa dang/ lha'i dbang po dang/ lha ma yin dang/ bdudakyi'od nams snag tsha'i gong bu bzhi du 'od ma gsal bar byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis mno
pa rgya chen po nyis 'gyur nyis 'gyur bas lhag pa dag khyer nas/ der song stedi'imachodaba rnams kyin na/ gdugs phal pa gang yin pa de ying chu zheng du stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jigs rten gyi
@# kha mas khyab par 'dug ste// mchod pa de lta bu sngon du btang nas/ bam ldan 'das kyi thad du phyin te/ lan du bskor ba byas nas zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/
bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// kham ldan 'das la ba dag mchod pa bgyid pa ni/ sgrung du mchod pa bgyidab dang
'dra ste/ bdag sbrang bu dang 'dra bas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bgyid pa 'jig la thog gas kyang/ bcom ldan 'das bdag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du/ zhal zas kyi tham gsol ba'i
gnang/ zhes lan gnyis lan gsum du gsol ba btab kyang/ lan gnyis lan gsum du bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bar gyur to/ ro thag chanas langs te/ phyogs gcig tu'adug go/
zhas de'i tshesangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogasalegs su 'jig rten gyi khams gapa'i klung grangs med pa gtams phrag dkrigs bye ma snyed 'das pan/ 'jig rten gyi khams yid
'phrog sgra snyan mu thug ces bya ba zhig yod de/ don de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'isangs rgyas nam mkha' dang mnyam ba zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ des sras kyi thu bo nyan thos
lus chen matha' yas la bka' stsal ba/ rigs kyi bu khyod ma mdzad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su songal/ denang bzhinag shegs ba dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes

byab ring po mi thogs par yongs su tshun las 'da' bar 'gyur gyis/ gas kyi bu khyod kyis de'i don du 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nas zhal zas zhim po ldan pa dag khyerate song zhig/ mchod pachen po dag kyang
khyer te song ba de la 'a diskad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das kyis zhal zas 'di gsol te/ yongs su myan lasag par bar mdzad du gsol zhes gyis shig/ khyod kyi the tsom dang yi de gnyis ci dang
ni yod pa de dang de dag kyang/ de bzhin gsheg pa de khon la legs par zhusashig dang/ des khyod la lung bstan par 'gyur ro zhes bka' stsal te/ dunas byang chub sems dpa' sogs
da 'chinapo lus chen matha' yas des legs so legs so zhes gsol nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la bskor ba byas nas/ zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
bo lus chen po grangs med pas bskor cing mdun du bdar nas/ mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir 'ongs so// de nas de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'digayos rab tu g.yos//
'gul rab tu 'gul/ 'khrugs rab tu 'khrugs/ 'khor rab tu 'khor/ 'ur 'ur rab tu 'ur 'ur/ shig shig rab tu shig shig mar mar rab tu ma ragar/ ldegaldem rab tu ldag ldag go//

de dag la sogs pa byas te/ sa chen po rab tu g.yos so// de nas 'khor de dag gi nang na tshangs pa dang/ dbang po dang/ 'jig rtenaskyong ba dang/ lha ma yin dang/ dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa lha rnams kyis sa
@# @#// gzhi de lta bur gyur ba mthong nas/ spyi khung zhes byas te/ 'jigs shing/ ba dang skego ma bskams nas 'bros bar chas te/ rang rang gi 'od kyang mthong zhing 'od nyams par gyurato/
sa 'khor de kun ng nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba las te/ lha'i tshogs de dag la 'di skad ces smras// grogs po dgam 'jigs shig ma 'jigs shig/ shar phyogs legs/

su 'jigs rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung grangs med pagatanas khrag dkrigs kyi byema'i rdul phra rab grangs med bsnyad 'das bzha/ 'jig rten gyi khams yid 'phrog sgra snyan tshathugaces bya ba zhig yod de/ nad
bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nam mkha' dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs la 'tsho zhing gzhes te/ de bzhi ba gshegs pa des/ rang gso sras kyi thun/
thos la bos de bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyodami mjed kyi 'jig na gyi khams su song la/ na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa 'ong dag par rdzogs pa'i sos rgyas shAkya thub ba zhes bya ba sa
sumya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur gyis/ de dge slong gi dge 'azhudang bcas pa la zhal zas kyi tha ma khul la/ khyodagyi the tsom dad mi de gnyis cidatsayod pa de gakyang legs par zhus shig dang/ sa
khyodol lung bstan bar 'gyur rozhes bka' stsal te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa 'chen bo lus chen mthar yasa' zhibatang ste/ byang chub sems dpa' grangs med pas
bskor cing mdun du bdar nas/ 'dir 'ongs pa de gzi brjid kyis khyed kyi'od nyams par gyur to// de'ong ba la rjes su yi rang bar gyis/ de bzhinashegs pa nam mkha' dang mnyam pas/ bdag cag
gi de bzhin gshegs pa lamad ba mdzad pa la'ang ltos shig ces byas so/ de nas 'khor de dag thams cad kyis ma long gi sa la bdag gi gzugs mthong ba bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams thag ring
po na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dadang/ 'jig rten gyi khams de mthong ngo/ de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur bas/ 'khor de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// ji ltar khyed
si 'jig rten gyi khams 'diding/ dbazhi gshegs pa 'dis gleng ba de bzhin du/ phyogs bcu'idi bzhigshegs pa rnams dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag kyang ltos shig/ de bzhin
gshegs pa rnams ni 'diltar bdaganyid che ba yin te/ rang rang gi gnas ni bzhugs bzhin du yang khyod la zha la ston par mdzad do/ 'khoradagags smras pa/ kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de ltar ba dag
nyid che ba yang yongs su myongan las 'da' bar 'gyurab ltaskyid cesazlazhing 'khodado// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen bolus chen mtha' las byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med pa dag gis

bskor ba yang mthong ste/ byang chub sems dpa' de'i lus kyi ba spu'i bu ga re re nas pad+machen po byung ngo// pad+maNen bor re la yang grong khyer bdun khri brgyad stong yod la/ grong khyer de dag kyang lul langs pa/
can gyi thag gru tsam shastag ste/ rin poche sna bdun gyi bdang/ 'obs bdun yigyis bskoral/ shing ta la'i 'phreng ba bdun rim gyis mdzes bar byas pa sha stag ste/ 'byor/
pa dang/ rgyas pa dang/ bdeb dang ldan zhing dga' dga' ltar 'dug la/ ra ba de dag kyang 'dzam bu chubo'ogasagyi ba gam chen po shastagagis bskor te/ ba gamathams cad kyibar bar n yang shing ljon pa

gzhon sha can 'bras bu dang/ ma tog dang ldan pa snyam ng bo dag yod do// shing ljon pa de dag gi ya lag rlung gis bskyod pa las kyang/ sil snyan dga' bar byed pa'i sgra snyan cing chags su rung 'byung ba
sna lnga lnga sgrogs te sgra dadag gis sems can de dag rtse zhing dga' dgur spyodad// 'obs do dag thams tsakyang chu bsil ring shel bzhin dudang ba dag gis gang bar 'dug ste/ de dag gi nang khor ro

lug tu/ sems can de dag rin po che'i gru dag gis brgal zhing rgyu bar byed do// chung dgakhyad pad+ma dang/ ut+pal dang/ ku mu da shing rta'i 'o phud latsam sha stag gis brgyanato// longs kyi khor khor

khug kyang skyed mos tshal gyi'aphreng bas mdzes par byas te/ skyedachoso tshal re re la yang rdzing bu thug grubagatshad byed ba lnga lnga yod do// rdzing bu'i chu de dag kyang pad+mad/ ut+pa la dang/ kuchu da kha dog sna tsho//

drizhim po'i shing rta'i 'phang lo tsam sha stag gis khebs par 'dug la/ bshang lenopache tog rgyas pa'i'aphrengabs mdzes par byas so// skyedamos tshal khor khor yug na yang ngang duradang/ thal mo dang/ khrung khrung

[z/ ]shugs dag gis pad+ma'i the 'bru myang bar byed do// khor khor yug gi skyed mos tshal de dang de dgan yong khang khyim dag yodal/ khang par re la yang chu zhengadapag tshad bzhi bzhi yod do// rtsig pa ni gsar dang/

dpul dang/ bai DUr+ya dang/ shel las byas/ sa gzhin ke ke ru las grub pa ste/ nor bu'i 'jonatshar gyis sel cing/ snang bar byas ba'i mu tig gi doshal spyas pa dang ldan pa/ gser gyi rta babs chen po ba

skar khung dang/ dro ba dag gis brgyan pa'i khang bzangs mthon kho// sa gzhig sar gyi khyim bdal po dang ldan pa stag go/ rdzing bu rnamA kyang 'dul ba'i lan/ gser gyi them skas them pa bco brgyad dang ldan pa dang/

mtha' thog thug gsar gyi chu shing gi 'phreng bas mdzes par byas pa/ lha'i tsan dan gyi drubasung can gyi chu dang ldan pa sha stag go/ grong khyer chen po dag re re nang na yang rgyal bo brgyad khri bzhi stong brgyad khri bzhi stong
yod do// de dag thams cad kyang budamed kyi tshogs dpag tu med pa/ dpag tumed pa dag gis bskor cing/ 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang ldan te/ rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod do// sems can

gzhan dag kyang de dang 'dra ste/ sa phyogs ka tsa lin+da'i gos ltar reg na bde ba/ tsan dan gyi chus chag chag btab la/ me tog gi sil mas gter ba/ gzhan dgan rtse zhing dga' la paNas la dga' dagur spyod

do grong khyer chen po de dag na theg pa chen po risgra ma gtogs par theg pa gzhan gyi sgra med do// pad+ma chen po de dag la yang seng ge 'i khri chen po/ rkang pa gsoradang/ dngul dang/ bo DUr+ya dang/
shel las byas pa/ ka la de ga'i sa kyiso ga bogs pa/ che ba la 'os pa// 'jig rten gsum n phul du bya ba sha stag gis dkrigs te/ song ge'i khri de dag la rgyal po//
dag 'khodacing/ sems can gzhan ngagatheg pa chen po'i mdo sde rnams slob par byed de/ rgyal po dag gi mdunan la lan yi ge 'di/ la lan klogo// la la ni kha ton slob bo// de ltar byang chub sems dpa'/

sems dpa' chen po lus chen mthar yas rgyas/ ba spu'i khung bu nas skyes pa'i pad+madag la 'khod pa'isems can de dag/ 'dod pa ri yon tan lnga'i rdega' ba dang ldan mang dag yongs su spangs nas/ mya ngan
la gyis gdungs te/ masngags 'don cing/ kyi hud kyi budatsos bla zhing 'khodod// nyis 'gyur du mchod pa 'i tshogs 'bul bar byed do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lug
chen matha' yas byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med pas bskor te/ lta bu'i 'byor pa ri rnam pa dag ston cing/ mchod pa'i tshogs chen po dang/ zhal zas rgya chab dag khyer te 'ongs nas/ zhal zas de

dgadung pad+made dag gi dribasung tshor ba gang yin pa de dag kyang nyon mongs pa dang bral bar gyur to// byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyang mthong bar gyur to// byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po las chen mtha' yas kyi tshad kyang nam mkha' dang mnyam bar 'dug ste/ sus kyang mthong bar mi nus so/// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen lus chen matha'i pas bcom ldan 'as kyi thad du song ste/ zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ thal mo sbyar te 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag gis phul bas zhal zas bcom ldan 'das kyis
bzhes su gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bar gyur te/ lan gnyis lan gsum du gsol kyang/ bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bar bzhugs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' de langs te
phyogs gcig du 'dug go/ de bzhin du lho phyogs dang/ nub phyogs dang/ byang phyogs 'gos nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen bo lus chen matha' yas zhes bya ba 'khor gyi tshog sachen bo

dang ldan pa sha stag lhags te/ de dag gis pad+ma dang/ grong khyer gyi tshad kyang snga ma snga ma las nyis 'gyur nyis 'gyur gyis che ba dang/ 'byor pa nyis 'gyur nyis 'gyur gyis che ba sha stag dang chas te/ de dag
der lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'dus la bad+ma dug gis mchod pa byas te/ snga ma bzhin du phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// shing sA la zung ging grub pa'i gnas de nyid ni/ kyil 'khor sum cu rtsa
gnyis tshad kyi khyon gyi sa gzhi la sems can gi 'khod pa'i go skabs ci yang med do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ de ltar lus che ba rang rang gi g.yog 'khor

dug dang bas pa de rnams kyang/ kha cig ni sa phyogs sbyang bu'i rtswa mo'i khyonatsam la 'khod do// kha cig ni khab kyi rtsi mo'i khyon tsam la 'khodo// kha cig rdul phra rab kyi khyon tsam la bag yangs su 'khod
gdo 'jig rten gyi khams rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dgan/ byang chub sems dpa' 'khodapa gang yin pa de dag kyang/ thabs de lta bur lhags te 'khodado// 'dzam bu gling gi//
sems can 'ang/ tshing ldan pa 'od srungs dang/ gnas brtan kun dga' bo dang/ rgyal po ma skyes dgra rnams m gtogs par/ ram 'ongs pa su yang med de/ tha nam gdug pa dang/ sbrul gdug
ba dang/ sdig pa dang/ sdom lasogs pa las mi bzad pa bcu drug byed pa yan chad kyang der lhags so// sbyin byed ma'i bu dang/ lha ma yin rtag tu len gyi bsam pa can thams cad kyang sdig pa'i los sdang
nas/ gcig la gcig budang/ ma dang/ sridamodang 'dra bar soms bar gyur to// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na 'khod pa'i sems can thams cad kyang/ gcig la gcig tu
gcig ba la byas pa bzhin du byams par byed de/ 'dod chen po ni ma gtogs so// mi mjed kyi 'jige rten gyi khams 'di yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus/ bong ba dang/ rdodang/ gsog ma dang/ dub

rmi dang/ tshoram med par gyur te/ shing ldan pa rinapo che'i khri shing gis dkris kha/ mnyen zhing regana'ajam pa dag dang ldan zhing 'jig rten gyi khams bad ba can ng 'dra bar gyur to// sems can der lhag

pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang den 'khod bzhin du/ ji ltar me long gi ngos la rang gi gzugs brnyan snang ba bzhin du/ rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten khams dang/ sangs rgyas kyizhing 'khyor
0 dang ldan pa gzhan dag kyang mthong ngo/ de nas de bzhin gshegs ba'adzin lanas 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs/ sngon po dang/ sor bodang/ dmar bo dang/ kar bodang/ btsod ba dang

shi lagyi kha dog lta bu dang/ me lce lta bu dag byung ba gang yin pa de dag gis bya ba thams cad byas te/ phyi'i le gnas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi zhag du zhugs temi snang bar gyur to// 'khor thams cad kyi 'od kyang/
sa khril gyis non par gyur to// nas lha dang/ gdang/ lha ma yin dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis 'od werade dag bcom ldan 'das kyis zhal du mi snang bar gyur pa mthong nas/ 'jigs shing skyigung zhes
byas te/ rgyas d par bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od zer rnams phyir le gnas mi snang bar 'gyur ba'i mi rigs nas/ go ma chag par phyogs bcu dag tu bya ba rnams zinanas/ da ni gan mi za bar de bzhin gsheg
pa yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis gang las kyang zhal bas ma bzhes na/ kun samasacan thams cad la tshad med pa bzhis sasam/ ci slong bar bzhugs par tshadapal

kyi ma rtsi nyi ma dang zla ba nub ma/ tsi rig pa'i chos kyi gru byed na/ kyi hud kyid ces blang zhing 'khod// nas de dgarang rang rgya lan lasa rnams rnas bar byas pa'i khrag gis sa gzhi 'og du gyur to//
chukrung gser ldan kyang khrag tu 'bab par gyur to denas 'khor de dag gi nangan/ grong khyekashis mgar ba'ibu dag bsnyen sku la byed ces bya ba de/ mgar ba'i bu bco lnga dang thas
gcig tu langs te/ rang rang gi spyod lam bcos sa/ 'jig rten dag la bltas te/ bla gos phrag gcig tugazaranas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom
ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ mchim mi thub pa bzhin du zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bag ldan 'das bdag ni sems can
thams nanges pA wasal ba'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dge slong gi dug 'anang bas ba la zhal zas kyi tham 'bul bar 'tshal/
ti/ bdagazhi gon ma mchis palags/ rtsa lag ma mchis pa lags/ skyabs ma mchis pa lags/ 'bongs te re ba lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gis phul ba'i zhal zas bzhes te/
yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das dparagasol na/ khyim bdag gam/ bram ze shin tu dbul po 'ga'azhi bo gzhan gyi yul dus la/ bdag nyidisogA pa skyed de//
mthar gyisazhing klas btsugs nas/ des rlon glang rmo sen ba thong gshol dang sbyar ba dag gis zhing la rdodang/ rdub dang/ ra mas mchis par bgyis te/ ri bachen bo bskyed nas/ sprin chen po lasar
'bab ba la sdod cing mchis pa de bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'as bdag ni lus kyi zhing lo/ nyes pa gsum dang/ bzhidang bro lakha'i 'de dad/ ngag gi smon glang dang/ sa ba'i thong gshol gyis nyon mongs pa

rnam pa sna tshogs kyi rdodang/ rdub dang/ ra ma ma mchis par bgyis nas/ khyod kyi chos kyisrina chen po las chos kyi char 'bab pa la sdod cing mchis te/ dge slong gi dge 'dunadang bcas par sman 'dren na// bdag
gi dbul ba bsal ba dang/ sems can thams cad la snyan pa'i slad du/ bdag gis phul ba'i zhal zas bzhes su gsol// bdag ni ma gnam mchis// skyabs ma mchis pa lags na/ de bzhin gshegs
pas bag la sgra gcan zin bzhin du gzigs par gsol/ donas bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyen pa// rgyal ba gang zag blan medabs/ 'gakha'i bu skul byed la 'di skad ces bka'
stsal to// skal byed bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ khyodazhal zas zam sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa chen po bzhes khara mdzaded/ de nas lha dang/
mdang/ lha ma yin de dag gis/ skul byed kyis phul b.rizhal zas kyi tha ma sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa chen bo/ de bzhin gshegs pa dge slong gi dge 'dunudang bcas pas bzhes sozhes shosanas/
sotshar rmad du byung ba'i chos thob ste/ legs so zhes skad chen po phyung nas/ mgakha'ibu skul byed la 'di skad ces sa so// kye mgar ba'i bu sku la byed byed seb khyod kyis ma lus thob pa ni
ban thogs par gyur to// legs par thob po// skul byed 'jig rtenan u dum wa ra'i me tog shin tu mdzes pani rU par daka'a'o// de bas kyang chos de bzhin gshegs ba 'byung ba rnyed par dka'o/
de bas kyi ngadad pa red pa shin tu dka' 'o// de bas kyang ches chos thos ba redabar dka'a'o/ de bas kyang ches de bzhin gshegs pa la zhal zas kyi tha ma dbul ba redabar

dka' 'o/ de bas na zhal zas kyi blo ma sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin ba thob ba mgar da'i bu skul byed khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// dper na ston bla 'bring po'i rta la sprinamed pa/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dri
khamed pa mdzes pa mthod bzha/ zla ba 'ba' zhig mngon du snang ba de bzhin du/ khyod kyis phul ba'i zhal zasakyi tham de bzhin gshegs pas bzhes ba nas/ khyod 'ba' zhig sems nathams
cad la mngon du snang ngo// khyod la yang dang yang duphyag 'tshal la// sku la byed khyon mi'i lus byed bzhin du/ lha'i lang lha yin no// dngazhin gshegs pa'i sras sgra gcan zin dang 'dra'o zhes byas
nas/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang smras so// khyodami ma yin te lha mchog yin/ mi mchog gtso ba khyad par 'phags pa ste// de phyir khyod lagasol ba 'di skad 'debs// ston longs su mya
na 'da' bar chas// bdag cag kun la brtse bas skul byed khyod// skyabo rnams la yun du phan pa'i phyir// 'diriniston pad bgamedamagon po la// bzhugs shing rgyun du bdud rtsi ston ces gsol
srid las rnam grol mya na 'da' bzhed la// gal te khyod kyis ring ma gson// bdag cag thams cad ma rungung shes par gyis// de las ban phyir mgon la gsol ba thob// nas la la zhigeg pa ma
