0 gnyis shi ba las phyir sos tegason por 'dug pa mthong na/ mchog tu dga' bar 'gyurapa kho na bzhin du/ mgar ba'i bu skul byed de mchog tu dga' bar gyur nas/ lag pa brkyang ste/ bcom ldan 'das
la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas langs te/ tshigs subacad pa 'di dag sus so// kyem deng bdag redapa legs par red// mi yi 'jig rten skyes ba 'bras bu yod// dani red la sogs las 'bral ma 'gyu

mi bzad dmyal bar langani ltungami 'gyur// deng 'dir red pa chen po redapa 'di// gser gyi bung bo bas kyang lhag pa yin// dpa 'debadagashegasamagon dang phrad pas na// phyin chadabartagani dud 'grog 'gaM
ba med// sangs rgyas la ni dad pa gting zug pa// dong red u dum wa ra'i me tog bzhin// rab 'jigs mi dgas 'grob yongs spangs shing// lha min skye ba'i sa bon mi bzad bcom// de bzhin gsheg

'byung dkonadang de phrad pa// khab kyi rtse mor yungs 'bru chags pa bzhin// de la pha rol phyi mchog sbyin phul bas// rtag tu lhu yi 'gro bar 'phar bar rgyu// chu gnas pad+ma chus mi chags pa ltar// drang
srong chen po 'jig rten chos rnams kyis// chags med phrad pas srid rtse'i sa bon kun// drus phyudabadagan 'khor ba'i mtsho rgyal// rgya mtsho nang gi rus sbal zhar ba'i mgrin// gnyar gde ma'i tu
chu dka'a'adra ba las// bdagashigs dang phrad de la sbyin pa phul// de nas bdag gis nyon mongasaM gsogakun bcom// lha rnams kyis ni zhal zas bzang po dag/ phul yang bde gshegs ma bzhes
[j ]/ dbag las ni// ma rand mi ma tog 'drab zhes des// bdagan 'jig rtenarab mchog dpal yon can// tshangs pa brgya byin la sogs 'jig rten 'di// thams cad lhags te
gus bar bdagalamatsho// khya mchog gnas su son pa gang yin 'di// skye ba 'di da lan bdag gis thog// de nas thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'as la 'di skad ces gsol to// mgon/
khyod myan 'da' ba mthong nas ni/ 'jig rten 'akun sdug bsngal gzir bar gyur// dbang med kyi hud ces ni skadacher bla// 'di dagam dor rtag tu sras bzhin gzigs// lhun po'i gser gyi rtse mor ba
mtho ba// mtshon bus na mdzes bar gnas pa ltar// chos kyi mnga' bdag khyodonachos ston cing// dge 'dun dbus sumadzes par bzhugs su gsol// ji lta mgazin shas ban// 'od zer dag/

gis sprin srab sel ba ltar// drang srong chen po yis sgrog chen gyis// skye bo'angabo'i mya na deng bas la mdzod// sems can 'di dag dud sa mig skrangs shing/ sdug bsngal gcig pu ri rgya mtsho'i che ting
du zhugs// de phyir dadabarnyed dka' bskyed mdzad cing// 'di rnams sdug bsngal tsho la yun du bzhugs// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis skul byed la bka' stsal ba/ skul byed ni de bzhin
dzin de bzhin te/ sangs rgyas 'byung ni u dum wa ra'i me tog bzhin du shin tu red pa'i dka' 'o/ dad pa yad repar dka'od chos thos pa yang redapar dka'a'o// de bzhin gshegs pa khongs su mya ngan

las 'da' ba'i tsho/ zhal zas kyi thasa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyogs pa phun sum tshogs pa yang red par dka' 'o// sku la byed gzhan yang khyodon du tshuganag byed par/ bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la zhal zas kyi

thuma'i sprin pa'i ba rol tu phyin pa phun sum tshogs pa go bo snyam du dgar bskyed cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa la bcomaM ldan 'das bzhugs sugasol zhes de skad du khyod gsol ba ma 'debs shig/ sangs rgyas rnams

kyi chos kyi de kho na nyid la rtog ge/mi rtag pa nyid la 'jug par gyis shig/'du byed rnamakyi rang bzhin shes par gyis shig ces bka' stsazhanas/tshog su bcad pa 'di dag khasung so// tshanin du rade yang 'jig par 'gyur 'di ni/
thams cad nges par 'chi bar 'gyur// 'tsho ba'i 'jig rten 'jig pa'i chos can yin// 'byor pa thams cad rgud bar gzhol bar 'gyur// rtag tu latsho rga bas nges par 'dzoms/ gzugs bzazhadamed na//
kyis 'jig par 'gyug/ srog chibs tsa nas 'byin par byed// 'jig rten kun na rtag pa ci la nga med// dbang phyugami rtag tshigangami rtag ste// skye ba'i sdug bsngal 'khor lo'i rtag tu 'khor//
'jig rten gsum n brtan po su yang med// srid pa dgan 'akun gsog tu 'dug/ srid pa 'jig pa'i tshes can rab go go ba// 'di dag na nibade ba ci yang med// da dang 'chi dngand dang rguda rnams kyi//
'jigs pas rtag tu kun nas gabar byed// srid pa mtha'amed brtan snying bored// thams cad dgra dang 'a'akha ra shes par gyis/ na 'khor zhing no khos dri ba yis// 'jig rten dkris te dpagyi srin
dbu bzhi// 'jig rten dag na ther zug gnod pa'i gzhi// rtag tu 'bras ltar sdug bsngal 'brel ba gang// tshigatsang lus dang 'dod pa de dag la// ban 'dod sdug bsngal bas/
'dod su zhig dga'// mi rtag 'dod pa rnams la chags pa med// tshul bzhin rtogs las 'dod chags bral bar 'gyur// des yang dag mthong na 'dod chags 'bral// de dag spangs bcad grol ba nyid du
'gyur// nga ni srid pa'i chu chen legs par brgal// ngan sdug bsngal rnams 'das bde bar zhugs// de phyirangasazhimatha' yas spros med ba// chags pa kun bsal thar pa thob par gyur// la rgangang

rgyun dang 'chib med// da la rtag tu tshe yang 'dab med/ (nga ni me ltar 'bar te 'gro 'gyur gyis// khyod kyis ngan med 'gyur ma sems shig/ de bzhin gshegs nyid lhun po 'dra bar ltos// nga deng yang dag
mya ngan 'da' bar 'gyur// kha d mchog de ni nga ri chos nyid de// rgyal rnams spyod yul yin gyi khyedal du/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ mgar ba'i bu skul byed kyis 'di skad ces gsol/
rtsato// bcom ldan 'dasaden dolags so// den de lags te// mya ngan las 'das pa ni bdag gis kyang bsam gyis mi khyab lags na/ sbrangabu dang 'dra ba'i sems can theg pa dman pa gzhan dag gis lta smos
kyang ci 'tshal/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sa bdag deng du byang chub sems dpa' mi mchog skal ba chen po dang ldan pa/ mchod par 'os pa/ 'jam dpa ' gzhon nur gyur pa la sogs ba dang/ thag pa zad pa rnamA/

dang mnyam pa nyid du gyur to// bcom ldan 'das dper gsol na/ gsar du bsnyen par rdzogs ba gzhon nu lang rab tu byung ba de nyid kyi tu'i panas/ dge 'dun gyi nang na dge 'dun du bgrang zhing/ yang dag par
'as par 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ bdag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi grangs su gtogs shing/ yang dag par 'dus lags so// bcom ldan
'das bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa yun du bzhugs par 'tshal gyi/ kha zas tshigs pa bzhin mya ngan las 'da' bar gshegs pa nim 'tshal lags so// de nas de'i tsho'ajam dpal
gzhon nur gyur pas/ mgar ba'ibu skul byed la 'di skad ces smras so// skul byed khyod 'di skadadu/ bdaganadi bzhin gshegs pa yun du bzhugs bar 'tshol gyi/ kha zas tshag pa bzhin dumya na
las 'da'abar gshegs pa nim 'tshal lo zhes de skad ma zer cig/ 'du byed kyi rang bzhin blta bar bya mod/ daltar lta ba gang yin pa den/ stong pa nyid bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/ dam
pa'i tshes 'dod pas ni de ltar bslab par bya'o// skul byed kyis smras pa// btsun pa 'jam dpal 'on ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i lang lha'i mchog tu gyur/ gal te 'du byed du
gyur na/ lha'i yang lhar 'os pa ma yin no// 'du byed rnams ni chu bur lta bur shes shing/ shing rta'i 'phang lo bzhin du 'khor ba yin no// lha rnams ni mchog tu tshe ring zhes grags la/ de bzhin
gshegs bsal khargya ba nga mthub ste/ debasan de bzhin gshegs pa lha' lad lhar 'os pa ma yin no// dparan mi la la zhig grong dpon byed pa las/ de mthar
gyis dbang phyug chen por gyuranas/ blon po chen po'i dbang phyug lasakyang 'das te/ rang gis dbang phyug ga'abras bu chos kyis red la longs spyod pa las/ de'i phyir yang bsod nams zad cing/ dbang
phyug las nyams par gyuranas/ gzhan gyis bkal zhing pas por 'gyurag/ de ci'i phyir zhen/ dbul por gyur ba'i phyir ro// de dang 'dra bar gal te de bzhin gshegs pa 'du byed du 'gyur du zin na ni/

'chi ba'i rgya yin pa'i phyir/ lha' yang lhar 'os bam yin no// btsun ba 'jam dpal de bsan/ lha'i yang lha de bzhin ga shegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag bar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la/ de ltar 'du byed dang

'drab r ma lto zhig/ 'jam dpal gzhan yang ci byed shes bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa la 'du byed kyi rang bzhin du rtog par byed dam/ 'on te ma shes pas rtog par byed/ gal te de bzhin gshegs pa 'du byed/

dang 'dra ba ni/ 'jig rten gsum po dga' akyi dbang phyug kharnyes pa/ lha'i yang lta mdzad pa'i 'os ma yin no/ dper na rgyal po'i dbang po la la zhig la rgyad stong gi mchog tu gyur pa'i rgyud cig yod la/ de gyad

thams cad kyis mi thub pa'i phyir/ gyad stong thub ces bya ba'i ming thob ste/ de la rgyud bla med pa'i phyir blanas dbang thang tshan po 'gruban 1 ru gyad stong thub pa de'i ming de thosan skad grags ba de mi bden pa yin nam/ 'on

te lon tan yod nani/ yon tan can gyi ming thob pa yin no// de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa yang/ nyon mongs ba'i bdud dang/ phung po'i bdud dang/ lha'i bu'i bdud dang/ rang bzhi gyi bdud kyi rgyud thams
cad bcom bsan ]cad stod thub bzhin du/ yang dag pa'i yon tan gyi sgo nas 'jig rten gsum bo dag tu/ de bzhinagshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bya ba lin gyis

btsun ba 'jam dpal khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la 'du byed dang 'dra bar yongs su ma rtogs shig/ dbor sha la la zhig phyug cing nor mang ba'i rigs su skye ba blangs la/ tshe thung bag 'gyur bzhig ste/ deskar

mkhan dag gis mthong nas/ khye'u 'di ni tshosgrung ngo zhes bstan te/ de'i phams de skad thos na/ 'di ni bdag cag gi khyim du phan par 'gyur ba ma yin no snyam nas/ grangs su yang mi tso zhing/ la byams
par mi byed do// de ltar skyes ba 'am/ bud med dam/ lha 'am/ tshangs pa yang rung ste/ gang tshe thung ba de la khyad du gsod par 'gyuran/ gal te de bzhin gshegs pa chos 'ba' zhig la yang dag par
gzhol ba nyid/ 'du byed du gyur tu zinan/ 'jig rten thams cad kyis brnyas par 'gyur ro// chos thamasakyin nganani/ phyir ltung ba med cing zad pa med pa la thar pa zhes bshad na/ gal te de ltar
gyuran named par 'gyur gyiso/ btsun pa 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa 'du byed du gyuraces deskad ma gsung zhig/ dper na bud med gzhon nudabulatsho// bkren pa/ mgonamedal/ nad
[n]@#// kyis thebs pa/ ma dor sdug bsngal bar gyur pa/ sbrum pas nyen ba zhig mgon medakhad pazhig tu song ba las/ bu mo dgu byung sa nasdanas gnas ba gzhan dag

gas de de'i nang nas bsad de/ nyon mongs ma de bu btsas ma thog tu byis pa kha mar khyenaso/ la legs pa'i yul zhig du chas te song ba las/ kham dug sbrang dang/ sbrang bu dang rlung dang/ nyi tshanadang
sdig sbrul gyi gnod pas na bar gyur te/ gats+tsha'i klung chen po gal bar 'dod pa las/ sa rgol bar ma nus te/ khye'u de khyer bzhin du blo'i nang du gshegs nas/ dbu de la byams ba'i bsod nams
sgyu khyad por gyis lus dang bral te/ shi ba'i 'og tu tshes pa'i 'jig rten du skyes te/ byams pa'i bsod nams kyi khyad par ji lta bu zhig gis skyes chen/ bdag ni lang pa'i/ khye'u 'di de zho med par

thar par bya'o snyam pa'i bsod nams kyi khyad par seskyes pa de bzhin du/ btsun pa 'jamadabal skyes bu dam pa dam pa'i chos 'byung bar 'dod pas/ de bzhin gshegs po 'du byed du gyur par blta bar mi bya
zhing/ 'du shes kyang bsgyur bar mi bya'o// gal te da lta bu'i mig lus la medan yang bcom ldan 'dasan bsam mikhyab bo snyam du/ mang gabalta gcan du bya'o// sems can thams cad la
pa'i gdam ngag bstan pos ni/ de bzhi gshegs pa 'dus ma byas pa yisi no zhes bstan par bya'o// na ba'i chos 'byin bar byed ba ni/ lta rakhud moda gzhon nu dbul mos gang+gA'i klung las bu/
bsgral ba'i phyir/ rang gi thog dang bsdos te/ 'bad pa de bzhin du bya'o// dam pa'i chos 'byung ba'i thabs bya ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'dus byas pa'o snyam du sems bskyed par bya'o/
de bzhin gshegs pa 'dus ma byas bar mthong na/ bdag nyid kyi tshod byakha'i sgyur ba'in rtogs bar 'gyur ro/ btsun 'jam dpal dpon mi la la zhig lam du 'gro bas dul bar gyur te
khyim gyin ng du nyal ba las/ de'atsho khyim de thog tha gnas ma chen por 'barate/ rims tshig ngan/ ni srog mda'i nyams/ ngotshashes pa dang/ khrel yodapa dang ldan pas/ bdag
gos kyis dam dudakris te/ soms dran pa dang ldan bzhin du gnas/ detshashesashing khrel yod bar soms ba'i bsod nams kyi 'bras bus sum cutsagsum r rgyal srilen brgyad cu byas/tshadaba'i

sridi gin 'bum byas mi'i 'jig sha du yang 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal sridilan ma byas te/ngan so namAsu 'am skye 'ga' mang dub dbagacig nas gcig tu brgyudapa 'ba' zhig thob pa de bzhin du/ 'jam dpal khyod
skyes bu dam pa ga deltar madzes par gyis shig/ tsashes par gyis shig/ deb gshegs pa 'du byed kyi thabs la 'jug pa stod dum zhugs g/ dge slong tshul khrims na sumatsho
pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'dus ma byas la/ bzhin gshegs pa 'dus byas ba yin nozhas zer babs ni/ mu stegs bar gyur tosha yang ba'o// de bzhin gshegs pa 'dus ma byas mi bzheng
0 @#/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'dus byas yin zhes zer ba gang yin pa de dag brdzun du ba yin// de bzhin gshegs pa 'dus byas min no zhes zer ba rnams ni/ rang khyim
dang 'dra bar sems can dmyal bar 'grobar 'gyur ro// btsun pa 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa la 'dus byas dang 'drab ram lta zhig/ da phyin chad 'khor bar rgyab na/ mi shes pa las bzlas to/
bcom ldan 'dasana'adus ma byas ba'o snyam pa'i shes ba pa 'azhig rtogs ba gyis shig/ de ltar bya btang bsgom pa 'bras bus khyod myur ba bon de bzhin gshegs M pa bzhin du/ mtshan sum cu rtsa
rgyugs dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ mgar ba'ibu sku la byed la 'di skad ces smras so// legs so legs so// tshar bar gyur cig/ rig
kyi busan di ltar bya ba yin no// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pa dang/ ther zug dang/ 'dus ma byas pa dang brtan par shes so// da ltar khyod kyis 'di bon ltar/ 'dus byas khod

rlag tu gtang ba'i sgo nas shes pa lasan/ khyod kyang ring bo mi thogs par de bzhin gshegs pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas nyid kyis kyang de ltar 'u bu cag gnyis kyis khyad du 'phags pa'i
bsngags pa brjod dozhes byis bsngags bar 'gyur ro/ skul byed de bzhin gshegs pa'i shes sgyur cig/ spyan pa thams cad kyin ng nan sar te sbyin pa mchog yin no// de la sbyar te sbyin zhes bya ba/
sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin ba thams cad sa bon las myu gu 'byung bar bya ba'i phyir/ gang gi dge slong ban/ dge slong ma 'am/ dgabasnyenam/ dge bsnyen ma gang rung/don 'ga' zhig gi phyir lam du

zhugs nas/ dub par gyur pa de dag la ci yod pa dang/ de'i rkyen du 'tshal pa dang/ brtags pa'i sbyin ba byed bde ni sgyur te sbyin pa zhes bya'o// skul byed de bzhin du khyod kyis ci yod pa las zhal zas kyi tha mar
yang rung rkyang lang rung/ de bzhin gsheg pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bas ba khyad par yodakyang/ khyadabaramodakyang rung ste/ 'a du chug cig/ bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'da'abar
gshegs su nye'o// de nas sku la byed kyis sbas pa/ btsun pa 'jam dpal khyod khazas la chags sam cin/ zhal zas mang yang rung/ nyung lungarung is shig ces/ bdag gi gzhen
'khas bar byed/ bcom ldan 'das kyis lo drug gi bar du dka' ba spyod 'das ngan/cid skacig tsha lang bzhes m spyod dag bzhin gshegs pachos kyi sku yin te/zhalazasakyiskum yin/cibcom ldan
zhal zas gso ba las/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ 'jam dpal sku la khyed kyis rjaskad smos pa den bzhinano// skulabyed legs so legs so// khyod nitheg pa chen l shes rab
che ba'o// khyod ni theg pachen bol shed bye ba'o// 'jam dpa la kyis kyang 'di skad ces snus so// gal te de ltar bzhed par rgyun/ de bzhin gshegs ba sku tshering bar shog cig skul byed
gyis sa ba cibag 'ba' zhig la bcom ldan 'das nyes sam/ 'on te sems can thams cad la yang mnyes/ 'jam dbal gyis sbas pa/ cibs ldan 'dras lta/ khyung
dang bdag dang sems can thams cad la yang mi mnyes sam/ skul byed kyis sbas pa/ de skadam zer cig/ gang la mgu ba yod pa de la ni phyin cilog gi 'ashes do/ 'bu cag ni la sbyod do//de bzhin
gshegs pa la ni nyes pa 'am/ dgyes pa med do// 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs banib be'u la byams pa'i phyir rtswa zos shing bos shing/ grong nyid du 'ong ba de lta bu'i byams pa dang ldan pa ma yin gyis/
sems can thams cad la yang sgra gcan zin dang 'dra bar gzigs te/ sangs rgyas kyi shes rab kyi tshulan di lta bu yin no// btsun pa 'jam dpal dpa' na/ rta cang shes dang sbyar ba'i shing rta/
rgyag pa'i zla la bong bu'i shing rta rgyug pa mi srid pa de bzhin du/'u bu cag bod du 'kheshing rta dang 'dra ba dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa shes rab dang/ 'drib dang/ dgongs pa'i tshogs dang/ mnyam
du 'gro bar nus re skan/ b.ronanam mkha' lding dpag tshad dumar 'gro ba nam mkha' la gnas pas/ chu'i nang na nya dang rus sbal 'khod pa rnams me long gi sa la rang gi gzugs brnyan snang ba
bzhin du gsal bar mthong lang/ byase ba rnams kyanamisomigasal ba'i'i/de'i mig gi tshul brjod bar mi nus pa de bzhin du/de bzhin gshegs pa'i yang de dang 'dra'o// 'jam dbal
gyis sbas pa/ skul byed de ni de bzhin te/ bdag gis ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chab nyid gleng ba'i phyir de skad du brgal bar 'dado/ nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi
zhal nas 'od zer rnam pa sna tshogs bgyis/ de dag gis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'alus la 'og go/ de nas 'jam dpal gyis de rtogs nas/ mgar ba'i bu skul byed l sbas pa/ skul byed de/
bzhin gshegs pa yongs sutshunalas 'da' bar rangesakyis/ gsubcom ldan 'dus la bshos 'ai du chug cig/ ma thogs shig/ rgyu med par bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal nas 'od zer rnams 'byung
par mi 'gyur ro// de nas skul byed tsangami'i ra bar 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ skul byed la 'disadaces bka' stsal to// sul khyedang yongs su mya ngan las 'di
bar 'grol// dge slong gi dge 'dun la dus su zas 'chi duchug ces lan gnyis lan gsum du bka' stsal to// donas skul byed kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// kyis bcom ldan
'das mi bzhugs gan/ 'jig rten stongs bar 'gyur ro// bdag cag thams cad kyis nga zhing bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba gdab go nas bcomo ldan 'das kyis/ skul byed la 'di skad ces bka'

stsal to/ skul byed ma ngu zhig/ de ltar lus la rnam 'byi'i zhig/ mi'i lus chu gang ba zhi du snying bo med par rtogs shache// smig rgyudang/ dbu ba rdol ba dang/ sgyumadang/ rdza mkhan gyis byas pa'i/
snod dang/ glog lta bur kheng du chud par gyis shig/ 'dus byas nas bgrangs med pa'i 'byung gnas nisnyam du shes par gyis shi'o// 'dus byas kyi rang bzhin la
ltos shig// des bcom ldan 'das la/ skul byed kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan das bdag dang sems can thams cad l thugs brtse ba'i slad du/ de bzhin
nangan/ bdug ci'i slad du zhi dulags/ 'jig rten stongs kyis ma mchis so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ skul byed la 'di skad ces
pa bka' stsal to// nga ni khyod la gde ba skyo ba dang/ sems can thams cad la snying brtse ba'i phyir/ gongs su mya las 'da' bar byed de/ 'dis sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos nyid dang/ 'as byas kyi cho
nyid do/ 'du byed thams cae rtag go zhes bya ba'i phyi'i tshogs su bcad par bod du chud par gyis shig/ chos thams cad ni 'du byed dang 'dres pa'i phyir sdug bsngal ba'o snyam du rtogs shig/ chos
rnathams cad ni bdag med pa'o snyam du spyod cig/ mi brtan pa/ banam/ na log pa 'osam dusoms shig/ lus 'di'i nyes dmigs mtha' yas pa dang ldan pa'osnyam du shes par gyis
shig/ 'anadabu ba dang 'dra bar ltos la mdu zhig/ rim chad cig// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ skul byed sa'adi skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das den
bzhin du 'jal lags na/ hacang sdug bsngal chen po mi bzodalags so/ bcom ldan 'das thabs kyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar mdzad pa lan/ bdag glob ras lags so// bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal/ skul byed legs so legs so// rigs kyi bus ning rimya ngan las 'das pa/ thabs de ltar blta bar bya'o// skul byed sangs rgyas gshegs pa ni bya ba nad zas la
'gro ba lta bur shes bar gyis shig/ skul byed tshering ba dang/ tshe ring bam yin pa'i rtags shes par gyis shig/ skul byed chos thams cad ni sgyu ma'i chos can no// de bzhin gshegs pa ni
thams cad la thabs kyi chos can yin la// da rnams kyis kyang gos par mi 'gyur ba de ni/ sas rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyirangabazhin// skul byed byed sred pa'i rgya mtsholas nges par brgal
bar byaba'i phyir/ zhal zas sbyar te cig lhadang/ lham yin dang/ mi rnams kyis kyang nga la rang rang gi mchod pa byas nas/ mi g.yo ba'i bde ba thob par gyur cig/ khyedas kyang snod du
gyur pa la dus su sbyin par gyis shig ma thegs shig/ snod du gyur pa dang/ dadang de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba ni don tha dad pa ma yino// nas skul byadakyis kyang sems
na thams cad ngos par bsgral ba'i phyir/ mgosnyad demachimalogs nas gsol ba/ legs []lags so/ legs lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad bka' stsal ba de bzhin du
bdag gis brgyago/ de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su myan las 'das pa'i 'og tu/ ji ltar ba lta bani/ bdag cag sbrang bu dang 'dra ba rnams kyi tshul langam lags/ nyan/
thos dang rangasangs rgyas kyi yul yang ma lags so zhes gsol to/ de nas mya na byed cing du bzhin dugayog 'khor dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das la bskor ba byas te/ mchod pa chen po'i las byas
nas/ bcom ldan 'das dang/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal te/ zhal zas len du song ngo// 'phags pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa theg pa
denas de'atshosachen bog yos rab tugayos/ 'gul rab tu 'gul/ 'khrugs rab tu 'khrugs/ khor rab tu la 'o/ 'ur bur rab tu
'ur 'ur/ shig shicig rab tu shig shig ched mer rab tumer mor/ ldem ldem rab tu ldem ldem// da la sobs ba byas te/ mimakhris pa'i nad kyis brgyal ba'i gnod pas thebs pa bzhin
sachen po 'di mtsho dug can pa'i mthas gtugs pa/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rten man chad thog thag tu rab tu ga'osaso// de nas lha dang lha ma yin dang/ mi de dag thams can go
rmongs te/ 'jigs shing skyi dung zhes byas nas/ dubazhin du tshigamathun par tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to// gon po khyod la bdag cag rnams// mgo bos phyag 'tshalagasol ba 'deb
rgyal ba khyu mchog khyod dang ni// bralan bdag cag mgon med 'gyur/ dungakhyod mya ngan 'da' 'gyur 'dibasams na// kha dog cag sdug bsngal shin tugating bub bying// thub pa bdag caganyid
nistor bar gyur// ba bzhonakun khyer de'ul chags pa bzhin// mgonamad dbul bo'i zhi la la zhig/ nad kyis thebs la sman pa yod pa dang// rang dgar byed cing khakhrusaM gnod pa rnams//
za ba jiltamachibar 'gyur ba bzhin// skye bo 'di daganyonamongasand kyis thebs// khyod med khyod kyi chos kyi gsos med pas// lta ba nyis pa byed 'drar 'chibar 'gyur// debs phan phyir 'jig
rtenam dor cig/ ji ltar grong khyer rgyal dang bral ba dang// dbul po rnams la mu ge byung ba dang// ji ltar dgon par skyon gyis gdus pa bzhin// khyoda'adas 'og tu bdag cagade 'drar 'gyur/
sems can gces khyod mya ngana'apa'i bzhed pas// sa gzhi rab tu g.yos shing phyogasakyang 'tshol// rgya mtshocha bo dag kyang rnam pa 'khrugs// bdag cagatan kyang sdug cing bsngal bar 'gyur
drang song chen po dang khyod mya ngan las// 'asan nyi ma'angs la ltung yang dag/ rgya mtshon bodag kyang bskam par 'gyur// bdag cag kun kyang deng du'agum lags grang/ ji ltar stobs ldan/
gisani sgo gsebanas// glang chen khyer nang du 'dzul bgyid pa/ shin tu nyon mongs 'gyur ba de bzhin du// bdag cag thams cad rab tu nyon mongs gyur// ji ltar bu gcig 'gum par mi 'tshal
@# khazhin// mya ngan byed 'di'i bdag cag de mi 'tshal/ gal te khyonatsuna'adab las// mi bzhedabadag cagazugs nad 'gos par 'gyug/ khyodanatsunas 'o ma
zhi gshegs ma tho bas// dud 'gromang po'ang g.yar na cher bgyid// bdag cag ji ltar g.yar na 'tshal lags// bdag cag mchil ma bzhi dul dor cig/ ma 'chadakar rang 'od
bsal bas// kun nag rnam par bcom pa de bzhin du/ 'phrul can khyod kyis sdug bsngal mun gsal te/ dge 'anadabus su rirang bzhin du bzhugs// bcom ldan 'as dpor gso'an
ltargyal po la la zhig gi bu sdug cing 'bas pa zhig mchis la/sa des chos lugs kyi bstan pa cos bslabs nas/ 'disod cig ces bka' stsal pa de bzhin du/ bdag cag bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos
kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal sras rnams kyang yang dag pa'i lta ba ba skyes/ bkum gyis ma mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal bo'i du ji lta ba de bzhin du/ bdag cag mi 'gum par/ bcom ldan 'dus
de'i slad du yun ring du bzhugs su gsol/ ji ltar la la zhig gzhung gis rtsod pa'i bstan bcos la bstan na/ skrag par 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ khyodatsas sgrug par m mdzad cig/ de khon nyid mkhyen
bzhin du bdag cag sems can dmyal bar 'chi bar ma mdzad cig/ dam pa'i chos kyi bdud rtsi'i bcud kyis tshim par mdzad cing/ de bzhin gshegs pa yun ring dubazhugs su gsol/ ji ltar rgyal po

btsonarar gnod pa'i las rnams kyis/ dang bor nyon mongs ban/ la la zhig gis khyod kyi na tsha ji lta bu zhig myong zhes smras na/ de ni de bzhinate/ gang gi tshebadag sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba las thar par 'gyur/
ba de tsho/ mya ngan las 'das pa yin te/ bde ba nyams su myong bar 'gyur pozhes mchib bzhin du/ bdag cag thams cad kyang khyod bzhugs n rgyal po'i btson ra nas thar pa bzhin du mya ngan las 'das pa/
lags na/ de'i slad du de bzhinagshegs pa yun ring du bzhugs su gsol// bcom ldan 'das depar gsol na/ sman pa tshe'i rig byed yan lag brgyad la mkhas pas/ bdag gi bu la'i rgyud phyim slob

par bgyid kyi/ slob ma la ni bdag dang mnyam par 'gyuradu dogs nas/ slob par mi bgyid pa de bzhin du/ chos kyi rgyal po sman pa chen po ser sna mimapa'i ba khyod kyis theg pa chen po'i rgyud phyi ma la de ltar
mi mdzad par/ bcom ldan 'das yun ring du bzhugs su gsol/ de bzhin du shing rta shing rta'i rig byed la mkhas pas/ bdag gi bu la ni rgyud phyis sgra grag par thog pa'i dpyad thams cad slob
par bgyid kyi/ slobamal ni slob par mi bgyid pa dang/ rig pa'i gnas gzhan dag la lang de bzhin du sbyar ro// bcom ldan 'das dper gsol zhi/ byis pa 'an rgan po 'am/ nad pa la la
zhig lam bzang bo las la te/ lam ngan par son/ shin tusdug bsngal bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das sems can las ngan par mchis pa rnams lus dang bral ba'i 'og tu sems/
can dmyal ba rnams su sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur lags na/ bcom ldan 'das lam ston pa yun ring dubazhugs su gsol/ ya mtshan can dgu bcu drug dang/ tshigs su
bcad ba bzhi bcu rtsa lnga la yang de bzhin rgyas par sbyar ro// de nas de'i tshobcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa// dge slong khyed lha dang mi rnams ltar byis pa'i
sngags 'don pa dgam byed par brtson 'grus rtsomasazhig/ nas lha dang lha ma yin dang mi rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung blo gros dang/ dran pa dang/ de kho na nyid du 'gro ba thos nas/
ltar bu gcig pa khag nas la bod du bor ba bzhin du de dag sdug bsngal bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ de dag la tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal la/ khyed nams des bar
bar gyur cig/ mya nam byed m zhig/ 'di sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos/ khams cad mi sna 'khod par gyis// bag med pa nam gnas pa// bag yod pa la dga' bar gyis// khyed stong par
dang stong pa ma yin pa 'am/ rtag pa dang mi rtag pa 'am/ skyabs dang skyabs ma yin pa dang/ 'gro ba dang mi 'gro ba 'am/ rten dang rten ma yin pa ma/ ther zug dang ther zug ma yin pa la brtan
ba dang brtan ma na pa ba/ sems can dad sems can med pa ma/ yang dag pa dang yang dag pa ma yin ba 'am bzhin pa dang bden pam yin pa ma/ rgyun las 'das pa dang myang n las
bas pa ma zhib ma/ gsang ba dang gsang ba ma zhi ma/ gas dang gtis sumed pa 'am/ de bzhin du chos rnam pa dum dag/ som nyi'am padaganyis sam/ tsom za ba ci dang
ci yod ba de dang de dag zhus shig dang/ thams cad gcad par bya'o// bdud rtsi'i mchog kyang khyed la bstan par bya ste/ 'i 'og tu khongs rgyan las 'da' bar bya'o// dge slong dag sangs rgyas
'byung ba red par dka' 'o// milus thob pa red bar daka'o// dal ba phun sum tshogs pa red par dka' 'o// bzodapa dang/ tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa ma zhigom ral ba mang na tu
rnyed par dka' 'o// 'jig rten na dgra bam pa thob bani/ gser gyi bye mdang/ u dum wa ra'i me tog bzhin du rnyed par dka' 'o/ dge slong dag 'di lta ste/ sani thams cad kyi sgo nas
sams na thams cad kyi 'tsho ba yin te/ de bzhin du nga'i chos bstan pa rnam pa snyatshog gsang kha/ thar pa'i grong khyer gyi bdud rtsi'i zas kyang de dang 'dra bar blta bar bya'o// sangs
na thams cad dung nga'i sras ge slong thams cad la dam pa'i chos mang po brtan por bzhag go/ gzhan yang sems can thams cad la phan pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan
chab nyid bsgrags te/ lagi 'brug cig pa'i thig le'i gtam yang bzhag nas/ longs su mya na las 'da' bar bya'o// de nas dge slong de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa
[np]/ dgongs su mya ngan las 'da' 'o zhes thos nas/ mi dga' bar gyur te/ skyobung zhes byas nas/ mig mchi mas gang bzhin du bcom ldan 'as kyi zhabs la mgo bas
! phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan mang du bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'adas kyis sdug bsngal ba dang/ mi rtag pa dang/ bdag
med pa dang/ rjes thams cad kyi nang na glang po che'i rjes tshes mchog yin par brtan to zhes gsungs te/ de ltar mi rtag pa'i 'du shes bstan cing bsgoms te mang du bgyis pas/ 'dod pa'i 'dod
chags thams cad zad par 'gyur/ gzugs kyi 'dod chags thams cad zad par 'gyur/ gzugs med pa'i 'dod chags thams cad zad par 'gyur/ ma rig ba thams cad zad par 'gyur/
lhag pa'i nga rgyal thams cad ma lus par yang dag par chad par 'gyur lags so// bcom ldan 'das dade/ragason/ ston gyi dusasu zhing pas rmog cher btang ste/ n+ya ba'adzings
pa thams cad sel bar bgyid pa de bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das mi rtag pa'i 'du shes bstan cing bsgoms te mang du bgyis pas/ 'dopa'i 'dod chags thams cad zad par 'gyur/ gzugs kyi
'dod chags thams cad zad par 'gyur/ gzugs med pa'i 'dod chags thams cad zad par 'gyur/ ma rig pa thams cad zad par 'gyur/ lhag pa'i nga rgyal thams cad ma lus par ga nga
dag par thad khar 'gyur ro// zhing las thams cad kyi nang nan ston gyi zhing las mchog tu bstan to zhes bya la sogs pa glang po che'i rjes lta bu'i mdo las 'byung ba bzhin du rgyas par sbyar ro/
bcom ldan 'das dpar gsol na/ rgyal po 'chi ba'i tshe/ bdag gis btsanar bsal te/ sems can rnams bton gnod pas nyon mongs pa las thar bar bgyis nas
de'i 'og tu 'chi bar bgyidapa de bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das khyed kyis kyang/ sems namashes ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyi btson rar brabs pa rnams kyi mi shes pa'i 'ching ba rnams bcad nas
de'i 'og tu yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar gshegs su gsol/ bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang dpar gsolan/ sems can 'byung bo dngosha za'i gdon gyis brlams pa las/ nachen po dang
phrad na/ 'byung po dang shatha'i gdon rnams kyis thebs pa thams cad las thar par 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ khyodadang mjalananyan thos kyi tshogs thams cad mi shes pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyi 'byung bo
dang/ shatha'i gdon rnams las bos su thar par 'gyul/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid bod du chud par bgyid lags so// bcom ldan 'das dbangagasol na/ glang bomi'i 'dul sbyong gi
mkhan pos/ sbos kyi glang bo chazhags pa chen pos btsos pa las/ glang bochos zhugs pa de bcad de bros pa de bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang bdag tu 'dzin pa dang/ bdag gir 'dzin
@#// pa dang/ phrag dog dang dngan then dang/ sar sA dang/ g.yo'i zhags pa chen po bsud nas glang bo tsha'i bdul sbyong gi mkhan po chen po dbazhi gshegs pa'i lag tu 'ongs
nas/ sems can thams cad las dang nyon mongs pa'i glong bo lnga bcu bdun yongs su bsal bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das dparagasolan/ grang ba'i rims kyis thebs pa sman pa chen po'i thad du
mchis na/ sdug bsngal las thar par 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang/ nyon mongs pa dang/ log par lta ba dang/ lag pa'i tshog nyes dmigs mtha' yas pa'i granga'i/
rims nad can gyis lus dang ldan pa las/ sman pa chen po bcom ldan 'dasakyi thadangums nas/ sdug bsngal thams cad las rnam par thar bar gyur te/ mi g.yo ba'i bde ba gang thob lags so/
bcom ldan 'das gzhan pa nga dparagasol na/ mi zhig gis 'bras skyems 'tshal te/ re bar gyur nas/ bdag nyid kyis kyang bdag 'di ma 'tshal te/ chos kyang ma 'tshul/ chos ma lags pa dang
ma 'tshal te/ 'di'i bdag gama'o// 'di'i bdag gi sring mo'o// 'di ni bdag gi bu mo'o snyam du yang ma 'tshal lo// snad tsare bla ste/ phyis dang gcin gyis rang gilus kun bskos shing mchis
pa las de'i 'og tubadag nyid sangs te/ gzhi las gyur pa la mkhas par gyur nas/ changanicor yang mi rung ngo snyam du sems to/ bdag ni sdig ba thams cad las thar to snyam nas/ chang 'thung
ba ru'i yang mi rung bar shas cher bsgoms te slong bar bgyid pa de bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das 'tsho ba'i 'jig rten 'din zlos gar mkhan bzhin du thog ma ma mchis pa nas/ 'khon 'khor zhing long
su 'khyam ban/ 'din bdag gi ma'o// 'di bdag gi sring mo'o// 'di ni bdag gi bu mo'o snyam dum 'tshal nas/ mdang/ sring mo dang/ bumo rnams dang/ lhan cig tu 'dod pa
rashes spyod par bgyid de/ 'bras skyeA kyis ra ro bar gyur pa de bzhin du/ sdug bsngal red par 'gyur la/ donas ngo tshashes pa'i mi de dag 'bras skyems kyis ra rob las sangs pa bzhin du/ cir yang
mi rung ba shas cher bskyomasanas sdug bsngal las yang dag par 'da' bar 'gyur lags so// gzhan yang na nad lasnying bo'i mi srid pa de bzhin du/ lus 'di la yang bdag dang/
sems can dang/ srog dang/ gang zag dang/ shid las skyes pa dang/ shadabu dung/ byed pa bo mchis mi srid de/ de lta bur bdag cag gis bdagamams pa'i'adu shes bsgoms te/
mang du bgyis lags so// dpar gsol na/ phub ma son pa bye ma snyed bor ba nisir yang mi gces pa de bzhin du/ lus 'di la yang bdag ma mchis so// dbar gsolan/ khas lagyi
tog la dri gdo' ba mamachis pa de bzhin du/ lus 'dil lang bdagamams te/ de ltar bdag cag gis bdag mamachis pa'i 'du shes bsgoms te/ mang du bgyis lags so// bzho ldan 'dA
kyis kyang/ dge slong dag chos thams cad ni bdag med pa ste/ de ltar sgoms shig dang/ de ltar bsgoms pa rnams kyis kyang bdag tu 'dzin pa sbyong bar 'gyur ro// bdag tu
'dzan pa longs su sasan/ mya nga na las 'das pa thob par 'gyur ro zhes bka' stsal te/ bcom ldan 'adras de ltar chos thams cad bdag ma mchis pa'i slad du/ bdag ma mchis pa'i 'du shes
bsgoms te/ mang dukhagyis lags so// gzhan yang ji ltar nam mkha' bya'i rjes gda' bani mi srid pa de bzhin du/ bdag ma mchis pa'i 'du shes bsgoms na lta ba rnam pa thams cad dang bral
bar 'gyur lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ bsgom pa de ltar bsgom pa khyod kyis shes sam/ dge slong rnams kyis gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das sdug bsngal dang/ mi rtag
ba dang/ bdag med pa'i 'du shes ma lags par bsgomanani ji ltar mi rozhing 'khyam pas/ lha khang dang/ bodad/ sa gzhi dang/ nyi ma dang/ blob dang/ shing dang/ ri rnams ma 'khor bzhin
zladu 'khor bar mthong ba de bzhin du/ gang dag gis sdug bsngal dang/ mi rtag pa dang/ bdag med pa'i'adu shes ma bsgom pa'i soms na 'jig rten pa de dag ni/ rarob dang 'drab r blta bar bgyi'i
bcom ldan 'das bdag gisani yang dag par bsgoms lags so// bcom ldan 'dasakyis bka' stsal ba/ dge slong dag dani bo 'di'i don de ngas bshad par bya'o// khyed kyis
ba gas su bcad pa'i na 'al/ no ni' go/ mi ge ni 'di nas gsal bar mi shes te/ ji ltar mi ra ro bas lha khang dang/ dang/ sa gzhi deng/ nyi go dang/ zla ba dang/ shing dang/ rin/
mi 'khor bzhin du 'khor bar mthong ba de bzhin du 'du shes phyi ci 'go dums cing/ kun tu mongs pa rnams bdag go snyam pa dang rtog gosnyam pa dang/ bde'o snyam pa dang/ sdug gosnyam pa'i

'du shes kun tu spyod do// de la bdag ces bya ba'i sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i noto/ rtog ces bya ba ni sakyi sa zhes bya ba'adzin to// bde zhes bya ba ni mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba'i donato// sdug ces bya
nas tshog bladogaso/ dge slong dag khyed kyis bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis ni/ sdug bsngal dang/ mortog pa dang/ bdagamed pa'i 'adu shes sgoms lags so zhes/ rgyags pa dang ngo rgyal
gyis dregs bar ma byed cig/ de ltar rnam pa gsum bsgoms par mnani/ 'a bstan bo la khyed kyis bsgom rnam pa gsum bsgoms pa de/ bsgom pa don med bar 'gyur ro// sdug bsngal shes
bar bya ba sgom pa rnam ba gsum ni/ khyad par dang/ khyad par gyi khang khyad par ro// sdugapasngal la bde'ogamadu 'du shes pa'i phyin ci log pa'o// bde ba la sdug bsngal le snyam du 'du shes pa ni
ni ci log pa'o// mi rtag la rtag go snyam du 'dus pa ni phyin ci log pa 'o// rtago ba la mi rtag pa 'o snyam du 'du shes ba ni zhi ci leg pa'o// bdag med pa la bdag tu 'du shes bani/
[r! ]@#// phyin ci log ba'o// bdag yod pa la bdag med par 'du shes pa ni phyin du log pa'o// mi sdug pa la sdug go snyam du 'dushes bani phyin ci log pa'o/ sdug pa la mi sdug
gosnyam du 'du shes panas ci log pas phyin ci log bzhi po 'di dag yang dag par ma shes par khyed kyis bsgom par bya ba bsgoms te mang du byas so// khyed kyis bde ba la sdug bsngal bar bsgomasaso//
rtag pa lam rtog pa dang/ bdag yod pa la bdag med pa dang/ sdug pa la mi sdug par bsgoms so// 'jig rten pa rnams la yang bde ba dang/ bdag dang/ rtag pa dang/ sdug pa rnams yod do// 'jig/

rten las 'das pa rnams la yang bdeb dang/ bdag dang/ rtag pa dang sdug ba rnams mo dgodi lan tshunami mthun pa yod do/ yi ge zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten pa zhes bya'i tha tshig go/don ces bya ba ni 'jig rten las
'das pa'i shes so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ dge slong rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'du shes bzhi la sogs pa phyin ci log de bzhin gshegs
pas lugs sub zhags pa rnams ni/ bdag cag gis yun ring mo zhig nas mthong yang mthong/ bsgom yang bsgoms lags na/ da ltar 'tshal ba bka' stsal du gsol/ de bzhin gshegs
pa bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa las lhag par yang bzhug sugasol/ de bzhinagshegs pas cidang ji skad du bka' stsal pa dedang de bzhin du bdag cag gis bgyi bar 'tshal lego/ gal te
00 de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs su mi gnang na/bda gnas kyang sbrul gdug pa dang khyim gcig kha nang du lhan cig tunas bami tshagatadabazhin gshegs pa bzhugs na tshag par spyodaci mchis pa'i
rje thog gis/ khyod nyid kyi slad bzhin du bdag cagakyang yongasaMsumya ngan las 'da' bar 'tshal la// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong de dag la 'di skadices bka' stsal to

dge slong dag khyed de skad ma zer cus/ ga slong dag ngas 'od srungs kyi lag tubastan pa gtad par bya ste/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'dra bar dge slong rnams kyi rten lta bur 'gyur ro// dge slong
rnams dang sems can rnams kyi skyabs lta bur 'gyur ro// dperanargyal po grong khyer mang po'i mnga' bdag grong khyer gcig tu song ste/ zhi ba dag gcig rgyal bor dbang bskur ba de bzhid/ 'jig/
rten gyi khams 'dis 'od srungs chen po la dbang bskur ro// dge slong dag khyed kyis sdug bsngal ba dang/ mi rtog pa dang/ bdag med pa dang/ mi sdug pa'i 'du shes ji ltar bsgom zhen ge

slong dag deporan/ sos ka'i sa la bab pa na/ skya be rnams kyis nags tshal gyi nang du chu bskyil te/ rang rang rgyal pa'i yo byad thogasanas/ chu'i nang du rtse bor byed l/ chu nang du ga gis nor bu/
napodits+tshapi dang ldan pa zhig bzha gnas / bozurade 'dod pa'i phyir/ de dag thams cad kyis rgyal ba rnams bor ti chu de'inang du 'dzulanas/ de'i nang naso 'am/ gsog ma ci'od kha ga
btsan/ @#// lanor du yin snyam ste/ rlas nas nor bu bdag gis red do// bdag gis rnyed do zhes zer zhing/ so so nas steng du byung ste/ rdzing gi 'gram du 'khod nas/ 'danani dug yin no
snyam pa'i 'du shes skyes bar gyural/ rdzing de'i chu yang nor bu'i 'od sa zla ba'i 'od bzhin du mdzes bar 'dug ste/ dedagagis mas pa d mthong nas/ e ma nor bu snyam du yon tan gyi 'du shes skye bar
'gyur te/ de dag gi nang nas thabs la mkhas shing yid reb gcig gis nor bu de yang dag par red pa de bzhin du/ dge slong dag khyed kyis thams cad sdug bsngal ba'o// thams cad bdag mo dba'o//

thams cad mi rtag pa'o/ thams cad mi sdug pa'o zhes thams cad kyi su bzung nas bsgoms 'ashing mang du byas pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad ji da gzhong gi gyo mo dang gsog ma bzhin du nor cing na med pa'/
gyur ta re/ skyes bu thabs la mkhas pa bzhin du gyis shig/ khyed kyis thams cad kyi mu bzung nas/ gang dang gang bsgoms pa de dang de nyid la bde ba dang/ bdag dang/ rtag pa dang/ sdug pa
yod de rnam pa bzhi bo de dag ni phyin ci ma log pa zhes brjod par bya'o// debs nanor bu dang 'dra bar chos kyi de kho na nyid rtag pa'i 'du shes sgoms shig gdan s bcom ldan 'das la
dge slong rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag chos thams cad ni bdag med pa ste/ de ltar sgomasashig dang/ de ltar bsgoms ba rnams kyis ni bdag tu 'dzin pa
ba sbyong bar 'gyur ro// bdag tu 'dzin ba spangs nas mya ngan las 'das pa thob par 'gyur ro zhes bka' stsal lags/ bka' stsal pa de'i don ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin/
gshegs pas de'i don rnam par dbye ba bka' stsal du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong de dag la bka' stsal pa// dge slong dag legs so legs so// dge slong dag bdag gi ma
nges par bcad par 'dod pas ni/ de skad ces dri dgos te legs so// dge slong dag dparan grong khyer 'ga' zhig na rgyal po shes rab 'chal pa zhig rgyal bo byed de/ rgyal bo dril sman pa ngan pa
zhig bdog la/ de yang sman pa 'amal pa zhig ste/ bla nas dbad thang cher dbang la/ rgyal pos kyang bkur ba zhig yod pa des/ 'o ma 'ba' zhig sman yin par 'dzin l/ nad gzhi'i shes
sa/ ma'i dpyad leg par 'dzin pa de/ skye ba thams cad kyi rlung nad kyi sna grangs rnams la yang gtong bar byed/ mkhris pa rind rnams dang/ bad kan gyi nad rnams la yang gtong bar byed de/
de de ltar byed kyang sman pa gces pa kho nar 'gyur la/ rgyal po de yang 'tshal pa'i bye brag mi phyed pa zhig go/ de nas sman pa tshe'i rig byed yan lag brgyud lamakhas pa/ rgyud
phyi ma shes pa gzhan zhig yul gzhan nas gsar du 'ongs nas/ sman pa de'i thad du rten bcas te sbas pa/ khyod kyi ming thos nas slob par 'tshal ba'i slad du bdag mchis kyis/ khyod kyis bdog
gi mkhan po mdzad du gsog/ des sman pa 'chal pa des deskad ces thos nas/ sman pa gsar du 'ongs pa de la smras pa// lo ni bcu rtsa brgyadakyi bar
dung la legs par bsgrims te/ dka' ba spyad pas rim gro brgyas la/ de'i 'og tu slobs shig dang/ khyod sman par 'gyur ro// de nas des de bzhin du mnyan te/ de ltar bgyi'o zhes byas na//
des mthar gyis smanang 'chal pa demagu bar byas te/ rgyal po'i pho brang du song nas/ rgyal bo de la 'di skad ces gsol te/ rgyal po chen po khyed kyis rtag tu bstan chos thams cad la brtson par mdzod

cig dang/ de ltar mdzad n rgyal po rgyal por 'os par 'gyur ro// rgyal bos kyang den bden te nar 'ong ngo zhus byas nas/ rgyal po des sman pa 'chal ba de dang snyan bacig shos kyi bye brag phyed par gyur nas
[ ]sman pa ngan pa de yul phyogasanas boskad de/ sman pa bzang po cig shos bkur bar gyur la/ de nas sman pa des dani dus la bab bo snyam nas rgyal bo 'di skad ces gsol te/ rgyal po chen pos
te bdag la mnyes par gyuran/ gsol ba snagacig cig gsol gyis gal te rgyal po chen po yang gyes par lta na gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ rgyal bos/ sman pa la bka' stsal pa/ nga'i lag
ba g.yas pa man chadanor ro cog las gsol cig/ sman pas/ rgyal po la gsol pa/ rgyal po chen po'i sman pa 'chal pa de'i 'o ma'i dpyadagang lag pa doni/ dug ha lahal lags na/ des glo

bar m chud kyis/ rgyal po khyed kyi khu la khams thams cad du bka' btags la/ sngon gyi sman pa de'i 'o ma'idapyadagang lan pa de ni dug ha la ha la ban gyis/ su sman du'om 'thung ba de mgongob cad dogs
bka' gdags par gso'/ de ltar ma bgyis na sems can rnams dus ma yin pa'i chibs 'chibar 'gyulo/ bdag ni 'tsho bar 'gyur ba dang/ nadam gas par 'gyur ba 'tshal te/ lha bdag
nagasol ba de 'tshal lags so// de nas rgyal bos/ sman pa de la bka' stsal pa// de ltar na gsol ba chung ngu zhig gsol to/ bka'agadags par bya'o zhes byas nas/ bka' yang/
btags so// de nas bka' btags pa bzhin du/ thams cad du lugs su chud par gyur to// de nas sman pa des/ rgyul po de la yang 'di skad ces gsol te/ dung yang lan gnyis
lan gsum gyi bar du/ de bzhin du bka' gags par gsol zhes byas nas/ smanapa des romangar ba dang/ sgyur ba dang lan tshwa'i dang/ tshab dang/ bskabadad/ khabanams kyis mi rnams
kyind sos par byas so// de nas ri'i rgyal bond kyis thebs nas/ sman pa de bkug ste bsgob/ shi'o thug si rgyal po'icinadang 'atsal ba'i gsol ba ci 'dod pa khyod la sbyin nozhes byas so
de nas sman pa des/ rgyal po dal gsol ba/ rgyal po chen po bgazhibardzun du sgrub ma lags so// 'om ni bdud rtsis lags te/ khyodagyis zhal zas 'om dang sbyar ba gsol
ga/ 'tshal la/ de nas rgyal pos/ sman pa de la bka' stsal pa// ci khyod mkhris pas myos par byas sam/ na tong slu bar byed dam cin/ sngar ni 'o ma dug/

zhe zhes zer la/ na ma sman gyi mchog yin no zhes zer/ kye ma snyan pa snga ma bsladapas phung ngo// des kyang 'o ma'i dpyad bsngags pa lasan/ de nasman pa chen po yin gyis/ny+tsan pa ngan pa ma yin khyed gyi/

mdapyadabyas pan/khyod bdag bskyed pa'i rgyu mnyen zhus byasog snyan pas bdasol ba/rgyal po chen po de ltar gzhan dum degongs par gsol// dper na shing ngam rtsi ga pa srin bus brkos te/ yi ge'i 'bru 'dab

yang/ mkhas pa rnams kyis srin bus yi ge shes so zhes brjod par mi bgyi/ yi ge sbyar ba lta bur gyur kyang/ ya mtshan du gzung bar mi bgyi ba de bzhin du/ khyod kyi snyan pa sngam 'o ma'i dpyad kyi las

kyang srin bus bskos pa'i yi ge bzhin du blta bar bgyis te/ dena'i ma so so'i bye brag kyang ma 'tshal ba lags so// rgyal pos/ sman pa de la smras pa// kwa ye sman pa ngan pa des 'o ma so so'i bye brag ji ltan
mishes/ sman pas gsol pa/ rgyal bo chen po 'o ma ni bdud rtsi yang lags/ dug kyang lags te/ de la bdud rtsi zhes bgyi ba ni/ bgang be'u ha cang stobs dang ldan pa ma lags pa dang/ chadag
snyigs ma mi 'thung ba dang/ nags khung dang/ gshong dang/ chu 'dam rdza ba can n mi gnas pa dang/ b.lang jis num ma bzhings pa dang/ rtsa brjes pa ma gsan pa dang/ rang gi khyun 'dug pa dang/
ma he'i khyu dang lhan tsags 'grogs pa dang/ de la sogs pa ba'i yon tan rnams dang ldan l/ de'i ma lhag ma gzaram bcad par natsam du bzhes pa'i 'og de nind do cog zhi bar bgyid pa lags so/

denas rgyal po ngematshar du gyur nas/ snyan ba de la bka' stsal pa/ mkhanabo dani ngas khyod kyi 'o ma'i dbyad bzang bo yang shes so// ngan pa yang shes so// de nas rgyal bos bka' btags te/ 'og 'thung
zhig ces bsgo ba dang/ 'bangs thams cad kyis rgyal pos phyir yang 'o ma 'thung zhig ces bsgo ba thos nas/ sems 'khrug te/ nu rgyal po gdon gyis thebs sam/ 'on te bdag cag la mtho 'tsham

mam zhes zer zhing/ de ltar grong khyer gyi mi dang 'bangs thams cad rgyal po'i drung du lhags te/ rgyal pos de dag mthong nas sus pa/ sman pa 'dzin re 'o ma de 'dra'o zhes zer na/ khyedagasherakyi bod
ces byas so// de nas rgyal bo dung/ grong khyer gyi mi dang/ 'bas thams cad mgu bar gyur nas/ snyan pa la mi mtshungs pa'i nyen bkur byas nas/ 'os dpyang la yang sen par byed pa de bzhin
du/ dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bdebar gshegs pa// 'jig rtenamkhyen ng/ skyes bu 'dul
ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ blonamod pa// lha dang mi sasakyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sman ba bzang bo dang 'dra bar 'jig rten du byung nas/ mu stegs basmanapa na ba dang 'dra ba thams cad kyin
gdu gshegs te/ thams cad nges par btul zhing/ nges pa bshag nas/ rgyal po dum mgu bar mdzad de/ mu stegs pa rnams tshar gcad pa'i phyir/ bdag med do//
sems can med do// srog med do// gang zag med do zhes gsung ngo// mu stegs pa rnams kyis bdag bstan pa ni/ srin bus brkos pa'i yi ge dang 'dra ste/ de'i phyirang sems can thams
cad la bdag med do zhes bstan pa ston par mdzad do// bdag med pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chog yin no zhes chos kyi bka' 'dogs pa mdzad nas/ yang gdul bar byab rnams kyi dbadadad/ sems
can rnams la phan pa'i phyir/ dus mkhyen par mdzad nas/ chos thams cad bdag med par bstan pa'i skabs de nyid du/ snyan pa bzang po bzhin du bdag yod do zhes yang dag par ston par
mdzad de/ 'jig rten pa rnams kyi bdag mthe bod tsam dang/ khre rgod kyi 'bru tsam zhes bya bde lta bu ni ma yin no// 'jig rten pa rnams kyi bdag tu lta ba gang yin pa lta bu 'ang ma yin te/
'dir chos thams cad ni bdag med pa zhes bya'o// chos thams cad ni bdag med pa'i ng ma yin te/ bdugan de khon nyid do// bdagani rtag pa nyid do// bdag ni yon tan nyid do// bdag ni
ther zug pa nyid do// bdag ni brtan pa nyid do// bdag ni zhi ba nyid do zhes sman pa bzang po'i 'o ma bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ng de be tid dang ldan pa ston par mdzad do// da
bsgom pa la/ 'khor bzhi po rnams kyis bston pa ragyis shig/ dge slong dag gzhan yang tshul khrims kyi gzhim gtogs par/ the tsom dang som nyi ci yod pa de dag khyed kyis nga la zhus shig dgi/
ngas 'a gas par gsus pas khyed ras par bya'o// nga ni bsgom pa thams cad las grol ba dang/ rang bzhin gyis stong pa chen po ston te/ dge slong khyedade bzhin gshegs pas bdug
cag la rang bzhin gyis stong pa chen po ma bstan nas de skad ma zer cig/ dge slong dag gzhan yang tshul khrims kyi gzhi ma gtogs par the tsom dang somanyici dang ci yod ba de dag khyed kyis
nga la zhus shig de nas dge slong de dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs partsisangs rgyas
la zhu ba ni/ bdag cag gi yul ma lags te/ bdag cag gis rjes thogs lags so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyang bsam gyis mi khyab/ ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang bsam gyis mi khyab
khyed kyi gdam ngag kyang bsam gyis mi khyab pas na/ bdag cag gis zhu ba'i rngo mi thogs lags so// bcom ldan 'das dpar gsolan/ mi la la rgas shing 'khogs la gtugs pa/ lob
nyinurtsa drug len pa/ nad kyis thebs ba/ mal khri lamachis pa'i nad pa zhig mchis la// mi la la zhig gis de'i sug par gter gtams te/ kye mi khyod kyis gter 'di leng la/ gang gi tshe bdag
lo bcu'am/ lan+ti kun sa nas phyir 'ongs tang/ de'i tshe 'dibadag la phyir byin cig ces gyisanas/ des gtad de mchis la/ rgan po de'ang bu ma mchis pa zhig ste/

mi de mchis nas ring po ma lags par mi rgan po de guman/ mi de sar mchis te/ de de lta nor gyi phung po chen po dang bral bar gyur kyang/ su la'ang ji skad bgyir yang ma mchis pa de bzhin du/ bcom ldan
'das tshul khrims kyi gzhi ma gtogs par/ bdag cag gis zhus pa de'ang nyan thos la yun ring du gnas par mi 'gyur la/ bdag cag la'ang ji skad du zhu ba'acham mchis lags so// bcom
ldan 'das kyis/ de dag la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong rnams kyis zhus pa ni/ sems can thams cad la phan bar 'gyur te/ de'i phyir ngas zhu ba'i skabs phye ba yin no// de nas dge slong rnams
kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dper gsol na/ mi gzhon nu la la la rtokeshu rtsa drug lon te/ phyug cing 'khor phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa zhig mchis la/ mi la la zhig
gis de'i sug par gter gtams te/ 'di skad du/ kyi bdagan don gnyer du 'gro yis/ bdag phyir 'ongs tang/ ma khyod kyis gter 'di dag la phyi'i byin cig ces bgyis nas/ mi des gter des
legs par sbas shing legs par bsrungs te/ de ltar mchis nas/ slar stsal ba de bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos kyi dbyig legs par gsungs pa/ dge slong kun dga' bo la sogs
po nyan thos thams cad la gtad na ni/ yun ring du gnas par mi 'gyur lags so// de ci'i slad du zhen/ 'od srungs chen po la sogs pa nyan thos thams cad ni mi rtag pa'i slad du'o//byang chub sem dpa'

zhus pa'i dbyig/byang chub semadapa' rnag la gtang nan le'abum phrag mang por gnas par 'gyural 'phel bar yang 'gyur zhing byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la'ang snyan par 'gyur lags so// byang chub sam
dang 'asems dpa' chen po rnams kyis ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa la zhuba'i rdo bregasal/ bdag cag sbyadabu dang 'dra bsani/ de bzhin gshegs pa la zhu ba'i rjes thig lags so zhes gsol nas/
cang mi zer bar 'khongado// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong de dag la 'di skad ces bka' su la to// dge slong dag legs so legs so// dge slong dag khyed zag pa
med pa sa ni de skad bya ba yin no// dgra bcom pas ni de skad bya ba yin te legs so// dge slong dag ngas kyang khyed kyis bsams pa'i phen de snga nas bsams so// 'thog pa chen po ni byang chub sem
pa'i lag tu gtadan/ rgyuganyis kyis yun ring du gnas par 'gyur ro// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis/ 'khor rnams la bka' stsal pa// rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo tsho'ang po dag
gzhi gsum ma gtogs pa dang/ tshul khrims kyi gzhi ma gtog par/ khyed kyi yi de gnyis dang/ som nyidang/ the tsom re yod pa la la zhus shig skyes lan gnyis lan gsum du bka' stsal te/
de nas 'khor de nyid kyi nang nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dong bu'i grong du skyes pa// bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba'i bu/ 'od srus chen po 5
rus gcig pa zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song nas phyag 'tshal te/ lan 'bum bskor ba byas nas/ lca'imatsho pa las chen po byas
te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tugazar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'driskad ces gsol to// gal te zhus nas/ ba lung bstan pa'i sAd du/ bcom ldan
'das kyis bdag la skabs phye na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o// bcom ldan 'ang
kyis bka' stsal pa// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba'i bu/ 'od srungs chen po dang rus gcig pa khyod kyi dung ni'adodapa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la zhus shig dang/ ngas zhu ba zhus pa de dang de lung bstan pas/khyod kyi sems radas par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems
dad 'a sems dpa' chen po bram bro'i rigs che zhing mtho ba'i bu/ 'od srungs chen po dang rus gcig pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mthu dang/ sogs
na thams cad kyi dege ba'i rna ba'i mthus bdag gis zhu bar na 'tshalan bdag ni spang bu dang 'dra la/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni tsan dan lta bu'i 'khor chen po mnga' ba lags/ sang ge lta bu'i'il
chen po dang ldan pa lags/ bit+tan dang rdo rje chen po ltar ma phyed pa'i sku mnga' ba lags/ mi phyed pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa lags/ gshes rgya mtshodang ldan pa'i 'khor chen po mnga' ba lags/ byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' tshon bo kha cig yon tan dpag du ma mchis pa dang ldan pa dag kyang mchis te/ de ltar dpag tu ma mchis pa'i 'khor mnga' ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa la/ ngobazhin gsheg
pa'i mthus bdag gis zhu ba'i rje thogs par gyur na/ 'di'i bgyi ba mang dumachis te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus bdag sbrang bu dang 'drabs zhu bar 'tshal lo zhes byas nas/ tshigs su bcad/
de gsol ba thub pa cis na tshe ring 'gyur// rdo rje lta bur nyis 'gyur lags// gang gis mi shigs theg par 'gyur// ci nas lus brtan stobs chen 'gyur// ji ltar gyis na mdo sde 'di'i//
pha rol phyin par 'gyur ba lags// ji ltar srog chags rnams kyisams// sna tshogs rtogs nas ston par 'gyur// thub pa chen po ji ltar na// rgyal chen thob nas skyabs su 'gyur// ji ltar
dgra bcom ma lags kyang// dgra bcom rnams dang mtshungs par 'gyur/ bcom ldan ji ltar bgegs bgyid pa'i// bdud na khong du chud par 'gyur// bdud kyi tshig kyang 'tshal ba dang//
sla@#/ rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gsung yang 'tshal// 'dren pa ji ltar dga' bzhin du// 'phags pa'i lam rnams ston par 'gyur// dge dang yang dag ldan gyur nas//
[R ]byin ma lag ston par 'gyur// thub pa chen po ji ltan// legs byed 'gyur ba bstan du gsol// thub pa byang chub sems rnams kyang// ji ltar brtag dka' khams mthong 'gyur// thub
pa ji ltar yi ge yi// khyed nirdzogs par 'gyur ba lags// ji ltar bzhad dang zal mo yi// spyod pa dag dang 'dra bar 'gyur// ji ltar phur bu pa wa sangs// nyim dag tu skye bar 'gyur// thub
babyang chub sems dpa' rnams// ji ltar sems nam skyes pa// 'di na 'jig pamed par 'gyur// jiltar g ta'i 'bras bu 'dra// ji ltar tshod dus skyes pa na// gos pa ma mchis baspyod ba dang
nyes pa'i dbyings su pad+maltar// nyes pa dag gis ma gos lags// ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams// yul khams sman pa chen por 'gyur// chu 'gram kun du mnyan par 'gyur// de 'di'i
bdawa/la lung bstan gsol// ji ltar sbrul rnanas pags pa ring// 'dor ba bzhin du 'gyur ba lags// rin chen mang po'i 'byung gnas dang// 'bru dang shing 'dra ji ltar lags// brtan po de
rtswa dag nyan thos dang// rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyis// sku gdung ji ltar ston par bgyid// mtha' yas sgo yang ji ltar ston// rgyal sras brtul zhugs brtan po rnams// ji ltar mi phyida 'khor
dang ldan// de dag 'jig rten dmus long gi/ mig dang 'dra bar ji ltar 'gyur// thub pa chen po ji ltar na// mgamang bye ba ston par 'gyur// ji ltar zla ba tshes 'dra bas// 'jig rten rnamA
la chos kyang ston// jiltakhur ni gzha' gsad du// yongs su mya ngan 'das pa ston// ji ltar lha dang bdud 'dra bar// brtan par 'gyur zhing dpa' bar 'gyur// ji ltar chos kyi so rtogs
nas/ tshes nyid kyang ni 'tshal bar 'gyur// ji ltar byung chub sems dpa' rnams// nad med par yang 'gyur ba lags// sems can kun la sman pa'i phyir// de dag ji ltar dgos
pa 'ad/ ji ltar dge ba lhag mar bcas// jiltar the tsom sbyong bar 'gyur// blo gros chen po ji ltar na// byang chub mchog tu bar 'gyur// che phra gzigs pa khyod nyid kyis// byang
chub sems dpa'i spyod pa gsus// chos rnams du ma'i sgodag kyang/ 'dren pa khyed kyis bka' stsol cig/ sems can kun gyi smanapa'o// rkang gnyis rnams la snyan ston cig/
thub pa phung bo 'dIdog las// bdag gis zhu ba'i yul ma mchis// byang chub sems dpa' brtan rnams kyis// yul ni thams cad mkhyen pa lags// des
bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba'akhu/ 'od srungs chen po dang sa gcig pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs/
[s! ]@#/ dkyibu legs so legs so// rigs kyi bu khyed ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba'i mdo chen po las/ thams cad mkhyen pa dang/ thams cad mkhyen pa nang 'dri ba
mdzad pa bzhin du'adri ba ni legs te/ 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung mang po grangasamed pa'i byis snyad kyi rolan/ thams cad mkhyenang/ rang rang gi 'jig rten gi khams na bzhugs pa dag pa
dang thabs gcig tu byang chub kyishing drung du byang chub kyi phyir te/ byed chub tsam pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba bstan pa'i don du byang chub kyi phyi rol pa de bzhin du/ khyod kyang sems/
thams cad la phan pa'i phyir/ yon tan ming gcig ba'i tshul/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i yul 'drizhing 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'dras la/ 'od srungs chen pa dang rus gcig
bas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i yul zhu ba'i rngo mi thogasayod kyi/ cung zad gcig zhu bar 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das dper gsolan
sbrang bus gnas dang rgya mtsho'i pha mthar 'chi ba 'am rgya mtsho'i chab 'tshol ba'i rje thogs pa de ni mi srid lags so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du bdag ni sbrang bu dad 'dra la/ bcom ldan 'dasan
gnam dang rgya mtsho dang 'dra zhing/ shesazab mo'i chos dang ldan pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das dper gsol na/ rgyal bo'i gtsug gnor bu bkod paso rad ga spyi bos blangs pa bzhin du/
bdag gis kyang chos bka' stsal pa yang dag par blad bar 'tshalan/ shes rab rgya che ba bskyod pa'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyisamatshudab med
pa yongs su bshad du gsol/ bdag zhu bar 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu nyon cig/ las gang gis kyang byang chub sems dpa' chen bo mi
ring bar gyur ba dang/ las gang gis byang chub kyi rgyur 'gyur ba de/ gzungaba'i sems kyis nyon cig dang/ las kyi 'bras bu san/ byang chub kyi rgyu skye bar 'gyur ro// thos nas kyang gzhan dag
la ston cig rigs kyi bu sa kyang las de byas shing/ gzhan ngag la'ang bstan bas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par gyur to// rigs kyi bu dbaran ma la la zhig/
bu gcig pa thar par bya ba'i 'o/ rgyal po'i btson ra'i nang du 'gro ba de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dang 'tsherang bar 'dod pas kyang/ sems can thams cad la bugacig pa'i 'du shes bsgom
par bya'o// de ltar bsgomasan/ 'tshob thams cad spong bar 'gyur la// byams pa chen po dang/ snying rje chen bodang/ dga' ba chen po dang/ btang snyoms chen po dang ldan par 'gyur zhing/
srog gcod pa spong bar 'gyur ba dang/ chos spyod par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang sems can dpag tu med pa dag bslab pa'i gzhi la 'god par 'gyur/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam 'a ra
@#// 'god par 'gyur ro// gal te nus na sems can dmyal ba dang/ lha ma yin dang/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang/ dud 'gror skyes pa rnams dang/ lam mi bzad pa byed pa'i
[H ]sems can rnams nges par bsgral ba'i 'i/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi rjes su 'jug par byed cing grol nas gzhan dgro' bar bya'osnyam nas/ de la 'dzin pa dang dran pa'i sems dang ldan par
gyur te/ legs par byas pa'i rnam par smin pa dang/ rgyudangamathun ba des n/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams mchog tu tshe ring bar 'gyur la/ ye shes kyi dbang phyug tu
'gyur zhing/ 'chi ba med par 'gyura'o// danas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od srung chen po dang rus gcig pas 'di skad ces groso'i
te// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ru las bsams te/ sems can thams cad la bu gcig pa'i 'du shes bsgom par bgyi/ bka' stsal pa/ de'i
na ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dang 'a soms dpa' chen pos sems can thams cad la bu gcig pa'i 'du shes bsgom par bgyi'atshalan/ tshigadenisi
'dod par bgyi ba lags so// ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das bstan pa 'di la sems can kha cig tshul khrims 'chal pa dang/ mtshams ma mchis par bgyid pa dang/ dam pa'i chos sun
'byin pa dag kyang mas na/ ci lags sems can de lta bu dag la'angadu gcig pa'i 'du shes bsgom par bgyi lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'od srungs chen po
dang sa gcig pa/ de lta les kyang yod/ ngani sems can thams cad la sgra gcan zin bzhin du lta'o// 'od srungs chen po dang sa gcig pas gsol pa// bcom ldan 'dasaM 'on bstan
par rdzogs pa'i 'khor dag pa rnams kyi belnga'i gso sbyong la bab pa'i tshe/ bzhon num grangs pa/ lus m sbyangs pa/ ngasnyen par ma rdzogs pa zhig rtsig pa'igrwa zhig tuyab ste nyan pa na/
de ci'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang nas/ gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po lagan rdo rje s rdul ba mo bzhin du phye mar brlags lags/ kye ma des de bkus pa nilagan rdo rje ha cang drags lagaso/
de lta na ji ltar bcom ldan 'das sems can thams nud la sgra gcan zin dang 'dra bar gzigs pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de skadam zer duge/ gzhon
nu de ni sngal pa yin te/ dam pa'i chos sun 'byed pa rnams tshar gcad pa dang/ bskrad par bya ba'i phyir/ gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po lag na rdo rjes de ltar bstan par zad kyi/ dam pa 'i tshes sun
phyung yang rung/ 'dod chen po'ang rung ste/ gsad du ma rung ngo// rgyu sogs pa'i srog gcod pa ni byed ma phod do// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang ji ltar rgyal po'am/ blon pa dag dam pa 'ches sun
'byin pa rlag par byed pa de bzhin du/ nga ni brlag par bya zhes mi zer modakyi/ dag nyid kyi chos ma yin pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du smin par zad do// de bzhi
gshegs pa thams cad mkhyen pa ni/ de rnams kyi don du ma 'jigs pa sbyin zhing/ 'od zer gcig ma/ gnyis gtod bar mdzad de/ gal te'o'i dog de dag la phog nani'atshir
'gyur/ de de bzhin gshegs pas ci byar yang med do// rigs kyi bu gozhan yang gal te khyod kyis brtag dka' blta bar nus pa blta nas/ sa khyod la rgyu gzhan yang bstan par bya ste/ yul
so son tshul khrims dang/ tsheg dang/ yon tan rnams tha dad pa mdo la/ rer de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu/ dge slong dag dam pa'i chos khol du 'byin pa
'dod pa la/ rgyal pos ston pa med pa'i phyir gnod pa byed pa las/ rgyal po de rgyal bo gzhan gyis bzlog ste/ des mthuchung bar byas nas rgyal po de chos la gnas par gyur na/ rgyal bo cig
shos de la bsod nams chen por 'gyur zhes nga skya'o// de ci'i phyir zhen/ rgyal po cig shos kyi nyes pa chen po'i gzhi bar byed pa'i phyir ro// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang dpe ran zhing ngam khyim du
dug shing dag/ se long skyes na/ rtsa nas dbyung dgos pa de bzhin du/ tshul khrims 'chal pa rnams dang/ a pa 'tshis sun 'byin pa rnams bran bzhin du tshar bcad par sa gnang ngo// gang
dag de rnams tshar gcod bar ma byed pa de dag ni/ da'i bstan pa la shin tu ring ba yin no// gang dag de rnams tshar gcod par byed pa de dag ni/ nga'i slob ma dang/ nga'i nyan thos yin no//
'od srungs chen po dang sa gcig pas gsol pa// gal te de bzhinagshegs pa de skad gsunganani/ sems can thams cad la sbya na zin bzhin du gzigs pa'i ng ma lags/
te'u dang tsanan lta bu zhes bgyi ba'i ming yang klag par 'gyur na/ dam pa'i chos sun 'byin pa'i rnams ji ltar tshar gcod pa'i rigs lags/ de bzhin gshegs pas de ltar bgyid du stsal ba'i
mi rigs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa la ba/ 'od srungs chen po dang rus gcig pa/ dper na khyim bdag gam/ tshong dpon nam/ sde dbon nam/ blon po 'ag
rgyal bo'ang rung ba zhig gis rang gi bu sdug cing 'phangs la/ mchog tu mdzes shing/ byagazugs phun sum tshogs pa rnams slob dpon gyi lag tu gtad nas/ slob dpon de la 'di skad ces
snas te/ bdag gi bu 'di rnams 'dulaM ba dang/ cho ga dang/ spyod yul dang/ rig pa rnams bslab pa'i phyir khyod la gtad kyiso/ 'di rnams khyod kyis 'dul ba dang/ tsheg dang/ sred sku la
dang / rig pa rnams slobs shig/ chogs shig/ gal te bdag gi bu 'di bzhi las/ gsum ni brdeg pa dang/ bsdigs pa dang/ tshar bcad rnams kyis shi bar gyur la/ gcig
ni/son por 'dug ste/ gcig ni lobs par gyur na/ gsum ni sha sheng bla ste ( gsum nishi/ gcig ni lobs ba de/ ci slob dan gyis sdig pa'i las byas zhes
bya ma/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags te/ de lan gnyis ka la'ang sdige pa'i las su mi 'gyur lags go/ de ci'i slad du zhen/ de lan khon gyi bsam pa ma mchis te/ de ltar bgyisan bsod
nas mang po 'phel bar 'gyur lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rigs kyi bu de bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni dam pa'i chos sun 'byin pa'i sems rgyun rnams la sgra
gtanazin bzhin du gzigs te/ bu rnams slob dpon gyi lag tu gtod pa bzhin du/ rgyal bo dang/ blon bo dang/ dge bsnyen rnams kyi lag tugatod bar mdzad d// de nas rgyal po dang/ blon po dang
dge bsnyen de dag gis byis pa g.yi la ba de dag tshar gcod par byed na/ ci de la de bzhin gshegs pa la sdig pa'i las su 'gyur zhes bya 'am/ bcom ldan 'das de ni malags te/ rgyal bo
dang/ blon bo dang/ dge bsnyen rnams la 'ang sdug pa'ilas su ma 'gyur na/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyes pa mi mnga' ba lta la/ gos par ga la 'gyur te/ de nyid kyi yon tan dang spyod pa srungs
tsha kha'i slad du/ ma 'dod bzhin dutshar gcod par bas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// de ltar na bu gcig pa'i 'du shesabasgom ba yin te/ gang dag de ltar bsgom pa de dag gis/
gcig pa 'i 'du shes sgom par 'gyur ro// de ltar byang chub sems dba'asems dpa' chen pos sems can thams cad la bu gcig pa'i 'du shes bsgom par bya'o// de ltar byas n sems
can thams cad la ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa sgom par 'gyur ro// des na mchog tu 'tshub med pa dag par 'gyur te/ des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de tshe ring ba dang/ mchog tu
tshering ba dang/ tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro// 'od srungs chen po dang rus gcig bas gsol// sems can thams cad la bu gcig pa'i 'du shes bsgoms nas/ byang chub sems dpar
sems dad 'a chen po rnams tshe ring bar 'gyur lags sam/ bcom ldan 'ad+ma kyis bka' stsal pa// de lta los kyang med/ 'od srungs chen po dang rus gcig pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das dper
gsal na/ gtam rgyud mkhan zhig gis ltad mo nga la 'khor gyi nang du/ ma la phud dud bya ba'i rigs pa'i gtam sna tshogs brgyas la/ rang gi khyim du mchis nas/ mchog tu dka' ba brgya bgyid pa'i/
ma la dbyug pa dang/ phrag dum dang/ bong ba dang/ rdo dag gis gnod pa bgyid pa de bzhinadu/ bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis bka' stsal pa/ sems can thams cad la bu gcig pa'i 'du shes bsgom/
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams tshe ring ba dang/ mchog tutshe ring ba dang/ tshor ba dran pa dang/ mi 'chiba'i dang/ ther zug pa dang/ brtan par gnas so zhes gsungs na
ci'i slad du bcom ldan 'das nyid sku tshathung lags/ ci slu bar mdzad dam/ 'on te bcom ldan 'dus nyid kyis sems can thams la sgra gcan zin bzhin du gzigs pas ma
gzigs sam/ kyam bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das kyis ni dga' ba mdzad de mi'i lta brtsin/ lo brgya yang mi thub ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'di kho na ltar sku tshe thung ba lags na/ bcom ldan
'das kyis sngon byang chub sems dpa' mdzad mdzad pa'itshe/ de snyad kyi srog gcig khacad lags/ de'i khog ltar sku tshe thung bu las na/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis mchog tu ma bzad pa'i las
mdzod pa lags drad/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'od srungs chen po dang dus gcig pa/ de bzhin gshegs ba dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la 'di kho/
na ltar rgya zhig/ ma rgya zhig/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sas rgyas ni mchog tu sku tshe ring ngo// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
pa'isangs rgyas ni mchog tubartan pa'o// mchog tu zhi ba'o// mchog tu ther zug pa'o/ mchog du rtag pa'o// 'od srungs chen po dang nus gcig pas gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das ji lta
nad bzhin gshegs pas mchog tu sku tshe ring lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'od srungs chen po dang rus gcig pa/ dparanAchu klung gang+gAdang ya mun dang/ sar yu dang 3
hid 'gu la sogs pa chu klung chen po rnams dung/ chu bran gzhan rnams rgya mtsho chen bo bona'i nang du 'bab pa de bzhin du/ 'od srungs chen po dang dus gcig pa/ lha yul dang sa'i steng gi tshe'i
chu klung yod docog thams cad nade bzhin gshegs pa'i rgya mtsho bonar 'bab ste/ de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa mchog tu sku tshar ng ngo// 'od srungs chen po dang rus gcig pa// gzhan yang

'di ltor chu klung chen po bzhim dros pa'i nang nas 'byung ba de bzhin du/ tsharing ba'i tshogs thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa las 'byung ngo// 'di ltar rtag pa thams cud kyi nang na ni/ namamakhar
mchog tu rtag pa yin la/ de bzhin gshegs po'ang nam mkha' bzhin du rtag go/ 'di ltar zhi bar byed pa thams cad kyi nang na ni/ mar 'bar zhig na chog tu zhi bar byed pa yin la/ de bzhin/
gshegs pa zhi ba dang bsil bar gyur pa 'ang mar dang 'dra ba'i chos ston to// 'od srungs chen po dang sa gcig pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te de na gshegs pa mtshog sku tshe
ring dab lags na/ sems can thams cad la snyan pa'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa lu lha bar lang yun ring du bzhugs shing/ srin chen po bzhin du dam pa'i tshes
kyi char yang rab tu dbab tugasol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'od srungs chen po dang rus gcig pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs/
@#// rgyas rnams la mthar thug par 'gyur ba'i 'du shes ma skyed cig/ 'od srungs chen po dang dus gcig ba/ 'din dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/
dge'anyi ma 'am/ 'di las phyi rol pa'i ng rung ste/ mngon pa shes pa lnga la dbang thob pa de'ang bskal pa 'ag/ bsal ba las lhag par gnas shing/ nam mkha' la'achag par/
yang byed/ nyal bar yang byed la/ mchan gyi g.yon lags nas me dang 'dra bar 'bar bar byed pa dad/ de bzhin du chos gzhan du dud ba 'thul ba lta bur yang ston/ tsha'atshod kyang rjesrid du
pa/ 'dod pa de srid du snur bar byed do// mdor na jitsam du 'dod pa dang/ ji tsam du dga' ba de tsam du ston par byed de/ 'di dag ni mngon pa shes pa lnga la dbang theb pa'ilon tan yin no// gal
de mngon par shes pa lnga thob pa'i ng de ltar bdaganyid 'tsho ba'i dbang phyug la dbang byed na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dbang du ma bstod pa lta ca ste/ de lta bu la mnga' ma mdzad/ de bzhin gsheg
pa bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa las lhag par ci ste mi bzhugs kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pa dang/ brtan pa dang/ ther zug pa yin par bod du chud par gyis shig/ 'jig/
rten 'don sprul pa'i lus ni sha'i lus ma yin te/ dang de bzhin gshegs pa dug sman la rton pa'i sku khongs su 'dor bar mdzad do snyam du'ang khong du chud par gyis shig/ rtag ba dad/
brtan pa dang ther zug ces bya ba'i bstan pa mchog la'ang brtson par gyis shig/ 'od srungs chen po dang dus gcig pas gsol pa/ gal te de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pa lags na/ 'jig
rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa khyad par ci mchis lags/ 'jig rten pa'i ng bdag cag gi tshangs pa ni rtag pa ste/ thog ma'i dus nas byung ba yin no zhes mchis pa dang khyad par ni
mchis/ gal te de bzhin gshegs rtag pa lags na/ khyad par ma mchis par 'gyur lags so/// 'phags pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa theg pa
chen po'i mdo las bam po bzhi pa// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rigs kyi bu dpar na tshong dpon nam/ khyim bdag gcig lab gleng sna tshogs spu mdog dug/
rigs dang rgyud mang po khyu gcig cing/ lhas gcig pa du ma bye ba snyad yod la/ sa nga glang de dag ba glang rdzi'i lag tu gtad de/ mar zhim po za la/ ba glang rje rnams kyang lhas skyong zhing/ no
dang 'o mas srub ba las/ phyi zhig na ba glang gi bdag po de rang gi tsha'adanas 41ste/ shi ba'i 'og tunagasan rgyu ba'achom shod kyis ba glang de dag phrogos nas/ de dge chung ma med pas/ rang
rang gis 'o ma srubs te/ de dag gis bsrubs pa las 'os ma yin pa'i phyir/ 'om de dag las mar gyi dri'i ngam grol/ zhor yang ma rung/ dar bar yang ma rung/ phris mar yang ma rungan
mar du lta ga la 'gyur te/ 'o ma'i rang bzhin las kyang nyamasanas/ dengag gis de chus bslad de/ bdag gis mar longs spyad par bu'o// bdag gis mar longs sprad/
par bu'o snyam dusams pa bzhin du/ 'jig rten pa sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi rgyu mthun pa las byung ba/ nor dang chos rgyas pa rnams kyang de dang 'dra ste/ gang gtsosangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dasa rnam pa/
glang gi lhas kyi bdag po bzhin du/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu 'jig rten pa chom shod dang 'dra ba rnams kyis kyang/ tshul khrims dang/ cho ga dang/ 'dul ba dang/ skyed yul rnams
dang/ sems can gyi khams gud du bsgyur nas/ sems can yod do// srog yod do// gang zag yod do snyam du sems shing/ thar ba ni 'di lta bu zhig go/ spyod pa ni 'di lta bu zhig go snyam nas/
stod pa dang/ sems can dang/ thar par dang/ rtag pa dang de kho na nyid ma shes te/ nagazhan la brtson pas thar pa'i ng ma'i thog la/ tshul khrims dang/ cho ga dngo/ sdod yul dang 'dul ba

dang rtag pa dang/ de khon nyid kyang m snyed de/ mi rgod kyi mar bzhin du 'jig rten pa rnams kyis chos kyi de khon nyid ma 'thob la// de dag sems can tshangs pa spyal pani rtag go snyam du 'dzin cing/

bdag ni thar ba yin no snyam du'ang 'dzin la/ ma shod pa rnams kyi'am bzhin du de khon mi shes so// de dag tshangs par spyod pa'i rgyu dang/ gzhan gyi chung ma sngaso pa'i rgyu dang/ pha ma la budadud
byas pa'i rgyusan/ tshom yod pa rnams kyis 'o ma ma rung ba'i lhag ma tsam zhig yod pa bzhin du/ mtho ris kyi bde ba cha shas tsam zhig thob ste/ longs spyod par byed la/ de dag gis bag la
phud du du bya ba ji lta bu yin pa'i ng ma shes/ gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba ji lta bu min par ng mishes/ gzhan gyi chung maspang ba dzilta bu yin pa'i ngam shos/ rtagad ji lta bu yin pa'i ng mi
shes so// de la sangs rgyas kyi sul ba nis rtag pa yin/ brdzun pa yin te/ des na 'jig rten pa rnams de bzhin gshegs pa mi rtog go/ mi brtan nosnyam du 'dzin// de bas na ma rtog pa'i
gnyan bor de bzhin gshegs pa rtagi go zhes bya ba la brtson par bya'o// rigs kyi bu de nas paglang gi lhas de'i skal ba can gyi 'khor la sgyur ba'i rgyal bo 'jig rten du byung la/ chom shod pa de dag
gis kyang/ 'khor la sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i bsod nams kyi mthus der ba glang gcig kyang med par mi byed do// de nas nags na rgyu ba'i tshes shod pa de dag gis ba glang gil sa de bor nas de 'gro bar
'gyur ro// de nas 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal bo'i khyim bdag rin po ches// ba glang gi lhas de nyams su len par 'gyur te/ khyim bdag rin po che des rang gi blos ba glang gi lhas de'i lo ma'i de kho na
nyid kyi thabs shes par 'gyur lo/ bo rnams kyi 'o ma'ang 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i bsod nams kyis nyis 'gyur du bzher lod pa de bzhin du/ chos kyi 'khor lo sgyur ba'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten du
byung nas/ ba glang gi lhas dang 'dra ba'i 'jig rten pa thams cad yongs su 'dzin par mdzad pas na/ rtag pa'i skrun de bzhin gshegs pa 'ba' zhig gi rjes su mthunagyis/
kaM 'jig rten pa tshem shod dang 'drab rnams kyisan sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang/ rtag kyi gnas kyang thos par mi 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i na thos rnams ni/ khyim bag rin po bzhin du
dam pa'i chos kyi ba glang gi lhas nyams su len par byed de/ sems can bsod nams dang ldan pa rnams kyi don du chos kyi 'o ma 'jo bar byed do// rigs kyi bu rgyu des na de bzhin gshegs pa
rtag pa dang/ brtan pa dang/ ther zug pa yin la/ 'jig rten pa rnams lani rtag pa'i chos med do// rtag pa'i sgra de de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas rnams 'ba' zhig la yod dus
nga zer ro// de ltar na rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni rtag pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni ther zug pa'o zhes de ltar shes par gyis
shage/ sems can gang dag rtag ces bya ba'i yi ge gnyis bsgom pa de dag ni ring po mi thogs pa kho nar nga'i go 'phangs dang lhag chad med pa thob par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu gang gi tshe
rtag go zhes bya ba'i yi ge gnyis bsgom pa nub par 'gyur ba de'i tsho/ de bzhin ga shegs pa yodas mya ngan 'da' bar 'gyur te/ don sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos da do// gsol pa/ bcom ldan
'das sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos nyid ces bka' stsa la pa de'i don ni lags/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni chos glengs pa 'di rtogs par 'tshalan/ bcom ldan 'das kyis tshig 'di lta bu lag
pa rgyas par bshad du gsol/ bam ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// chos nyid kyis bya ba ni lus yongs su 'dor ba ste/ lus yongs su 'dor ba zhes bya ba de ni smad pa'i tshig yin par
shes par gyis shig/ gsol pa/ de bzhin gshegs pas skya bor nas slar yang sku len ma ma len pa bdag zhu lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ rigs kyi bu/
de skad ma zer cig/'di ni chos nyidi gcod pa yin te rigs kyi bu dpor na 'du shes med rnams la gzugs kyi phung po gnyis medan/ sems can de dag ji ltar gnas/ ji ltar dga'/ ji
ltar snang/ de dag gi 'du shes ji ltar 'jug ces 'drib 'di ni/ sangs rgyas kyi yul nano// rigs kyi bu 'du shes med pa'i lha rnams kyigazugs dang/ gnas dang/ spyod lam dang/
bde ba rnams ji ltar bstan par bya zhes/ phyin chad de skad ma 'dri zhig/ 'di ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yul ma yin te/ 'dan sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul yin no// rigs kyi bu de ltar
na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni sangs rgyas 'ba' zhig gi yul yin gyi/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yul ma yin no// de bzhin gshegs pa gang na gnas pa dang/ gang na snang
bani khyod kyi yul yang ma yin gyis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dasan thabs bsam gyis ma khyab pa'i sku yin nosAm du khyed kyis gnas par gyis shig/ rigs
kyi bu chos dang dge slong ga deg 'dun la'ang rtag pa'i 'du shes yang dang yang du spego ba rgyushig/ gzhi gsum la tha dadapar ma byed cig/ mi rtag pa'i m/ mang rtan pa 'ag/ ther zug
pa ma yin pa 'am/ ni bam yin na/ thar pan na ba'in par yang ma sgoms shig/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang dug gzhigasum gyi bdag nyid chen po la de ltar mi
sgom pa de dag skabs su 'gro bdag pa yin no zhes nga zer ro// de ltar na rtag pa bsgrub ba na/ bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ rigs kyi bu dper na shing yon grib ma bod kyi/ shing mdan grib ma
med ba de bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs ba rtag pa dang skyabs su 'gyur gyi/ gal te mi rtagan/ lha dang mi rnams kyi skyabs su 'os pa ma yin no// gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das dul gas/
mtshan mo mun pa'i nangan/ shing ljon pa'i gribamasnang zhes bgyi 'og mi snang zhes bgyi/ bka' stsal pa/ 'od srungs chen po dang rus gcig pa/ bde ldan ba yod pa'i grib ma ci'i phyir med
ces brjod par bya'o// de ltamod kyisha'i ge gson miethong ste/de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i ng rtag ga dang/ ban ba dang ther zug ba yin te/ ther zug pa yin gyisakyang/ mtshan mo mun pa 'i
nangan/ shing ljon pa'i grib ma sha'igisogs ma mthong ba de bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pa yongs sumun las 'da' bar mdzad pas/ rtag ba dang/ brtan ba dang/ ther zug pa yin bzhi/
du/ mtshan mo mun pa'i nang na/ shing ljon pa'i grob ma ltar mi snang ba ltar/ sems can rnams de bzhin gshegs pa mi rtag gsAm du yongs su rtag go/ gal te nga dang/ chos dang/ dge
'dun rtag pa'i 'du shes khyod kyi pha ma la medan gsum la skyabs su 'grob ma dag go zhes ng zer ro// pha ma la gnyis la gzhigasum rtag ra bstananani/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po gsum la skyabs su song ba'adege bsnyen zhes bya ba'i me khyod kyis thob par 'gyur ro// gsol pa// deng slan chad bdun rgyud kyi riges tshun chadadang/ ba ma gnyisel/ bcom ldan 'das
chos dang dge 'dun rtag go zhes bgyi bar 'tshal la// kye ma sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dasan bsam gyis mi khyab bo zhes kyang bslab par 'tshal lo// gzhan dag la'ang bstan par 'tshal lo//
gang dag bdagagis bstan pa ltar mi 'dzin cing/ mi rtag par skya ba'i sems can ngan pa de dag lani bdag gis ser babazhin du bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'dras sa bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu lag
so lags so// a ba'i tshes bsrung ba'i rigs lus ni de ltar bya dgos te/ rigs kyi bu 'od legs so// de ltar n 'tshob med la zhugs pa yin te/ 'tshob med pa'i las kyi 'bras bu
chen bo des n/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams tshe'ang ring bar 'gyur la/ tshar bas kyang dran par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das
pa theg pa chen po 'amado las 'tshob med pa'i phung po'i le'u ste dang po'o// rigs kyi bu de ni de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pa'i sku dang/ mi shigs pa'i skudang/ rdorje'i sku dang/
'asha'i sku ma yin pa dang/ chos kyi skur ltos shog/ gsolar// gal te de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar mdzad na ni/ bodag de ltar mi la lags so// gal te ngos su
mya ngan las 'da' bar gyur na/ gzhog du rung ba'i sku dang/ thal ba'i sku dang/ sha'i skur blta bar 'tshal le// bka' stsal pa// rigs kyi bu mi'i lta bur sob sob pa'i lus dang/ gzhig
tu rung nga'i lus zhes des d na ster cig/ 'od srungasaMchen po dang sa gcig pa// de bzhin gshegs pani bskal pa bye ba phrag du ma nas mi shigs pa'i sku dang ldan zhing mi'i lus ma yin/ lha'i
lus ma yin/ srid pa thams cad kyi lus ma yin/ sha'i lus m yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa'i sa med pa/ ma skyes pa/ ma 'gags pa// dad pa ma yin pa// 'jug pa med pa/
mthar thug pa med pa// gnas pa med pa/ rnam par shes pa med pa/ kun tu spyod pa med pa// shin tudag pa/ ci'ang ma yin pa/ sin bam yin pa/ rkang pa med pa// gnas pa med pa//
'gyur ba med pa// myong ba med pa/ ma 'dres pa// ma shes/ shes par byar med pa// rnam par rig tum bzodapa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa// bsamadu med pa// rnam par shes pa med pa/
sams dang bral ba/ sems mnyam pa nyid/ soms mnyam pa nyid du 'gro ba/ 'bab pa med pa// 'ong ba dang 'gro ba yongs su chadapa/ ma bcad pa/ bcad dumed ba/ glags med pa/
rdzas ma yin pa/ ma byung ba/ spyod pa med pa// rtog pa med pa// mde med pa// yongs su ma grub pa/ myong ba ma yin pa/ mi mngon pa/ yul med ba/ gzhi med pa/ mun pa med pa/
snang ba med pa/ zhi ba ma yin pa// rab tu zhi ba ma yin pa// zhi ba dang bral ba/ dag pa/ rnam par dag pa// ci'ang med pa/ len pa med ba/ chags pa med pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa/ nyonamang
pa dang bral ba/ mi gnas pa'i tshul gyis gnas pa/ gzung du med pa// 'pho ba med pa/ 'bo bar byar med// chos ma yin pa/ chos ma yin pamed// zhing ma yin pa/ zhing du ma gyur pa
yin pa/ mazod pa// thad par bya med pa// bod pa dang bral ba/ bod pa mad pa/ skad cig pa/skad cig pa dang bral ba/ skad cig pa ma yin pa/ ma 'khrugs pa/ yi ge dang thig le
