dang mo'u 'gal gyi bu gnyis ci'i slad du nyan thos kyi yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bas yongs su mya ngan las 'das lags/ rang sangs rgyas rnams kyang ci'o smad du'ang sangs rgyas rnams kyi yongs su mya ngan

las 'da' bas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ra bgyid lags/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang phyi'i slad du byang chub sems dang 'i yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen pos yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa ra
bgyid lags// bka' stsal pa/ sangs rgyas rnams kyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po ni nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ma yan te yongs su mya
ngan las 'das pa chen po 'di la ni sangs rgyas rnams ma gtogs par gzhan dag gi gnas med do// gsol pa/ ji lta bu lags/ bka' stsal pa// de bzhin gshegs pa ni bska la ba bye ba phrag grangs med
pa mang po zhig na de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung bar ston par mdzad na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang/ nyan thos rang/ rang sangs rgyus dang/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la khyad par ci yod ce na/ ragis

kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa gsang ba la dgra bcom pa rnams kyi gnas med do zhes pas bstan to/ zhi gnas mad pa yin no// dengasan yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'imado chen po 'di'i tshul
gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po la gnas med do// de bas na yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po zhes bya'o// gsol pa/ tha dadapa kho ra gda' lags so// bka' stsal
ra nga ji ltar snang/ gso lapa/ nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang yongasasu mya ngan las 'das pa chen pos yongs su myang n las 'das par 'gyur te/ chu klung
rnams rgya mtshor 'bab pa bzhin du de dag gi gnas kyang de dag lags so// de bas de dag kyang rtag pa zhes bgyi'o// bka' stsalapa/ de dag ni nga'i mchog turtag pa yin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
khams tha dad pa ma mchis pa dang thadadapa ji lta bu lags/ bka' rtsam pa/ gnas skabs thadad do// gso la pa/ ji lta bu lags/ bka' la ba/ dper na ba'i 'o man mchog du mngar ba yin te/

wa khams kyang de dang 'dra'o// nyan thos rnams dang/ rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi khamasazhi sha dang 'dra'o// byang chub se mas dpa' rnams kyi khams na mar dang 'dra'o// sangs rgyas rnams kyi khams rnams gyi re
khu dang 'dra ste/ de ltar yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po las gdams ngag ston pa'i de bzhin gshegs pas rnam pa bzhi'i bstan to// gsolal/ bcom ldan 'das la gsan thams cad kyi khams ji lta bu

lags/ bka' stsal nga/ ba be'u 'brangs ma thag ba'i 'o ma khrag dang 'dres pa bzhin du / nyon mongs pa'i khrag dang 'dres pa'i khams des/ de bzhin gshags pa'i khams mar gyi nying khu dang 'ang nga lab pa /

bdug go/ gsol la/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ku sha'i grong khyer 'di na gnas ba'i gdol pa 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i sangs rgyas stong dang lhan cig tu de dag ginang du dar zhin gshegs pa gcig pur 'gyur te de

ba zhegshegs ba'ang tu dga' ba zhes bya bar 'gyur te/ sems skyed pa gcig kho nas dus 'di rtsog na myur du sangs rgyas su 'gyur zhis sangs rgyas su lungabastan pas lung pa ston lags na/ci'i tshad// shAri'i bu dang/
mo'u 'gal gyi bu gnyis ches myur du sangs rgyas su 'gyur bar sangs rgyus su lung bstan pas lung ma bstan lags/ bka' stsal pa/ nyan thos dang/ rang sangs dang/ byang chub sems dpa' kha cig

dam pa'i chos 'byung ba'i phyir tshun ring por son lam 'debs pa'i ng yod kha tsag no myur bar smon lam 'debs pa'i ng yod de/ ngani de'i smon lam gyi dbang gsan nas myur bar sangs rgyas kyi gnas mchog tu lung

ston par byed de// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang mnyan pa chen po la la zhage gangol pa'i grong khyer du song ste/ rin po che rin thang med pa 'tshong ba las/ gdol pa bye brag mi phyed pa de dag gis rin po chade ma thong na

'phyas 'dogs shing 'agling skad byed de/ mnyanar sa'one che ba yazhe no zhes byas kyang de dag gis brda mi phrad nas 'dinishil yin no zhes de skad kyang zer ro// rigs kyi bu de bzhin du ngas kyang nyan thos rnams la gal te/

sangs rgyas kyi gnas su myur du sangs rgyas su lung bstan pas lung bstan du zin kyang nor bu dkon pa 'tshong ba'i mnyan pa bshazhe du 'gyur ro// gdol pa rnams lta bu zhi ma 'ongs pa'i dusazha dag sbyong blun po g.yel ba//
dge ba'i rtsa ba spangs pa 'chongs baphongs pa/ bkres shing skom ras gzir ba/ mu ges mar ba/ rang gi lus tsam gtso bor byed pa/ 'tsho ba don du gnyerab/ mibartan pa rnams

'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag yan te/ de dag gsenga'i nyan thos lung bstan pa thos na 'phyas 'dogs shing gshibar 'gyur la/ brdami phrad pa nas tshul khrims 'chal pa yin no zhes bya bar byed do// nga'isha thos de dag zhi dag

sbyong ma yin te/ gdol pa rnams dang mnyan pa ji lta ba bzhin no// rigs kyi bu de bas na ngan de mas can myur ba'i smon lamacan rnams ni sangs rgyas su lung ston par byed do// dam pa'i chos 'byung nga'i sbyor ba can

@# de dag zhi ji ltar 'dod pa pa[R]du yun rade mo shog gse sangs rgyas kyi gnas su lung ston par byed do// gsol nga/ ji ltar n byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams g.yog 'khor ma phyed pa dang ldan pa ra
'gyur lags/ bka' stsal pa// byang chub sems dpa' mi mchog rnams ni dmara'i chos dbyung bar bya'o snyam du de'i sbyor ba brtan por byas na/ g.yog 'khor mi phyed pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro// gsol pa/
sems can ma rungs pa/ 'jigs su rung ba/ lce dang/ rkan dang/ lkog ma tshig pa rnams tsa las 'gyur lags/ bka' rtsal ba/ gzhi gsum mi shes po gang yane pa de dag ni/ sems can ma rungs pa/'jig

su rung ba/ lce dang/ rkan dang/ lkog ma tshag par 'gyur ro// dare ra na mdang dud 'gro lci tshig pa rnams kyisarojug ste/ mngar ba dang/ skyurab dang/ lan tshwa'i re dong tshab dang kho ba dang/ bas ba/

sa rnams za ban/ ro'o bye brag mi phyed rang de bzhin du/ sems can mi shes ba lcenang/ rkan dang/ lkog ma tshag pa/ ma rungs pa/ 'jigs su rung ba/ gzhi gsum pa rtag par ma shes pa gang yin pa de dga'//

lce dang/ rkan dang/ lkog ma tshig pa zhes bya'o// jags kyi khyo ga zhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa rtag par mi shes pa gang yin pa de dag zhi dmus lengogi mchog yin no zhes nga zer ro// de bzhin gshegs pa rtag par

shes pa gang yin pa de dag rnapesha'amag dang ldan pa yazhedu zinakyang lha'i mog dang ldan r yin no zhes nga zeraro// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang mdo sde 'di thos nas re bzhazhigshegs pa rtag bsheng nge khong dachun pa

gang yin pa de dga'i lha'i mig dang ldan pa yin no zhes nga'a'o// lha'i mog dang ldan pa yon du zin kyang de bzhin gshegs pa rtag bar chishes pa'i ng yin par dgasha' mog dang ldan pa ya'i go sar zer ro// de dgazhi da dung bskal

pa byeb mang por yang bdag gamagomajug rtso badra ba'ang mthong ba 'am bstan mi nus te/ de bas de dga' ril yone gshegs pa brtag par bsgoms pa dang bral ba'i phyi'i sha'i mig dang ldan pa zhes ng zer ro// rigs kyi

bu gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'isangs rgyas ni 'joge rtan thams cad kyi pha ma lta bu yin no// ci'i phyir zhen/ sems can rkang gnyis dang rkang mangs thams cad la rang
ga yul bzhon du chos ston cing/ tshig gcig gis sems can thams cad kyis rang rang gi yul bzhin du shes par 'gyur te/ kye ma bdag cag gi rang bzhazhidang/ 'du shes rnam rtogab byapa'i phyi ste gto ma
du 'dzin to// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang dparan khyim bdag gam tshong dbon yang rung// rang gi bu zla ba bcu drug lon pa dang/ lhan cig tu skyugs pa bzhin du sba bar byed de/ de'i dar
gsebu de'i mi'i skad slob par byed na/ tsade'i pha lkugs pa zhes bya 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de nim lags ti/ bu de'i dbang gso bgyid par blta lags so// bka' tsayab/ rigs kyi bu

tsa de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i ng lkugs pa bzhin du gsungasko/ sems can thams cad dam pa'i chos la dgod pa'ired lta bu'i sku ston par mdzad na/ tsa de bzhashegshegs la'ang skugs pa zhes bya 'am//
gso la ba/ bcom ldan 'das de na logs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni rtag tu seng ge 'i sgra sgrogs pa lags na/ lkugs pa ltar gsung ba de ni 'jig rten dang mthun par mdzad par bltabar bgyi lags so//

dezhas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi zhal nas 'od zer sna tshogs bkyalta/ 'od zer de dag gis mgar ba'i bu tsund la phog nas/ kum de bzhin gshegs pa la phyin chadadabul du med pa'i sbyin pa'i dkon/

zlab yin no snyam nas/ shin tu ris par de bzhin gshegs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa tsham par 'gyur ba'i zhal zas sbyarati/ rang gi 'khor rnams dang lhan cig du ring bar 'dzam bu chu klung gi gsar dri ma/

pa'isnod dkyil du nor bu'i 'bur mthon po 'od can gyis smras pa rnams dang/ gtsage ni dngul gyi snod rin po che snatshog sakyis sngaa ba rnams zhal zas skyarum sna tshogs dang sbyar bas bkang ba dang/ mchod ba'i yi khyad chang/

po dag khyer nas grong khyer gyi bar nas byang ste bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der chas so// de nas lha'i bu mthu chen po dang ldan pa rnams kyis mgar ba'i bu tsun du la bskor nas 'di skad ces smras so// tshun ra re zhig zhal
sa ma dbul bar de bzhin gshegs pa thang cage zhog cig ces byas so// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de kyi 'od zer dag bkye ste/ 'od zab de dag gise lha'i bu rnams la phog nas tsun da btang ngo//

de nas lha la sogs ra der 'dus pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa chen po byas te/ tsun da dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du dong nas 'di skad cesagasol to// dge slong

rnams kyi gdugs tshod la bab na gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ de nas dge slong rnams kyis gdugs tshod la bab par shes nas spyod lam bzang bor byas te/ lhung bzed lag tu blangs nas sdod do// de nas ma gaba'i

bu tsun sa seng ga'i khri sna tshogs tshig tu bzlas te'ang mi nus// 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can gyi rkyenadu rung nga lta bu dag kyang bshams/ zhal zas kyang sta gon byas nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
gso la to// de bzhin gshegs pa bskal pa 'am/ bskal ba las lhag par yang yun ring du bzhugs su gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ tsun da gal teng yun ring du 'dug par bdod na/

sprin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa tha ma'i dus la babakyigyur du phul cig/ de nas lha dang/ ma thams cad dang/ byang chung sems dpa' rnams kyis 'di skad ces smras so// kyematsun da skyod de ba 'dis phul ba'i zhal zas
tha// de bzhin gshegs pas gsol bar chad pa lta/ bdagacagan dpal yon mad de/ bdag cag gis zhal zas sta gon byas pa 'don med par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi

ba spu'i khung bu thams cad nas baspu re re'i khung bus kyang sangs rgyas rar mngon du sprul nas/ der 'kho'i re 'azhing du'ang de bzhazhig shigs pa re'i dge slong gi reg 'dun dang bcas pa bshos gsol ba lta bur bstan
to 'dabazhin gshegs panyide rnatsun nas phul ba'i zhal zas gsol lo// tsun jis 'bras sA lu yul ma ga ng+ha'i na la ta brgyad las zhal zas gyur ba'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus dge slong gi dge 'dun

thams cad zhal zas kyis byed par mdzad do// de nas tsun da'ang dga' bar gyur te/ bdag gi sbyonepa de bzhin gshegs pa'i dge slong gi dege 'dun dngabacas pas gsolazhas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar mdzad
dosnyam mo// 'khor de dag thams cad kyang 'di snyam du sems to/ bdag cag gis yul ba'i zhal zas de bzhin gshegs pas bzhes kyis/ tsun da'i mabazhes so// bdag cag gse phul ba'i zhal zas
gsol nas de bzhin gshegs pa yongs sumya ngan las 'da' bar mdzad dosnyam ste/ mchog tu dga' bar gyur to// 'khor chen po denade bzhin gshegs pa rnams bshos gsol nangeb zhugs pa'i bsamA

smyung bu'i rtse mo'i khyon tsam gyis chod par snang ngo// kha cigen rab kyi rtse mo'i khyon tsamagyos phyogs dag na bzhugs shing zhal zas dang mchod pa rnams 'dra bar mnga' bar snang ngo// de nas de'i tshe lha dang//
mi dang/ lha ma yin de dag ngu zhing cho nge 'don par byed de/ bdag cag gi so so nas phul ba'i zhal zas gsol nas de bzhin gshegs pa yosasu myongan las 'da' 'o// phyin chad bdag cag gis su la zhal/
zas dbul par bya/ bdag cag ni zhe gon dang bral te mgon med par 'gyur ro zhes 'dzer to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ babor de dag thams cad la tshigs su bcad pa 'di deg gsungs so//
'phags pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa theg pa chen po'i mdo las bam po btsugasum pa ste tha ma'o// sangs rgyas chos nyid 'di yin gyis// gdung zhing du bar ma byed/
ci// ngan myang n 'da' ba na// bskal pa bye ba zad par 'gyur/ nga yi rtag bde dam pa yi// mya ngan 'da' ba nga las nyon// ngan khazas mi za ste// grub tshar yong gsemad// sems can kun la phan bde
ba'i rjes su yi rang ngas bshad kyis// thos nas yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas// rtag pa de 'debs par gyis// gang tsho 'ug pa bya rog rnams// shang gcig la ni gnas nias kyang// spyan dang budang 'dra
bar ni// phan tshun rtag tu tshim par byed// de tshe sgra gcan zin bzhin du// de bzhin gshegs pas sems can gzigs// sems can kun gyi mchog gyur pa// gtan du mya ngan 'da' sa grongs// gang

tshe sbrulo dngane'u le dag/ shingegatsag drung du gnas nas kyang// spyan dang bu dang 'dra bar no// phan tshun rtag tu tshim par byed// de tshe sgragacan zin ba'i du// de bzhin gshegs pas sems can gzigs//
sems can kun gyi mchog gyur pa// gtan du mya ngan 'da' bas grongs// gang tshes ba rta par n yin// me tog kha bshi' dri'i 'gyuratshore// kar ka yiyeshing rnams las// tani tu ka yi 'bras
! bu 'byung// de tshe sgra gcan zin bzhin du// de bzhin gshegs pa bsam can gathags// sems can kun gyi mchog gyur pa// gtan du mya ngan 'da'ababa'agrengs// gang che sdig can 'dod chen po// byang
chub mngon par rdzogs 'tshang rgya// mchog tu bde nga thob nas kyang/ nyes pa thams cad rnam spangs pa// de tshe sgra gcan zin badzazhedu// de bzhin gshegs pas sems can gzigs// sems can kun gyi
mchog gyur pa// gtan du mya ngan 'da' bas grongs// gang tshe sems can thams cad ni// bsam pa mthun par gnas gyur te// byang chub mchog tu rdzogs sangs rgyas// nyes pa thams cad rnam spangs pa//
du tshe sgra gcan zin bzhin du// de bzhin gshegs pas de nas can gzigs// sems can kun gyi mchog gyurang// gtan dumya ngan 'da' sa grongs// gang tshe sbrangabu gcan tsam gyis// rgya mtsho bzhi yi man
zla glas pa// nags tshal ra rnams bcas ba yake/ sa gzhi ngoms par gyur pa na// de tshesgragacan zan bzhin du// de bzhin gshegs pas sems can gzigs// sems can kun gyi mchog gyur nga// gtan dumya

angan 'da' bas grongs// de bas na chos dang ldan pa/ chos la gus pa rtsed mya ngan ma byed cig/ mang zhig/ de bzhin gshegs pan rang la dbang yodachus mi rtag pa'i 'du shes ma byed par rtag pa dang/ ther zug pa
dang mchog tu brtan pa yazhe par yang dag par ltosangashog/ gzhi gsum rtag pa'i gsang sngags kyi sba ba dang/ bsrung ba 'di srung bar gyis shig/ gzhi gsum rtagar gsang sngags kyis ni/ gnam lcags

kyis tshig pa'ishang rnams kyang skye bar 'gyur te/ yal ga phre'u dang/ sngal mig bye ba dang/ lam la 'bus pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro// 'khor bzhi po las gzhi gsum rtag par rjes su yi rang ba'i gtam 'di yan

tshunas nas/ byang chub kyisams skye mi dgos par 'dzin kyang gzhi gsum mchog tu rtag pa'i rgyus na/ byang chub kyi rgyur skyo bar 'gyur te/'di ni sengs rgyas kyi rjesasu yi rang zhes bya'o// gzhi gsum rtag pa las/

byungapa'i rjesau ya nga ba 'di dge slongangam/ dge slong ma gang dag sems can rnams la ston par byed pa de dgan yul 'khor gyi bsod snyoms thabar 'osar yon no// cig shos dgazhi 'os pa ma yin no// ji ltar rjes su yir ba
'dis gdol pade 'jig rten thams cad du bde bar gyur ba'i chos kyi bden pa des na/ dam pa'i chos 'dod pa rnams la bgegs med pa dang/ gnodapa med par gyur cig/ de nas lha dang/ lha ma yin dang/

mi dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis de bzhin gshegs pa rtag par khong du chud nas/ thab tu dga' ba'i sems dang/ dge ba'i sems dang/ sgrib pa dang bral ba'i sems dang/ gzhol ba med pa 'i soms dang/ pad+ma
kha bye ba lta bu'i bzhin dang ldan par gyuranas lhu'i mchod pa chen po'i las byas te/ ma tog dang/ phyam dang/ bdugapa dang/ smos kyis bsgo ba la sogs pas gtor to// sil snyan la sogs pa'i ng
dkrol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dar 'a sems dpa' chen po 'od srungs chen po dang rus gtsag pa la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis deng 'dir ngom
rmad du byung ba ci mthong/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis sngon lan 'ga' yang ma mthong ba'i ngomatshar rmad du byung ba mthong ste/ 'khor reras phul ba'i zhal zas de bzhin gshegs pa re re dag

sa slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas ra sa gsol bo mthong lags so// 'khor 'di ni sbyar bu'i rtse mo tsam gyi khyon dag la 'ang ji ltar bshams ra 'i gdan dag de bzhin gshegs nga sku chen po du ma bde bar bzhugs te/ rjes
su yi rang ba bcu gsum gyi tshags su bcad pa dag ston cing bzhugs pa mthong lags so// sems can thams cad kyis ni sgyu 'phrul 'dis 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das ni bdag gis phul ba'i zhal zas gsol ba
@# pa zhugs so snyam du 'dzin lags so// mi mchog byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la sogs pas ni/ tsun ras de ltar 'bras sA lu yul mal d+ha na la ta brgyad la zhal

rdzo/zas sgyur ba'ang rdul tsam yang dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mi gsol pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa zhal zas ma gsol ba'i ya mtshan rmad du byung ba 'di yang dag par 'tshal te/ 'di'i thabs tsam du mdzad

[& ]dpar bas so snyam du sems lags so// nyan thosakyi tshogs rnams kyis ni kye ma de bzhin gshegs pa ni dpag tu du ba dang drug pa lags so snyam du ma 'tshal lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ mgar ba'i

bu tsun dal bka' stsam pa/ tsun da khyod kyis ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba ca mthong/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sngar de bzhin gshegs pa ma tshun gyi mchog sum cu rtsa gnyis dang/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad/
cumanga' ba du ma mthong pa las/ da ni nga rang gi bsgyur nas 'dzin byeng chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus chen po lus chen ngodapa tu snang lags so// de bzhin gshegs pas dug sman gyi sdong po

lta bu'i sku gcig pur gyur te byang chub sems dang 'a rnams kyis bskor bar ga nga' lags so// bka' stsal pa/ sangs rgyas snga ma gang yin pa de dag wa se mas can thams cad la phan pa dang/ bde ba dang/
yade dga' bar bya ba dang/ bsod nams mi zad pa ra bya ba'i phyir sprul pa yin te/ sgyu 'phrul 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams ma gtogs par sems tsan rnams kyis mi shes so// de ltar na byang chub
sams dpa'i spyod pa ni dpag tu med do// de ltar n byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams Mzhi dpag tu med do// byang chub sems drapa' mi mchog rnams la sangs rgyas kyis rnamapar 'phrul pa'imadzuyod do//
mgar ba'i bu tsun da'ang byang chub so masadapa' sems dpa' chen po sa bcu thob pa yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mchog gi mthar thug pa ni de lta bu yin no// 'od srungs chen po dang rus
gcig pasagasol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni di lags te/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi nang na mi mchog tsun da la bdag rjes su yi rang lags so// bcom ldan 'das da ni mdo sde rnams bshad/
pa'islad dusnang ba mdzad pa'i rogs/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ mdo sde thams cad lhag ma mchis pa'i don la gas sam/ na te lhag ma ma mchis pa'i don lags/ bka' stsal ba/

lhag ma yod pa'i don kyang yin/ lhag ma med pa 'i don kyang yin ne// gsol pa/ sbyin pa kun tu bsngags pa yin// sbyin pa gang du'ang snang med// ces bgyi 'di'i lhag ma mchis pa'i don du ji ltar bshad khagrwa/
tshags su bcad pa'i don ni gang lags/ tshul khrims ldan pa dang/ tshul khrims 'chal pa'i bye brag natsim chas/ bka' stsal ba/ gcig ma gtogs par sbyin pa ni thams cad du ba sngags so// gso la
ba ma gtogs pa gang lags/ bka' stsal pa/ mdo sde 'di las tshul khrims 'chal par brtsi ba gang yin pa'o// gcol ba/ bcom ldan 'das/ bcom ldan 'das la deng bdag 'di kho na
zhu lags na myur du bka' stsal du gsol/ bka' stsal pa/ 'dod chen pa ma gtogs par sbyin pa ni thams cad du bsngags pa yin no// gsol pa/ 'dod chen ba ji ltaru lags/ bka' stsal pa/
dgi song ngamaM/ dge slong ma 'am/ dgabastan nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang rung ste/ chagi ngan pas mdo sde spangs nas byisakhazodapa' gsol khar yang byed pa de lta bu gang yin pa de na 'dod chen pa'i
tshalam du zhugs pa yin no// pham pa bzhi byung ba rnams dang/ mtshams med pa lnga byed byed pa gang yone pa de dgan bdag cag 'jigs pa'i gnas su zhugs sam shes kyang 'jigs par lo dang kha

dmapa'i chos kyi phyogs kyang mi 'dzazhi/ dam pa'i chos dbyung ngo snyam du 'bad pa ra yang mi byed la/ danyid kyi bsngags pa ma yin pa'i ng rjod par byed pa de dag kyang 'dod chen pa'i lam du zhugs pa yin no//

sangs rgyas med do// chos med do// dge 'dun med pa zhes zer ba gang yin pa de dag kyang 'dod chen pa'i lam du zhugs pa yin no zhes nga zer te/ 'dod chen pa de dag mag rtogs par sbyin pa thams cad du sngags so//
gso la ra/ de la tshul khrims 'chal pa zhes bgyi ba gang dag lags/ bka' stsal pa/ pham pa bzhi byed byed pa rnams dang/ mtshams med pa lnga byen byed pa rnams dang/ mde snga slong bar byed l de dag
nyidi do// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das tsalags/ dre dag rtag tu tshul khrims 'chal ba khen lags sam/ bka' stsam pa/ 'di la rgyu yod de/ des na ye rtag pa 'ang yod do// ye mi rtag pa'i ng yod//

gang dag gos tshon can gyi rtags can rnams dang lhan cig tu mi gnas shinge/ khyam bdag cag ni pham pa byung ba yin te/ bdagatsag gise zhes pa byas so snyams 'dzugs par lta la de dag dam pa'i chos dbyung
bar bya'o snyam nas nyams su len par byed cing/ dmapa'i chos kyi phyogs 'dzin pa rnams kyi bsngags pa brjod par bya'o// chos ma yin pa'i phyogs rnams ni tshar gcad par bya'o// mtshungs mchod pa'i mdo

snga rnams ni gdon par bya'o snyam du brtson par byed pa gang yazhe pa de dgazhi tshul khrims 'chal pa yazhe no zhes nga mazer 'o// ci'i phyir zhen/ rigs kyi bu dper na nyi ma shar n lhakhar gyi rdzus sangs par 'gyur ba de
bzhin du/ mdo sde chen po'i nyi ma 'dishar ba na de ltar sgom par byed par sems can rnams kyi ldog pa'i phung po grangs med pa byas pa rnams zad par 'gyur te/de ltar na dam pa'i chos 'byin la/

lhan 'bras bu che ba yin no// mtshams med pa byed byed pa rnams dang/ mdo sde spong ba gang yin pa de dag gal te kye ma bdag cag gis mdo sde spong ba byas pa 'dizhi bdag cag rlag par 'gyur ba yin te/ nyes pa byas so snyam

'gyod congegadung bar gyur nas bdag cag gi skyabs ni mdo sde 'di nyid yin te/ 'khras gzhan ma mthong nge snyam du sems skyed par byed na de dag ni zla ba khyadadam/ zlab gcig gam dus srid kyi bar du mdo sde la

kha skyabs su ma song ba'i bar dunaM dedag la byin pa 'bras bu chung bar 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe mdo sde la skyabs su song ba de'i tsho ni de dag kyang yon gnas su 'gyur ro// gal te mtshams med pabyed byed pa'i ng 'gyod de/

kye ma bdag gis mi rogs pa byas kyi/ bdag gis dam pa'i chos dbyung bar bya'o snyam du sems na/ de'ang mtshams med pa byed byed pa ma yin par rig bar bya ste/ de lazhi chung ngu zhig byin na'ang 'bras bu yod do// mchog tutshul

khrims 'chal pa cig shos de dag la byin pa'i 'bras bu cung zad kyang med do// rigekyi bu gzhan yang pham pa byed byed pasaji ltar bya bton cig/ pham ba byed byed pasazhi chos kyi de len nyid de/ de bzhigshegs pa'i

snying po khong du chud par byas na dmapa'i chos dbyung bar bya'o snyam du bsam na de la byan pa'i ng ches khyad par can du 'gyur go/ rigs kyi budaban budamed sbrum mazhigayul 'khrugs nas yul gzhan du song ste/ lha khang

zhig gi nang du bu khye'u zhig btsas te de bde bar gyur nas khye'u de khyer te/ bdag gi yul zhi bar gyur pa'i 'og tu de logs su chas pa las/ chu klung chen po zhig dang phrad nas nu de brgal ban bu dang ras te tshu'i nang du

nyam thag par gyur nas/ bdag mishibang bya'i khye'u 'di thar par bya'osnyam nas/ des de'i don du 'badapa las budang ldan tsag tu sha nasasdo mchog tu 'jigs pa'i las byas su zin kyang bu la byams shing thar par

bya'o snyam pa'i 'bras busamatho ris su skyes pa de bzhin du/ pham la khyed byed pa dang/ mtshams med pa byed byed pa las dam pa'i chos 'byin par byed pa de dag ni/ sngon ldog pa'i las byas su zin kyang dam pa'i chos
'byin pa'i 'bras bus bud med de dang 'drab r sems can thams cad kyi yon gnas su 'gyur te/ dam pa'i chos 'byin pa'i 'bras bun de ltar che'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'dod chen pa 'dod chen par
lhung bar gyur pa las/ slad kyis gshaM gsum la 'chags par bgyid cing brjod par gsol bar bgyidenatsa lags/ de la stsal ba'ang 'bras bu che bar mi 'gyur lags sam/ bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu
de skadam zer cig/ dper na mi la la zhig gis shang thog a rdza zos nas rus pa sa la bor ba'i 'og du des 'di snyam du bsams te/ nang gitshig gu zhim yang dag snyam nas/ des de'i phyi rol rusapa ber te

tshig gu zos pa dang/ des de'i 'o mo thim par tshor nas yang bor ro// de nas des kyi hud bdag gis sa bon ma rung bar byas so snyam dubasamasanas/ sa bon dbyas rus ba'i zhing dubatsugazhas sa brkos pa'i 'og tu bcug
ste ta'o ma dang mar khus brugs la ma chen po bab tu zin kyang sa bon yin pa ma'adu bar byas pa skya bar mi 'gyur/ skya mi srid do// de nas du sa bon 'di ni ma rung bar byas pa yin te skyes
mi 'gyur ro snyam nas/ dal bar gyur te cang gi zin par 'dug pa de bzhin du/ 'dod chen pa la'angs bon med de/ 'dod chen po chags shing bzod pa gsol ba'i sems bskyed pa ni mi slade do// de
bas na 'dod chen pa de lta bu lan thams cad du sbyin pa 'bras bu che ba ma yin no// dgra bcom rnams la la ba'i 'bras bu'ang tha dad do/ rang sangs rgyas rnams la phul ba'i 'bras bu 'ad tha
ba dad do//de banyin gshegs pa rnams la phul ba'i 'bras bu'ang thadadad// de bas na thams cad du sbyin pa 'i 'bras bu byub ma yin no// gsol pa// ci'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su
bcad pa 'di'i don rnam pa gnyis su bka' stsal lags/ bka' stsal// rgyu las 'gyur/sngon rgyal po'i khab kyi dgabastan dad pa mad pa gcer bu pa la dga' zhig yod pa des/ de la sbyin pa bya

ba cir 'gyur ba dris pa de'i dud drang pa'i phyir sbyin pa kun tu bsngags pa yin zhes bya ba'i tshigs su bcad pa de de la bstan to// da nabyang chub sems dang ba rnams kyi don du tshugs su bcad pa'i don gos
pa'i gsubastan te/ athams cad du gos su bcad pa'i don 'dra bar bstan pa ma yin no// thams cad ces bya ban skas dang sbyar te/ tshig gi lhag ma yod par 'ge par bya'o// byang chub sems

'tha0 dba'i mi mag gis ni tshul khrims 'chal pa rnams zhing gi rdzobazhin du tshar gcad par bya'o// gas kyi bu gzhan yang ngas sngon tshugs su bcad pa 'di bstan te/'di lta ste mukrung du kun gya gyur 'bab
nags tshal kun shing de yi// bud med kun la g.yo sgyu yod// dbang phyug thams cad bde ba yin// bud/da rnams kyi sems/g.yo sgyu can dang/ 'jigs su rung ba yin no//
nas 'jam dpal gzhon nu gyur pa stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshalanas/ bcom ldan 'das la slar tshigs su bcad de gsol pa// tshukun gya gyur 'bab ma 'gas/
ga tshul kun kyang shing n lags/ bud med kun la'ang g.yo ma nas// dbang phyug kun kyang bde ma lags// de bas bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi sgo deskad du bka' stsal pa ni rigs par bka'
stsal pa ma'ags te/'di la rgyu mchis pa bka' stsal 'tshol 'gasaso// stod gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rtan gyi khams 'din glang tha dad pa nub kyang glang spyod ces bgyi ba mas te/ de na chu klung

gi mang drang bor 'ang da res bgyi ba/ shing ma lan gyi thig skudabazhin du nub phyogs kyi mtshonas shar phyogs kyi rgya mtshor drang por 'bab pa zhig mchis la/thams cad ces bgyi ba shin tu rgyas pa'i lung
las lhagag yod pa'i sho 'gas par btson 'das kyis dka' nu lan/ chu klung drong ngo ga'ang ba ces bgyi ba dgen tu rgyas nga 'i lung gi mdog nga lasa bshadang bcom ldan 'das bden pa gsung bas bka'
stsal du gsol// dper na nor gyi 'byung khung gi rgyus mkhan 'byung khung la mi mkhas pa zhig gis de kho na nagaser mas bzhin du/ 'degs sumachis so zhes mchis pas ni/ gnas kyi phyags ma'i bye
brag tsam 'tshashes par bgyi'ags so// nags tshal kun shing nyid yin no zhes bgyi ba// lhag ma yod pa'i don lags// nags tshal rnam da gang dunas te/ 'di lta ste/ gser dang po lhu'i nags tshul
a mas lags so// de bzhin du bud med kun la g.ye rgyu yod ces bgyi ba'ang lhag ma yod pa'idon 'gas te/ dudamed 'ang tshul khrims dang ldan ba dang/ 'dedatsags dwangabral ba dang/ sor
snamamanus pa dam ma lags so// dbang phyug thams cad bde ba yin zhes bgyi ba de'ang lhag ma yod pa'i don lags te/ dbang phyug ces bgyi ba na 'khor 'dus sbyar nga 'i rgyal de dang sangs rgyas
rnams dbang phyag gi mchog lags mod kyi/ de dag kyang 'a 'pha'i dbang du 'gyur zhing zad pa'i chos can 'gasan/ tshangs pa'i dbang phyug 'di dag kyang lhung ba'inyis can 'gas te/ de bas na de
dag na dbang phyug ma lags zhes bdag mi lags sa// rtag pa dang brtan pa'i dbang phyug gang lags ba de ni/ mya ngan las 'das pa mchog tu bde ba'o dbang phyug lags su// bka' stsal
pa 'jam dpa la dpag na sman pa zhig gis khyim bdag gi bu zhig gi gso bar byed de/ sman mar bskol nas de 'thung du bcug ban nad nga de mar mang du 'thung bar sol la// da nas sman
pa des/ de la sa pa/ nyam stobs dang ldan pas na mar mang du btung pa la stsal kyang des 'dzub nus kyi/ khyod ni nyam stobs med pas glar ha cang mang du ma 'thung zhig/ mar gi skad sal

ba'ang yin mod kyi/ mang du 'thungs na de nyid kyis khyong ye 'drog tu 'chi bar 'gyur ro zhes byas na/ tsi sman pa phan par 'dod pa des snying brtse ba des yang dag pa'i don dem rung bar byas pa yin nam/
de bzhin du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang rgyal po dang/ blon po dang/ btsun mo rnams kyi rgyal bsal ba dang/ kos la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi btsunamo rnams gzhan dang gsem pa la 'jig/
pa dang skyob spyod pa'i phyir/ sman pa bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas rgyal po gsal rgyal las brtsams nas/ chu klung ni gyur 'bab cesags su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal te/ ruchung gya gyur 'bab
ces bya ba la de bzhin gshegs pa 'khrul pa mi mnga' 'o// gang gi blo 'khrul pa zhig tu gyur na gnams log par 'gyur ro// de bas na thams cad smos te bsrungs ngani lhag ma yod pa'i ng mad/ lhag ma
mad pa dang 'dra bar gsungs so// 'jam dpal byang chub sems dapa'i khya mchog dam pa khyod kyis sums can thams cad la phan pa'i phyig shes rab rgyas par byed pa bde legs so legs so// denus
'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das 'a yang tshigs su bcado de gsol pa/ bdag gis byas dang ma byas rnams// brtag par bya la gdan dag gis/ byas dang ma byas rnams dang ni//
gzhan g.yemathun brtag ma bya// zhes bcon ldan 'dasadabazhin gshegs pas chos kyi sgo de skad du bka' stsal pa ni/ legs par bka' stsal pa ma lags te/'di la ci'i slad du de skad
ces bka' stsal pa brgyu bka' stsal 'tshal lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs rab yan lag dag las 'ded gcer bu pa sems can dmyal ba thams cad dang/ ya mtshan can dgu bcu rtsa drug po
rnams ni ma na ngas zhugs pa yin no// sangs rgyas kyi sras thams cad ni ma nganalas 'das pa la zhugs pa yin no// drang po dang/ tshul khrims dang Da ga dad ldan pa dang dbang po thul ba
gang yin pa de dag thams cad ni mtho sa su 'gro ba dang chos kyi spyod yu'acan yin no zhes bdag bstod pa dang/ gzhan smod pa dang/ gzhan gashu ba bka' stsal to/ bcom ldan 'das kyis da lta gzhan/
adang mi mthun pa rnams kyang bka' stsal pa// gzhand ga dang ma mthun pa zhes bgyi ba'ang ma lags pa de ji lta bu lags// danas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ 'jam dpal gzhon nu/
gyur ngal 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu sa/ gzhan gyis mthun rtagami bya// zhes bstan pa dgang lasan brtsa mas ci'i phyir ni bstan ce na/ ma skyes dgra las brtsams nas bstan
pa yin te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das na rgyu med par don dang 'gal ba ston par ma mdzad kyi/ rgyu dang bcasarkyen dang bcas par mdzad de/ sngon ma skyes dgras pha bsad nas nga'i thad du 'ongs
nas 'di ltar brnyas thabs su dri ba dris te/ tsalags bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyen pa lags sam/ 'on te thams cad mkhyen pa ma lags/ gal te thams cad mkhyen pa lags na
ci'i slad du lha sbyin rab tu byung lags/ de nabs stong phrag mang por phyi gzhin 'brang zhiganod pa bgyid par gzigs na/ daltar yang rgol du 'ong bar thams cad mkhyen pa khyod ji ltar ma gag
zhes khros nas dus de la 'di skad du/ gzhan gyimi mthun brtag mi bya// zhes gas su bcad pa bstan te/ de ni rgyal bo chen po khyod/ bdag gis pha bsad de mtshams med pa'i las kyi rab tu
dug chen po byas pa de sbyang ba gyis shig/ rgyal po gzhan gyi shes pa la ma rtag par de lta bu khong du chud par gyis shig ces byas so// gzhan yang mi mthun pa brtag par yang byasku/ tshul khrims
dang tshog l bstan pa gang yin pa de dag gi skyon bag pa lhur blang bar bya sta/den sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa yin no// gzhan gyi mi mthun pa la rtog pa rnams kyisani bdag dang gzhan dag gis byas pa
dang ma byas pan bdag dang gzhan dag gi yin par shes bar bya'o// de lta bu'i tshul gyis gzhan gyis byas pa rtag tu yang dag par mthong ba gang yin pa de dag ni nga'i nyan thos yin no zhes da zer
re nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// chad pa gang gis thams cad skrag/ kun la srog ni phangs ba yin// bag gi
nyams las dang bya zhing// brdeg par mi bya gsad mi bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ du pas thams
cad skrag mi 'gyur// srog kyang kun la 'bangasam lags// bdag gi khams las dpag 'gyur zhing// thabs kyis bgyi ba rtogs pa 'bagyi// de bas na bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi sgo de skad du
bka' snyam pa ni rigs par bka' stsal pa ma lags to/ dgra bcom dadran 'khor los sgyur// glang chen bud med rin chen dang// khyim bdag rinaman rta rnams ni 'ganod pa rtsis gyang mi tshugs
so/ 'di rnams la ni lha dang/ mi dang/ lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten na sus kyang gnod par bgyid nga 'i rdzom thogs te/ gra drag shul gyi stobs can rnams kyis kyang de dag la gnod pas/
'phyis ma srid lags so// de dguni lha dang/ bdud dang/ tshangs pa rnams kyis kyang mi 'jigs lags so// de bas na sems can de dag na cis kyang mi tshugs pa zhes bgyi lags so//
g.yu la da gcig tu dpa' ba dang/ gcig tu khyim thab la me 'khu ba'i chung ma dang/ seng ge dang/ sin du pa'i tunang shes dang/ dge slong tshul khrims dang ldan pa 'di rnams ni gnodapas
tshugs pa lags kyi kyang cis kyang 'jigs lags so// de la chud po dag gis thams cad skrag// ces bgyi ba 'dir smyug ma yod pa'i don lags pas na mdor bsdus pa lags so//
bdag gi nyams 'as rang ga bya zhing/ zhes bgyi ba de 'ang lhag ma yod pa'i nu lags te/ dgra bcom pa rnan sa ni bdag dang mun nyamang phyug3jig rten du grags lags so// gal te dgra bcom/
ba rnams kyi bdag tu 'du shes pa dang/ dgra bcom pa rnams kyi srog tu 'du shes pa bsrungs pa lags so zhes da ltar lta ba'i blo chung ngu rnams kyin/ gra bcomapa gnas ngan par bzhag pa lags te/
de ltar bgyis pa'i srog tu 'du shes pa'i lta ba ngan pas rmongs dang 'a 'bras bus myur du mnos mang skya bar 'gyur lags so// gcig zla ngatadag bcom pa rnams gsad pa'i sams bskyod du lags/
kyang sems can de dag gis gsod par 'gyur ma srid de/ sems can mang po log kyang de dag gsod pa'i mi thogs 'gas so// btsam ldan 'das kyis bka' su la nga/ srog chags rnams
la snying brtse ba'i phyir bdag dang 'dra bar blta'o// dgra bcom pa ni 'du ba med pa'i sgo nas dang ga tumad lu dang/ mdud pa med par blta bar bya ste/ de dag la gsad pa'i sems bskyed
ngar mi bya'o// de ltar na sangs rgyus na rgyu med par don dang 'galang mi ston te/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di na rgyal po'i khab kyi gan kyi go pa las brtsams nas bstan te/ dasar dgas
bsad nas shadang ldan pa'i zas kyi sbyin ng la spyan drangs nas/ das kyang des spyan drangs pa gnang nas sgra gcan zin dang 'dra bar blta ba'i tshul gyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di skadag
byas so// chad pa dgagis thams cad skrag/ kun la srog ni'aphangs pa yin// bdag gi mas las dang ga bya shing// brdeg par ma bya gsad mi bya// mig rgyang ring du ltos la//
cad la phan pa'i phyir/ dgongs pa'i tshig 'di dris pa de ni legs so// de nas bcom ldan 'dus la/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas tshigs su bcad de 'di skad ces gsol to// ma la mched
a[' ]/[']cha bdu rtabs []danAkhung du chud par gyis shog/ byang chub soms dpa' rnams kyi nang na mi 'khyom chog 'jam dang la legs so legs so// sems can tham
ba'i tshul gyis ni// ba ma gnyis la mchod bgyisan// bla ma la yang gus gyur la// mas med 'jigs bar ji ltar mchis gdan s bcom lda'adas kyis tshigs su bcad de 'di skad ces bka'/
stsal to// 'di ni srid pa ma zhes bya// gtimug la phazhes bya// chos 'di gnyis la gangamachod nga// de namanamad 'jigs par 'gro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ yang 'jam dpal gzhon
nur gyur pa la tshigs su bcad pa 'di skad ces bka' stsal te// gzhan gyi dbang gyur thams cad sdug/ rang dbang can ni thams cad bde/ dargyal dbang gyur kun mi bzad// dga' ba thams cad bozad b
yin/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ 'jam dpal gzhonanur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi sgo de skad du bka' stsal pa legs par bka' stsal pa ma lags[}]
ba0 te 'di na khyim bdag la la zhig bdag gi du byas pa'i slob dpon la gtor na lags/ khye'u de gzhan gyi dbang du gyur pa zhes mi bgyi lags sam/ de la gzhan gyi dbang du gyur pa ma lags so zhes
bgyis na'ang don dang 'gal bar 'gyur la/ de'ang rang dbang can lags so zhes bgyisana'ang don dang 'gal bar 'gyur te/ chos 'di shin tu brtag dka' ba lags so// 'di na rgyal po'i dus
'khacos su mi rung bar 'gyur te/ daci'ang slob ma 'tshal nas rang dga' dang rang nyams du 'khyam pa de la rang dbang can lags zhes bgyis na ni don dang tshang sa cha 'ga' bar 'gyur la/
grazhan gyi dbang du gyur te zhes bgyisanan den dang 'gal bar 'gyur te/ chos 'di ni shin tu brtag dka' ba lags so// gzhan gyi dbang gyur ces bgyi ba'i tshig bla dgas ni/ de rang dbang du gyur na
sdig pa bgyid pa dang 'gum par 'gyur bas na/ bka' stsal pa 'di lhag ma yod pa'i don lags te/ de bas na gzhan gyi dbang du gyur po thams cad sdug pa'i dam lags/rang dbang can/
cad bde ba'ang ma lags so// nga rgyal dbang gyur kun mi bzad// ces bgyi ba de'ang lhag ma yod pa'i don lags kyi/ nga rgyal gyi dbang du gyur pa kun mi zad ba'ang ma lags te/ 'di ni la la
zhigang rgya'agyi dbang gis rab tu byung tsi lags/ rab tu byung ba de nga rgyalagyi dbang du gyur pa kun mi bzad pa ces bgyilags sam/ de ni nga rgyal ma mchis pa dang/ bsod nams dang ldan pa dang/
ba/ tshul khrims dang chog dang ldan pa dang/ dbang po bsrungs pa lags te/ de bas na nga rgyal gyi dbang du gyur pa kun mi bzad pa'i ng ma lags so// dga' ba thams cad bzang
ba yin// zhes bgyi ba de 'dra lhag ma yod pa'i don lags kyi/ dga' ba thams cad kyang bzad pa ma 'gas te/bstan pa 'di la pham pa byung ba rnams gosan can gyi rtags can rnams dang
lhan cig 'khod pa bdag nyid kyis rung bar mthong yang/ sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur te/ de lta bu dag la bzung zhes bgyis na don dang 'gal ba'agyur lags so// bam pabye byed
[ ]pa de dag gos dka/ra bo gyon duu0f8bjug pa de dag na bzang po'imagadon rgya chen po bgyid pa lags so// pham pa bgyid pa rnams ni mi bzang ba zhes bgyi ba ste/ de dag phul bar bgyid pa de dag ni
bzang ba zhes bgyi'o// de bsan dga' ba thams cad bzang ba ma lags na/ lca'i yang lta sangs rgyas de bzhin gshegs pas shes dgongs te de skad bka' stsal pa lags/ de nas bcom ldan
'das kyis/ 'jam dpal gzhon nu gyur pa la'adi skad ces bka' stsal te/ sas rgyas ni rgyu med par don dang 'gal ba megasung gi/ rgyu dang bcas pa rkyen dang bcas par gsung sta/ rgyal

pan+ti po'i khaban/ khyim bdag ko ta ka'i bu mo rab bzang sa pa'i khyim du song nas rab tu 'byung ba'i sems skyes te/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'i thad du song nas bud na da du gyur pa na gzhan gyi dbang du gyur
ba pa yin l/ skyes par gyur ba rang dbang can yin no snyam du bsams nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang/ chos dang/ dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su song ste/ de'i rtogs pa thugs su chud/
nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ gzhan gyi dbang gyur thams cad sdug/ ces gsasu bcad pa de skad gsungs so// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyin ng na'i khyu mchog 'jamo dbul lo//
so legs so/ bsems can thams cad la phan pa'i phyir/ dgongs pa'i tshig 'di nga la zhus pa legs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la tshogs su
bcad debaka' sul pa/ thams cad bras la rten pa yin// ser sna med pa thams cad g.yo// zas kyi nyes pas nad du 'gyur// tshangs par spyod pa 'grogs na bde/ 'jam dpal gyis
gso'ab/ bcom ldan 'das cigs/ tsun pa'i spyin ba che gsol nas zhal khrus kyi nyis pas bsongs lags sam/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ 'jam dpa' la 'di skad ces
bka' stsal to// sems can thams cad kyang bris la rten pa ma yin no// ser sna med pa thams cad kyang g.yo ba ma yin no// thams cad la 'dra zas kyi nyes pas nad du 'gyur ba yin no//
chos stod pa rnams dang 'grogs so ceg kyang bde ba ma yin no/ 'jam dpal gang gi rmakhyod nad kyis thebs pa de'i tshe/ pa'i ng nad kyis thebs so// dgra bcom dang rang sangs rgya/
03dbya// byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// de dag rtag tu zas med de// de nisangs rgyas chos nyid de// dgra bcom pa rnams dang/ ngangasangs rgyas rnams dang/ byang chub
sems dpa' rnams dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni zhal zas kyang ma gsol la/ sbyin ba 'bum phrag mang po'ang bzhes pa mdzad do// spyin pa bung bar bya ba'i gdams ngag kyang ston/
pa mdzad de// sems can rnams sems can dmyal ba dang/ dud 'gro dang/ yid gs kyi rgya mtsho las nges par bsgral ba'i phyir sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsngags par yang mdzad la
gsol na yang mi mdzad do// de bzhin gshegs pa la drug gi bar du dka' ba spyad pas nyam chung bar gyur to zhes sangs rgyas la sems can thams cad dang dra bar blta ba mi bya'o// 'dod
pa'i du bo las brgal ba de dag ni brtan po yine te/ dpa' bo de dag na ma'i yul la spyod pa ma yin no// de bzhin du nga'i nyan thos rnams kyi stobs dang spyod yul yang bsam gyis mi khyab bo//
sems can thams cad zas la rten ces bya dang lhagam yod pa'i don yod par shes par bya'o// sar sna med pa thams cad g.yo pa yin zhes bya ba 'di nga lhagam yod pa 'i don yin te/
bdag la ser sna byed ba mi g.yo ba'i bad kar 'gro ba dam pa 'ga' yang yod de// thams cad zas kyi nyes pas nad du 'gyur zhes bya ba de'ang lhag ma yod pa'i don yin te/ tsher mas
brug pa la sogs ba'i nad glo bur dag kyang yodado// sa spyod pa rnams dang 'grogs pa thams cad bde ba zhe bya ba de'ang lhag ma yod pa'i don te/ 'jig rten pa rnams la'ang chos 'dzin pa mA

dang 'tsham pa'i chos rnam bamang po dag yod de/ de dag la'ang bya ba sna tshogs yod mod kyi/ sbyang ba rnam pa sna tshogs can lus nyon mongs pa de dag dang gal te la la zhig 'grogs par gyur na ci bde/
ba la ston par 'gyur ma/ de ltar nan don dang 'gal bar 'gyur ro// de bas na sangs rgyas ni rgyu med pa'i don dang 'gal bar ston par mi mdzad de/ ga dul bar bya ba'i dbang gis rgyu dang bcas/
rkyen dang bcas par ston pa la shes par gyis shig 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos mgatubade ba yin no// tshigs su bcad pa 'di ni grong khyer gyen du la zhes bya ba'i bram bri lug dpalany+tsa
bya ba las brtsams nas bstan ba yin te/ bram ze lug dpal khag bzhi pa'i snangab byed cing/ nga'i thad du 'ongs nas ngas de'i zhag bzhi ba'i snang ba'i lta ba bsal ba'i phyir/ sems
can thams cad brasal rten cis bya ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di bstan to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' tshon po 'od srungs chen po dang dus gcig pas
'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das thams cad ma lus pa ji lta bu 'gas/ thams cad ces bgyi ba'ang ji lta bu lags/ bka' stsal pa/ ma lus pa'i don ni dge ba'i phyogs
na/ @#// thams cad rtag pa'o// bde ba'o zhes bya ba lta bu 'o// de ltar na bcig na lhag ma yod pa'o// kha gnalhag ma mad pa yin par chos 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bus rig par bya'o/
gsal pa/ kye ma de bzhin gshegs pa sems cad thams cad la sgra gcan zinabazhin du gzigs pa lags te bdag shin tu'angasags so// bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu legs
so legasaso// de ltar ra phra bar brtag dgos sa// gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das da ni yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i mdo chen po'i bsod nams ji ltar skya ba bka' stsal du
gsol// bka' stsal pa// sangs rgyas kyi yul 'di bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir nyan thos dwang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang/ mdo sde 'di'i ming yang tshig tsam du'ang nyan pa rnam
b+hU la brjod par mi nus so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha dang/ mi dang/ lha ma yin rnams kyis dri'i mthun par tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ sas rgyas bsam yas bsam yas
sa gsung ba// chos dang dge 'dun rtag tu khyod la rten// de phyir dge slong 'od srus kun dga' bo// mams bar du mgon po bzhugs bar gsol// ba de ha yi rgyal po ma skyes dgra// khyod kyi
mdza' mchog thugs 'dra che ba yang// da dung ma mams mthar thug khyod ma gshogs// kun mkhyen khyod kyis bdag cag the tsom chod// de nas btsem ldan 'das kyis/ de dag la 'di skad
ces bka' stsal te// da pasras mag thu bo bod srungs dang// blo ldan kun dga' khyod kyi the tsom gcod// khyod kyis nga yi zhal rjes rtag pa dang// mi rtag shes byos su ngan ma byed cig/
de nas 'khor de dag thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'dasal mad pa rten ngo byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs nga 'i byang chub tus lam btab nas/ der sems can gang+ga'i klung gtams

brag dkrigs spyod kyi bye ma'i grangs snyed kyis sems bskyed nas byang chub sems dpa'is dang po 'i gnas thob bo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nusu gyur pa dang/ bram ze chazhingamatho ba'od
srus chen po dang dus gcig pa la bka' stsal te/ mgor ba'i bu tsun da byang chub tu dbang bskur nas/ byang chub sems dpa' de gsum la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag bag yod par gyis
shig /bag yod par gyis shig/ ngaskad pa'i nad drag pos btab ste/ gzhon nu dag nga re zhagi thabs kyi nad pho brang du nyal bar 'ded kyis nyal du chug cig/ 'jam dpal khyod kyis 'khor
thams cad la chos ston cig/ seng ge 'i sgra sgrogs shig/ gnas brtan 'od srungs chen po dang/ kun dga' bo gnyis m 'os kyi bar du sa khyod la bstan pa 'ad gtad kyis/ nam khos nga
na de gnyis la gtod cig ces de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ bcom ldan 'das gdul bar bya ba'i dbang gis nad pa'i tshul du bzhugs par bstan pa sta gzames 'ang legs su zur gyis gzi
@# ]das yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i mngonon ngo// dam pa'i chos gsung rab thams cad kyi snying por gyur pa rgyud phyi ma lta bu/ rtogs par dkar ba'i chos kyi 'byung
gnas/ gcig tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ston pa'i srol/ le'u nyi khri snga ston yod pa las lha dang/ mi dang/ lha ma yin dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ rig sngags 'chang dang sun
la sogs pa zhus pa zhusab zhes bya ba'i le'u/ 'bags pa longs su mya ngan las 'das pa theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so/// sho leka sum stong brgyad brgya mas
rgyugar gyi mkhan po dzani mi rta dang/ dzAn gar b+ha dang/ zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba banang+ge de ba tsan dras bsgyur te gtan la phab pa//@#// rgyugar skad du/
dbyab phyung po 'u in kyang su pham de'i en/ bod skad du (thabs makhas pa chen po sangs rgyas drin lan bsab pa'i mdo// bam po dang po// 'di skad bdag/

gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab bya rgod sbyangs pa'i na la/ dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dge slong nyi khri brgyad stong thams cad kyang bya ba byas pa/ tshangs pa'i smad pa spyad
ba srid par kun tu sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/ klu chen po ltar sems kyi dbang thob pa sha stag la 'di lta ste/ 'od zungs chen po dang/ rab 'byor dang/ kun shes ko'u decad ng/mdzes/
[z]/ bzang dang/ byams ma'i bu gang ngo dang/ lam chen bstan ngang/ shAri'i bu dang/ ka t+ya'i bu chen po dang/ kun dga' bo dang/ sgra gcan 'dzin la sogs pa cang shes pa dag thabs cig tu nga zhugs
sa byang chub sems dang 'a sems dpa' chen po sum khri brgyad stong dag dang thabs cigeg ste/ byang chub sems dang 'a de dgathams cad kyang yun ring por dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pas/ sangs
rgyas bye ba brgyad stong du mdu ba rnams la rtag tu tshangs par spyad pa/ smon lam chen po yongs su rdzogasang/ ting nge 'dzin brgya stong skud khong du chud cing rtogs pa/ gzungs pa sa
su rdzogs pa// snying rje chen po me gtong ba/ sems can chen po ji lta ba bzhin thams cad lan par brtson pa// dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung mi chad pa'i tshong// chos kyi rgyal
mtshan rnam par 'dzugs pa// so so'i ma bskul ba'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du gyur pa// ye shesachen po'i 'gram du phyin pa sa kun tu grags pa sha stag 2'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dang 'a
spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ngang/ byang chub sems dpa' mthu chen thong dang/ byang chub sems dpa' rtag par brtson pa dang/ byang chub sems dang 'a yon tan dam pa dang/ byang chub sems/
glogag 'od dang/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mnyam pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' yon tan gtso bo dang// byang chub sams dpa' ni rang rgyal po dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sngos kyi
[4 ]@#// glang po dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sposaglang chen po dang/ byang chub sems dba' stobs 'dzin dang/ byang chub sems dpa' khams gsum 'phags dang/ byang chub
soms dpa' rtag par snying rdzudang/ byang chub sems dpa' lag na rin po che dang// byang chub sems dpa' 'od can dang/ byang chub sems dpa' dam pa'i dpal dang/ byang chub sems dang/
rin chen zla ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa' stobs chen po dung/ byang chub sems dpa' blo gros tshad med dang/ byang chub sems dpa' bzang skyong dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sang ga'i
sgra dang/ byang chub sams dang bsang ga byed dang/ bya chub sems dpa'i seng ge rnam par sbyangs pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' smon lam rdzogs dang 1 byang chub sems dang ba rin chen
brtsegs dang/ byang nubasams dpa' byams pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la sogs pa 'khor mang po dang yang thabs cig tu bzhugs so// den len ba
rtsagazhan yang 'dod pa'i khams kyi lha'i bu tshad med pa brgya stong dag kyang lcags nas/ lha rdzas kyim tog dang sa rnams thogs shing/ lha rdzas kyi rol mo dkrol nas/ steng gnam mkha' la
'khod do// de ma yin pa lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ drab dang/ lha ma yin dang 2 nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lta'adun ba dang/ ma dang/ ma ma yin pa dang/
001 de la sogs pa so so nas 'khor brgya stong dang lhags nas 1 sangs rgyas kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de'i tshon bcom ldan 'das la 'khor mang pas yongs
su bskor te/ rim gro dang mchod pa byas/ bkur sti dang bcas pas yongs su bstod pa byas so// de'atshon bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis kun dga' be snga dro'i dus su rgyal po'i khab
tu zhugs nas/ mthar gyis bsod snyoms blangs so// de'i dus na bram ze phatshal sri zhu chen byed pa/ khyims zhig nasaci'ang mi bdog pa zhig kyang ma rgan khur du byas te mthar gyis sangs ma byed/
de yang kha bras zhim po re dang ldan pa 'am/ shing thog bzung po dag rnyed na pha ma la stobs so// kha bras ngon pa 'o med pa 'am/ shing thog skam po dag cha dan bdag rang ba'o// kun dga'/
ngos de lta bu dag na thong nas rab tu dga' ba'i sanas skyes te/ mi de la legs so legs so zhes snyan pas bsto danas/ rigs kyi bu pham 'a sri zhu byed cing mchud pa byed pa de mtshar che sta
legs so zhes smras so// de nas kun tu rgyu ston pa drug gi bstan pa la phyogasangashing grags su gyur pa gcig dbang po rno ba gtsug lag dang rig byed rnam bzhi la mkhas par gyur pa// skar ma
dang na' mkhas pa/ dge sdig gi ltasaM rna ba/ mo dang gtsug lag gi rig pas pha rol gyi sems shes pa// phal mang po'i slob dpon du gyur pa// kun gyis bkur ba gcig lta ba ngan pa la
zhen nas/ khe dang grags pa'i phyir dam pa'i rjes 'jig par byed de// sangs rgyas dang/ chos dang/ dge 'dun 'dra phrag dog byed de// smod pa'i phyir kun dga' bo la 'di
skad ces smras so// khyod kyi ston pa go'u tam shAka thoges kyi bung na dge ba yin ta/ yon tan chen po dang ldan n zhes smra ba'ang mang tsam du zad de/ bden pa'i dngos po med do// khyod kyi ston pa
go'u ta mni yang dag par na sdig pa can yin te/ btsas nas zhag bdun len nama'ang shi bas sdig can yin pa'i mdzeno// rgyal po'i pho brang na 'dug pa las/ pho brang nang nas bros pas
yab rgyal po 'ang mya nganagyis non to// sems 'khrugs nas brgyal ba las chus gtor tezhag bdun len pa dang dran pa de red de/ tshe nges btab nas/ 'i lha bu gcig dong du stor re zhes
sung rje rje skad du dus nas nga'i yul dang srid kyang khyod 'ba' zhig dbang bur 'don/ ci'i phyir bed spangs te ni dgon par chas zhes pa sngags 'don du bcug pas/ khyod kyi ston pa go'u tam
dri mi shes ( ci la'ang ma bltas par las te song bas na/ sri zhu mad par yang manan// yab rgyal pos pho brang brtsigs nas rlung ma blangs pas kyang chung ma las ma byas te
mya ngan gyis gdungs par byas pas na// khra'amed pa 'ang yin pa ramanan// kun dga' bos de skad ces snas pa'i tshig de dag thos nasaM/ ngo tsha zhing skyangs tabasod snyoms blangs te phan
sangs rgyas gangan bar 'ongs nas/ zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ gas gcig tu thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sa/
rgyas kyis bstan pa'i chus pha ma' sri zhu bgyi ba lta mamasu sam/ sangs rgyas kyis/ kun dga' bo' bka' stsal pa/ 'di skad du zhu ba 'di khyod la su zhig gis bstan/ lha
'am mi 'am/ mi ma yin pas bstan tam/ 'on te khyod nyid kyirishes pa'i blos de bzhin gshegapa la zhu bar gyur ces bka' stsal pa dang/ kun dga' bos gsolapa bdagal lha 'am/ kram/
ma dgas sam/ mi 'am/ mi ma lags pa gang gis kyang bstan pa ma mchis te/ snga dro bsod snyoms slong du mchis pa'i shul du/ ston pa drug gi 'khor kun tu rgyu gcer bu pa zhig dang mjal ba dang/
bdag la tshig rtsub mo gsami'o zhes rgyas par gsol to// de'i tshabam ldan 'dres 'dzum pa mdzad nas/ zhal gyi sgo nas kha dog rnam pa du ma dang ldan pa'i 'od byung ngos/ shar phyogs 'gasasu

sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa bye ba brgya stong 'das pa'i pha rolan/ 'jig rten gyi khams bla ma mchog ces bya ba snang bar byas so// 'jig rten gyi khams de nas ngs rgyas dga' ng 'i rgyal po zhes bya ba
de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag ngag rdzogs nga 'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan// bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa// skyas bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba
@#// mdu ba/ ston pa rgyal ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi zhing rab tu bkod pa zhes bya ba na bzhugs te/ sangs rgyas kyi nang de dang shin tu mnyam zhing bo zhu las byas pa/
gsar btso mas thag re lub bres pa// ne po na sna bdun gyi shing bskyed pa/ shing de dag kyang mda' rgyang gang tsam du mtho ba/ ma tog dang/ 'bras bu dang/ 59la ga dang do 'dang mas
shan tu brgyan pa/ rlung mi sdug pas bskyod na sgra snyan pa byung ba/ sgra de dag so so'i skya bos thos pas ma drinus pa// skabs skabs na ma ga dang/ mtshu'u dang/ khrus kyi dzang bu yod la/
yon tan brgyad dang ldan pa'i tshul[']yongs su gang ba/ rdzing gi zhabs kyang gsar gyi byams bdul ba/ rdzing gi ngos bzhin bsung dam pa dang ldan pa'i ma tog pad+ma dang/ pur ka dang/ bal ba/
ka dang/ de ma yin pa'i ma tog sngon po dang/ sa pa dang/ dmar po dang/ dkar po shing rta'i 'phang lo tsam gyis chu'i stong yangs su babs te/ chu de'i nang na bya rnam pa sna tshogs kyis shin tu
yad du 'ong ba'i sgra snyan pa 'byin te/ 'dzing de'i nang na rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i gru yod de// de nasems can mang po 'dod dgur rtser zhing longs spyod do// na po ma'i shing de dag gi bar
bar na sangaga' khri mthokhyad kyi tshud dpag tshud gcig pa bshams nas/ rin po che sna bdun gyis brgyan te/ lha rdzas kyi na bza' khri'i stang dusum par btang ba/ lha rdzas kyi spos kyi dri 'thul ba/
[s/ ]lha rdzas kyis rtag gsal par bkram pa'i khri de la de bzhin gshegs pa dga' ba'i rgyal po skyil mo krung du bcas shing bzhugs pa la/ byang chub sems dpa' tshang snyed pa bye ba brgya stong snyad
mdun du bdar te thal mo spyar ba btud nas/ de la de bzhin gshegs pa de la so sonas tshig mthun nga la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsem ldan 'das ce'argya pa'i rkyen gyis 'od bzang po ba degason
po dang sa ra pa dang/ mar pa dang/ dkar po dang ldan nga/ rab tu gsal nga/ dang ra mi bzod pa 'di nub phyogs 'ogs nas 'khor mang po 'di dag la snang bar gyur te/ gang la 'od kyis
ga pa de dag thams cad lus dang sems bde bar gyur pa thugs brtse ba'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan du gsol/ de la bcom ldan 'dras des 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
'bags kyi bu dga' gas nga la rkyen la yid la zung zhig dang/ khyod la dkrol zhing ngashad da ra bya33/ 'di nas niub phyogs legs su 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med pa brgya stong 'das pa'i
rel na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing mimajed ces bya ba yod da [ ]de na sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdza gas pa'i sangs rgyas 'gi pa dang zhabs
su ldan pa// bde bar gshegs pa// 'ag rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ ston pa rgyal ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba 'khor mang pos
[o ]// yongs su bskol nas/ 'khor mang bo thams cad la thabs makhas pa chen po drani lanabasab pa'i mdo rdza ston ri/ sams na thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i don gyi phyi'i
sems can thams cad kyi legapar lta ba'i zug rngutsunas gdon pa'i phyi/ soms thogam pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dag byang chub sems las phyir mi ldog cing brtan par bya ba'i phyir/ ka thos/
dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad mthar phyin ba'i theg pa gcig gi lam la dgod ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams myur du mngon par byang chub ng sangs rgyas la drin lan bsab pa'i phyir/
sems can thams cad kyi ni lci ba dran par bya ba'i phyir/ sems can thams cad sdug bsngal gyi rgya mtsho las dgrol ba'i phyi/ so so'i skye bo mtha' dag pa ma dag la sri zhu bya bar 'dod pa'i
a phyir 'od 'di snang bar gyur pa yin no/ de ste 'khor de'i nang na byang chub sems dang 'o 'khor mang po'i ston pa dang gtsobor gyur pa stong phrag bcu spyod stan las las te/ bla gos phyogs
gcig tu byas nas 1 pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugasate/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis bdag cag rnams ma mdzad kyi
'go rtan gyi khams der mchu zhing/ de bzhin gshegs pa kya thub pa la mchod pa dang/ bstan bkur bgyi ba dang/ thabs mkhas pa chen po sas rgyas kyi na lan bsab pa'i madodam
0 pa tan cing mchis par byin gyis brlab tu gsal/ de nas sangs rgyas des/ byang chub sams dpa' de rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal te/ rigs kyi bu dag khyed mi mjed kyi 'dzig rten
kyi khams der phyin nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de la mchod cing bkur sti bya ba dang/ shin tu phrad dka' ba'i 'du shes bskyed par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ni

bskal pa grangs med pa bye ba khrag khrig gi bar du shin tu spyad dka' ba spyad de/ snying rje chen po'i smon lam 'di skad ces btab bo// gal te mngon par sangs rgyas pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams sdig pa can
ri dang/ shang shong dang/ rtse mo dang da gsag ma dang/ tsher ma la sogs pa yod pa'i gnas su sems can dag kyang nyon mongs pa dang bcas nga/ mtshams med pa lta dang/ mi dge ba bcu rdzogs
par spyod pa'i gnas der mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ phan pa dang bde ba'i don du sdug bsngal thams cad yongs su bdud de/ bde ba thams cad dang yongs su ldan par byas nas/ chos
kyi sku yongs su rdzogs par byas shing/ lhag ma ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'dus par gyur cig ces smon lam du btab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das des thog ma de skad ces smon lam btab pas/
khyed rnams 'jig rten gyi khams de phyin nas ji ltar sangs rgyas nyid gshegs pa dang/ ji ltar sangs rgyas nga bzhugs ba dang 'dra bar gnas par bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang/ byang chub
@#// sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyis mi mthun par bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' bzhin du bgyi zhes gsol nas/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag re re 'dra 'khor byang chub
sams dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong skud kyis yongs su bskor te/ mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na ba der song ngo// de dag 'jig rten gyi khams gang dang gang du phyin par 'jig rten
gyi khams de dag rnam pa drug tu g.yos te/ 'od ze chen pos kun tu snang bar gyur/ stang gi bar snang 'a sa lha rnams kyis ma rtog mnar ba dang/ man+dan bachen po'ang mas bzhin du phab go/

'od zer chen pos snang bar byas shing/ rdzu 'phrul gyis 'jig rten gyi khams gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyad dag kyang g.yos so// de ma yin pa gzhan yang lhardzas kyi rol mo tshad med pa brgya stong sud kyang
stong gi bar snang lasam bkrol bar rang zer bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag bya rgod spangs pa'i ri ga la ba der de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar lhags nas/ zhabs la mgo bos
phyag 'tshal te/ sangs rgyas la lan gsum bsko'i bsanas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer gyis nub phyogs 'drogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa

bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'das pa'i pha rol na/ 'jig rten gyi khams dag pa'i gnas zhes bya ba snang bar byas so// 'jig rten gyi khams de nas das rgyas kyi mtshan nyi zla mar me'i 'od ces bya ba de
[j]bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ge pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rtenamkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ named/
pa ston pa rgyal ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi zhing bde ba can zhes bya ba na bzhugs te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'ang shin tumanyam zhing gzhi ba rlalas byas po/ gsar btso
mas phrag re 'ur bres pa// rin po che sna bdun gyi shing bskyod pa/ shing de dag kyang mda' rgyang gang tsam du mtho ba/ me tog dang 'bras bu dang/yal ga dang/ 'dob mas shin tu brgyan pa/
rlung mi drag dras bskyod pas sgra snyan pa 'byung ba/ sgra de dag so sa'i skye bos thos pas mi ngoms/ skabs skabs na chumeg dang/ mtshe'u dud khrus kyi rjed bu yod la/ son tan brgyad
dngoldan pa'i chus yongs su gang zhing/ jing gi zhabasakyang gsar gyi byams bdal ba/ rjed ga ngos bzhin bsud dam pa dang ldan pa'i ma tog pa dang/ punanika dang/ pa 'phesha ka dang
de ma yin pa ma tog sngon po dang/ sar pa dang/ dmar po dang/ dkar po shing rta 'phang lo tsam chu'i stang yongs su khabs te/ chu 'inangana'ang bya rnam pa sna tshogs kyang shin tu yid du

'ong ba'i sgra snyan pa 'byin to// rdzong de'i nang ba'i re che sna bdun las byas pa'i gru yod de/ de na sems can mang po 'dod dgur rtse 'ang longs spyod do// rin po che'i shing ga bar bas seng ge 'i khri
/ mthokhyad dpag tshad gcig du bshams nas/ ni ru sna bdun gyis brgyan pa/ lha rdzas kyi na bzas khri'i steng du rim par bting ba/ lha rdzas kyi sros kyi dri 'thul ba/
lha rdzas kyi ma tog gis rgyalang ra bkram pa'i khri de la de bzhin gshegs pa nyi zla nar ma'i 'od skyil mo krung bcas shing bzhugs pa la/ byang chub sems dang dad na da pa bya ba brgya stong snyad
mdun du bdar te/ thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa de laso so nas tshigamathun par 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ri'i rgyu tsa'i nagyis 'od bzang po kha dog sngon
po dang/ ser bo dang/ dmar po dang/ dkar por bcas pa dang ldan pa/ rab tugasal ba/ dparami bzod pa 'dazhan phyogs legasas 'khor mang po 'di dag la snang nga ra gyur ta/ gang
many+tsa la 'od kyis reg pa thams cad lus dang sems bde bar gyur pa// thugs brtse ba'u slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan du gsol/ de la bcom ldan 'das des 'di skad ces braka' stsal
te nags kyi bu legs par nyon shin tu yid la legs par zung zhig dang/ khyed la dgrol bar bshad par bya'o// 'di nas shar phyogs legs su 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag
khrig brgya stong 'das pa'i pha rol na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mdzad ces bya ba yod de/ de nas ngs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rtenamkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha laskyar ba/ bla na med pa/ 1 stod pa rgyal ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhes b
ba 'khor mang pos yongs su bsa gnas / 'khonan nga po thams cad la thabs mkhas pa ren po na 'an bsab pa'omad snga ston cing/ sems can thams cad laban pa dang bde 'gyi//
phyi/ sems can thams cad kyi leg par lta ba'i zug rngu rtsad nas 'don pa'i phyir/ sams thog ma pa'i byang chub sems dang 'a dag byang chub las phyir mi ldog cing brtan par bya ba'i phye/ nyan/
thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad mthar phyin pa 'i thag pa gcig gi las la dgod pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams myur du mngon par byang chub cing/ sangs rgyas kyi 'i
lan bsab pa de phyi'i/ sems can thams cad kyis drin lci ba dran par bya ba'i phyir/ sems can thams cad sdug bsngal gyi rgyun tsho las sgrol ba'i phyir/ so so'i skye bo dag phamal sra zhu bya bar 'dod
pa'i phyi'i 'od 'di snang bar gyur pa yin no// de'i 'khor de'i nang na byang chub sems dpa' 'khor mang po'i gtso bo dang ston par gyur pa stong phrag bcu snyad stan las langs te/ bla gos phyogs
gcig tu byas nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha ngas la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldon 'das kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis nga dag cag rnams mi mjed kyi
[# ]// 'jig rten gyi khams der ma mizhing/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la mchod pa dang/ bkur sten bgyi ba dang/ thabs makhas pa chen po sras rgyas drin lan bsab
pa'i mdo sde dam pa nyan cid mchi bar byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ de nas sangs rgyas des/ byang nub sems dpa' de dag la 'dri skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu ga byed mi mjed kyi
'jig rten gyi khams der phyin nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la mchod byed bkur ste bya ba dang/ shin tu phrad dka' ba'i 'du shes bskyed par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas
shAkya thub pa ni bskal pa grangs mAd pa bye ba khrag khrig gi bar dushen tu spyad dka' ba spyad de/ snying rje chun po'isnyan las 'di skad ces btab bo// gal te mngonod ra sangs rgyas pan/
@# 'jig rten gyi khams sdig pa can pa dang/ shang shang dang/ gyam dang/ gsab ma la sogs pa yod pa'i gnas su sems can dag kyang nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa// mtshums mad pa lnga
dwangami dag ba bcu rdzogs pa'i gnas der mngon pa nas nigs rgyas te/ phan pa dang bde ba'i don du sdug bsngal thams cad yongs su bcad de Da bde ba thams cad dang ldan par byas nas/ chos
kyis yongs su rdzogs shing lhagamam lus ba'i mya ngan las 'das par gyur cig ces smon lam btab bo// sadas rgyas bcom ldan 'das des thog ma de skad ces smon lam btab pas/
khyed rnams 'jig rten gyi khams den phun nas/ ji ltar sangs rgyas nyid gshags pa dang/ ji ltar sangs rgyas nyid bzhugs pa da 'dra bar gnas par bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang/ byang chub
sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyis tshig mthun par bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' bzhin du bgyi'o zhes gsal nas 1 byang chub sams dpa' de dag re re'ang 'khor byang chub sems dpa' bye ba

khrag khrig brgya stong nyid kyis yongs su bsko to 1ma mdzad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na ba der song sta/ de dag 'jig rten gyi khams gang dang gang du phyin par 'jig rten gyi khams de dag rnam pa drug tu
g.yos te/ 'od zar chen po'ang kun tu snang bar gyur/ stong gi bar snang las lha rnams kyis ma gsan ra ba dang/ mnar ba na do 'ang char bzhin phab bo// 'od ze chen pos snang bar byas shing/

rdzu 'phrul gyis 'jig rten gyi khams gang+ga'i klung gi byam nad dug kyang g.yos so// de yan ba gzhan yang lha rdzas kyi rol mdzad med da brgya stong nyid kyang stong gi bar snang la ma dkrol ba dang zer
bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag bya rgod spungs pa'i 'a de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar lhags nas/ zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ sangs rgyas lalanagasum bskor ba byas
nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas kha dog rnam pa lnga dang ldan pa'i 'od zer gyis byang phyogs legs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig lnga brgya
[r/ ]@#// 'das pa'i pha rolan/ 'jig rten gyi khams dbang phyug grags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba snang bar byas so// 'jig rten gyi khams de na sangs rgyas pa dro le brgan gyi 'od ces bya
ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan ng/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur
ba/ blun med pa// ston pa rgyal ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi zhing dri ma dang bral ba zhes bya ba na bzhugs te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de 'ang shin tu mnyam zhing gzhi 'urlu las byas
ba/ gsar bcoms thag le bur dris pa// rin po che sna bdun gyi shing bskyed ba/ shang de dag kyang mda' rgyang gang tsam du mtho ba/ ma tog dang/ 'bras bu dang/ yal ga dang/ 'dabo mas shan shu/
tsho'i brgyan pa/[7 ]rlung ma drug pas bskyod na sgra snyan pa 'byung ba/ sgra do'ang so so'i skye bos thos na ma ngoms da/ skabs skabs na mig dang/ mtsho'u dang/ khrus kyi rdzong du yod pa/yon
tan brgyud dang ldan pa'i nus yongs su gang zhing/ jing gi zhabs kyang gsar gyi bum bdal ba/ jing gi sa bzhin bsung dam pa dang ldan pa'i m rtog pa dudang/ punA ri ka dang ba rag ka
dang/ de ma yin pa'i ma tog sngon po dang/ sar po dang/ dman po dang/ dkar po shing rta'i 'phang 'atsam chu'i stang yongs su khebs te 2 mu'i nad na bya sna tshogs kyang shin tu yid du 'ong ba'i sgra/

snyan pa 'byin to// rdzing de'i nang na 'an po che sna bdun las byas pa'i gru yod de/ denusems can mang bo 'dod dgur rtse b+hing longs spyod rdo// 'chi ba mi'i shing de dag gi bar bar na phung ga'i thimatho khyad dang/
tshod gcig po bshams nas/ rin po che sna bdun gyis brgyan te lhardzas kyin pa blas khri'i stang du rim par bti ba/ lha rdzasakyi spos kyi dri 'thul ba/ lta rdzas kyi me togagis rtsa'adas bkram/
pa'i khri'i thog na de bzhin gshegs pa pad+mo la brgan gyi 'od rlugs pa skyel mo krung bcas shing bzhugs pal/ byang chub sems dpa' tshud med pa bya ba brgya stong sud bdun du bdar te/ thal
mo sbyar ba btud nas/ de bzhin gshebs pa de 'dras so nasag mthun par 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ni'i rgyu ci'i rkyen gyis bod bzang po kha dog sngon po dang/ sog po
dang dmar bo dang/ dkar po ldan pa// rab tugasal 2 dbar mi bzod pa 'di lho phyogs legs nas 'khor mang po 'di dag la snang bar gyur te/ gang la'od kyis reg pa de dag thams cad/
lus dang sems bde bar gyur pa/ thugs brtse ba'i slad du bcom ldan bdas kyis bstan du gsol/ de la bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skadis bka' stsal to// bags kyi bu dag legs
dpaganyon la shin tu yid la legs par zung zhig dang/ khyod la dgrol zhing bshad par bya'o// 'dinas lho phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'das pa'i
hu/ lan gsas rgyas kyi zhing mi mdzad ces bya ba yod do// de nas ngs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs ba dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'ag
ba dang zhabs su ldan ng/ bad par gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ ston pa rgyal ba sas rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba 'khor mang ngos
sasu bskor nas/ 'khor mang po thams cad la thabs mkhas pa chen po dran lan bsab pa'i mdo sde ston cing/ sems can thams cad 'phan pa dang bde ba'i din gyi phyir/ sems can thams cud kyi
sgrub jurtsad nas 'den pa'i 'i/loms thog ma pa'i byang chub sams dpa' dgabyang chub las phyir mi ldog cing bstan par bya nga 'i phyir/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thamasacad na thar phyin pa 'jig
pa gcig la dgod pa'i phye/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams myur du mngon par byang chub cung/ sangs rgyas kyi drin lan bsab pa'i phyir/ sems can thams cad kyi drin lci ba dran par bya ba'i

phyir/ sems can thams cad sdugabasngal gyi rgya mtsholas sgrol ba'i phyir/ skye bo dag phan 'o su zhu bya bar 'dod phyir 'odra'adi snang bar gyur pa yin no// de'i tsho 'khor de'i nang nas byang chub sems
dba' bo mang po'i gtso bo dang ston par gyur pa stong phragabcu snyad stan las langs bar gyur nas/ bla gos phyogs gcig tu byas nas/ pus mo g.yas pa la lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan
[o]'as de la 'di skad cesagasol to// bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyi bus kyis bdag cag rnams ni mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams der mchi zhing/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la nad pa dang
bstan bkur bgyi ba dang/ thabs makhas pa chen po sangs rgyas kyi drin lan bsab pa'i mdo sde dam pa nyan cing mchibs byin gyis rab tu bsol/ de nas sangs rgyas des/ byang chub sems/
dpa' rnams la 'di skadazhes bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu dag khyed me mdzad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams der phyin nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de la mchod cing bkurasti bya bo dang//
kun tu brad dka' ba'i 'du shes bskyod par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ni bskal ba grangs med pa bye ba khrag khrig gi bar du shin tu spyad dka' ba spyad pa sa/ steng
rje chen po'i smon lam 'di skad ces btab bo// gal te man pa la sangs rgyas ban/ 'jig rten gyi khams sdig pa can pa dang/ sha shong dang/ rgya mo dang/ gsago ma dang/ lo ma la sogasab
med ba'i gnas su sems can dag kyang nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa/ mtshamasamad pa lnga dang/ mi dge ba bcu rdzogs par spyad pa'i gnas der mngon nga rasas rgyas te/ ban pa dang byed ba'i rin
du sdug bsngal thams cad yongs su bcad de/ bad pa thams cad dang ldan par byas nas/ chos kyi sku yos su rdzogs shing lhag ma ma lus pa'ichungan las 'das par gyur cig ces snon
lam btab bo// sangs rgyas des thog ma de skad ces sogalan btab pas/khyed rnams 'jig rten gyi khams ded phyin nas/ ji ltar sangs rgyas nyid gshegs pa dang/ ji ltar sangs
rgyas nyid bzhugs pa dang 'dra bar sems par bya zhes bka' stsal pa dang/ byang nub sam dpa' de dag thams cad kyis tshig mthun par bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' bzhin du bgyi'i nas gsol nas byang

chub sems dang 'dedag de 'ang 'khor byang chub sems dpa' byab khrag khri brgya stong stod kyis mos su bskor te/ mamajed kyi 'jig rtenagyi khamasu nub der song sta/ de dag 'jig rten gyi khams gang dang gang du

phyin bar 'jig rten gyi khams rnam pa drug tugayos te/ 'od brel chen po'ang kun tu snang bar gyur/ stong gi bar snang las lha rnams kyis me tog mdar ba dang/ man+da ra ba chen po'ang sa bzhin du phahaM/

pa 'od zer chen pos snang bar byas shing rdzu 'phrul gyis 'jig rten gyi khams gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang g.yos so// de ma yin pa gzhan yang lha rdzas kyi la mo tshad mud pa brgya stong nyid kyang skad
gi bar snang lam dkrol bar rang zer bzhin du/ byang chub sems dang 'a de dag kyang byargod spungs pa'i yig 'badeb de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar lhags nas/ zhabs lamag bos phyag 'tshal te/
sangs rgyas la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de bzhin du phyogs mtshams bzhi dang/ stodadang/ ga gi phyogs dang/ phyogs bcu nas lhags pa'i byang chub sems dapa'/
chen po thams cad kyis so so nas 'khor brgya stong grangs nang pa dang bcas te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der lhags nas/ mchod pa dang bkur sti byas/ ma med pa byas nas/ thams cad kyi mgrin

gcig tu tshigs su bcad pa brgya stong skud kyis bcom ldan 'das la se ngas bstod de// de ltar sangs rgyas la bstodanus kyang phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de'i ra me mdzad kyi 'jig rten gyi khan sakyang nyengs su

dag par gyur te/ ra khrid khrod dang/ ri chen ngo dang/ chung du dang/ gtsang bo dang/ chuklung dang/ mtshe'u dang/ rdzing dang/ lteng ka dang/ shang shong dang/ ngam grog dag mdu rung/ de na gnas pa'i
sems can rnams kyang 'od kyis snang bar byas pas/ saMngs rgyas gangan dag lhags nas dga' zhing mgu ba'i sams kyis thal mo sbyarang datud nas/ mgo bos phyaga'atshal/ mig 'dzunas nga/
gas pa'i yid kyis lta zhing 'khod do// danas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'od zer phyir 'dus par mdzad de/ 'od zer de dag gis sku la lan bdun bskor sa dbu'i spyi gtsug tu nub pa gyur te/ da ltar gyur pa kun
dga' bos mthong nas/ 'khor mang po thams cad kyang the tshom skyes par sems kyis rab tu shasabs/ de bzhin gshags pa'i mdzad pa thabs khas ba mngon nga' bstan pa dang/ phyis ma 'ongs pa'i skya bo dag

gi shes rab kyi mig dbya ba dang/ saso'i skya bo thams cad sred pa'i chu klung las brgal zhing pha gol tu phyin pas bde ba 'ang dgod pa dang/ sa so 'i skye bo dag pha ma dang/slobadaponadang/ nga ma'i phrin lte ba dran zhi shes dar
bya ba'i phyir stan lasalaanas/ gos tshugs su bcos nas bla gos phyogs kha cig tu byas te/ pusachos la btsugs nas thal mo sbyar ba bad de bcon ldan 'dus nad 'di skad ces gsal

ba te// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag kun dga' bos sangs rgyas kyi zhabs 'bring na mchis na 'dzum pa mdzad pa mthong ste/ 'di la nges par dgongs pa namanga' na/ 'khor na nga po'athetson gyi drab bacad pa'i
sa slad du/ bcom ldan 'as kyis bstan du gsol/ sangs rgyas kyis bshad du gsol/ thabs mkhas pa chen posangs rgyas drin lan bsab pa'i mado sdes/ gleng bzhi'i le'u zhes bya ba sta gcig go/
de'i tshe de'i dus na 'khor mang po'i 'dus pa de ni po che sna bdun las byas pa'i pado'asdong po dngul las byas/'dab ma ni gsar las byas (gzhin ning re sha' dus byas

mu tig gi dra bas kun tu brgyan ba gcig de nyid nas byung bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa bzhugs pa las bzhengasanas/ pad+mo de la skyel mo krung bcas nas bzhugs so// de la bzhugs ma

thag tu yongs su dag pa'i sku mngon par bstan to// sku de las lam rgyud lnga'i lus kyi tshogs bstan/ lus kyi phyogs re re la'ang tha dad pa rnam pa khri brgyud stong nyid bstan to/ gzugs rnam du de re re

la'ang sku'i tshogs bstan/ rdul phra rab kyi sku'i gos brgya stong snyad bstan/ sku'i tshogs de dag re re la'ang gang+ga'i klung bzhi'i byamasnyad kyi sku'i tshigs snyad bstan to// gang+gA'i klung bzhi'i bu ma snyad/

kyi skya'i tshogs de dag re re la 'ang glu nga bzhi'i rdul phra rab snyad kyi sku'i tshigs bstan/ rdul phra rab kyi sku'i tshogs de dag re re la'ang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'ge rten gyi khams kyi rdul phra rab snyad kyi sku'i

tshogs bstan to// rdul phra rab kyi sku'i tshogs de dag re re la'ang phyogs bcur phyogs re re yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing bya ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi rdul phralab kyi sku'i tshogs bstananasaM/ nam mkha'i dbyis
kyis klas ba/ chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid kyis sems can gyi lus kyi tshogs mngon par bstan to// de'i chu de bzhin gshegs pas de sud kyi lus kyi rtogs mngon pa'i
bstan nas/ kun dga' bo dang phyogs bcu nas 'dus shing gas pa 'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang/ 'khor mang po rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal te// gas kyi bu dag
dang de bzhin gshegs pas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis yang dgapa'igi gang yin pa de bka' stsal par bya'o// chos la tshig tu brjod pa med modakyi/ de bzhin gshegs pas thabs mkhA
pa'i dbang gis mtshan ma dngaming med pa 'i rjesal mad dang mtshan mas bstan par bya'o// 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni thog mar skyes shing 'khor ba'i tsha bsamagyis mi khyab pa'i rdul
phrarab snyad kyi lus kyi tshogs rnam pa tha dad pa de dag thams cad rdzogs par myong ste/ de ltar lus kyi gas de dag kumyong bas na/ samasacan thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i pha ma'am gyur pa/
med de bzhin gshegs pas kyang sems can de dgag pha ma'am gyur pa mad de/ mar gyur ba thams cad kyi phyi'i rgyan du shin tu spyad dka' ba dang spyad/ shan zhugatadaka' ba'i yan lag

gi dam pa go dung/ mag dang/ klong rgyas dang/ yul dang/ grong khyer dang/ chung ma dang/ bu lodrang/ ba glang dang/ rta dang/ ni dror sna bdunagyi shing rta dang/ theg pa dang/ gos dang/ zas dang/ skom dang/ mal

chadang/ nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang// gos pa ni yo byad thams cad gang yang ma btang ba med de// shin tu 'bad pa 'bartson 'grus kyis tshul khrims bsrungs pa dang/ sbyin pa byas pa dang/ mang du thos pa dang/

bsam cagatan bsgomApa dang/ shes rab spyod pa nas/ spyod par dka' ba thams cad spyad de/ skyo ba dang ngal ba mad cing/ rgyun 'chad par brtson 'grus su 'bod pa'i ng bam la sri zhu bya ba dang/ drin zhes pa/
dang drin lan bsabang dang/ sems can thams cad myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la dgod pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs ba'i sngon gyi smon lam yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang/ de
ltar na sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi bka' drin chen po yod par shes par bya ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rjen pos sems can yongs sumagatang pa dang/ rtag par shin tu thab
mkhas pas/khams gsum pa'i srid pa nyi shu rtsa lngar gnas pa 'i sems can thams cad la bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i bar du mnyam snyoms pa'i byams pa bsgoms shing/ btang snyoms dang

ldan pa'i thabs makhas pa stod de/ sems can thams cad stong pa nyid du rtogs pa dang/ chos stong pa nyid dang/ phung po lnga stong pa nyid du rtogs shing phyi man ba dang/ mi 'bying ba dang/ mi rgong nga stong nga
nyid du yang dag pa'i mtshan nyid la bsam bsabs bsgom par bya ba dang/ theg pa gsum m spyo zhing kun chub par slob pa'i thabs mkhas pas/shan tuwang ro 'i spyod yul dmang spyad nga la thabs mkhas/

pa'i bya ba'i phyir/tshes kyi mtshan nyidal shin tu gsal bar rtogs te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams thog ma dang tha ma'i bar du cigAm yan par rtogs shing dud pas/ so so'i skya bo ga nirtsisashing bslad
pas gdung ba gsum gyis yongs su gdungs te/ sdug bsngal gyi mtshor nub par gyur to// phyin ci log bzhis bsgribs nga sa zag po dang bcas pa'i don la phyin ci log tu gyur to//
ma bden par kun tu rtogs pas bdag med ba la bdag tu lta/ mi rtag pa la rtag par lho/ mi bde ba la bde bar lta/ mi gtsang ba la gtsang bar lta zhing/ skya ba dang/ rga bdang/
na ba dang/ 'chi bas gzir te/ skad cig tu mi rtag pas bsgribs pa lnga dang// kun nas glags pa bcus kun tu klugs te/ srid pa gsum du 'khor zhing skya sha thog ma dang bram
med pa myong nga ra gyur te/ de bas na de bzhin gshegs pas ci dang 'i 'phrod pa bzhin sde snod gsum dang/ mngosdodagunas mdo sde bcu gnyis kyi bar du rnam par phyazhing bstan te/
[z]na@#// so so'i 'dod pa bzhin mdo sde mang bogasungs so// gi la chags pa ba nug bdagama'ang khonasareg sta skya3na las 'das pa thog ces 'dzin pa'i ng yod de//
de'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngon gyi thugs rje chen po'i smon lam gyi shugs kyis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na 'as mthun pa thams cad bsdus so// de ltar las na thun
pa kun 'dus pas/ 'khor mang po'i dkyil 'khor 'de dam pa'is mdo sde gsungs par dgos te/ gzugs brnyan gyi sa nam du rgyun mi 'chad cing/ so so'i skya ba thams
cad bde panon po thob par mdzad do// de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa 'dul zhing ston pa'i ng dus las ma yol bar gshegs/ dusalas ma yol ba mya ngan las 'da' 'o//
'jig rten gyi khams kha cig de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad ces bya ba dgu bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs
rgyakha/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'akha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa// ston pa rgyal ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhes grags so// skabs kha cig tu na dga' ldan/
gnas su gshegs nas lha rnams kyi ston pa mdzad do/[0f38]skabs kha cig tu na dga' ldan gyi gnas nas babs te/ 'dzam bu'i gling du skutsho'abargyad la bzhugs por ston to// de
bsan de bzhin gshegs pa na bsam gyis ma khyab bo// 'jig rten gyi khams kyang bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ ]las rnam par smin pa'i ng bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sems can
yang bsam gyis ma khyab bo// bsam gtan gyi tadang 'dzin yang bsam gyis mi khyab bo// klu'i mthu'ang bsam gyis mi khyab bo// 'dan sangs rgyas bsam gyis ma/
khyab pa ste/ sems can thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyi thugs la dgongs pa shes par 'dod na/ []sems can dbang po zhan nga tha ma'i bar du'ang kun shes bar mdzad de//
