sems can thams cad las gang yang sangs rgyas mthong bar 'dod na/ de ma thag tu mthong bar mdzad do// gal te mthong bar ma mdzad na/ mig sngar bab kyang mi mthong ngo// de ngas
natan thes dang rang sangs rgyas dwag lha'i mig gi mngon pa shes pa yod kyang mthong bar mi nus so// de ma yin pa gzhan yang sa sa rgyusakyis 'od zer cher bskyed nas/ srid nga 'i rtsa
mo man chad mtshan sa med pa 'i sam sa can dmyal ba yan chad snang bar mdzad kyang/ gang 'dul ba'i skal ba dang ldan pa ni mthong bar 'gyur/ gang skal ba dang mi ldan nga ni mig sngan/
bab kyang ma mthong ngo// de bzhin gshegs pa skabs kha cig ni rnyid du skal ba mdzad/ skabs kha cig tu na cing mi gsung bas na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni sam gyis mi khyab ste/
1// shin tu dpag par dka' ba/ shin tu shes shing rtogs par dka'an/ ji ltar khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la spyod pa dka' ba shin tu zab mo dri ba la stobs par gyur
khyod kyis zhus pa 'don yang dag par sems can thams cad la byams shing snying brtse ba yin te/ ngan 'gro gsum gyi 'a ma bkag nas lha dang mi'i lamagatod pa yin no// kun dga' bo ngasaM da
khyod la pham la sri zhu bya ba'i spyod dka' ba'i mad tsam zhig bstan par byas/ legs par nyon la yid la zung zhig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo dang/ byang chub sams dang 'a
sems dang 'dun po rnams dang/ 'khor mang po rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sngon byung ba bsal pa redamang pa mtha' yas grangs med pa 'dus pa'i pha rol na//
yul zur Nasimasus rgyas rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas g pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ pad bar gshegs pa/ 'jig
rten mkhyen pa// skyes bu 'bul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa// ston pa rgyal ba/ 'jig rten gyi gtso// lha dang mi'i ston pa 'jig rten du byung ngo// sangs rgyas de'i sku tshab tshad
kyang bskal pa rud du t+taMshur bzhugs so// dam pa'i chos kyang bskal pa chung du nyi shur gnas so// gzugs brnyan gyi chos kyang bskal pa chung ngu zhi la gnas so// gzugs portan l
[o]chos spyod pa'i/ mi'i rgyal po ra tsa zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung sta/ yul wA rA Nas la dbang sgyur ro// rgyal po de la btsunamo ni nyi khri yod/ blon po ni bzhi stong dang yod/ la
gyi glang po che'ang lnga brgya yod/ rgyal phran drug cu la dbang/ grong khyer brgyad brgya zhig yod rgyal po de la bugasum yod de/ de gsum char yang rgyal phranar ra byed do// de'i tshe
de'i dus na yul wArA Na si'i rgyal po de mkhas pa'i shes rab dang ldan// rtag tu'ang dam ba'i chos kyis yulagyi srid 'dzin pas/ gang yang stams las chad ces bya ba med de//
rgyal po'i bsong nams dang yon tan gyimathus char chu dus las mi yol ta/ lo tog rgyun du legs pas/ de na gnas pa'i mi rnams kyang deng skyod do// de'i tshe na wA ra sa'i
rgyal po de la blon po chen pa sgra gcan zhes bya ba zhig yod do// blon po sgra gcan rgyal po la 'khus nas/ dmag rnam bzhi bshams pa la 'di lta ste/ ba glang gi tshogs dang/ shing
rta'i tshogs dang/ rta'igs dang/ dpung bu chung gi tshogs bshams nas/ wA rA Na si'i rgya la pol brgal nasargyal po'i srog bcad do// de ltar rgyal po bsad nas kyang dmag gi
tshegs rnam pa bzhi bkye nas/ mtha'i rgyal phran bu rang kyang bsad do// de nas rgyal bu 'bring po'ang phab nas/ mtha'i rgyal phran rgyal bu thachung gi thog tu dmag drang por bshams
ga so/ rgyal bu tha chung de ngo mtshar du gzugs byad bzang la 'phags par mdzes shing/ rang bzhin gyis dge ba dulal/ 'dzum zhing smra ba/ smra'o cog kyang phan pa'i
don du sna 'ang 'gyur gyi/ gnod pa med pa rtag tu drang po'i chos kyis yul gyi srid 'dzin te/ leg ngas ma 'tsho bas yul mi rnams kyang bde skyid la bar/ longs sbyod dang nor ni/
na pa mar ldan ng/ bang mdzod gang ba/ rgyal po de'i yon tanal kun gyis bsngags shing bstod pa/ 1 bar snang gi lha dang 'jig rten gyi lha thams cad kyisakyang dga' zhing bkur ba/dra'i/
tshe na rgyal po de la rgyal bu su kha de ba zhes bya ba gcig pu zhig yod de/ shin tu yid gzhungasashing gsal ba/ byams pa'i sems dang ldan pa// sbyin pa la dga' ba/ lus kyi
mdog gsar du 'dug pa/ gnas bdun mnyam par gang bra/ skyes bu'i mtshan gas pa'i ldan ba/ le bdun lon pa zhig yod pa da' yab rgyal po'ang shin tu byams shing
sdug bar sems so// de'i tshon pho brang bsrung ba'i lha zhig la po de la 'di skad ces smras so// rgyal po mkhyen tam/ blon po sgra gcan 'khus nas yul srid thogs te/ rgyal
bo yob kyang bkros/ dmag gi tshogs bzhibang bkyanas/ rgyal po gcin gnyis kyang srog gi dbang po dang phral te/ dmag gi tshogs rnams ring po mi thogs par bar phyin na
rgyal po ci'i phyi'i srog skyabs shing gud du ma 'gro/ de'i tshon rgyal po des de bskad ces smras pa thos nas/ lus kyi ba spu kun zing zhes byed de/ lus kyang bab nas yinug cing mya ngan gyis sems

gdus te sa la 'gro shing brgyal bar gyur nas/ ring zhig lon pa dang cung brad sangs te dal gyis nam mkha'i lha la 'di skad ces smras so// 'di ltar stsa ba'i skad ni yod lagazugs ni mi snang ba khyod yin/
smras pa'i tshig 'de yad dag par bden nam/ lhas smras pa/ bdag ni rgyal bo'i pho brang srung ba'i lha yin te/ rgyal po khyod shes pa dang ldan zhing bsod nams dang yon tan du bcas pas/
drang po'i ngos kyis yul srid 'dzin te/ de bas na bdag gis sngar smos pa yin te/ sdug bsngal gyis nyon mongs par ma gyur bar myur du byol zhing 'gro ba'i gsaso// de nas rgyal po de ngo brang du
zhugs nas/ da ni bdag yul gzhan zhig tu 'gro dgos so snyam du bsams so// yang 'di snyam du bsams so// yu la parol tu 'gro ba'i lam gnyis yod de// 'am zhe bar zhugs na ni
zhag bdun gyis pha rol tu phyin par 'gyur 1 lam ring por zhugs na nizhag bcu bzhis phyin par 'gyur pas/ tsa nas lam nye bar 'gro'o snyam bsams nas/ zhag bdun gyi brgyags dang
nas te pho brang gi pha'o 'o tu phyin pa dang/ phyir pho brang gi nang du le gnas / rgyal bu su sha de ba pang du blangs te/ migami 'dzums par lta ning sngangs pa ltar lasanas phyir yang 'dug go/
rgyu ga de'i ro na btsun mos de ltar mi bde zhing skyag pa ltar gyur pa mthong nas/ rgyal bo 'a'adi skad ces gsol to// rgyal po chen po 'i slad du 'jigs skrag pa lta bu 'agazug
ston pa'i/ sku la'ang rdul gyis gos ba lta bu sku'ang 'dzing sa te/ dbugs kyang mi bde ste yul ston la shugapa a/ mdza' sdug pa dang byi ba ma/ dgra sdang ba dang phrad ba lta bu dang//
ts+tsa bkam shes pa'imtshan ma dag gda' ba tsalags bstan du gsol// rgyal pos smasar/ kho de runyis pa khyod kyis shes pa ma yin gyis ma smra zhig/ btsun mos gsol pa//
bdag dang rgyal bo lus gzugasaganyis kyang sems gcig ste/ dpal na bya'i 'dab ma gnyis sam/ lus kyi rkang pa gnyis sam/ mgo'i mig gnyis sam/ de dang 'dra na
no ci'i slad du bdagalags ng snyam gsung/ rgyal pos/ btsun mo lasnas pa// khyod la shes sam/ blon po sgra gcan n gnas ems skyes nas/ rgyal po la 'bus te/
yab rgyal po'ang bkros te/ gcen rgya'abu'ang [ ] sogagi bar chad byas a/ da lta dmag dang rgyas te nga largol du 'ongs bas lo yulagazhan du 'byol du 'gro zhes lcas nas/ 'gas bu dag don
bad du blangs te lam du zhugaso// de nas btsun mo'ang rgyal po'i phyi 'brangs te song ngo/ de'i ni rgyal po mya ngan gyis non te yid 'khrugs nas/ zhag bcu bzhi'i lam du zhugs pas lam yang nor

te lam de'ang 'grod dka' zhing nang rtsub tsam yang medade/zhag dum zhig song ba las brgyags kyang dado// thog ma gsang sargyal bo gcig du 'gro bar byas nas/ zhag bdun gyi brgyags las kyang ma brjod palas
lam yang nor/mi gsum gyis kyang khros te/ zhag bcu bzhi'i lam du zhugs s// dadung 'a ma de nig yod pa las/ brgyags chad nas/ de'i tshe rgyal po dang btsun mos skad phyung nas dus
so/ kyi dud kyi cud re sdug thog ma btsas nas da tsam gyi bar du 'di 'dra ba ma myong ba du 'di'i myong bar gyur te/ da 'di sdug cing 'phongs so zhes zer te dag nga sa mgo la brdabs so/ des
la lag nang lus la rdul gyis gos nas/ tshuga'adi skad du sna sngags 'don to// bdag cag gas tshusngam la sdig pa mi dag pa'i las ci zhig byas/ 'on te pha ma dang dgra bcom pa
bsad dam/ 'on te dam pa'i chos la skyag pa btab bam/ 'on te mthun pa'i dge 'dun gyi dbyen bgyis sam/ 'on te rngon pa dang nya pa byas sam/ 'on te srung dang bu bcos te pha rol
la ga rloms byas ma/ 'on te dge 'dun gyi nor la sbyod spyod dus/ nye dus na 'di 'dra ba'i sdug bsngal myong bar gyur cig gu/ de skad snang zhing cung zad bstenani dgrasae bas// srog
gar chad nges par 'byung/ lam du zhugs nas 'gro ni bkres pa dang skom pa/sa nyananas srog la bab tu ma'o// rgyal po dang btsun mo de lta bu'i sdug bsngal gyis nyon te skad phyung
sta dus pa dang/ sa la bskyal nas brgyal bar gyur to// de nas ring zhig len pa dang sas nas 'di snyam du/ gsum m lhan cig tu 'di kho nas 'chi bar
'gyur gyis/ btsun mo bsad pa bdag drang bu 'i srog thar par bya'o snyam bsams nas/ ral gri phyung ste btsun mo bsad par bshams pa dang rgyal bu dag den gyis rgyal
po'i lag pa nas bzung ste/ da ltar ci zhig mdzad dgongs zhes gsol to// yab rgyal pos mig nas mchi mas gang bzhin du rgyal bu la 'di skad ces smras so// khyod kyi
ma btsun mo dam pa bsad la khyod kyi srog gso snyam mo// gal te ma bsad kyang rang 'chi bar 'gyur te// kho bo na'achi'am gson yang rung na/ bu khyod kyi srog gso ba'i phyir//
khyod kyi ma btsun mo bsad snyam mo// de nas rgyal bu dge don gyis/ yab rgyal po ka'adi skad ces gsol to// gal te btsun mo bsad par gyuran/ de'i sha la bdag mi
'tshal te/ gang na'ang ma 'a shal bu za ba mi srid pas/ bdag kyang 'chi bar 'gyur na/ yab rgyal po ba'i slad du bdag bkum sta pa ma'i srog thar par me mdzad/ yab
rgyal pos de skad ces smras pa thos nas/ mod 'khams te 'gyel nas sa la 'gro zhing rgyal bu la 'di skad ces smras so// khyod kho bo'i mig dang 'dra na su rang gi mig phyung
ste khra bas byed/ kho bo deshi 'ang ba bsadu phyi la sod do// bu bsad de sha za ma nus so// de nas rgyal bu dge don gyis/ yang yab rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to//
gal te mang yum gyis bar g pa kum sha khrag kya'ang po ma thogs par tshul sums nas dgos pa ma mchis par 'gyur te/ bdag gi gsol ba gcig gcig ma ga'ang na byams
pa'i yab yum ma lags pas/ bdag gi sad dang mi 'gal bar mdzad du gsal/ de nas yab rgyal pos sras rgyal bu la khyod kyi yid dang mi 'gal bar bya bas/ ni
gsol ba 'i rnams myur du smos shig ces bsgo ba dang/ rgyal bu dge don kyis/ yab rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to// yab yum gyis pa dag la thugs brtse ba'i
spyod du/ nyin re ba zhin bdag gi lus las sha rgya mgasum gsum bcad de/ rma gnyis ni yab yum la 'bul// chagacig na bdag rang 'tshalan/ lus srog
gzungs su 'gyur ro// de nas rgyal pos kyang rgyal bus gsol ba bzhin du gnang nas/ nyin gnyisog bzhin sha rgya ma gsum bcad de/ cha gnyis na rgyal po dang btsun mos
za/ ru gcig ni rgyal bu dang bla ste/ lus dang srog gi zungs byas nas/ lam du zhugs te song ba las/ zhag gnyis kyis yul pha ma slob pa'i rgyal bu'i lus kyi sha b+bad da
rus ba 'tshig sa dang chung tsam zhige 'brel te/ srog gi lhag ma tsam zhig lus nas sa la 'gyel to// de nas rgyal po dang btsun mos rgyal bu phang du blangs nas/
skadachen po byung nas tshonges btang ste 'di skad ces snas so/ dwanged gnyis kyis ma rig par khyod kyi sha khros te/ khyed 'di lta bu'i na tsha'i sdug bsngal myong bar gyur la/ las
yang da dung 'ang bas khyod kyi 'dus kyi shan zad de/ dan lhan cig tu gnas 'di'i ro bzhag go/ de nas rgyal bu dge don gyis/ skad chung dus yab rgyal po la 'di skad ces
gsol la// da ni 'di nas pha rol tu zhag gcig tsam gyi lam las ma lus te/ bdag ni g.yo zhing bskyodam nus pas srog 'di'i 'dod ro// rgyal po dang btsun mo na
ma ma rabs ngan pa ltar lhan cig tu gnas 'di'i rdo gzhag go la gsungs shig/ bdag la byams shing thugs brtse bar dgongs na/ bdag gis bsam pa dang mi 'gal
bar mdzad du gsol/ da dung yang bdag ba nus pa'i gseb na sha ca yod pa ma lus na btogs la yul pha rol tu gshegs su gsol/ de nas rgyal pos yang rgyal
bus gsol ba bzhin du/ tshags dang dus nga' gsab sha cu yod pa nga tog gsanas chu gsum du bgos te/ chaganyis ni rgyal bo dang btsun mos zos na/ mgacig ni
rgyal bus zos te/ rgyal bo dang btsun ma'ang lam du zhugs nas deng de// rgyal bu dag don langs nas 'greng bzhin du rgyal po dang btsun mo song ba la lta'o// rgyal ngo
dang btsun mo gnyis skad phyung nas du bzhin song nas/ rgyal bu dag don gyis mug gas ma sod kyi bar du rgyal bo dang btsun mo la chags pa'i sams kyis mig mi 'dzums par
lta pa lta nas ra ji zhig len pa dang/ phyir sa la 'gyel to// sha dang khrag gu dri bro bas phyogs bcunas sbrang ma dang sha sbrang mang po 'dus nas/ rgyal bu yog patsam du lus
la bla zhade'ajus te/ sdug bsnga la gyis gdungs so// de'i tshon rgyal bu de srog gi lhag ma tsam zhig ma chad de/ skad phyud nas 'di skad ces smon lam btab bo//
bdag gi sngon gyi mi dge ba'i las rnams ni 'dis byang zhung brad par gyur cig/ deng slan chad mi bgyid do// bdag gi lus pa mal phul te/ sbyin pa byas pas
bdag gi pha ma snga ma bas lhag pa'i bsod nams bcu gcig dang ldan te/ bde bar nyal ba dang/ bde bar sad pa dang/ rmi lam ngan pa ma rmi ba rung/ ltas bsrung
pa dang/ mis bkur ba dang/ zhal mchudang/ rkun po dang/ dgra dang/ chu ste khyod pa med cing/ dus thams cad du bkra shis par shog cig/ bdag gi lus lhag ma tsam sha
khrag sbrang ma 'byin pas thams cad du 'grangasashing rim par gyur te/ bag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na sangs rgyas grub pa bshog cig/ sas rgyas su grub nas chos kyi sku thob nas kyang/chos kyi
skus thams cad kyabakres skomaba'iluge dang/ skyashir 'khor ba 'i nad rtsib sel bar shog cig/ rgyal pus de skad smon lam btab bzhi/gnamasa'ang rnam bsdug tug yos/nyima'ang 'damigs bdu gyur/

gcan gzan dang ra gas rnams kyang sa gnas kun tu rgyag/ rgya mtsho'ang rab tu 'khrugs/ rab kyang 'gul zhing ldeg/ sum cu rtsa gsum gnam gyi bar du'ang rab tu g.yos so// de'i tshe rgyarten lha'i dbang pos
'dod pa'i khamasakyi lha dag dang/ 'dzam bu'i gled dag tu babs nas/ rgyal bu don grub bsdigs pa'i byin/ song gdang/ stag dang/ 'phar sbyang la sogs pa'i lus su sprul nas mig bgrad/ khagadas

spu bsgreng nas skad chen po 'di'i byung ste/ rgyal du lan da dra ba'anabasdebasas// de'i tshorgyal bu don grub kyis gcan gzan khro bo de dag mthong nas kyang yod mi chabs 'di skad ces smos so// khyed rnams kho bo tha

'dod ci bder bro zhage/ 'di 'dra ba'i mthu rtsa 'gyas bsdigs ci dgos zhes bsgra'o// de nas brgya byin lha'i dbang pos snas pa/ bdag cagan soge'am gcan gat+tanam yin te/ brgya byin lha'i dbang po yin te/

[]khyod bgam zhangasad du 'os so// de'i rgyal dus brgya byin lha'i dbang po mthong nas shin tu dga' mgur rangs par yang gyur to// de nas brgya byin gyis/ rgyal bu la snusapa/ khyod kyis shin tugatang dka' gtang
0 ga'us kyi sha khrag gas bam la bstabs pa 'di'i bsod nams kyis khyod bdud kyirgyal por 'dod m 'on tatsus pa'i rgyal po bded dam/ lha'i dbang po 'am/ mi'i rgyal po 'a/ 'khor los skyar nga 'i
rgyal po 'dod/ rgyal bus smras pa/ bdag ni bdud kyirgyal po'am/ tshosapa ma/ lha'i rgyal bo 'am/ mi'irgyal po 'am/ 'khor los sgyur ba'irgyal po gang yang ma 'dod de/ sems can thams tsong rnam

bar rgyab bya ba'i phyir/ bla na med pa yang dag pa rdzogasang 'i byang chub 'dod do// brgya byin gyis sbas pa/khyod ni shin tu'angagayug zhig yin pa 'dra/banamad pa yang dag nga rardzogs pa'i byang chub n
unarang bo nas shin tu dka' bas bsgrubs pas gzod 'grub ca'o// khyod kyis shin tu sdug bsngal b bzod dam/rgyal bus smras po// galategs kyi 'khor lo 'bar ba bdagagi spyi bo'asteng na rgyun tu bo

yang sdug bsngal de tsam gyis bdag blanam pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub lasaphyi muldogogo/ brgyan gyis smras pa// khyod kyis smras pa stong pa 'di'i su zhig yid nyes par 'gyur/ de nas rgyal bus dam bcas
nas smon lam 'di skad ces btab bo// gal te bdag gi snanga' ga brdzun telha'i dbang po bslus par gyur// bdag gi lus kyi rna bde nam du 'ang 'tshub 'gyur// gal ta snaba'i tshig bden na bdag gi

lus kyang sor chud cing khrag kyang 'omar gyur cig ces smras m thagatu/ lus kyi 'ang sdom kho na bzhin sor chud de/ khrag kyang mar gyur nas/ rgyal bu'i byadagazugs kyang snga ma bas lhag par bzang zhing ga
[ ]/ba dang mdzes par gyur te/ langs nas lha'i dbang po' dang nga la mgo bos phyag byas so// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis rgyal du khyed legs so//shin tu legs so// shin dga'/

ba'i brtson 'grus kyis gdonami za bar dran med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob pa ba'agyuro/ nga bar mi thogs par bu namad pa yang dag pa rdzogs pa'ibyang chub thob pa na/ thogamar bdag gi

den mdzad par gyur cig/ces smras nas/ brgya byin lha'i dbang po'ang nam mkha'i phyogs de nyid dumi snang bar gyur to// de'i rgyal po dang btsun mo'ang rgyal po de'ango de'i drung du phyin nas/rgyal po des kyang rgyang ma

nas bsunas/dgos pa'i khyad yodabazhin du sbyar ro// de'i tshargyal bodang btsun mo des rgyal bus lus kyi sha khrag gis pham la ltar bstabs pa rgyal po de la zhib tu brjod pa dang/ rgyal po des ji ltar brjod pa de

dag thos nas/ rgyal bu de'i lus kyi sha khrag giso pham la bstabs pas su zhu chen byas pa'i drani lan bsab nas/ dmaga rnamabazhib[%]mas nas rgyal ba de dang yul wA rA Nasi'i dmag drangs so// de'i tshorgyal po/

de dmaga rnam bzhi dang chas nas lam du zhugs te/ rgya'adu dang bral ba'i gnas su phyin pa dang/ 'di snyam du bdag gdun gdon mi za bar 'di nyid du shin/ bu'adus pa tsam bsdus te phyir bdagagi yul du bskur ro//

snyam du sams nas/ skad phyung nas duyong bu'i rus bu sdud dusod song ba las/ rgyang ma nas bdag gi bu'i lus kyi rma 'ang sosanas/ sngam bas bzang zhing mdzes te srung du 'osaso// de nas rgyal pos pad

[4a ]blangs te/ khyod da dung gsonanam zhes snas pa dang/ rgyal bu'i ji ltar gyur pa yab rgyal po dang btsun ma las so// rgyal po dang btsum 'ang tu dga' ste/ thams cad ba glang la zhon nas/ phyir bdag gi yul du phyi

pa dad/ rgyal bu de'i bsod nas de'i mthus bdag gi yul yang phyir thob nas/ rgyal bun grub rgyal por dengang bskur te rgyal por bcugage/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa// de'i tshe de'i

dus na yab rgyal por gyur ba de gzhan yin snyam du khyod sems// de de lta ma blta'o// deci'i phyogs zhen/ de'atshade'i dus na yab rgyal po de ni da ltar da'i yab zas gtsang ma zhes bya bar gyur to// de'i tshapa'i dus na

um du gyur pa de na gzhan yin pa snyam du khyod sems na/ de de ltar mi blta'o// de nad ltar nga'i yum lha mdzes zhes bya ba yin/ de'ang de'adus na rgyal bu don grubaces bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam du

khyod sems na/ de de ltar mibalta'o// de'i tshe'i dus na rgyal bu de ni da ltar shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba nga yin// de'i ri de'i dusan brgya byin lha'i dbang por gyur pa da ltar kun shesako'u da na zhes bya ba yin/[]
bcom ldan 'das kyis pham la sla zhu byed pa'i le'u 'debastan pa'i6/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khord na byang bsams/dpa' khri phrag nyi'u skad kyis 'gro ba thams cud la phan pa dang bde ba'i don la mkhas pa'i
gagi spobs pa thob par gyur to// byed chub sems dang 'a khri phrag bcu gnyis kyis ma skye ba'i chos kyi bzad pa thob bo// gzhan yang phyogs bcu nas 'dus pa'i[]na thos dang/ rang sa das rgyas dang//
0 @#/ rdul phra ba stod kyis theg pa gnyis kyisams spangs te/ theg pa gci'i gsa mthar phyin par gyur to/ dge bsnyen dang dge bsnyan majul bsnyad kyi 'bras bu dang po nas/ theg ba
gnyis kyi 'bras bu'i bar du thob par gyur to// lhadang mibargya stong nyid ni named pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang sems bskyed de// dem yin pa lha dang/ klu dang/ yi dgas dang/ lha ma yin dang/

drib dang/ namam ba' lding dang/ mi'am ci dang/ lta 'dza chen po dang/ mi dang/ mi ma lags pa la sogs bamang po rnams la ni bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pas/ nyan thos dang rangasas rgyas
kyi bar du sems bskyed bgyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis/ kun dga' bo la bka' saang/ byang chub sems dpa' dag gis sems can thams cad kyi don du pham lasonubya ba'i phyir/ lus kyisha khrag gis
kyang nga ma la bltabasashing/ shin tu dadaka' ba spyod pa 'dinyapu yin// 'khor mang po thams cad kyisasas rgyas kyis gsungs pa thos nas/ soso saban pa dang bdaba'i dored de/ dga' rangs nas
mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ g.yas phyogosanas bskor ba byas nas phyir dang// thabs mkhas pa chen ngosangasargyus drin lan bsab pa'i mdo las/ sri zhubale'u zhes bya ste gnyis pa'o//
mi/ bamaboganyis pa/ de'i tshod 'dusanabcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor mang po'anan/ 7ma'i dkyil 'khor gyis skabu mamadapozil gyis mnan pa lta bu ma/ klu

'khyil pa'i 'dzatshon lta 'dazhing gsal ba yapa lta mi gas pa bzhinanam/ bsams na yid 'phrul nga yang 'od zer lcam me lhang nger bzhugs te/ dper na mi bzod pa nasrin bum khyer gyi 'od nyamasham thag dumi snang
ba bam/ nyi b+hU la 'od zer brgya stong snyad yod kyang/ brgya byin gyi drung sol phung lta bu 'am/ brgya byin la 'od gasal ba yod kyang/ tshangs pa chen ba'i 'od zer gyi drung na rgya 'am/
gsag ma lta bu 'am/ mnaM na mo dang/ nor bu rin po che'i dadubasgron ba tsam mam/ tshongs pa'i rgyal po chen po li'od zer dam pa brgya stong snyad yod pa'i 'od thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs
pa'i 'od byed gyi drung nasal ba'i phung po ltar gyur to// de ci'i phyir zhan/ ngobazhin gshegs ba'i 'od zer mdog gang gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu snang bar gyur te/ de dag na
gnas pa 'i sems can dga' 'od zer na regan/ dmus long mig gisagazugs mthong pa 'gyur/ lus sgur po ni lus nangs par 'gyur/ dbang po nyams pa rnams ni dbang po tshang zhing yan lag dag/

nying lag dang ldan pa ru 'gyur te/ myos pa rnams ni dran ba phyi rnyed pa 'gyur/ mdo na jitsam du yid du mi'ong ba thams cad dang bral 'dod pa bzhes thob par 'gyur ro// de'i tshe 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor/
de nyid du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdun cu snyad stan las lasanas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan brgya stong bskor ba byas nas/ phyogs gcig tu
'khod do// thams cad kyis skadamathun par tshigs subacad ba brgya stong gis de bzhinagshegs pa la mngon bar bstod pa byas pa 'di lta ste/ byang nub sems dpa' bsam
gyis mi khyab pa dang/ byatshubasams pa'i rtog mdadabyangs dang/ byang chub sems dpa' bade ba'agazhigasems dang/ byang chub sems dpa' dri ma med pa grags pa dang/ byang nubasanas
dpa' tshad mad dbyangs dang/ byang chub sems dpa' grags pa chen podang bong bsams dpa' gtsug bud 'od dang/ byanguchub sems dpa' brtan nga 'isang go dang/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ba'
zhig rol dang/ byang chub sems dapa'i rtog pa spong dang 1 byang chub sems dpa' ye shesabartsegs dang/ byang chub sems dpa' dge gnas blo gros dang/ byang chub sems dpa' rtag tumtshan
med dang/ byang chub sems dpa' blo gros 'od bab dang/ byang chub sems dpa' khro zhi blo gros dang/ byang chub sems dang shin tusrung 'gyur dang/ byang chub sems dpa' dad pa brtson dang/
byang chub sems dba'am toga'aphags dang/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bde dang/ byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa'i shes rab las dang/ byang nubasams dpa' ngo 'phral 'tshang dang/
byang chub sems dpa' basamadumed dang/ byang chub sems dpa' tshangs pa srinadang ( byang chub sems dpa' rin chen las dang/ byang chubs mas dpa' ma tog gnasadang///
bung bsems dang gshin tusems dang/ byang chub sems dbab dang gnad ches dang/ byang chub sems dpa' grags pa'i yid dang/ byang chub sems dpa' skyobasapa brtsegs dang/ byang chub
somasadaba' dbang phyug sgodang/ byang chub sams dpa' stobs bcu dang/ byang chung sems dpa' stobs bcu'achangadang byang chub soms dngopa' 'phags pa chen pos skyong dang gdung sems
dba' 'dus med pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' na bu rol dang/ byang chub sems dang 'dona gnas dang/ byang chub sems dpa' grangs med lta dang/ byang chub sems dang ba'i 'od dang/
byang chub sems dpa' rab tu lci ba'i sdong po dang/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyu bas 'phags dang/ byang chub sems dpa' gcig pu 'gro dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i gzi brjidi 'bags dang/
byang chub sems dapa' sngachen khams dang/ byang chub sems dpa' ris skyob dang/ byang nubasoms dpa' 'jig rten gsum 'dzazhidang/ byang chub sems dapa' bo'athul yod dang/ byang
chub sems dang 'khrugs pa brjod dang/ byang chub sems dpa' nyi 'od gsal dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sangagebatsan dang 1 byang chub samos dang 'dus tshod rgyal podang/ byang chub sems
dpa'i seng ge 'i snying podang/ byang chub sems dpo'isrida mngon ston dang/ byang chub sems dapa ba'od rgyang gs ladang/ byang chub sems dpa' sangage'i dang/ byang chub sems dpa' srid
ka/ len byed dang/ byang chub sems dbang rgyal babyin dang/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyalatshana mchog dang/ byang chub sems dapa' gcan gu'angs dang/ byang chub sems
bab brtson 'grus brtan dang/ byang bsams dpa' 'gribs da dung/ byang chub sems dba'akhrags ldan dang byang chub sems dang 'jigs med dang/ byang chub sems dpa' m chagasalha dang/ byang chub
gnas dang 'thonam chen bo dang/ byatshubasems dpa' 'jig rtenubod dang/ byang chub sems dpa' mkha'i dbyas dang/ byang chub sems dpa' thabs rten stobs dang/ byang chub sems dang 'a mun nag gsal
dang byang chub sems dba'amanyam med phyogs la sogs ba bya chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar yi dam 'di skad bcasaso// bdag cag rnams kyis bcom ldan
khadas mya ngan las 'das pa'i'ogatusangs rgyas kyis bsrung zhing/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu rgyas par bgyi zhing rgyun mi 'chadapar bgyi'o// ci'i slad du zhe na/ bdag cag gis de
bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer dam pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa mthong nas/ 'od zer dedag las sangs rgyas kyichos bas ma gyisami khyab pa mang thos par gyur/ sa dag thos nas sems kyi sgrib pa dang bral
te[ ]kun nas nyon mongs pa thams cad byang nas/ lha'i rin po che gser ltar sems rnam par dag pa 'ag bas/ thams cad gsal bar snang bar gyur pa'i phyir ro// bdag cag gis phan pa dang bde ba'i
yon na 'di lta bu dag nang sade bzhin gshegs ngal ston pachen por 'du shes skyes so// byamasapa'i pha ltabu'i 'du sa skyas nas rtag tusaargyus kyi bka'an dran te/ sangs rgyas kyi bka'
drinashes par bgyid do// de ci'i slad du zhen/ ma pa'i chos thos pas ring po ma thogs par byang chub kyasnying po' 'dug cing/ dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor 'baskor te/ sems can thams cad sgrol
bar 'gyur re// de dag kyang chos thos pas thun mudang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thobang rgyu pa'i 'o// danas de bzhin gshegs pas 'khor mang bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/
byang chub sems dpa' sems dang 'drenapobadun cu po 'di dag na'ang pos bskal pa grangs 'dapabye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi rdul phra rab kyi sngolan/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'as gang+ga'i klung gtum

brgya stong snyad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rdul phra rab snyadal bstun bkur byas te/ sangs rgyas de dag las rtag tutshangs par spyad pa spyod cing/ rgyal bdedagalami skyo ba'i sems kyis mnyes par byas nas/
khyams pas bdag lus bsrungasate/ sangs rgyas kyi chos 'dzin cing/ snying rjecan pos rgyun du phyogs bcur thams cad ba napa dang bde ba'i don byed de// sems can gang zhig tham TikAbyang
chub sems dang 'a de dag la bdag gaming la/ gnyis sam/ gsum n/ ba'og/ bdun cu'i 'dardzogs par thos te/ de las srog phyogasaskyabasasu songan/ 'bos
ma thag tu gang nas sa rgyus bzhugs pa'i 'gal gyi nyamasasu pado las rdzus teskyo bar 'gyur zhing/ 'dod chags dang yongs su bral ba dang/ mngal gyi gnas nas mi skyo ba
dang mnam zhing brtsog pa dang bral bar 'gyur te/ lus mos su dag cing/ lus dri zhim pa dang/ thams cad kyi yid du 'ong zhing bkur sti byed par 'gyur re// kun gyi yid du 'ong zhing bkur sti byas
pas sems rab tu dga' bar 'gyur// somasarab tu dga' bas thun mad pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyod par 'gyur// ban mad pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byung chub sems bskyod pas
sems can thams cad la byams pa dang ni pan po'i sems skyed par 'gyur/ de ltar byams pa snying rje sems bskyadangs/ gro ma lus pa la btang snyoms su mi gtong pa'i soms skyo bar 'gyur/
gzhan yasems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur ba'i sams dang/ bdag dang gzhan gyi don byed pa'i sems dang/ sgrib pa dang bar chad du 'gyur ba bsalaba'i sems ngang/ nyon mongs zhi bar
byed pa'i sems dang/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen la snyan tsang rtag tubakur sti bye dpa'i somasadang/ 'dun pa'i yid kyis chos nyanapa'i soms dang/ ma brjed par yid la byed cing don bzung po/
gakhrusasu 'dziba'i sams dang/ tung du thos la dmang du shes pa'i sa so dang/ mang du thos 'don mi shes pa mi 'dod pa'i sems skyabar gyur ro// de nas yang dag pa nyid la dad pa'i sems/
dang [+ ]de bzhin nyid kyi donabadenang la dad bsams skyabar gyur/ yang dag pa'i na bden paa' dadapa 'isams sadas ji ltar bstan pa bzhin du rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sems skye bar gyur ro// jil

bstan pa bzhin du rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sams skyes pas phyir mi ldog pa'isams skyo bar 'gyur/ de ltar phyir mi ldog pa 'i sams skyes pas/ sems can thams cad lamanyamosnyogasaganyen po'i sems skye bar gyur to/
ji ltar bag khams gsum pa'i srid pa nyi shu rtsa ltar skya ba mi dga' ba bzhin du gags yodapa dang/ gzugs med pa dang/ rkang bzhi dang/ rkangams dang/ grog spu gnas / srog chags thams cad

kyang de dang 'dra ste/ de bas na byang chub sems dang ni lus dang srog gi bar du ston yang pha rol po'i srog 'phrog pa'i las mi byed do// ji ltar bdag lanor rdzasadang/ 'bru dang/ gos dang/ zas dang/
skom dang/ ba glang dang/ shing rta dang/ theg pa dang yul dang/ grong khyer dang/ chung ma dang/bu dang/ lus kyi yan lag gi bar du longs spyod rnams ' srung zhing rim gror byed do//
ga zhan gyis khyer zhing 'brog pa'i m dga' ba bzhin du sems can thams cad kyang de dang 'dra sto/ dbas na byang chub sems dpa' ni bdag gi lus dang srog ston kyang sems can rnams kyi mdang/ gos dar
zas dang/ skomadang/ longs spyod la 'phrog pa'i samasami skyad do// jiltar bdag ba gzugs dom pa sringamo 'am/ chung ma 'am/ sras la gzhan gyis ma rigs pa byed mi 'dod pa
ca @#// bzhin du/ sems can thams cad kyang de dang 'dra sku// dbas na byang chub sems dab 'anibadag gi lus dang srog skor kyang/ parol po'ig zugs dam pa la 'du shes ngan
log pa'i sems mi skye dan/ mi rigs pa'i gonganang lta ci smos/ ji ltar bdag bran dang o rtsub po 'khrug par 'gyur pa 'a mi dga' ba bzhin du/ sems can rnams kyang de dang 'dra ste/ de bas na
byang chub sems dang ban bdag gi lus dang srog ma la yang brdzun du sna ba dang phan tshun 'khrug pa'i tshig ma smago ji ltar bdag rdodabyug gis bajog pa dang/ lcagagis gzhub dang don la 'bor bu
lami dga' ba bzhin du/ sems can thams cad kyang de dang 'dres/ do bas na byang chub sems dpa' ni bdag gi lus dang srog yal yang rdo dbyug dang/ lcags dang chad pas bcad pa'i las kyis saya/
utsanams la mi 'tsho'o// ji ltar bdag lcags sgrog dang/ khong sgril dang/ mtshon chadang/ bzung ba dang/ btags pa dang/ bcings bcings pa'i gnod pa rnams la mi dga' ba bzhin du//
sems can kun kyang de dang 'dra ste/ dengasan bya chub sems dapa'i ni lus dang srog yal yang lcags sgrog dang/ khongasgril dang/ mtshonam dang/ bzung ba dang/ batragasapa dang/ bcing ba la
sogs pa'i gdangs 'tshongar mi byed do// ji ltar bdag gzhan gyis brnyas pa dang/ dbang dang drag shul byed pa dang/ dbangarom btsan byed bsnyams shing ngan du byed pa 'ami dga' ba bzhin du//
sems can thams cad kyang de dang 'dresta de bas na byang chub sems dpa' bdag gcig pu'i rus dang srog yal yang tshul pazhin ma yi nga'i mi rigs pas/ sems can la gnod pa mi byed de/ ji ltar
bdag la pha rol pogazhan gyis bkur sti byed cing mchod la/ tshig snyan pas bstod// bdag bde ba la dga' ba zhin du bdag kyang sems can rnams la gos dang/ zas dang/ skom dang/ mal cha dang/

nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang/ bde ba'i go byad thams cad kyis sbyin par byed do// gal te bdag gis lam chen po zhig sgrub bam/ sangs rgyas kyi phyi ras/ chos kyi phyir sam/ dge'adun gyi phyi sa/ don bsgrub/

ba las blos lcogs grub par ma gyur nas mi dga' zhinga mkhan gyis gdungs pa las/ mkhas pa blo dang ldan pa zhigagis bdagagis sgrub 'donam grub ngasami dga' zhing mya ngan byed par mthong na bdag la 'daskad
grar ro// rigs kyi bu khyod mi dga' bar ma byed cig/ khyod kyi don grub pa'i grogs bya'o// don pa de bzhin du grub par bya'anyis zer na/ de la rab tu dga' ba'i sems skye bar 'gyur te/ de bas na
bdag gi sems can la ban pa dang bde ba'i don du bsgrub pa'i las kyigrogs bya'o// ji ltar bdag la rgyal po dang/ rkun po dang/ tshul m/ mas gnodapar 'gyur ram/ blon po la sogs pas
bzungangs/ btags sam/ bcings nas mi dga' ba brgyan gyis gdungs par gyur pa las/ mkhas pa blo dang ldan pa zhig gis ngagade ltar mya ngan gyis gdungusapa mthon/ snyan pa sgra'i mig gis
bdag la khyod mya nganam byed cig/ khyod kyi kho bos rgyal to 'am/ blon po chen po la gsol ba btab ste/ gal te nor sug sbyin pa'i m/ thabs rnam pa sna tshogs kyisacan s kyang bod/

ma bde ba'i sdugabasngal las thar par bya'o zer na/ bdag gis tshig de thos pa tsam gyis sems dga' bar gyur te/ de bas na byang chub san sa dpa' ni shes par bya ba'i sgyu rtsal dang bze'i bar du mthar phyin
pa brtson 'grus su slob bo// 'di lta ste/ shes par bya ba'ag pa gnas dang/ bzo'a gnas dang/ rolam dang/ rtsed mo dang/ grangs dang/ rtsis dang/ mig 'phrul gyi sngags dang/
smanadang/ baglang dang/ rtadang/ gzhon pa dang/ gnyis dang/ dmag drang ba dang/ dbyad la sogs pa la mkhas par slob ste/ de ltar sgyu rtsal la'ang mkhas par bslabs nas/ 'gro ba mang po dang/
rgyal bo dang/ blon po chen po la sogs pa'i ng bsams pa'i yi de dang 'gal bar mi byed/ de ma yin pa gzhan yang longs spyod kyi rgyan gos samaM/ 'og ma/ bras sam bza' ba 'am/ btung ba 'am/ nor du
'am gdubu ma/ lus kyi rgyananam gser ram/ dngul lam/ bi b+hUrlu'am/ man shel lam/ phyag gamo/ mu tig gam/ asma gar b+ha 'am/ nor du ban po'am/ ba glang 'as/
rta'am/ thog pa'i m/ ban pho'am/ las byed pa 'am bam/ chung sa ma/ sus kyang yod/chumig gam/ khrus kyi rdzing bu 'am/ na po chayang thog bzang po 'am/ lengs spyod kyi yo byad rnam bsna tshogs/

yod kyang/ byang chub sems dpa' de 'dom pa 'am/ rgyugs pa'i simasamad do// de ltar sgyu rtsal kun yang makhas/ rin po'i bangamadzod ngargya stong dang yang ldan/ ba gla dang/ rta dang/ theg pa'i ng yod na

chum bzang mo'ang grangasamad par yod/ yang thog bzangapo'ang yod/ yi gdang khrus kyi rdzong la sogs pa 'dod pa la longs spyod gang yang yod ni da kyi/ de lamachags// rtag tu 'dod pa nyung ba dang/ chog shes/
pa' dga' zhing/ bas mtha' gon pa dang/ rang/tshuladang/ shing drung du bsam gtan lazhi nga gas pa la mos so// skyobomarapo dang zhingagatamaza yang/ son sanirtag tu gnyen po 'i sgor 'jug pa/

byed d// so so'i skya bo dang sbyong tshul mthun pa lta byed kyang sems can la phan pa'i don du nor bu rin po gtong bar byed kyi/ soms nal gnong mi phan pa'i don mi byed de// gang dbul 'phongs pa nyam thag

par gyur ba dag byang chub sems dpal slong du'os su/ 'a ni 'dod pa bzhin byang chub sems da pa' sbyin par byed do// sems can gang zhig sangs rgyas kyi chos la nos shing dadade/ byang chub sems dpa' la

bsnyen bkur dang nadab byang gi phyi'i 'am gro dang ga shog byed cing/ rkang pa 'khru ba'i las byed ma/ lus bkru ba dang mnyapa'i las byed dam chag chag dang phyag bdar byed dam/ soshing dang khrus sa sbyor lam/
mal stan 'di nga zhingamal gos sbrag pa'i las byed dam/ srodadang tho rangs la maram 'bud dam/ khya sus dang/ dril ba khris than ban dang/ bu sha ni dang/ 'dana'abul lam
'thung pa'i sgom yu li shi dang/ bu la sha ka'i 'bras bu'i skom dang rgun chudang 'a nag po 'i tshul sogs pa skya spyanas/ yo byad de lta bu s zhag bdumanam zhag dgu bcu'i bar dubyang

chub sems dpa' la chos 'dod pa'i 'bul bar byed na/ byang chub sems dang 'a de'i mchod pa'i yo byad 'bul ba de la dga' ba'i sa nas med do// de ci'i phyi na na/ byang chub sems dang 'a ni nga skal pa grangs
mod pa yun ring po nas sangs rgyas kyis tshol ba'i phyir/ sems can thams cad la skyed 'bri'i sems nang ba'iyi/ byams pa dang snying rje'i sems dang ldan pa'i phyi/ mnyam snyoms pa'i san na la gnas

pa'i phyir ro// de bson dus cig tu 'a khoras skya ba'irgyalapo byed da/ rtag tu dge ba bcu'i ris kyis sems can gyi don byed do// sems can de dag kyang rgyal bo'i yid bzhin du dga' zhing sdod pa'i ri'i sa

byas na'ang lha dang mi'i 'go nadu 'dod pa lnga'i so stong mchog dam pa dang ldan te/ gas che zhing mtho bar skye ba 'gyur/ bsams pa'i yid bzhin du nyal ba dang/ ldang pa dang/ 'grob laganod bamid pa 'gyur/

gnas gang du 'gro'ang bton pa'i 'dang theg par ldan te skyed mos tshal du rtsod mdang/ rol mo la rtse zhing longs spyod pa 'gyur/ bza' bdang/ btung bam pa dang/ dga' dgur spyod par 'gyur yang/ thamami ga pa brten
te rga ba dang na bas gzi'i tesha bar gyur na/ khyim gyi bu smad mun gyisagadungs te skadabyang sangu zhing/ lalanagal thal martobs/ la la ni rang rang gi skra 'bal te/ mtshim 'dzag cis 'a 'gro'o//

des khyogs sam shing rta'isang dung zhag nas/ dur khrodadustsalate/ dultar bskyalanas kyang dusnyad dag de khyim du 'ongs nas myan gyis gdus te/ 'a 'bargyal nas sa la 'gro/ 'alan da'i rkyen gyis nad du gyur/

lal nim dran ngs u0fb1sa/ la ri'i bar chad du shi nga ra byas te/ de ltar byas kyang gson pa rnams la phan pa mad/ shi nga la ni rab tuganodade// de'i de'i dus 'a 'og 'as sgyur ba'i rgyal po 'khor dang bcas te/
yul nang song ba las/ sems can m gyis gab bamatho nas/ snying brtse bsams skyes te 'di skad zab ro// rgyalang zhes ng ban du las dbang gis 'gro ba mang po dbang sgyur te/ de lta bu dag ba

bculaMm gyis 'gro ba rnams btul te/ 'bras bu 'dod pa lnga mchog dam pa thog tu zin kyang skyod dang/ rga ba dang/ na ba dang/ 'chid dang/ mes pas 'jigs pas thar pa ma gyur na bdag gis drang nga'i dbang
chos kyis yul gyi srid btsasAkyang phan pa'i don mdo// dalta 'gro ba rnams la banapa'i don mdan/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po rin po zhes kyang jiskad ces kyang// byams brtenango 'i phan kham/ sman

ba rgya la pa chen po zhe 'am/ 'dren pa'i ston pa chen po zhes bya bani/ yang dag pa'i lam du 'dren cing/ myang las 'das pa'i lam ston te/ 'dus ma byas pa 'ir btubade ba thob par byed do// bdag can ming

dang sdod pa semathunate// pas nam zhig skom pas gdungs nas srog la bab pa las/ chu 'dod pa'i phyi'i phan tshun brgyugs te khron bskam po cig dang phrad nas rab tu dga' ba'i sar sa skyas te 'di snyam dusams so//
da ni bdagagi a'adi ri la phyi sos so// de ci'i phyi'i na/ gal te tshudang ma phradan/ srog 'di'achib las ming nga nga las/ da khronapa bzang po dang phradanas/ gdonami zangs dong

sgo grang mogatsangan dang phrad de ka ngoms shing tshim par 'gyur bas/ srog 'tsho bar 'gyur ro snyam bsams nas/ myur ba myur ba'akhronapa'i drung du bsnyen to// khron pa'i drung du phyin nas lusu'agyenang bgos phung de gas gtum+bas

nas [ ]mu'adod pa'i phyi'i khronapar du zhugs so// khronapa'i gting du phyin nas rgyud kyi/ sbrul gdug pa dang/ rmigs pa dang/ sdig pa dang/ rtsangs ba dang/ sbal pa dang/ gyomodang/ de la sogasang gsob mdang

ba dang rtswa'al nyil 'ba' zhig mthong bar gyur to// de'i ngoskomapas nayam thag pa gyur pa de thog mar bu bzhin du myurangam red la/ gdugapamangapos gab+bas nas khron pa de las phyir byung bar gzasakyang khronab banAs

shing zhig la zabs kyamad brgyang gang tsam yodado// de'i nang nas skas sam/ thagasradam/ 'bru ba'i shing tsam yamadade/ mas mtshang du stsal kyang nyam thag la stongs zhan ngas 'ang mi nus te/ phyir yang zhabs su

sasngal gdug la sogs nga sa phra zhing 'jib bo// de cung zad mi srog 'chad kyibar du 'di sku da ces ze 'o// khong khron pa 'di ngan rumad par sngar shes na lta bro ba 'di la mig gis lta 'ang mi phod na 'di'i nang du zhugs

pa lta smos kyang ci dgos ta dgi khron pa 'di'i rgyan gyis sdug bsngal ba sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ro zhes sngags 'don// 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'ang de ltar so so'i skye bo dgagacig shiba'i 'og tu

khyim gangag bu snyadadangaganyen rnams kyis sdug pa dang bye bram pa'i sdug bsngal gyis gdungs pa mthong nas 'di skad zer ga/ bdag ga'un 'di ni khron pa skam po de dang 'dra ste/ khron pa 'ami tsam yod kyi/ munimad ra san/

'jug pa yod kyang thog med pas de lta bu'i lus dang srog stong 'isdug bsngal myong bar gyur to// da lta bdag 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i dbang sgyur zhing rin po che sna bdun dang ldan te/ dge ba bcu'i las kyis 'gro ba

'dul zhing drang de 'tshis kyis yul gyi srid btsas nas/ skye bo mang po dang lha dang ni 'i na goris kyi gnas sudakad do/ 'dod lnga'i yononan rjegadan pa 'a'as sdong du bcug kyang/ de dag skya ba dang/ dab dang/

ba dang/ 'tshib dang/ sdug pa dang/ bye bral dang/ dgra sdang ba dang phrad pa'i sdugabasngal las thar pa'i m nus te/gcig la gcig ngu zhing rang byed pa'i den po dag gis nyes kyi/ sems na rnams kyis ma nyes so// de rilta zhan/ bdag

la 'gan 'a sa 'das pa'i rjes 'grobamang po la phan pa'i don du 'gyur ba mdo// bdag las dge ba'i kyis 'dod cing rab tubapa 'dod kyang sdug bsngal gyi mtsho las rgalaminus so// de'i tsha ba'og las sbyar ba'i rgyal

ba'ang 'di snyam du sems so// da ltar bdagagi 'us 'di ni dpe gnashes pa mdang/ gti mug can gyi spyin bdag dang 'dra'o// de'i dus gaMzhan zhig la bdun gyi bar du char ba ma bab pas/ than pa'onango byang ste
rigang yang bskams/ 'bru'ang rab tu dkon par gyur mu ge chen po byung ste/ gcig la gcig 'tshal zhing za bar gyur/ ga gigi sha khrag la gcig za ste/ 'a 'a ni bu'i sha khrag la pham za/ la lo ni
pham rig 'du za zhing/ mdang phunudang/ khyog dang/ bu yodang/ bumo'angagag ga shal gcig khri bar gyur te// de'i tshan spyin bdaga chen po de 'chug cing 'phun dusang so las/ sems
zhamang po gastogasanas da'od nyams te/ 'dicing skams la nyam chung lam dog ngan pa dang/ skra'anga'adzings nas lus gnag lakob ga/ 'khrig pa lam khul du khyar te/ ba gnamo'imago dang/ lag pa dang/
kong pa dang/ lhu tshigs dang/ lag ngar dang/ brag pa dang/ tshigs pa dang/sgral pa dang/ brladangardzong dang/ yan lag dang/ nying lag gi bar du khyer/ kha cig gi nang khrol ma yin pa dang/ man

pa dang/ glo ba dang/ rgyu mang/ gzhan rnams khyen ba mthong ngo// de lta bu dag mthong nas sbyin bdag des da ngaga mthong nas/ khyad khur du khyer ba 'di dag ci yin zhes dris so// de dag gis snus ba/ bdag cag gi

khur du khyer ba 'di dag ni mo'i ste/ mi'i mgo dang/ rkang lag dang/ brludang/ rjes dang/ yan lag dang/nying lag gi bar du'o/ khyed mi lo mgo dang/ yan lag dang/ nying lag gi bar du khyab 'di ci dgos/ ci sa bya

zhes sib dang de dgagis snasab/ khyodami shes sam/ mu ge chen go byung nas 'bu rab tu dkon par gyur to/ ma kun ltogasanas daltar gacig la gcig za bas bdag cag gi khur du khyer ba 'di ni bdag cag gi zas
yin no// de'i spyin bdag chen po des de skad ces smras pa de thos nas sngangs te/ spu zing zhes byed nas 'khams te sa la 'gyel ba las/ tshugrang mos gdong dugato nas ring zhig 'dong dang//

[e ]sems gol chud nas 'on khyed kyi zas yin na/'di dgasuwiya yin dris pa dang/ de dag skad chen po byung nas ngus te/ sbyin bdag la brjod du mi rung ngo zhes smras te/ e ma'o bdag gnasdug go/ a ma'i bdag/

ga ni sdug go/ kyi rgyud kyi dung khyod la drang po mi snar mi rung ste/ bag cag khur du khyer ba 'di la lan wisha/ lalanama' sha/ 'a ni du'isha/ 'al niyunu'isha/ la la miganyen bshes kyi sha yin nozhes/
ltogs ti/ de dgagis soso nas sbyin bdag la drang po rags byas nas/ bdag cag ni+inatultogs ngas gcig tingashadra ba'agyur ro// do'i ngo spyin bdag des dabugs kyis brnangs pa tsan du/ mi rtogs pa
rnams la 'di skad ces smras so/ byed rnams der phyin nad gcig la gcig nying ba bar ma byed cig/ khyed rnams la dgos pa'i yo byang gang yang rung ba bgo ba'i gos sam/ bza' ba bam/ btung ba 'am

nad kyi rkyen rtsi ban/ khyad ci dgos pa thams cad srin nga la bya ste nag bdun na khyed rnams kho bo'i sgor shog cig dang/ yid bzhin du gos sam/ kha bras sam nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang ci 'dod pasam pa 3
bya'o zhes bsgo ba dang/ de dag rab tu dba' sa nas/ shin tu legs so legs so// ngomatshar che'o zhes bstod pa byas so// de nas sbyin bdag de phyir khyim du 'ongs nas/ chung ma dang/ bu
rnams dang/ bran khol dang/ las byed pa'i mi rnams kyang bsdus te/ dga' ba'i mdas byung ste/ 'jam zhing yid du 'ong ba'i tshig snyan pas bu da dang/ bran kholadangalas byed pa 'i yi rnams l
'di skad ces bgro'o/ khyada rnams shes par gyis shig kho bos smras pa'i tshig legs pa bton ge khyed shes sam thun pan pos mu ge byung nas/ mi thams cad rtogs te gras 'dab//
zhig shi bar gyur to// bdag gi khyim nabang mdzod kun gzhing 'dade/ 'bru yang gragand yod pas dus las ma yol bar bdag cag bsod nams bya zhes// bu smad kun gyis de skad ces bsgo ba thos nas/
legs so legs so/ bdag cag gi srog lus sbyin pa byas kyang ma 'phangasan/ ba medzod dang nor rdzas dang/ khu zas lta smos kyang nyid gos de nas sbyin bdag kyang rab tu dga' rangs nas/

khyed rnams ni yang dag pa'i lo de 'dron med pa'i byang chub thob par byed pa'i grogs yin pa lta dge'i legs so// khyed rnams kyang so so nas phyi dang cig ba rnams ci dang sgrub bsgo'akhya nga'i rigs pa 'ang mod la bya/ sgrub

pa'i ges pa'i nga myur du bsgrubasta da ste zhag bdun nangs pa la 'byon par bya'o/ de'i tsha sbyin bdag des so sor bsgo nas/ khyim gyi phyi rol tubyung ste/ gang nas mnyam zhing la ngas la bdong 'i gnasaM
shig bltasanas/ medalas gzhingag la las sdomad par byas phyugs te/ khri stan bshams so// de ltar mang po 'du ba'i gnas sbyin pa sbyin pa'i sa gzhi bshams nas/ baglang lnga brgya la kha brasabakal
sbyin pa'i sor bskyal nas/ kha zas ri bzhin du spungs/ zhomunimatshobazhin du bskyil/mas dang/ 'bru mar dang/ 'khur ba la sogs pa kha zas ro brgyadang ldan pa mchog sbyar te/ dem yin pa gzhan
[e ]yang gos dang/ gdubudang/ 'phrang bdang lus kyi rgyan mtshogs pa dang/ ba glang dang/ rtadang/ rin po che sna bdun la sogs te thams cad phun sum tshogs par sbyang nas/ zhag bdun len pa'i skye du
shanas zhag bdun gyi nyin la dril brdungs/ dung bus te/ skad chen pos thams cang sbyin nga ' gnas 'dir 'dus shig ces bos sa// de ni na thams cad kyis nges pa'i skad thos nas/ 'phags pas byin gyis/

brlabs pa tsamadu dga' ba'i sems skyes te/ thams cad sbyin pa gtong pa'i gnas su lcagasato/ yid bzhin dgos dang/ mal dang/ bras skom dang/ lus kyi rgyan sna tshogs pa dang/ nad kyi rtsi sman mang po dang/ ba/

glang dang/ rta dang ni po che sna bdun la sogs ci dang ci 'dod pa yid bzhin du drungs nas sbyin pa li rdzas ci yod pa thams cad kyisam lus pas khyer ro// de nas sbyin bdag de dga' nas phyi'i khyim du 'ongs nas/chung ma dang bu rnams

dga' babushin du 'dod du lnga la'angs spyod do// de nas kyang zhag bdun tsam len pa dang/ mngagan de spyin bdag des sngar gos dang khrus dang/ skom la sogs pa spen pa byas na/ kha zas zos pa rnams dug langs nas than/
cad shi'i zhes bgo/ de ltar ngashi bar gyur pa'i thams cad kyi tu brjod de ngo ma la// ngon par ma'o// de ltar sbyin bdag chen po des kun 'asnying brtse ba'i phyir 'dod pa bzhin du kha zas sogs bas/

ma par byas te/ lus dang srog gson par byas par gyur na/ phyis nag mang pos 'go par dug langs nas thams cad she'o zhe bya bar sgrogs par gyur te// de'i sbyin bdag chen po des de ltar gyur pa de thosan yi/

[f ]/ mug cing mi dga' bar gyur te/ chung ma dang bu la sogs pa la khyed kyis bzas ji ltar slob na/ kha zas kyi nang du dug mtshungs ba ji ltakhongs zhes dris pa dang/ chung ma dang/ bu dang/ bran khol dang/

las byed pa de ni rnams kyin cid sa ga na srid de// dug 'di ga khongs zhib tu rtogs shig ces smras so// de nas srin bdag de nyin gyi gal tabyed cing mtha gyis songasang ba ras khron pa zhig stong bkab cing
ba/yogs pa na thong ngo// khron pa 'dici'i phyir g.yogs zhes dris pa dang/ khron pa 'di na 'di bdag 'di byed dusang nga ngu'i na/ sprul gdug nga gsum zhig gas gso ba las/ khron pa 'di brkos nas
ba/ sbrul gdugapa gsum bcug go/ khron pa 'de'i sbrul gdug pa'i khron pa yin// tshul ng dug pa'i rlu'adebang 'thus nga sa na sa 'chi bar 'gyor de// sbyin bdag des gi de dag thos nas/ las byed pa la
khyud de bar kha bas g.yo ba'i tshe/ khronamu'adi'asaM bcus te kha bras ma g.yos sa/ las bu dang sa snas pa// gzas nang du g.yobs rings nas chu 'di bcus nas kha zas kyi g.yos byas so zhes bsgo/
sbyin bdag mig ste ngo tshug go/ bdag ni gtilug can shesang 'dra med pa yin pa 'dra ste/ ci'i phyi'i sbrul gdug pa gas zhing khron pa gagang che zhes 'gyod nas/ ngan dang du 'a bsgong/ sbrul gdug

pagasum gyi khrom pa nur du khongs shig/ sbrul gdug pa gsum yang le babadag gis bsreg go zhes bsgo pa dang dwangs byed pa'i minams kyis de ma thag tu khron pa de'ang bsub nas re da ngang byas so// donas sprin

pas/ bdag des sprul gojug nga 'i khron pa de mad par byas nas/ phyi rol tu'adag tusang ba 'a/ sbyin bdag gi khra zas dug can gyis pa gyur pa dang thams cad tshigamathun ngang spenang lag 'dis bdag cig/

ka zas dug cani bdenas/ bdag cag sngar shi ba snga gyurapa yin no// bdag cag gis de ltar shes na/ der mosong yang rung zhen 'gyod pa skyes na// de bzhin du 'khor los sgyur ba'irgyal po do'ang dgang nus sam sa can
[p ]pa can galadangami'i wisi sa skazhing 'dod pa lta la 'dod dgu lospyodamed kyi skya ba dang/ rgab dang/ na ba dang 'digs mi thar nga 'ang de dang 'dra'o// de nas 'khor las sa ra ba'i
rgyal po de med padag namad pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos dang/ 'bai rten las 'des pa'i sa bsgrubs te/ sems can rnams kyang de la klog pa dang 'don pa dang/ 'dri ba dang// goms dar ba ste da sa shi'i

'khor ba yongs su sangs shing sa ngan las 'das pa thob par bya'o zhes don bcasaso// de'angon 'dod los sgyur ba'i rgyal posangs rgyas kyi chos tshol ba'i phyir 'dzam bu'i glin sangs rgyas kyi rjes sus shes zhes
kus kun tu bkar btags so// 'khor shes skyar nga'i rgyal ngos 'dod pa'i rgya'i gnas kun tu ngo kar bo gas kye shes ngan byung ngo// mtha' 'khob kyi yul chung ngu gcig tu phyin pa dang/ de na bram/
cig gcig sangs rgyas kyi gshes zhes zer ro// de nas bram ze de'i steng du 'o nya btang nas/ bo tade bram lpag la ba der phyin nas/ btsun pa sangs rgyas kyi chos shas sam zhes dris na ngashes sa
00/ @#// zhes zer// de nas bo nyas bram ze'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag byas nas/ btsun pa 'gog les sbyar ba rgyal bos spyan 'dren du btang gi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po de gal
ba der gshegs sugasol/ danas bram khri 'du de 'os nas 'bo las sgyur ba'i rgyal pos rgyang mnas bsuste/ rkang pa lo mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas da bar byon tan/ lam dunyon mongs par ma gyur

tam nga la 'a ma gyur tam zhe sa ga tamadres te pho brang gi nang du khrid nas/ pho brang gi dbus su rgyal po'i gdan la bzhag go/ bram khres kyang gdan la skyil mo krung bcas te 'ag ge/ du'i rgyal bos
tha/ bram zedabade bar ' gnas / gos pa'i lo khyad nams kun yul de spyin pa byas nas/ tha'akho spal te bram wade la ston pa napo sangs rgyas kyis shes sam zhes dris pa dang/ bram zan re ba dag gis
sangs rgyas kyi chos shes so zhes zer ro// da nas rgyal pos bram ze la ston ng nango bdag la bstan ri dashad du gsol zhes bsan/ bram za'i rgyal po khyod ni shin tu glen no// kho bosasangs
rgyas kyis bsus ngan/ mun ring du dka' ba'i sdug bsngal myong nas gdod lebs pa yin/ nga rgyal pos phul byung du thos par 'dod ma/ rgyal bos smras pa// ston pa chen po 'o na ci zhig 'do/
bram zes smras pa/ bdag las rtsod pa phul cig/ rgyal pos smras pa// ston pa chen pomachod pa ci zhig 'dod/ gos sam/ mal cha'am/ bza' ba 'am/btud 'dod dam 'onatogs pa/
[s ]dngul lam/ nachadadam/ bram dasmad ng/ padodA nan+dad na/char dko nag/ spyi na bdad+d+harman kachar haa'adudan/ 'on/ nga a/ rto'am/ thogapa 'dodom/ na 5
'am grong la lamu/ chung ma ma/ bu 'dod dam/ rol mo 'am/ glu 'am/ gar byed pa 'dod dam/ bram zes smras pa/ bdag de dag gang yang mi 'dod do// gal te lus la rtsa stongaphyung sta/ rma
nang dumang blugs lam ma snying po btsugs te/ ma ma stong 'da' bas mtshodon/ sas rgyas kyi chos bstan cing bshad pa bya'o// gal ted ltar minus nabadag las te 'gro zhes smras na/ rgyal ngos
skad cig tsam lanam smras kyi bdu khri las babs so// de nas rgyal bos yang du blangs nas ston pa chen po cung zad lag bsring du gsol// bdag shes pa na zhing bsod nams zhus pas cung zad bsams gad
bar bgyidado'is smras so// de'atsho'i khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal bo de 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ bar g gi lus 'di thog ma red 'i dusanasashi bgrus na dpa' myongana'ang/ chos kyi phyi'i
masha'i/ da long ba ga gi lus 'di'angamatho 'jig cing rul bar gyur pas na pa mad de da dus la bab bo snyam bsams nas/ ston pa bram 'a'adi skad ces smras so// ston ng chen po bdagamachod pa
'dod pa bzhin bgyid do// de nas rgyal po pho brang du song nas/ btsunamo rnams la dani bdag cag te 'dra la 'o zhes smras so// btsun mo rnams de skad ces smras pa thos nas sngangs shing 'khams te/ ci/
[7 ]@#// nyes gto'amed de/ rgyal po da lta ci zhig mdzad snyam gongs zhes gaso'al// rgyal bos smras pa/ bdag bas lus 'del ba ma stobazhig btsugs te ston pa bram ze'amadapa byas mamo//
pa btsun mo rnams kyisaraskad ces smras pa thos nas/ sal 'gre zhing dngos btab ste brgyal la// 'di yi 'od dang phyir na pa red do// rgyal po chen po 'jig rten na bdag gi lus 'ga'aphas pamad/ nyis te
dogs nas gso ba'i rimagro chen byed// ci'i phyi'i bdag gi lus la ma tho 'tsham zhing gnod par bgyid/ rgyal po ni yu bsapa'i blo dang ldan pa la gsan/ da ltar myosasam/ 'on te yi dgas kyis bar ms ma//
tsanongs/ rgyal bos smras pa/ debu gang yang ma yin no// ba ci'i phyir de lta bu'i gnodapa mdzad cing bram khro'amachod pa dgos/ rgyal bos smras pa/ bdag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos 'byongad//
sems can thams cad donabyed par sems so// de ltar sems can thams cad la dgongasan/ datsa'i yi bdag cag rnams bkol bar gyur/ rgyal pos smras pa/ 'jig rten mdza' sdug thams cad ms
bya'aphral du gyur te// de bsan bdagags lus kyi mchod pa byas te khyod dang sems can thams cad kyimun nag gi khang par me shas chen po'i sgronam gzugs shing skyor 'khor ba'i ma rig pa'i mun ng
snang bar byas l/ kun nas dkris pa'i nyon mos pa'i madud pa bcad de/ 'khor ba'i skyon las bsgralas/ myang n las 'das pa'i gnas su dgod pa'i dadu bsamasakyi/ khyod rnams bcad/
dang bgagasam byedi/ de'i mibatsun mo rnams deskad ces bsgo ba thos sa/ brnangs pa ltar cang mi smra zhing skad ngan po byung stangazhing rang rang gis 'ba'al// bdag cag la bgadanam samadad/ bkrami

shis pa sa gson por bdag cag la lha mod par gyur ces smra'o// rgyal po de la rgyal bu lnga brgya yod do// thams cad kyang mnga' spyod bzang zhing sdug pa/ yid gzhungs shing mkhas pa 'bro dang ldan pa// mi'i mtshan

dngardzogs par ldan pa// rgyal po'ang mig bzhin du 'phrangs shing byams so// de'i rgyal pos/ rgyal bu rnams la smras pa/ 'bo dmachod pa'i las shig byed snyam na/ lus dang srog nyam chung du dogs te bud

dang bral ba snyam/ yul gyi srid dang 'du ngasanamasakyi siraring gas byos shig ces bko'o// rgyal bu rnams de skadabasgo ba thos nas/ lus kyi yan lag dang rtsa rnams bcad pa tsam dusdug sngal gyis gdus te/
dbaran mi banangs pa las bskyug tu'angamad/ mid du'anger dpabazhin du rgyalapo la 'di skad ces gsol to// ci'i sad du bdag cag rnams spangs te skyabs na mas dag spangs tamadzod/ la lan rgyal po'i

gzha' gnas 'a khyad/ la la ni lag pa dang rkang po nas bzung nas skad phyung zhing du/ kyi hud kyi hud/ ci'i mgon dang skyabasamad par gyur zhes smras// de nas rgyal pos rgyal bu rnams la spro ba bskyed pa'i
phyir 5 'jig rten mdza' zhing sdug ba thams cad mthar nge 'bral ba 'gyur ro zhes bsgo'i/ de skad ces bsgo ba thos kyang yid lagacags ta'abral mi phod na/ bgag ga gisagasolab gcig gnang ba
mdzad dugasal/ bdag cag gi lus dang srog rgyal bo la 'du ba na/ ston pa bram ze'amachod pa mdzad du gsol/ rgyal bos snyam ng/ du+od nams da dung shed bye tshubs
zha de 'dra ba'i rtsod pa byed mi bzod kyis/ khob ston pa'i m ring bo nas gnyis mchod pa bya bar khas blus nas/ yid dang 'gul bar bya mi rung bus busrinucan ni pha'i yid dang 'gal bar mi byung na//

khyadAnams kho nga'i yid dang 'gal ba byed dam/ rgyal bu rnams de skad smra ba thos nas skad phyung sta/ tsho btab pas/ yul gyi lha rnams kyang sngangs te/ ri 'gyil ba bzhin du thams cad lus sal brdabs so//

de'i rgyal po la yul mtha'i rgyal phran thams cad kyis kyang m phyag byas nas robrang gi nang ston po ga lab der song ste/ de'i drung du phyin nas lus kyirgyan thams cad kyang bkrol nas gos kyang phud da phyogs gcig

tu bzhi g nas lus drang por bsrang ste 'dug go/ 'dug m thag tu rgya laphrin rnams dang/ blon bodang/ rgyal bu lnga brgyudang/ btsun ma nyi khri la bsgo// khyed nams las gang gis kho bos lus la stong zhig/

gcod sus nus zhes smras na/ btsun mo dang rgyal bu dang/ blon po dang/ rgyal phran rnams tshigamathun par bdag cagAgis rang gi lus la gri thogs te mig phyung la bla'i/ rgyal po'ilus la rma 'byin mi phodado//
denas rgyal po mi dga' bar gyur nas/ danibadag mo bur gyur pa lta/ 'khor mang po 'di nyid kyin ng na/ mi 'ga' yang kho bo'i grogs su 'gyur ba da dam zhes smra bar gyur to// de'i tshon rgyal

pa de la rigs ngan shan pa dang nga zhin gyis khrol// kun kyang 'jig su rung ba zhig yod pa zhiganges so// shanapa de de 'od so// gshan pa de'a gnas rgyal bu nar 'khyadam nan de da cig/ rgyalango na nga'i don 'grub

pa'i thabs bdag lags kyis// don ma gruban sngam ba bzhin durgyal po'i srid bzung du zad do zhes smras// rgyal bu rnams kyis tshig de skad ces smras pa thos nas/ rab tu dga' ba'isams skyes par gyur te//

de nas shan pa de rgyal po 'i drung du 'ongs nas/ rgyal po chen po da ltar ci zhig mdzad par dgongs zhes gsol pa dang/ rgyul pos smras pa// kho bo'i lus 'a ma ma stongang tsugs la ston pa chen po bram ze la mchod par sems

so ga shan pa sa smras pa/ de ltar na sku lagacod nus so// rgyal pos de skad smra ba thos nas rab tu dga' ba'asams su gyur nas/ bshan pa la khyod na yang dag par kho bo'i bla na med pa'i byang chub basprad pa'i/

grogs yin zhes sngasaso// danas shan pas rgyalapo'i drung du 'greng bzhin du ngam dur ba'i skad nganangos rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to// rgyal po mkhan tam/ mi bsad nga lings kyis ni sngar mgo bcad

gos te/ gnya' ba btubs larkang lag dang bral te/ drub dang rgyus pa'i ng byang dgosan/rgyal po chen po de 'dra ba'i dpa'i sdug bsngal bzod dam/ rgyal pos de skad smras pa thos nas/ rab tu dga'aba' so mas

nu gyur nas/ des shan pa sa gnag lce lta bu'i gyi grogs te// ring po mi thogasopar rgyal bo'i lus la sto tshangabar bcad do// gsham pa rgyal po'i sa mas shi nu ba tsamadusams pa lan 1 sems ma nu ba'i kri yang/
[r1 ]@#// sal bo nas bros so// des rgyal bo chabo'i bka' chasto tshang ba bcad pa'i lam du khu byugs nas/ rasabab pa'isi bo btsugs so/ lam stong btsugasaso// de maze
ston pa ngan pas de ltar byas ba mthong anas/ 'di snyam du dam du sam bshadon lus srog 'tsho'am mi 'tshog la mad pas/ gal te srog masos na susachos man par 'gyur bsams nas/ rgyal po la 'di

skad ces smras so// sangs rgyas kyi chos thos par 'dod pas shin tu dpa' ba'i brtson 'grus kyis bya dka' ba'i spyod pa spyad pas/ legs par nyon la shin tu yid la zung zhig dang/ dargyal ngolasangs rgyas

kyirgyas bsten par bya'o/ deskad ces skyas ba thos nas rgyal po rab tu dga' ba'i sams su gyur te/ dang ra na bu su zhu can zhig phamadzran rab mi dga' sto/ sdug bsngal gyis gdus pa las/ pham phyir sos
sh+tsa ban/ bu de ji lta bab tu dga' ba ltar/ rgyal po de'ang rab tu dga' bar gyur to// de nas bram ze dus/ rgyal po la smras pa// skye ba lon 'baba'agyur// 'gog pa 'di'i bde ba yin// zhes tshigs su
bcad pa da 'di bstan to// rgyal bos dam pa'i chos bstan pa thos nas rab tudag bsams su gyur te rgyal budang blon po rnams la 'di skad ces bsgo'o// khyed rnams khro bo 'a sdug cing brtse ba'i sams/

yodanangos 'dim brjod ng pa de la zul/ yul phyogs su gang mang po 'dus pa'i gnas dang/ grong dang/ grong khyer dang/ tshong dus su 'gro ba mang po la 'di skad ces bka' thogs shig/ 'khor les sgyur ba'i rgyal
ka/ bon po sasems can mang bo sdug bsngal gyi rgyams bying pa dag bdonapa dang/ goms can thams cad 'asnying rjen po'i sems bskyang nas/ lus lam ma stong btsugs te/ gsasu bcad pa'i tshig bcad byer
pa thos pa 'di rgyal po chen po 'di'i byams pa dang/ snyin gnas ams grub par bya ba'i phyir/ thams cad kyis yi ger bris te 'don pa dang/ kha ton du bya ba dang/ 'dri ba dang/ goms par byed pa dang/

na yang yid la bzhi de ji ltar gtams pa bzhin du nan tan du spang par bya'o// de'i donami mang pos de skad ces bsgo ba thos nas/ rab tu dga' zhing mgu bgyur te/ thams cad kyis tshigamathun par rgyal po la bstod

nas shin tu dga' go/ rgyal po napo bdag cag snying rjechen po'i pha yang dag pa yin no/ sems can thautung phyire shin tu sbyang dka' ba spyod de zhes kun gyis bsngags te/ shog shog dang/ 'a dang/ shun pa
nga/ shing thog yi ger bris te kha ton du slob bo// gang na mi mang bo 'duba'i gnas su'ang yi ger bris te/ thams cad kyis mthong zhing thos par byas nas/ bla namad pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyar du
bcug go/ de'i ri rgyal po chen pos lus lam mastong btsugs te/ ston pa chen po bram ze la mchod pa byas pa'i 'od zer gyis phyogasabcu'i zhing 'jig rten gyi khams snang bar gyur te/ mar me de 'odong
las gsasu bcad pa'i tshig bcad phyed kyi chos sgra yang grags par gyur nas/ thams cad bran med pa'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du sems bskyed do// mar me de'i 'od des sum cu rtsa gsum
ka gnam gyi lha'i bang pa 'ang snang bar byas nas/ ma' ma'i 'od des lha'i 'od kun zil gyis mnan pas sum cu rtsa gsum gnam gyi lha rnams kyis mna'i 'od des kun tu snang bar byas pas/

de dag 'di snyam du gyur te/ ci'asgyu tsi'i rgyan gyis 'od phog 'di lta bu snang bar gyur snyam/ lha 'i mag gis bltas pas/'jig kha gyi bams 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal bon pos snying rje'i sems bskyadado/ grong

thamasacad kyi phyi'i lus lam ma stong btsugs nas/ ston pachen po bram ze la mad pa byas pa mthong ngo// lha de dag rab tu dga' ba'i sems skyes nas/ 'jigs rten gyi khams su babasags/ mi pham la pa'i lus

su sprul nas/ rgyal po ga la ngal lcag te/ rgyal bo chen po la 'di skad ces smras so// rgyal po chen po lus la mar me stong btsugs te/ shin tu'ang dka' ba spyad cing/ gas su bcang ba byed cig thos pas ci

zhig bya/ rgyal pos snum pa/rigs kyi bu bdagasems can thams cad bla na mad pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sams bskyod du gzhug pa'i phyi 'o// danas sngalaba'i mid phyir brgyabyin gyi lus su bsgyur/

nas lus kyi 'od kyis kun tu snang bar byas te/ rgyul po chen po la 'di skad ces smras so/ rgyal po chen po 'di ltar mchod pa byas pa 'dis/ lha'i rgyal bo 'dod dam/ badzod kyirgyal po redadam/ myos pa'i rgyal

po 'dod/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal pos brgya byin la smras ng// lha'i rgyal po log na lha dang mi'i longs spyod gang yang mi 'dod kyi/ banamed pa yabag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dod do// saso'i skye bo thams

ka tsad med de ba rnams bde ba'i gnas su dgod pa dang/ ma grol ba rnams grol ba bya ba dang/ rol tum phyin pa rnams phyin pa la bya ba dang/ bya ba mthob pa rnams thob par bya bar 'dod do// brgya byin gyis sman nga

skyal don po khyod ni rab tu blun pa'o// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni yun ring poshin tu spyad pas thob par 'gyur na/ ci'i phyir dran med pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur/ rgyal des/ brgya

bun la smras pa// rtsi sta ba dag gi spyi bo'i stan lcags kyi 'khor leshin tu 'bar ba rgyun du 'khor yang sdug bsngal de tsamakyis bla na med pa'i byang chub las phyi me ldog go/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/tshig de skad ces

smra ba la su zhig yi dam ngal gyur/ de nas bkob los sgyur pa'i rgyal pas/ brgya byin la smras pa// grol te bdag yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dod pa ma yin 'a// lha'i rgyal po khyodabasus par gyur na bdag ga/

lus kyi 'di dag nam du'ang 'tsho bar ma gyur cig/ gal tedi ltam yin na/ khrag kyang mar gyur cing rma rnams kyang sos par gyur cig ces dam baamathag tu rnams kyang de sa par gyur te/ brgya byin lha'i dbang

pos rgyal po la shin tudage'o zhes bstodanas/ rgyal pochen po khyod niyAng dag par snyingadzanango dang ldan pa ste snying rje napo'i spyod pa'o// deltar spyod pa dkaM'ab spyod pas/ ring po ma thogs par du nad pa

ya nga dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'thob par 'gyur ngas/ rnam bla na mad pa'i byang chub thob pa na/ thogam bdagagi don snga spyan par shog cigatsos smras// brgya byin lha'i dbang pos lus 'od zer gyis
rgyal po ri lus kun tu snang bar byas nas/ lha'i 'khor brgya stong dang ban med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tusems bskyed de// rgyal bu lnga brgya'i rnams de ltar yabargyal po'ilus
kyi sas te snga mkho bzhin du gyur pa mthong nas/ rab tung ga 'das tergyal po'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal nas/ phyogs gcig tu'akhod do// thalamo sar babadams/ tshigamathunang 'di skad ces smras so//
'di du mdzad pa ngoms so yabargyal po'i yang dag pa 'gro ba thams cad la snying rje ba'o zhes bstod do// rgyal bos smas pa/ rgyalabu khyed ngos su 'dod pa bdonan/ thams cad bumed pa yang dag par

rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed ci'ices bsgo bas rgyal bu rnams yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang nub tu soms bskyod par gyur to// de bzhin du btsun nyi khri dang/ pho brang gi slas brgya stong snyad kyang byang chub tu

mas bskyed do// de'i 'khor de'inang na gnas pa'i sems can gang+ga'i klung gakhyim bcubadun snyad kyis nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyus su sems bskyed par gyur to// lha dang klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri bra dang

yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lte phye chen po dang/ mi dang/ mi ma yin pa lasogasang grangasamed pa rnams de lta bur gyur pa mtho shes nas/ thams cad kyis byang chub tu sems bskyad de/ ba
ga 'a nas kyi dogo/ thabs mkhas chen posas rgyas kyi sgolan bsab nga mdo las/ gnyen po'i le'u zhes bya stagasum pa'o/// de'i na 'khoragyi dkyil 'khor den/ byang chub
[j]sems dpa' sems dpa' po ga' ba'i rgyalapo ldan mas 2 ngas ba phyugase ga pa gsan/ dus sagayas pa'i lhang ga labatsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de legs su thal mo spar du btung nas

bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// byang chub sems dpa' ji ltar na drin shes par bgyi/ ji ltar na dranibasab par bgyi zhes gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis// byang chub sems dpa' dzaga'o ba'i rgyal po la

'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu legs pa nyon cige/ byang chub sems dapa' sems dang 'a chen po dris shes pa ni/ blanamad pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyang pa'o// drin bsab pa ni samA

can pha rol bo thams cad bunamad pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed du gzhug pa'o// gsol pa// byang chub tu sems skyed ces bgyi ba ji ltar sems bskyed par bgyi byang chub samasadapa'i dangos po

gang gi rgyan gyis byang chub tusams skyed bar 'gyur/ rigs kyidu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' tshan po thogayabranamadang yang dag pa ra rdzogs pa'i bya ba dusams bskyed pa/ 'di skad du yi dam dun ngo bca'

lto ba dag bran mdang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob pa'i tshe/ somasacan thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i don du/ samasacan thams cad ru sa las 'das pa chen po las par dgod pa 'dam bca' 'o/ gzhan yadas/

can thams cad shes rab kyi pa'ol tu phyin pa longs su rdzogs par bya bar dmabaca' bar bya'o// de'i bdag gi don dang gzhan gyi don byed nga zhes bya ste/ debasan thogam byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ byang chub kyi rgyu dang
ldan pa zhes bya/ sems can gyi rgyu dang ldan pa zhes bya// yang dag nga 'i don gyi rgyu dang ldan pa zhes bya/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi ga sum tsa ban gyi chos dang ldan zhes bya/ dge ba'i chos
thams cad sdud pa'i gzhi zhes bya/ dbasan byang chub sems dapa' dge ba zhes bya/ dge ba chen po zhig bya/ sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa bzhes kyang bya// sems can thams cad kyi lus dang/
ngag dang/ yid kyi la ma sbyong ba zhes bya ste/ las nganapagasum sbyangs pas 'jig rten na smon lamagang yang ba madra bar 'dug par rdzogs pa'i byang chung dus nas bskyad du las 'da' bamed du
smon lam mchog dam pa bunamadang 'o// byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen po thog ma byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i/ dngos po lnga dang ldan par bya'o// lnga gang zhe na/ rang bzhin dang/
spyod pa dang/ spyod yul dang/ yon tan dang/ bskyed pa'o/ byang chub sems dba' de ltar byang chub tu sams bskyed na/ byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen po zhes bya ste/ gdon

mi khra bar blanamadapa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob cing thag pa chen po spyod par 'gyur ro// debasun mo nga chub tu sems Mbaskyod pas/ dge ba'i chos thams cad sdud par 'gyur ro// byang chub

smiM sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ ji ltar spyod po zhin du blo'amad pa yang dag pa'i dzegs pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur ro// gal te byang chub tu sems m skyad na/ namadu'ang byang chub/
thob bar mi 'gyur te/ debs bya chub tusems skyidan/ blunamad pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi gzhithob bar 'gyur ro/ nga chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can sdug
pasngal gyis gzir ba mthong na/ byams shing snying ba'i sams skyod de/ dengs na byang chub sems dpa' na byams pa dang snying rje'i sems kyis rgyu byas pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i nga

chub sems skyed par 'gyur/ bla ma babasang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyod pa'irgyus/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sumacu rtsa bdun sgrub par 'gyur/ byang nub kyi phyogs kyi chos sumacu

rtsa bdun bsgrubs pa'i rgyus/ banamad pa yang dag pa rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob ste/dbas na byang mutu mas bskyang ng gzhi'am/ rtsabazhes bya'o//byang chub tu sems bskyod pas/ byang rlabasams dpa'i tshul khrims/

spyod par gyur te/ de bas na byang chub tusems bskyed pa ni rtse ba zhes bya'o// yan lag ces kyang bya/ sdud pa zhes kyang bya/ go rims zhes kyang bya/ sa bon zhes kyang bya/ byang chub sems dpa' byang nub tu
soms bskyed pa'i ng mthar phyin pa dang/ mthas phyin pa yod de/ blan med pa yang dag pa rdzogasapa'i byang chub kyil du thob par byed pa'i nam du 'ad mi ldeg pa 'am/ nub bam dbas mtha yin pa lo
mthar mi phyin pa ni ldog pa dang nyams par 'gyur ta/ phyiramaldogapa 'a rnam pa gnyis te/ mthag ldogab dang mtha ldog pa ma yin pa yodado/ mthar phyir ldog pa ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs/
ba/ @#/ pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa las/ mi ldog kyang chos gang yin pa de bsgrubs babs/ nAn tan du spyod mi nus pa'o// mthar phyir ldog ba ma yin pa ni bya nga chub tu sems bskye danas
chos gang yin pa bsgrub cing/ nan tan spyod pa'o/ byang chub sems dapa'i spyod pa la rnam paga'i ste/ gos kyi bu ma/ rigs kyi bumo ma/ gang zhig sangs rgyas sam// byang chub sogs dba'i don gyi

dngos po bsam gyis ma khyab pa thos sam mthong// de'i tshadad cing 'dun pa'i sar/sa skyo bar 'gyur te/ 'di snyam du sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i go gyi dngos po nibasun gyis ma khyabcu sangs

rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i don dngos po bsam gyis mi khyab pa de ni thob par bya ba yin pas/ bdag gis bran med pa yang dag pa rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par bya'o snyam sems te/ de bas na sems rtsa

gcig tubyang ba dran nga' byed cing/ byang chub tu sems bskyod pa dang/ kha cig ni sangs rgyas dang bya chub sems dpa' rnams kyi don gyidas bo bsam gyis mi khyab pas mthong yang/ sa rgyas dang byang chub

gnas dpas dgongs tagasus pa'i snying bo thos pa tsam gyis da ci'anapa 'i sems skyes te/dadapa sogs skyes pas// bla ma med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chung dang/ chab thams cad mkhyen pa de thob

rma par bya ba'i phyir byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang/ khag ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i don gyi dngos po bsamagyis mi khyab pa'i mthong/ gos tagasungs pa'i chos ma thos kyang sang 'i chos
'jig par gyur pa mthong na/ dbades m du na mad pa'i sa rgyas kyis sems can nams kyi zhanamos pa grasamadab zhi bar byed cing/ bded dang ban du ba na du gyur ba bdin/ sangs rgyas dang
bachub sams dba' 'ba' zhig gis yun ring du gnas shing mi nub par mdzad de/ bdug kyang byang gtusems bskyed la/ sems can thams cad kyi+i mongs pa yongs su spangs ba'i phyir/ bdag gi lus
'di sdug bsngal chen poskyong langs sa rgyus kyichos 'jig rten na yun ring du gnas par bya'o snyam soms nas/ byang chub tu sems bskyad bad/ kha cig sas rgyas kyi chos 'jig bsa mthong yang sangan
ba'i sems can rnams nyon mongs pa shin tu lci ba 'dod chags dang/ zhe sdong dang/ gtimug rnams dang ngo yodapa dang/ khro'amad pa dang/ ser sna rnams dang/ phrag dog dang/ khong khro ba dang//
'khrub pa rnams dang/ med pa dang/ phatsom dang/ la la sogs pa nyon mongs pa'i dngos po'i dngos po 'di dag mthong na/ de'adi snyam dushin tu dus pasasems can 'adi dag ningage ba mi spyod de/ de
ltar dus napas theg pa gnyis kyisams kyang skyadaminusan/ blan mad pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyod pa lta ci smos snyam samasanas/ byangunub sogs bskyang nga 'o// da ltar
byang chub sems bskyadanas sems can thams cad kyang banamadapa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sogs bskyod pa la brtson par byed do/ des khyang chub sems dapa' dga' ba'i rgyal pos/
ba ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' drin la/shes pani/ bdag byang chub sems bskyad pa'o/ byang chub sems
dang 'a drin lan bsab pa ni/ sems can b.rol debya chub tu sems bskyed du bcug pa'o zhes bgyin/ de bzhinagshegs pa sngon 'khor ba na 'khor ba'i tsho thog ma dngos po tsi'i rgyus byang chub tu
sems bskyed pa gyur/ bcom ldan 'dasakyis bka' stsal ba ragis kyi bu sngon gyi bskal ba grangs med pa 'i bar du skyashis 'khor bas 'khor zhing/ lus dang/ gangang/ yid kyi nyon mongs pa'i las
'a chen pos sems can dma' ba chen ngo brgyad song bar gyur to// 'dilta ste/ a da nga 'isems can dmyal ba dang/ a la la'i sems can dmyal ba dang/ a tshatsa'isimasaman ngamal ba dang/ zangs
kholama'aams can dmyal ba dang/zas khol bachen po'i sems can dmul ba dang/ don pa'i nags can dmal ba dang/ rdog pon po'i dmyal ba nas/ ma'i shing rta'i dmyal ba'i bar du'o//
dade'i tshanama'i shing rta'i dmyal bar lhung nas/ gudan gcig dang gnyis kyasi ma'i shing rta'adren te/ dmyal ba'i srungs ma a wang ni shing rta'i stang na 'dug cade mgakhagrad/ so gtsegs te ma
'bud na kha dang mig dang/ rnab dang/ snunas ma 'bar/ dud po 'thul te/ srungasam de'ang lus shin tu che zhing gnag la/ shing rta'i steng na skyil mo krung bcas te ' gnas / lag pas lcags kyi dbug
pa thogs te nga la brdego/ de'itshangan ba'i sdug bsngal ma bzod nas sto bas mi nus kyis shing rtadras so// ba'i grogs shig mchung sta 'dren ma nus pas dmyal ba'i srungs sa a wang gis lcags kyi
mdung rtse gsum pa thogs nas brang du btsugs te lcags thos babasanas hrag char pa phab bo// de'atshami de na ba'i sdug bsnga'ami bzodapas/ natsa ba'i skad chen po byang nas bal 'ga'ani pha

ma zhes 'bod/ bar thag na chung ma bu zhes bos kyang phan pa mdudo// nga du'i tshod lta bu'i sdug bsngal chen pomyong bar ma thong nas snying rje'i sags skyas sa// de ltar snying rje'i sems na po skyas nga'i na
kyag byang chub tu sams bskyod por gyur te// de nas sdug bsngal myong ba de'i phyir dmyol bo'i srungs ma a zhang la sdug bsngal myong ba'im 'di lasnying rje'i sems cung zad skyed cig ces gsol ba
btabab dang dmyal ba'i srungs bos nas gsang gi sams rgyas pas/ lcags kyi mdung rtsa gsum pa thogs nas/ de'i gnya' bar btsugs nas/ der mo'i dusabyas pas lha'i shing rta'i sems can
dmal ba las thar to/ bskal pa brgya nad kyi ma go ba'i sdig pa byang bar gyur to// de ltar dus bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byatshub tu sams bskyed pas/ me'i shing rta'i sems can dmalab 'as
thar pa gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dga' ba'i rgyal po la bka' stsal pa// de'i ma'i shing rta'adonapa de'i da ltar nga yin te/ byang chub tusogs bskyod pas myur du sangs rgyas su grub par gyur
0 gtong de ba gnas ems can thamasacad kyis byang chub tu sems bskyed pani/ nogyi des po gcig tu zad de/ bal snying rje'i rkyen gyis skya'o// la la ni pang gi rkyen gyis skye 'o// la la ni

sbyin pa'i rkyen gyis skya'o// la la nisob sna'in gyis skyab la dga' ba'i rkyen gyis skyogo/ la lanamya ngan gyi rkyen gyis skye'o// 'a ni 'dod pa dang bye bral gyi rkyen gyis skya'o// la laningag sdang

ba dang phrad pa'i rkyen gyis skyo'o// la lanidage ba'i bshes gnyenalartenapa 'iskrunagyis skya'o/ la 'di mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi rkyen gyis skye'o// la la ni sangs rgyas mthong ba'arkyen gyis skya'o// la'ani
sa thos pa'i rgyagyis skya'o// de bas na sems can rnams la byang chub tusanas bskyad pa nad las so sor mi mthun te/ dga' ba rgyal po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos// drin 'onashes pa dang

drin lan bsab pa'i don gyidangs po 'dra 'bage par bya'o// de'i ngo ris 'di bstanapan/ skya bo khribargyad stong snyad kyis bla med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sams bskyed par gyur to// 'khor mang po dedag
lasalanargyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob panas dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu'i bar du thob par gyur to/ lhadang/ gludang/ yi dgas dang mi dang/ mi ma yin pa la sogs pa thams cad nyan thos dang rang
sas rgyas su san sa bskyang pa gyur te/ tshes thos pa lar ba tu dga' rangs nas/ mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/g.yas phyogasanas bskor ba byas nas phyi dong ngo// thabs mkhasab chen po sangs rgyas
09 drin lan bsab pa'i mdo las/ byang chub tu sems bskyed pa zhes bya ba'il bu sku bzhi pa'o/// bam po gsum ng// de'i tshe deb zhi gshegs pa'i sun
lhamadzes dang rtsa rnams kyan du zhag dgu ba cu'i bar du lha rnams la chos ston du gshegs te shu 'dzam bu'agling ba mi rnams kyis zhag dgu cu'i bar du de bzhin gshegs pa galabazhugs da ma togs so//

mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po rdzu 'phrul gyi mchog tu gyur pas kyang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi thusagatugs te/ phyogs bar brtags kyang ma rtogs so// 'phagasang nyaskyong lta bu lha'i mig mchog gis phyogs bcug stong

gsum gyi stong chen ngo'i 'ag rtenagyi khams kun tu bltas kyang ma mthong ngo// de bzhin du 'phags pa'i 'khor lnga brgya'i bar du/ kun gyis brtags kyang ma mthong ngo// de ltar de bzhin gshags ba ma na thong bas/
de dgami dga' sto ma nagyis sems gdungs par gyur to// de'i tshe rgyal po u Ta ya nas de bzhin gshegs nga na mthong bas mi dag 'bu'isims skyasato/ de bzhinagshegs pa dran pa'i phyir/ glang
mgo'i shing tsan dan las de bzhin bshegs pa'i sku gzug byas nas phyag 'tshal ba dang/ mchod pa byed pa de 'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mngon sum dang 'drab r bzhugs bar dmags nas mchod pa//
byas so// de'i ri rgyal po chen pos mu stags can gyi ston pa thug bos nas/ de bzhin gshegs padaltar ga labazhugs zhes dris na/ ston pa drug gis rgyal bo la 'di skad ces smras so// rgyal
dpon dge mkhan nam/ dge sbyong go'u ta man rgya'athul can yin te/ sbya'o// sgyu 'phrulagyi sgyu ma bden pa'i das pon dpas/ bdag cag gi gtsug lag lasale stong sa

nyis stongan skya'aphrul can sgyu ma'aga'abyung ngo zhes 'chad pas/ dge sbyong go'u tam ni sgyu ma de 'on yin no// po'i po'aphags pa bar skyong rgyal po chen ng ga la bar song nas rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to// rgyal

bo chen po mkhyon tan/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni de sta zhag bdun nas sum cu rtsa gsum gnamanas 'dzam bu'i gling dugshegs so// rgyal ngos de skad ces smras pa thos nas na ba tu dga' ba'i sems su gyur te//
tsa yula'i bsdus ]mgag dang ga bdar byas te/ spos dang me tog kyang bshams/ dar gyi ldaldi dang/ ba dag dang gdugs bras te/ zha' bas mang po dang/ rol mo lasogs pa marjod pa'i yo byung rnam pa

sna tshogs bshams shing sbyar ba dang/ mu stegs can 'di ston pa drug der 'ongs nas/ khyod rnams 'di ltar mchod pa'i yo byad bshams shing sbyar ba bde rgyal po spyan 'drenanam/ de dag gis de ma yin no zhes
smras pa dang/ bon blon po tsha bo 'bod dam/ bram khri 'am khyim bdag 'bod dam/ de ma yin na gnabashes kyi 'dus ston byed pas/ smasang de ma yin te/ sas rgyas bcom ldan 'das gshegs su

gsol lo// ston pa drugagis smras pa// sangs rgyas zhes bya ba su zhig/ smras pa// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'o// yang rnamab thams cad mkhyen pa zhes pa de su zhig/ smras ng/ byams pa dang snying rje chen
po'i yab po khyed me shas sam/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i rigs mtho zhing btsun la mchog tu gyur ba/ shog m bskal pa dang ponas btsunamorten mo'i dus cig gcig gis gdung bsams te/'khod 'gos

rgyal ba'i rgyal po byas so// bar du ba gnyis kyis 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal pom byas mod kyi/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi rgyal bo byas so// rgyal po de la sras mched gsum zhig mnga'o/ rab ni rgyal bo zas gtsang ma/

zhas pya/ de'i bar ma ni zas bra bo zhes bya/ de'i tha chung du bris zil dngar gyi zas zhes bya'o// rgyal po thas gtsang ma la sras gnyis shigamang ba/ man ngon yin grub ces bya/ sras chung ngu ringaga' bo zhes ba/ rgyal

go zas bye bo la sras gnyis shig mnga'/ chen po'i lha sbyin zhes bya/ srasarlud du ni kun dga' bo/ rgyal bo zil dngar gyi zas la sras mo gcig yod de bumo le dang 'a gyi zhes bya'o// de'i tshon spun gyi rab rgyal

bu don grub pho brang gi phyi rol tu ltadamo ltar song song ba los/rgas pa dang/ na pa dang/ shi ba dga mthong anasam dga' bar gyur to/ kha bras kyang mi bra zhing snying ldabasams kyisasams pa la zhugs te/ mi'i

skyes pa la mtho dman med par gzigs su red ba thams cad la de'adra ba'i nad dang skyon yod de/ gcig kyang mi thar losAm bsams nas/ mtshan mo pho brang nas bros nas byang chub kyi []nga drung du lo drug
gangal dusngod pa dka' ba spyad nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya bar gyur te/ thams cad mkhyen pa la shes can zhes mngon par sangs rgyas te/ stobs bcu dang/ mi'ajigasang
[r]@#// bzhi dang/ ma'adras pa 'chos brgyad dang ldan zhing rnam pa thams cad m khyen pa zhes bya bar gyur to// bltams nas zhag bduna'an nas yum lha mdzes dus byas te/ sum cu rtsa sum
gnam gyi lha'i nang du skyes nas yul la zhag dgu bcu'i bar chos bshad d Da dalta nag bdun na 'dzam bu'i gling du gshogs so// de'atshamu stagasacan gyi ston nga gags de skad ces sgrub thos nas/
phrag dog gi sems skyes te/ rab tu yi dam dga' ba'i mya ngan gyis gdus nas/ ston pa drug 'khor dang cas te lhan cig tu 'dug ste 'di skad ces bgros so// dge sbyong go'u ta mga' ta'adzam bu glid 'di
phyin te 'ongasan/ mi thams cad kyis bdag cag srongazhingadag sbyong go tama'amachod pa byed par 'gyungs/ bdagacagani bra 'a zhing 'phongs la srog lu 'bab pa sogs 'gyur re zhes bgros nas mu stegs na
gyi ston pa drug yang 'dem du bsams so// bdag cagami mang po 'dus pa'i gnasasu myur dusong la/ mimang po zhing du 'di skad ces bzlog par bya'o// de skadaku shes par gyis/ gesbyong go'u yani/
