kyis myur du song ge'isgra sgrogs shig/ 'di lta ste/ dkon mchog gsum dang/ bden pa bzhi dang/ khyim pa dang/ rab tu byung ba'i 'khor bdun gyi khyad par dang/ de dgage skyabs su
'gro ba gsum dang/ gtan khrims lnga nas/ tshul khrims thams cad kyi bar du/ sems can la phan pa'i tshul khrims dang [Y]nyon mongs pa sbyong ba'i tshul khrims dang/ spyod lam gyi
@# @#// gdul pa'i tshul khri sa dang/ bsam gtan gyi tshul khrims dang/ zag bamed pa'i tshul khrims bstan te/ dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung rgyas bar byos shig/
de nas ma 'gags pas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// de bzhin gshags pas rdzu 'phrul gyi thus ba dga' byed gyis brlabasan/ bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa
wA 'a cung zad cig zhu'o// gsol ba/ dkon mchog gsum zhes bgyi ba gang 'gag/ sangs rgyas dang/ sa dang/ dge 'dun zhes bgyi ba dkon mchog gsum la mtshan nyidamamari
chen na'i slad du chos dang dge 'dun bye brag dang khyad par mchis shang/ dkonan cog gsum la skyabs su namib ji ltar gzungs su khrung/ skyabs sumar pa gsum gal te gcig
lags na/ gra sum zhes gsung ba'ayi gas/ gal te skyabs sumachib gsum du gsungs na/ ci'i slad du 'khor rnam pa bdun nas par gsungs/ bcom ldan 'das ci
la skyabs su mchan/ skyabs sumareb zhes bgyi/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don de dag so so nas rnam par bkrol te/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sangs rgyas zhes bya ba
bsta/ ngos kyi mtshan nyid thams cad mngon sum dud pa'i yi ro// gzhan yang sems can thams cad n dmas gsum nargyun du gnyid kyis myos te/ sangs rgyas byang chub kyi sngon bye bas
0 na bdag kyang khyod la/ pha khu bo' tshon par byed ba pa yang dang tshor ba zhes bya'o/ sangs rgyas nyis thams cad la thobs thob pa thams cad gsungs pa'o// gsol ba/ ji ltar na
sangs rgyas kyis thams cad gsungs pa zhes bgyi ba lags/ na ta dus tshod las gsol dang dbang po rtsa dang 'bod pa bzhin du gsus pa la bgyi 'ag/ 'on te so so' snga thadad da bzhin
durjes su gsungs pa la bgyi/ bka' stsal ba/ sangs rgyas na dbang po ji zhin du dus las ma yol bar chos thams cad gsungs na/ phyis nye gnas rnams kyis rjes kyi sde snod bsdus
pa 'tshim ngo spro'i bag la bstan to// sangs rgyani skabs ga bcag tu rta gnas rnams la tshul khrims ji lta ba dang/ skyur ba dang/ ltung ba med pa bcas te/ 'du ba'i sde snod du phyin/ sgosabA
kha cig tu ni rgyu dang 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid las nyon mongs pa dang/ nye ba'i nyon mongs ba skya bas/ las kyi mtshan nyid gsungs te/ chos mngon pa'i sde snod phya'o// lha dang mi 'jib
tan du pas de la ci dang 'bras pa bzhin du bstan cing gsus pa/ gzhung gcig nas 'phros pa nas bya ste/ 'dul ba'i skal pa dang ldan pa'i gang brag rnams kyis spyod pa'i las su
gsungs so// sems can dbang po rnon po nas don zab mo rnam pa mang po gsungs ban/ gzhung bar n zhes bya ste/ slob ma rnams kyi spyod pa'i las su gsungs so/ bsam gtan/
ba'i don du gzhung 'bring po gsungs so// byamasa rnam pa sna tshogs gsungs pa ni gzhung sil bu zhes bya ste/gang zag bsam gtan byed pa rnams kyi srid pa'i las su gsangs so/
gsolor/ gal te sangs rgyas thams cad gsungs pa la gnas ni/ mdo sde lu sangs rgyas shing ljon pa zhig gi drung du bzhugs te sher ba/
ma'agagacig 'dab malas nga zung nas nya gnas rnams la mal gru gzung ba'adi'i 'dab ma mad ma/ shing rten dken po'i'adangamamang zhes bka' stsalas/ shing ljon pa'i 'dabs
mang ngo zhes gsol pa las/ sangs rgyas kyis dus mkhyen pa ba tshes shing ljon pa'i 'dab na 'dra'o// dras bshad pa'i ngos ni lag ngas bzung ba'i 'dam dang 'dra'ozhes gsungs
tsawaM na sangs rgyas thams cad gsungs pa'o zhes bgyi'ang ma/ bka' stsal pa/ mtshan nyid dad pa'i thams cad kyi thams cad dang/ mtshan nyid gcig bu'i thams cad kyi thams
cad yod do// 'di ni mtshand tha dad pa'i thams cad la dgongs te/ sangs rgyas thams cad gsungs ba'o zhes bshad do// de'angasems can gyis zad pa'i gzungaminus
pa la bya'i/ sangs rgyas kyis gsung mazhus pas pano// gzhan yang thamasacad mkhyen pa la'ang thams cad gsungs pa zhes bya'o/ drang thobs su thams cad gsungs
[}]ba zhes bya ba mi rung ngo// gso'ab/ gal te sangs rgyas kyimkhyen ngs gsus pa 'gas na/ nyan thos dang rang sa na sgras kyang shes ba la rten ta sman/ ci'i slad du de la'ang sad/
rgyas zhes bdags/ bka' stsal ba/ de lta bu ma yin te/ sangs rgyas namkhyen pa dang gsum pa gnyis ka'i mtha' nano// thagu pags kyigs pa dang smra ba'i chos kyis
ma phyin pa'i do// gzhan yang sangs rgyas machos thamasacad chub dag mkhyon pas/ ming brtags pa 'ang mkhyen gyis/ theg pa gnyis kyis de ltar mi nus so// gzhan yang sangs rgyas ni
rjes banas pa'i ng mtha' yas la/ tshes gsungs pa'i ng mtha' yas te thug pa gnyis ni de ltar minus so// gzhan yang sas rgyas kyis brnyes pa'i thun mong gi thag ba gnyis kyi thob da
da 4 thun mong ba'ang yod// nyan thos kyis thob pa dang/ thun mong ma yin pa'i ng yod do// theg pa gsum gyis shes pa thun mongani/ theg pa 'bring gis thob/ thag pa gnyis kyishe
ba thun mong nas nigs rgyas 'ba' zhig gis brnyes te/ theg pa gnyis kyis ma shes pa'i ng sangs rgyas nyag gcig gis mkhyen to// gzhan yang ji tsam du sgron na kha gapa kyang che ste/ sa
chen mtshan nyid kyang mtha' yas pas/ saMngs rgyas na mtha' yas pa'i shes kyis/ mtha' yas pa'i rtsis gsungs te/ theg pa gnyis kyi so pa gos na mtha' 'o da pas chos kyi tshun
nyid ces mi gdags so/ gzhan yang dbang po dang nadu ldan te/ bang po zhes bya ba'i shes rab kyi dbang 'o// don zhes bya ba ni she su 'bag dbang po 'di/
zhes bya ba 'debs 'bakyis dmigs pas so// sangs rgyas ni dbang po dang donaganyis rdzogs te/ shesab pa kyis dmigs pa 'dis kyang matha' man dmad do// theg pa gnyis
kyis dbang po dang gnyis ka mardzogs so// gzhan yang sangs rgyas nas thams cad kyiman nyid kyi mtshan ti yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mkhyen pa'i yang dag pa'i ye shes
bas pa yin// theg ba gnyis kyis nas kyi gting rub bur shes pas/ yang dag pa'i ye shes zhes bya mi rung ste/ de ltar don rnam pa mang po'i sgo nas theg pa gnyis la
zla sangs rgyas zhes byar mi rung de// 'am ldan 'das zhes bya ba na tshig dang sgra'i sgo nas gdags su mi rung gi/ don gyi sgo nas btags pas bcom ldan 'das zhes pa lta/ de'ang gnyen
po'i chos thams cad mkhyen pa'i yi ro// gzhan yang 'jig rten pa'i sgra skad mi mthun pas/ 'jig rten du rung bsam shes bar zad kyi/ sas rgyus kyis ni kun mkhyen pas bam
ldan 'das zhes bya'o// gzhan yang slong rtsib legs ces bya ba'i gzhung las/ theg pa gnyis dang soso'i skya bo dgazhi kha cig dban zhi zhi la dad pa'i ng yod/ kha mig
ni ri sam ga tan dang te de 'a la dad pa'i ng yod/ kha cig na rkyen gzhan gyi sa ga sang mkhyud de'i ston pa 'dra yod kyi/ sangs rgyas kyis brnyes pa'i ris ni byams pa dang thugs rje mjul/
ldan ng sa/ gzhan la ston cing gsungs par spro'o// gzhan du na gdug pa gsum btson btsun/ bcom ldan 'drasazhes bya// gsol pa/ theg pa gnyis kyang gdug pa
gsum bcom ni'i slad du bcom ldan 'das zhes mgags/ bka' stsal pa/ de lta bu ma yin te/ thog pa gsan ldog pa yod kyi/ sangs rgyas nas rtog pa mad da'i
'o// phyi ga ba la 'jam pa gsum ste/ 'bras bu'i ldog pa dang/ 'bras bum yin pa'i phyib ldogapa dang/ spyod pa las phyir ldog pa'o// 'bras bu phyir ldog ces bya ba// nyan thosakyi 'bras bu
gsum phyir ldog pa zad kyi/ 'bras bu tha ma phyi ma ldog pa dang/ theg pa bar ma la rnam pa gnyis te/ gal te bskal pa brgyu bar du rnal 'byor ba spyod pa 'inang sangs rgyas ni 'bras bu yi
na ldog go// gal te grogs nas thog pachung ngu'i 'bras bu gsum las/ rang sangs rgyas su gyur na/ de'abras bun shi ldog par 'gyur gyi/ sangs rgyas kyi 'bras bu ni phyir mi
ldog gi// 'bras bu ma yin pa'i ldog pa ni/ gal te thag pa gsum la phyogs pa'i gang zag 'bros bum thob pa'i phyir ldog pa dang/ dge slong rnal 'byor can la 'khyodapa dang/ brtson
@#/[ ]'grus chad pa dang/ rnal 'byor sbyong pa las/ masate/ mi brtson pa'i di gsum ni 'bras bu ma yin pa'i phyir ldog pa zhes bya'o//
spyod pa las phyi ldog ces bya ba ni/ jitsam du thob par bya ba'i tshesa mngon sum du las sumalung ba'o// dbar na sangs rgyas kyi stobs bcu dung/ theg pachud bu'i sa shas bcu lta bu/
gcig la 'os su byas kyi/ lhag ma gzhan ' dgos pa'i m/ mdo sde la tshigs su bcad pa 'bum kha ton du shas pa las/ gal te kha ton ma byas pa ni dusan/ de kun la spyod pa lu
phyir ldog pa zhes bya'o// thag pachung du la'ang 'bras bu phyir mi ldog pa yod/ thug pa bar ma la'ang 'bras bu ma yin pa'i phyir ldog pa yod kyi/ sangs rgyas la ni 'bras bu ma sinopa'i phyi
ldog pa med dro// de'ang chos thams cad la brtson 'grus ga byas pa med pa'i phyi'i// theg pa gnyis la ni spyod pa las phyi'i ldog pa yod kyi/ sangs rgyas ni ga cig tu ma nges te/ stod
bcu'as gcig las su byas pas chogag/ dgu las su bya mi dgos pas ldog pa zhes bya'o/ ]lagazhan dun las su bya ba lami dgos pa'i phyi'i ldog pa mdud/ dbor
mdo sde 'gas su bcad pa khri ga teshu kha nangashesan/ gang zaganama'u zhan bsanyin zhag gcig gam/ zhag gas kyi bar du rdzogs par 'don nus kyi/ sangs rgyas na skad
gtsam gyis rdzogs pag/ stobs bcu'ang de dang 'dra ste/las su bya dgosan skad ga tsam gyis mdzad pa tshad med pas/ las su bya ba lami dgos pa'i phye ldog pa med do// gzhan/
yang sangs rgyas la las su bya ba mi dgos pa'i la ldog pa med de/ dpo'ananam bza' smad ga logs gsol ba'i[& ]/ so so'i skya bo'i sa lta bur gzhung med par gsol ba ni ma yin gyi/ de'ang
sems can mang ngol panapa'i don du 'phrin las mdzad kyang/ na pa yon las de mdzad kyi ban padan mdzad do// de ltag las su bya ba lami dgos pa'i phyir ldog pa med kyi/ so
sonas dgos pa yod de gcig tu ma nges pas/ sangs rgyas kyi dgod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya'o/ gsol ba/ na thos la 'i slad du 'bras bu gsum n yi ldog la/
'bras bu tha ma phyi ma log pa lags/ bka'astsal kha ]'bras bu gsum n sngon yang thob pas na she ma ldog go/ 'bras bu tham pa da dungamA thob pas na phyir mi ldog go/ dpa' na gang zag bkrin
pa zhes kha zas zhim po dang phradan/ yun ring po mi brjedapal/don 'di'ang de dang 'dra'o// gzhan yang 'bras bu thaman bzod pa thogs bamed pa'i lam du 'gyur la/ sogs rnam par grol
ba'il du gyur ro// 'bras bu gsum ma shes thogs pa med po'i lam du gyur la/ de bas rnam par grol ba'i lam dum 'gyur ba'i phyi'i ldog go/ gzhan yang bden pa mthong
[z/ ]@#/ ba'i lam ni bying mi ldog gi// bsam pa'i lam ni phyi ldog ste/ dag da dung ma gu pa'i 'du shes kyis/ nyon mongs pa'i mdud pa gcod pa'i phyi'i ro// sems da lan kun

nas nyon mos pa yod kyi/ bshar ma bod bal kun nas nyon mongaramed de/bden mthong pA kun nas nyonamodra pamedami/ bden pa mthong bas kun nas nyon mos bar mthong la/donam tho bas na bsen par ng skya ste
kun nas nyon mongs pa phyi ma lde go gzhan yang bden pa mthong pa'i ya shas kyi stobs che ba ni/ dreg na sdong po chen posardzas mnon pa dang 'dra ste/ sems shing yid la byed pa'i shes
ra po zhan pas phyer ldog pa yod do// gzhan yang bden pa mthong ba 'dod pa'i khams kyi bzod pa dang/ shes rab kyi sams gnyis kyis// dag pa kun nyon mongs pa'i mdud pa gcod
do khams gong ma'i bzod pa dang/ shes rab kyi sems gnyis kyis ni/ kun nas nyon mongs pa bdun cu rtsa gnyis gcod do// gzugasamed pa'i bams kyi mthur phyin pa
zlaphyi'i ldog pa med do// na de lta bas na/ de 'ba' zhig la bcom ldan 'das zhes bya'o// gzhan yang sangs rgyas la bag chags kyi rnam pa med kyi/ theg pa gnyis ka'i na bag chags
ma zad do// dper na dge slong rtag tu bldad pa zhes bya ba rtag par ba glang ltar bldad pa yang/ tshe rabs snga ma latshe rabs dunang ba gang byed pa las mi'i skyes pa'i phyi 'o// dper na dge slong
zhig zag pa zad kyang rtag tu ma lod la lta ban tshorabs du mar bud med skya 'tshongam las ma'i skyes ba'i phyi'i'o// nang na dge slong zhi khro dang gdang la 'dzegs rab dang ga'u ba'ang/ tshe/
rabs dunar snga'u byed pa las/de skyes te/ de la ni bcom ldan 'das zhes byar mi rung ngo/ gsol ba/ 'di skad bdag gis thos zhes bgyi ba sangs rgyas bzhugs pa'i tshibadag gis shes
zhes gsungs sem/ sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu thos zhes gsungs/ chos kyi mdzod bsdus pa'i tshig las po dag gis thos zhes bya ba/ sangs rgyas shing bstan pa'i ng
bdag la na lus par bstan cing bshad par gsal le zhes m smras sam/ gsol pa// lo nyi shu'i bar dus kyi ga ci bshad pa da ji ltar bstan par bgyi/ bka' stsal pa// sangs
rgyas kyi thabs mkhas pas/ tshigs su bcad pa gcig gis kyang ches grangs med pa ston la/ chos grangs med pa'i don yang tshigs su bcad pa gcig gis ston te/ sangs rgyas kyis
mdo tsam zhig bstan na'ang kun dga' bos ma lus par shes pa na/ rno ba'ashesa'ab kyis gzungs su 'dzin pa'i stobs che ba'i yi 'a/sa brgyad khri yod ces bya ba ni/ dper na/
shang gi rtsa ba dang/ yal ga dang/ lcagom dang/ 'dab ma la spyir sdong po gcig ces bya ba ltar/ sangs rgyas kyis sems can gyi don du thog ma nas tha ma'i bar du chos bstan/
shug pa la sde snod gcig ces ltan brgyad khri'o// gzhan du nas sargyas gdan gcig las ma g.yos par le nyi shu'i bar du chos bshad kyang/ kun dga' bos ma rdo/
na/ ci'i slad du de dag gis gros zhes bgyi/ bka' stsal pa/ lha rnams kyis kun dag bdo' sa zhes kyang bya/ gzhan du na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kun rdzob 'jig rten pa'i thugs kyis
kun dga' bos shes par byas zhes kyang bya/ gzhan dun dag slong rnams las thos zhes kyang bya'o// gzhan yang kun dga' bos 'di skad ces sangs rgyas la gsol ba btab bo//
sangs kyin bza' rnying pa bdag la stsaya cing/ yonub dag gis bsod snyoms bdag la mi la ba gsol la// bdag gi 'dod pa 'dis ngas rgyas la phud dud dang bam gro
bgyid de/ ci bzhed pa sbyor gyi/ gos dang bras kyi phyi ma yin no// dge slong gzhan rnams snga dro dang phyi dri'i dus kyi ngosangs rgyas mthong gi/ bdag ni nam lta 'dod ng na mthong
bar gso la go/ g.yo chung la rkashu'i bar du sagasung/ chos bstan pa la sde snod gcig ces bya ste/ de lta bu brgyad khri'o// sa dang gzhan dun yig 'tshag bar du cu drugal
tshigs su bcad pa phyed do// mi ga'i tshig bar sum cu rtsa gnyis lags su bcad pa gcig ces bya ste/ de ltar brgyad khri'o// yang gzhan du na tshig bshad kyi rkang nga' ring thang las
yi ge ba tshig bar bzhi bcu rtsa gnyise 'tshugs su bcad pa gcig ste/ de ltar na brgyad khri'o// lung gzhan dunu zla ba phyed phyed cing tshul khrims bstan pa la sde snod gcig ces bya ste//
de lta na brgyad khri'o// yang gzhan dun sas rgyas kyis gsungs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa drug khri drug stong la/ sde snod gcig ces bya ste/ de ltar na brgyad khrig/ yang gzhan du
na sangs rgyas kyis nyon mongs pa brgyad khri'i ga nyan bono/ chos kyi sman brgyad khri'i gsungs pas/ chos kyi sgo me dakhri zhes bya'o// grasol ba/ ci'i slad dumado sde dang chos man ta/
sangs rgyas kyis sngar ma smos la/ 'dul ba sangs rgyas kyis sngar smos/ bka' stsal pa// mchog yin pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyis bcus pa'i sha// dpal nA mde sde lta bu na/
nye gnas rnams kyi chos bstan pa 'dra yod/ drungar na brgya byin lha 'i dbang po lta bu'i bdag ni spyi nye pa bzhi pa yin na mchog go/ de ci'i phyi zhen/ bdag gis sbyin pa khyen da sa
lha'i dbang por gyur te/ bsam pa yid bzhin nozhes smras te/ sangs rgyas kyis kyang de bzhin no zhes gsungs pa 'ad yod/ dumakha gcig tu sangs rgyas sprul pa 'asas rgyas su
sprul te/ sprul pa'i sangs rgyas kyis chos gsungs pa'i nga 'od kyi/ 'dul ba ni ri lta bu m yin te/ thams cad sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa sa/ de ngos na sangs rgyas so/
sngar smos so// yang gzhan dan de sdona gnas gos bzhugs dra ba na gsus kyi/ 'dul ba ni de lta bu ma yin te/ gnas gang du nyes pa byung na
de nyid du khrims bca' ba ma yin gyi/ mtshams kyi rgyal du 'cha' ba dang/ khyam pa'i ngan sa pa byang n dga' dun gyi nang du bca' ba dang/ grong khyer gcig tu zhes pa byung
na'ang/ ge 'dun gyi nang du bca' ba dang/ 'khor rnam lnga'i nga du shes pa byung na/ dge slong dang/ dge slong mang du bca' dgos pas/ de ngosan sangs rgyas kyis snga smosaM ba
tshe yin no// yangs pa can zhes bya ba/ yul kha ba/rgyal po'amadzanalos btags pa'i ng yod/ yul kha cig ni yulas pas btags pa yang yod 2 kha ba na grong khyer las
bags pa 'dra yod/ yul 'di ni klu las yul gyi ming du btags so/ ka lan ta ka'i gnas zhes ba ngan/ lasazhing du btags te/ grong khyer zhes bya ba ni grong gi bdag po'i
mang ngo// lha sbyin zhes bya ba 'ang de'i pha mas lha 'a gsol ba nga pa a bu red bsan/ lha spyan zhes ming du btags so// gtsan phyug ces bya ba// phyog pa lanam pa gnyis te/
sems can gyi bgo dad sems can g yin pa'i bag go// sems can ma yin pa zhes bya ba na/ gsar dngul dang/ bani ngo tsho sna bdun dang/ bdaMmadzod dang/ no byig
dang / zhing dang/ khang khyim mang du yod pa'o// sems can zhes bya ba ni bran dza dang/ banan dang/ las byed pa nyi ma dang/ ba glang dang/ rta dang/ lug dang/ dang nga/
byed pa 'grong du mang du yod pa ste/ dan phyug po zhes bya'o// bzhi zhes du ba na dbang dang ldan pa bas/ legs nga 'i yin tan dang ldan te/ ma'i cog gis phud dad byed cing btsun
bar byed pas btsan zhes bya// dkona mchog gsum la phyogs shing skyabs su 'gro ba gsum na nos pa'i// gsa' skyabs su 'gro ba gsum gyirang bzhin ji lta bu la gas/
ston pa kha cig ni skyabs su 'gro ba gsum ni cho ga yin gyi/ chog mtshan nyid mdu du/ skyabs su 'gro ba gsum nod pa 'i tshe/ dus mo btsugs la thal mo spyar te skyabs su 'gro ba/
gsum kha nas tshig tu brjod pa ni// lus dngog gi chog bstan pa'o// gal te sems rtso gcig tu byas na ( 'as da ngag yod kyang rtogs bstan pa mad do/ de ni ro ga bstan
pa med pa zhes bya'o/ gzhan dun skyabs su 'gro ba gsum n/ lus dang/ ga dang/ sad kyi las kyi rang bzhin gsum zhes bya'o// yang gzhan dun skyabs su 'gro ba
gsum ni phung po lnga dag ba ste/ sems can gyi phung bo lnga dge bas/ gsum la skyabs su 'gro bar byed de/ dkon mchog gsum ni skyabs su 'gro ba'i gnas so// skyabs su 'gro
(zhes pa na/ mgon skyabs sag dpung gnyen gyi don te/ dper na mi zhig nyes pa chen po byung ba las yul gzhan du 'phos pa las/ rgyal po pha rol po la yag
skyabs pa tsal nA/ tshul T pa la gyargyal bos de la khyod la 'jigs po 'dod na pa'i yul 'di nas mi 'gro zhing des ba ston pa nyanan/ mgon skyabs bya'o zhes bsgo ba dang 'dra bar so so'i skye
gong de dang 'dra sta/ bdud kyi dbang du gyur la skye shi 'khor ba'i nyes pa yod pas/ dkon mchog gsum la phyogs skyabs su 'gro bar bya'o// gal te dkon ma rtog gsum lartse
gcig ta phyogs shing skyabs su song la/ sangs rgyas kyis bstan pa las 'ga' bar na byas na/ bdud kyi rgyal po sdig pa can gyis ci byar yang mad do// sngon phugashen gcig khra sanyan
rgyunasaA'i bu'i phag grib ma song ba 'as ]'on kyang skrag cing dngang ngu bzhin no// danagasas rgyas kyi grib ma'i 'batusong ba dang/ 'jigs pa med de/ 'dug ba'ang mad do//
gal te rgyalan bo 'pho zhing 'gyur yang srid kyi/ bug na de ni bsgyur du med de/ dubs nasadas rgyas byams pa chen po dang/ thugs rje chen pos ldan gyi/ 'a gi bu ni byams
pa dang/ snying rje chen pomed do// sangs rgyas lan ngag chags med kyi/ Aya'i bu lan bag chags ma zad do// sangs rgyas ba skal pa gros med pa gsum gyi bar du byang
ka chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyad kyi/ hA ba'i ba ni de skal pa drug cu'i bar du dka' thub spyad de/ da nga san phug na yang bA ba'i bu'i gribama' song ba na/ 'on kyang skrag cing 'jigs kyi
sangs rgyas kyi gab mar song da na/ 'jigs pa med par gyur to// gsol pa// gal te dkon mjug gsun 'a skyabs su song bas/ sdig pa mi dge ba byang zhing 'jigs par mi 'gyur
na ci slad du lha sbyin lta bu dkona mchog gsum la skyabs su gsol// dad pas khyim nas rab tu byung sta/ tshul khrimis kyang rdzogs pa las/ mtshams med gsum bgyisanas/ dam
rad pa'i sems can ngomyal bar ltung bar gyur/ bka' stsal pa// mgon skyabs bya ba'ang/ skyabs bya bar 'os nga 'a[] bskyabs bya ba yin te/ lha sbyin lta bu niyi dge ba'i rtsig nga chen po byas
la gdon mi za bar myong ba'i 6sa dang yang ba cas pas da da'i yi yang na be don skyabs byar yang dka' 'o// ba/sol pa// gal te sdig pa chen po bgyis pa las sa rgyas kyis mgon skya/
ma mdzad na/ sdig pa las ma 'das pa la sangs rgyas kyis mgon skyabs bgyi yang tsa'i tshul/ dkon mchog gsum la mgon skyabs 'a 'o zhin kyang ji skad bgyi/ bka' stsal pa/
lha srin gyis dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su song ba 'ang yang dag pa'i soms kyis ka yin te/ kyang bsu 'gro ba gsum m rdzogs so// de ni rgyun du rnyed pa dang/ nga kur sti dang/ grags
nga 'a dod pa'i phyir bdag ni thams cad n khyen pa yi ges can n zhes sangs rgyas la'ang bsngo bas na/ de'i phyi'i dkon mchog gsum la mthu stobs chen po yod mod kyi
mgon skyabs su mi 'gyur go/ dper na rgyal bo ma skyes dgra lta bu la'ang mas med pa'i sdig pa yod de/ mtshams med pa'i sems can dmyal ba'i ltung bar 'gas pa sa/ yid dag pa'i
sams rtse mig tu sangs rgyas la skyabs su gsol bas/ mtshams med pa'i sdig pa byang nas/ thib nag po ti sems can dmyal bar lhung nas/ ma'i nang nas sdig pa lci ba myong nas lci
ba dang 'dra bar/ zhag bdun myong tsam gyis sdug kun byang bas/ de ni dkon mchog gsum gyi mgon skyabs kyi mthu zhes bya'o// kha sol pa// lha spyin gyis sdig pa bgyis ra shin gon
skyabs byar mi rung ngo zhes bgyis pa mdo sde'i nang nas bag nga su'ang rung ba sangs rgyas la skyabs su song na/ ngan song gsum dum khyung ngo zhes bgyi ba'i don ji lta bu lags/ bka' stsal/

pa lta sbyin gyis dkona mchog gsum la skyabs su song bas mtshamasazhe dar bsems can dmyal bar song mod kyi/ sdug bsngal myong ba yang zhing chung la bsti lo'i dus skabs la dgod bar nam zhig khas/nags tshal 'am/
'brog dgon pa 'jigs pa'i gnas su phyin ba las/ gal te sangs rgyas yid la byas shing bsamasan/ de'i yon tan gyis 'jigs shing skyag pa zhi bar 'gyur te/ de bas na
dkon ma rtog gsum la skyabs su song ba la mgon skyabs su 'gyur ba'ang brdzun no// gsol pa// dkon mchog gsum zhes bgyi ba bdun pa ba na las bden pa gang gi nang du bsdu
dbang po tashu rtsa gnyis las dbang po gang gnang du bsdu ga khams bco brgyad las khams gang gnang du bsdu/ skye mched bcu gnyis las gang gi nang du bsdu/ tabar 'anang la
phung po lnga las/ phung bo gang gnang du bsdu bar bgyi/ bka' stsal pa/ dkon mchog gsum n/ bden nga ba ni' su 'gog pa'i bden par bsdus/ lam gyi bdanang 'a reg
gcig/ dbang pan ga shes pa kushis par bya ba'i dbang po ra bsdu'o/ khams dang 'o brgyad las yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang/ []chos kyi khams su bsdu'o// skye
mched bcu gnyis las/yid kyi skye mched dang// chos kyi skye mched kyin ng du bsdu'o//nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga las zag pa med pa phung po lnga 'and du bsdu'o/ de lasangs rgyas dkon mnyegon/[>
bden pa bzhi la lam gyi bden pa'i phyogs chu gcig go/ chos dkon mchog ni bden pa bzhi las 'gog pa'i bden par ba'o// deg 'dun dkon mdog kyang bden pa bzhi las lam
gyi bden pa dang phyogasar gcig go/ sangs rgyas dkon mchog ni dbang po zhig gnyidi las kun shes pa'i dbang por bsdu'o// chos dkonamadog ni/ 'gog pa bden pa yin pas
[z/ ]@#// 'dus ma byas pa ste/ dbang pos bsdu ba ma yin no// dge 'dun dkona mchog ni dbang po ti rtsa gnyis las zag ba med pa'i dbang po gsum gyi nang du bsdu'o/

skye mched bcu gnyis las yid kyi skya macad dang/ chos kyi skye mched kyi phyogs gcig gi nang du bsdu'o// 'bar 'an pa'i phung po lnga las/ zag pa med pa'i phung po lnga'i phyogs cha
gcig gi nang du bsdu'o/ chos dkon mchog ni bams bco brgyad la sasu chos kyi khams kyi phyogs ma gcig gi nang du bsdu'o/ skye mched bcuganyis las/ chos kyi skya mched kyi phyogs chu
gcig gi nang dub sdug/ sa dkon mdogan phung po lngar bsdus pa ma yin no// phung bo ldan 'dus byas kyis ni 'dus ma byas pa'i phyir// dge 'dun dkon mchog ni khams bco brgyad
las yid kyi khams dang/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khamasaM dang/ rtsos kyi khams kyi phyogs rag gi nang du bsdu'o// skye mched ba cu gnyis las yid kyi skya nyid dang/ sa
kyi skye mched kyi phyogs dgacig ga nang du bsdu'o// nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga las zag pa med pa'i phung po lnga'i phyogs ma gcig gi nang du bsdu'o// gsol pa/ sadas
rgyas la skyabs su gsol zhes bgyi ba sangs rgyas kyi thub pa la skyabs su gsal lam/ na te dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas la skyabs su gsal// bka' skul pa// dus
gsum gyi sangs rgyas la skyabs su gsol// dzil zhen/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi sku gcig tu mthun pa'i phyi 'a sangs rgyas gcig la skyabs su song ba nyade sangs rgyas than sa
cad la skyabs su song ste/ sang sa rgyas la tha dad pa med pa'i phyi ro/ lang ba zhan dun/ dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas la skyabs su gsol len sa bgyi ba lha rnams las duganang dgag sa ngas/
rgyas 'od srungs kyi gnas yin par sna/ kha cig ni bdag sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyi nyi gzhas yin par smra ste/ de bzhin du sangs rgyas bdun la la'ang sa de nas bdag na sa dar rgyas/
chagam zhig gi nye gnas yin zhes sna bas/ de las sangs rgyas gcig la nga skyabs su gsolta bar 'os kyi/ dus gsum ma'ags so// gzhan yang daltar mi rung ngo zhes snang 'ad
yod de/ de'i phyir zhen/ dade'an rnam thos kyi dus dris pa'i mdo las/ rgyal po rnam thos kyi bu dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su gsol ba ni 'das pa dang/ rwa pyad pa dang/
da lta bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas la skyabs su gsol lo zhes gsungs te/ don de dang spu na dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams la skyabs su gsal bar mngon no// gna'ang/ gal
te de lta bu lags na/ lha'i bu dag so so nas bdag ni sangs rgyas che ga ma zhig gi nye gnas lags so zhes bgyi ba'i don ji lta bu lags/ bka' stsal pa///
lha'i bus smras pa la don nges par chud pa'i ng ci yod/ lha'i du kha cig nasas rgyas gcig la skyabs su 'gro ba'ang yod/ kha cig ni dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas la skyabs su song du 'du
yod de/ med na sas rgyas gcig la bya'o// gsalapa/ tsan+d+he skyabs su mchin/ sangs rgyas la skyabs su song ba zhes pagyi/ bka' stsal pa/ skyabs su 'gro
zhes bya ba ni/ ga gi 'khon le so/ thams cad mkhyen pa slob pa med pa'i yon tan la skyabs su song ba'o// gsol// gzugs kyi sku la skyabs sumache 'am/ nos kyi/
sku la skyabs sumachi/ bka' stsal pa// chos kyi sa la skyabs su 'gro'i/ gzugs kyi sku la skyabs su 'gro ba ma yin te/ gzugs kyi sku sangs rgyas ma yin pa 'i phyir ro//
zla gsol pa/ gzugs kyi sku sangs rgyas ma lags nA/ ci'i slad dusas rgyas kyi skul khrag phyung bas/ mams mams pa'i las bgyis par 'gyur/ bka' stsal pa//
gzugs kyi skun chos kyi sku'i snod yan te/ sa kyi sku'i gnas so// de bsan gazlogs kyi sku la gnod pa byas pas/ mtshamasamad pa'i las su 'gyur gyi// gzugs kyi sku
sangs rgyas yin pas/ mtshan s med pa'i las su 'gyur ba nam yazhen// gsol pa/ cel skyabs su mnan/ chos la skyabs su mchi ba zhes bgyi/ bka' stsol ba// skyabs
su 'gro ba zhes bya ba ni/ ngag gi 'bor 'asta/ 'did pa dang/ 'dod pa med pa 'a mtha' na cing/ mya ngan las 'da' da las skyabs su song ba ni/ rjes la skyabs su song ba
zhes bya'o// gsol pa// bdag gi lus mthar phyin pa las skyabs su mchi ma/ gzhan gyi lus n ran pa la skyabs su mchi/ bka' stsal pa// bdag gi lus na thar phyin
pa dang/ gal gyi lus mthar phyin pa la skya bu su 'gro ba na/ chos 'a skyabs su song pa zhes bya'o// gso'// ji ltar na dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi ba lags/ bka'
cul ba/ skyabs su 'gro ba ni ngag gi 'khor 'a sto/ bsod nams kyi zhing slob pa dang/ mi slob bu'i nyan thos kyi yon tan la skyabs su 'gro ba// dug 'dun la skyad sa su song zhes/
bya'o/ gsol pa// kun rdzob kyi bden pa'i dge 'dun 'du skyabs su mchi 'am/ don dam pa'i bden bu'i dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi/ gal te den dam pa'i bden pa'i dag
'dun la skyabs sumanani/ sngon sangs rgyas kyis de ba dang/ pa ra la skyabs su 'gro ba gsum bog pa'i tshe/ phyis dge 'dun zhes bya ba yod par 'gyur gyis/ dalaskya ba
su song zhig ces gsungs pa ma'i ges te/ don dam pa'i ba dan ba'i dge 'dun rtag tu'ajig rten mas bralags/ bka'agalang/ kun rdzob kyi
bden pa'i dge 'dun don dam pa'i ban pa'i dge 'dun gyi brtan pa'i gnas yin pas na/ phyis dge 'dun yod par 'gyur gyis/ de la skyabs su go dra zhig ces gsungs pa yin no
yang ga zhan du na kun rdzob kyi bden pa'i dge 'dun la bkur zhing ban par bya ba'i phyir yang de skad ces gsus te/ saMsargyus kyi 'khor thams cad kyi nang na dge 'dun ni sas rgyas
kyi 'khor mchog gi/ dban 'om lasazhe 'byungal/ zho la/sa mar 'byung/ mar las mar gyi snying po 'byung ste/ mar gyi snying po namag rab gya nom pa dang 'dra ste/ sangs rgyas
kyi 'khor dge 'dun yang de dang 'dra ste/ nye gnas dge 'dun yod na de'i nang na 'jug pa bzhi dang/ 'bras bu bzhi thob pa// bla na med pa'i bsod nams kyi zhing yod pas// 'khor rnam/
ba dgu bcu rtsa drug gzhi ngan dge 'dun na kye nom pa/ mchog rab/ dpe zla med pa sta/ de bsan sa dge 'dun yod par 'gyur gyis/ skyabs su song zhig ces ba/sungs pa la don dang 'gal
(bamed de// gsol pa// sangs rgyas ted rkyes lags la// chos nyid kyang dge 'dun lags te// dge 'dun nyid kyang ngos lags pas/ yang dag par na tshos ga/cig tu ngas na/
khyad bcu nam bye brag ni mas/ bka' stsal pa// nges de dag yid med kyi/ don gyi sgo nas bya brag yod de/ dkenan reg gsum zhes bya ba ston pa med par ye shes chen de dang
slob pa med pa 'i san te/ yon tan thams cad dang ldan pan/ sangs rgyas dkon mug ces bya'o// 'gog pa'i bden pa dang// 'dus ma byas pa na ris dkon mchog ces
bya'o nyan thos kyi slob pa dang/ mi slob pa'i yon tan dang shes rab tu ldan pani/ dge 'dun dkonanachog ces bya'o// chos kyi sgo nas dbye na/ ston bgad pa dang/
bslab pa med pa'i chos ni sa sa rgyas dkon mag ces bya'o// 'gog pa'i bden pa dang/ 'dus ma byas pa ni/ slob bu bad ma yin/ mi slob pa'i ng ma yin pa'i tshesan/
ches dkon mchog ces bya'o// nyan thos kyi slob pa dang/mi slob pa ni dge 'dun dkon mchog ces bya/ dbang po'i sgo nas dbyen/ sangs rgyas ni kun shes pa 'dabang
pa'i// nusani dbang po'i chos ma yin pa'o// dge 'dun zug pa mad pa'i bang bo gsum mo/ bden pa'i sgo nas khyen/ sangs rgyas lam gyi bdun pa'i phyogs na
gcig go/ chos ni 'gog pa'i bden pa'o// dge 'dun yang 'am gyi bden pa'i phyogasar gag go/ dbeg sbyong gi 'bras bu'i sgo nas dbyen/ sangs rgyas n dge slong ngo// sa/
na ba sbyong gi 'bras bu'o// dge 'dun na dag sbyong ngo// chos dkon mchog na dag skyong gi 'bras bu'o// bram ze'i sgo nas dbyen/ sas rgyas ni bram
wa'o chos n bram bre'i 'bras bu'o// dag don ni bram ze// sa dkon mchog ni bram ze'i 'bras bu// tshungs par sdod pa'i sgronas dbyen/ sangs rgyas ni tshad
bal spyod pa'o// chos tshangs par spyod pa'i 'abras bu'o// dge 'dun nas bar spyod pa'o/ chos dkon mchog ni tshangs par spyodad 'i 'bras bu'o// rgyu dang 'bras
sgronas dbye na/ sangs rgyas ni ko/ chos ni 'bras bu'o// dge 'dun ni rgyu'o// chos dkon mchog ni 'dus bu'o// lam dang 'bras bu'i sgonas byin/ sangs rgyas
ni lam mo// chos n 'bras bu'o// dga' dunanalen mo// ches dkon mchog 'bras bu'o// sangs rgyas kyi ston pa na yan te/ tshes
las sangs rgyas skyes pas// rnyesan sangs rgyas kyi yum yin te/ sangs rgyas gs la gunas go/ gso'apa sangs rgyas kyi ston pa chos lags// ci'i slad [S]]
dkon mchog gsum las de a sngar ma sos bka' stsal pa// sangs rgyas kyi ston pachos yin mod kyi/ ngos kyang sangs rgyas ma yin pa gzhan gyis ma ston to/
'bum zhes bya nga 'ang ges ba sgrub dgos pas de bas sangs rgyas sngar sbas so// de nas ma 'gags das/ yang bcon ldan 'das 'di skad ces gsol te// baa ldan
'das dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su gsol du mnod nga'i/ snga' chos dkonan chog snos la/ phyis sangs rgyas dkon mchog smos nagasum lu skyabs su na dri nga ra rung
ma/ bka' stsa la nga/ rtogs shing shes pa med na/ go rami saner na'ang nyes pa med de/ skyabs su 'gror 'dud do// gal te shes bzhin du nang du non par snas
nanyes pa dang a bcas la/ gsum la skyabs su 'gro bar yang mi chud do// gsol pa// sangs rgyas dang chos smras// dge 'dunamasnyes na/ skyabs su mtshib gsum
da rung ma/ gal te chos dang dge 'dun snyas 2/ sangs rgyas na smos na/ skyabs su mi ra rung ngan/ gal te sangs rgyas dang dge 'dun smos 2/ ches lta smos na
gsum la skyabs su mchi bar tshud dam/ bka' stsal pa// de gang yang m rung ste/ ma chud do// gso 2pa/ gsum la skyabs su ma mchis par tshul khrin sa lnga thob
rung ngan/ gal te gsum la skyabs su mamachis par yan lag brgyad kyi tshul khrims thob par rung ngan/ gal te gsum l skyabs su mchi ba ma mchis pa// tshul khrin sa pa cu
thob par rung ngam/ zhu nga dang gsol ba bzhi bas ma bgyis par/ tshul khrims rdzogs par mchod du rung ngam/ bka' stsal/ de dag grod/
yang mi rung// gal te tshul mas ldanodan sngar gsum la skyabs su 'gro bar bya'o/ de gsum la skyabs su song ba'i 'og tu (khrims lnga thob par gyur te/ de nas brems
lnga gang yin pa brjod de/ bdo' ngo brems lha'amang bos par bya'o// de bzhin du gsol ba dang zhu ba bzha' las byas nas/ tshul khrims rdzogs par gyur te/ de'i 'og
tu gnas bzhi dang/ rtsa ba bzhi dang/ dge 'dun gyi lhag ma bcu gsum shes shing khong du chud par bya ba ni phyi'i/ brjod cing bstanang 'khya'o// yang gzhan dun skyabs su
'gro ba byas nas/ srog ma gcod pa'i khrims bstan/ khrims thob par 'gyur te/ de bas na khrims ga cig bshad pas/ khrims lnga thob pa ces bya ste/ gal te
khrims ga cig thun/ khrims ldan thub ces bya'o// yang gzhan du na/ zhes l gcig la gcig 'brel ba'ang yan la/ thog mnas khrims ldamanod par dom
bcas pa'i phyir/ yang gzhan dun khrims ldan mnos pa'i 'og tu khroms thob bo// ston pa kha cig ni skyabs su 'gro ba gsum byas nas/ khrims lnga thob ces byab na
de bden pa thopa sa/ dzeltar gsol ba dang/ zhu ba' 'os byas pa bzhin no// yan lag brgyad pa'i khrims nod pa dang/ khrines bcu nod pa dang/ 'as lnga nor ba//
bshad pa bzhin no// gus pa// gal te sngar gsum la skyabs sumachis te/ dag bstan du gyur pa sud kyis gal te khrims lnga nod pa// khrims bcu nod kyang rung/
skyabs sum ba gdod bgyi gtsul lam/ bka' stsa'ang/ skyabs su 'gro ba gsum ma byas kyang/ sngar gsum la skyabs su song bas tshul khrims kun thob bo//
gsold// gal te gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba 'dra bgyis/ gsol pa dang zhu ba'i 'as kyang ma bgyisan/ khrims thab par 'gyur ram/ bka' stsal nga khrims
lnga dang/ yan lag brgyad pa'i khrims dang/ khrims bsu nod pa gsum la skyabs su song nas khrims thob bo// gal te tshul khrims rdzogs par mnyed pa// gsol ba dang
zhu ba bzhi'i las byas pas/ tshul khrims rdzogs par 'gyur gyi/ gsum la skyabs su song bas na ma yin no// tshulaM khrims rdzogs par mnod pa ni da'i yon tan dang/
bsod nams re [']bas na las cung zad tsam mam/ rkyen cung zad tsam gyis sgrub par mi 'gyur bas/ de bas na skyabs su 'gro ba gsum dang dge slong bcu'anang du gsol//
pa dang/ zhu ba pazhan las byas pas tshul khrims thob par 'gyur ro//khrims lnga dang/ yan lag brgyad pa'i khrims dang/ khrims btsun
[f/ ]yon tan dang mthu de tsam du mi tshe bas/ de bas na gsum la skyabs su song bas la khrims thob par 'gyur te/ lasan dra po dang/ rgyanamang bos dgos so//
gsol pa// tshul khrims rdzogs par mnos pa'i 'ogatu/ rtsa ba bzhi dang/ ge 'dun gyi lhag ma bcu gsum 'ba' zhig ni ba stan la/ gzhan dag rdzogs par mi ston/
pa/ bka' stsal pa/ tshul khrims rnam pa 'a de gnyis na ning ga sa pa yin te/ rtsa ba bzhi las gcig nyams na/ yang phyir gson ma rung/ lhag ma ni gson rung mod kyi gso
dka' ste/ de'ang dge 'dun la mgu ba dang chad pa'i las byas la/ gang na dge 'dun nyishu yod pa'i mdun du nyes pa bshags dgos te/ 'di ni bsrung dka' bas/ bsrung
dgos pa'i phyir smos so// gzhan bsub sun ba srung sla ba'i phyir smos mi dgos te// de bas na rnam pa 'di gnyis smos kyi/ gzhan ma smos pa yin na// gsol pa// so
sor thar pa'i khrims 'di zag pa med pa 'i khrims lags sam/ bsam gtan gyi tshul khrims lags/ bka' stsaka pa/ zag pand pa'i khrims kyang ma yin la/
bsam gnang tshul khrims kyad ma yin no// so so'u bshad pa'i tshugs khyen sa 'a ni/ gal te sangs rgyas 'jig rten du bshegasan/ tshul branas 'ad yod kyi/ gal te da dus
rgyas 'jig rten du ma gshegs na/ tshul khrims 'di med de// zag pa med pa dang/ bsam gtan gyi tshul khrims ni/ sas rgyas 'o gi rten du gshegs kurda rung/ ma
gshegs kyang rung/ dus thams cad kyi thams cad du yod de// sa sor bur pa'i tshul khrims na u0f7abcas pa las yod pa 'a 'gyur gyi/ zag pa med pa dang/ ngasam gtan gyi tshul
khrims ni bcas pa las yod pa ma yin no// sosor thar pa'i tshul khrims ni gzhan las thob dag 'gyur gyi/ zag pa med pa dang/ bsam gtan gyi tshul khrims ni gzhan 'os
thob pa ma yin no// so sor thar pa'i tshul khrims ni gnyid kyis legagam/ ma leg pa ma/ dgi ba 'am/ sdig pa las/ lung du ma ston pa'i si nas kyi dus thams
cad du yod do/ brag pa med pa dang/ bsam gtan kyi tshul khrims ni/ bsam gtan du 'dug pa dang/ zag pa med pa'i sems la des nga' tsha 1 tshul khrims yod kyi/
sems M ga zhan thams cad la med de// so sor thar pa'i tshul khrims ni mi'i nang na 'ba' zhig na yod kyi/ brag pa med pa dang/ bsam gtan gyatshul khrims n lha dang mi
[ ]@#// gnyis ka med do// so sor thar pa'i tshul nas ni/ 'dod ba'i khams dba' 'gan yod kyi/zag pa mad bdang/ bsam gtan gyi tshul khrims
na 'dod pa'i khams dang/ gzugs kyi khams na rdzogs pa yod de//zag bamed pa'i tshul khrims dang/ so sor thar pa'i tshul khrims ni/ sangs rgyas kyi slob ma 'ba' shul
yod mod kyi/ bsam gtan gyi tshul khrims ni/ mu stegs can la'ang yod de// gsol da// dge bsnyan gyi khrims lngal/ dun rang bzhin gyi sdig lags/ dunu ban
pa'i sdug lags/ bka' stsal ba/ bzhi na rang bzhin gyi sdug/ mdu 'thung ba'i khrims ga cig nang nus pa'i sdig go/ chang 'thung ba na bag med pa'i le'a gnas yin pa ste
sdig pa bzhi'i grogs su 'gyur ro// khrumes lnga 'chang 'thung ba ni/ bag med pa'i gzhi yin pas/ khrims nga 'a yang nyams par byed de// dpag na sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyi
tshe/ dag bsnyan zhig chad 'thungs pa'i rkyen gyis gzhan gyi chung ma la 'dod bas leg par g.yam pa'i ng byas/ pha' po'i bya'ang btus nas bsad do// gzhan zhig gis khyod
ci'i phyir 'di ltar byed ces dris na/ bdag gis byas pa med ces zer te/ de ltar rang 'thungs pan khrims bzhi chun cig car nyams par byas so// chang 'thungs na mtshon sa med da
0 bzhasheng byed par 'gyur te/ dge 'dun gyi dbyen 'ba' zhig khyed zhus so// 'di'ar sngon gyi las kyi gnyis bam yonamod kyi/ 'on kyang skyo ba dang de dran dar smyo ba myong bar
'gyur ro// chang 'thungs pas ba glangs pa ltar mos shing 'brug pa 'gyur te/ rang gis myos na yang dag nga 'a 'a sa su byab/ bsam gtan dang/ mdo sde klog pa dang/
'don pa dang/ dge 'dun gyi las bya ba rnams shes bar 'gyur te/rang bzhin gyi sdig pa na yin mod kyi rang bzhin gyi sdug pa dang 'go/ de nas ma 'gags da sa/ yang bcom ldan
'das la 'di skad ces gso' te/ dag bstan gyi khren sa lta bu sems can 'ba' zhig las khrims thob bam/ sunas nam yin pa las kyang thob par rung/ 'on te gsod
du rung ba dang/ brkur yod pa dang/ mtshungs par spyad du rung ba dang/ brdzun sna rung ba'i sems can las khrims thob par 'gyur ram/ na te nga sad du mi rung ba dang/
brkun ma mas ra dang/ mtshungs par spyad du ma rung ba dang/ brdzun snaban rung ba dang/ so na ha can las kyang khrims thob par 'gyur/ bka' stsal pa// son sa
can lasan khrines bzhi thob par 'gyur gyi/ sems can ma yin pa las rung mi 'byung ba'i khrims thob par 'gyur ro// sems can dugatogs nga bsad du rung ba 'am/ bsad
du mi rung ba'am/ mi tshangs par spyod du dud pa dam/ mi rung ba na/ brku rung ba 'am/ ma rung ba'am/ brdzun smra rung ba 'am 1 micung
thams cud las tshul khrims thob ste/ mtshamasamad pa'i sems can dmyal ba yan chad/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi skye mched man chad stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i bar du srog dang bcas pa thams cad las tshul khrims 'di bzhi thob da ra rung ste/ de las yang thog ma tshul khrims
nod ba'i tshe/ srog thams cad ma bcad pa dang/ thams cad la ma byin par ma 'an pa dang/ thams cad la mi tshangs par mi spyad pa dang/ brdzun thams cad ma 'o zhes bya
ba'i mtha' dang tshad gzung du ma pas gdu bus na sems can thams cad las/ tshul khrims ma thob par 'gyur ba med do// tshul khrims 'gogs nga chog bzhin du byas
na sngar khong dud cing yid ches par bya ba'i phyir chos bshad 'a sems can thams cad la byams pa dang/ snying rje'isoms bskyad du gzhug go/ de ltar lhug par mos pa'i
sams skyes na/ lhag pa 'i tshul khrims thob par 'gyur ro// yang tshul khrims thob pa na sems can thams cad las/ so so nas tshul khrims bzhi thob da ra 'gyur te
tshul khrims bzhi so sor dbye na/ tshul khrims bcu gnyis su 'gyur ro// sems can 'asu srog mi gtsed pa dang/ ma byin par ma len pa dang/ mi tshangs par mi spyod pa
dang/ brdzun mi smra ba las bzlog pa'inyis pa bzhi su ba'ang rgyu dang rkyen gsum gyi phyi'i te/ de 'dra'adodazhugs las skye ba dang/ zhe sdang sa skya pa drang/ gta mug las/
skye'o// sems can thams cad la mi dge ba bcu gnyis po 'di yod de/ ma dgo ba 'di las bzlog na/ dge ba'i tshul khrims kyi rnam par rig byed kyi gzugs bcu gnyis
thob pas rgyun ro// dpag med pa'i sems can thams cad las thob pa'i ng de dang 'dra'o// gal te dgra bcom pa khri phrag brgya 'am/ 'bum phrag brgya na ngan las 'dus
kyang thog ma dgru ban pa de dag las tshul khrims thob// dgra bcom du mya ngan las 'das kyang/ tshul khrims ni nyams dar 'gyur da na yin no// chung
'thung nga 'a khrims ni lus 'di thog na nas tha ma'i bar du stod gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ji tsam chung du gtogs pa thams cad la nub ra zhing khrims kyi rnam pa/
rig byed kyi gzugs thob sta/ thog ma khrimananod pa'i tsa/ rang thams cad mi 'thung ngo zhes byas des gal te chad thams cad 'ad kyang/ tshul khrims ni rtag tu yod
pasam nyanas so/ gsol pa/ thogs khrims nod pa'i tshe/ budamed thams cad kyi sgo gsum nas/ 'dod pas log par mi g.yem pa'i khrims
mnan lu/ phyis drung na bungasan/ tshul khrims nad nyams par 'gyur nam/ bka' stsal pa// nyams pa mi 'gyur ro// ji lta zhe na/ thog ma budagad lta'adod pas
leg ra ma g.yem pa'i khrims thog la/ 'di ni bdag gi chung ma yin bos 'dod pas lag par g.yem pam yin te/ khrims 'dems par mi 'gyur ro// don 'di dang/
na thams cad mthun te khrims brgyad dang/ khrims bcu dang/ sems can dang/ sems can ma yin pa'i rnams las/ tshul khrims thob pa'i ng de dang 'dra'o// tshul khami
zhes brgya lnga bcu'ong sems can kun la so so nas tshul khrims bdun bdun zhig thob ste/ de'ang rnam par dbyen/ tshul khrims skye bu rtsa gcig tu 'gyur go/ sems can
thams cad la lus dang ngag gi sdug po bdun 'byung sta/ sdig pa 'byung ba 'di'ang rgyu dang rkyen rnam pa gsum gyis skye// de'ang 'dod drags kyis skye ba dang/ zhe sdang gis skya ba dang/
gtamug gas skyo ba ste/ de ltar na rgyu dang rkyen gsum gyis sdig pa bdun bdun skyo ste/ daltar na mi dag pa'i sdig pa bdun gsum du ga cag go/ sdig pa de las bzlog na
tshul khrims su 'gyur te/ sems can ga ge 'dul khrims kyi rnam par rig byed kyi gzugs len rtsa ba gcig yod pa bzhin du/ sems can thams cad na'ang dad pa 'drago/
don de dang sbyar na dus gcig tu tshul khrims srungs med pa thob par na'i nga gi/ dus gcig tu cig car nyams pa 'gyur ba nas/ dus gcig tu mad par 'gyur dang na yin no/
a khrims nyams zhes bya ba ni/ gal te tshul khrims kyi rnapa nyams na/ gong nas gong du 'phar bar mi 'gyur te/ bsta tshul khrims yul la phyis nod na yang/
tshul khrims thob par ma 'gyur go// dpar na/ zhin gra gcig gi yan lag brgyud pa 'a khrims kyi rtsa ba nyams na phyis khrims brgyud dam/ khrims lnga 'am/ khrinas da cu
'am khrims rdzogs pa 'om/ bsam gtan gyi tshul khrims sam/ zag pa med pa'i tshul khrims sam/ tshul khrims 'di dag gang yang med du mi rung ngo// gal te sa
khrims lnga'i rtsa ba nyams na yang/ khrims brgyad don/ khrims bcu 'am tshul khrims rdzogs pa 'am/ bsan gtan gyi tshul khrims sam/ zag pa med pa'i
tshul khrims kyang thams cad thob par ma gango// gal te khrims ldanyams pa'i 'og tu/ khrims lha phul la/ khrims bcu nod pa de ni gnas ma yin no// gal te
0 @#/ khrims phul ba'i 'og tu khrims lnga chod kyang rung/ khrims brgyad dgo/ khrims pasu 'ag/ khrims rdzogs da 'ag/ bsam gtan gyi tshul
khrems sam/ brog pa med pa' tshul khrimasu ma non kyang khrims gang yang mi thob bo// gal te khrims bcu 'am/ khrims rdzogs pa'i ka ba nyams na/ gong
nas gong du 'phar ba dang/ khrims M phul te khrims nod pa na/ ji ltar khrims lnga las bshad pa dang 'dra'o// gso la nga/ bsam gtan gyi tshul khrims dang/
brag pa med pa'i tshul khrims dang/ so sor thar pa'i tshul khrims dang/ tshul khrims 'di gsum las tshul khrims mchog ces bgyi ba gang lags/ bka' stsal pa/
bsam gtan tshul khrims mchog ste/ gzhan du na sa si'i than pa'i tshul khrims kyang mchog yin no// de ji lta zhen/ gal te sangs rgyus 'jig rten du gshegs n
tshul khrims 'di yod par 'gyur gyi/ bsam gtan gyi tshul khrims rang/ zag pa mar pa'i tshul khrims ni thams cad kyi dus su yod do// sosor thar pa'i tshul khrimA
ni sems can dang/ sems nam yin pa las kyang thob par lung gi/ bsam gtan gyi tshul khrims dang/ zag pa med pa'i tshul khrims ni sems can las thob/
ba ma na// so sor thar pa 'i tshul khrims na sems can thams cad byams pa'i sems kyis thob par 'gyur gyi/ bsam gyin gyi tshul khrims dang/ brag pa
mdapu'i tshul khrims ni byams pa 'i soms kyis thob dar ma yin no/ gson than pa 'i tshul khrims ni/ sangs rgyas kyi ngos 'dzin da 'khor rnam ra bdun 'jig rdzunan
yod cing/ thag pa rnam gsum gyi 'bras bu rgyun mi rad dran byed pa'i bzhi 'gyur ba tin gyi/ bsam gtan gyi tshul khrims dang/ ga ba med pa'i tshul khrims nid lta dum
yin te/ de bas na khams gsumu nu mchog rab phul du gyur pa yin no// thog ma'i khron/sanod pa'i/ gsol ba dang zhu ba bzhi'i las byas ma thag tu tshul khrims rdzogs
'gyur te/ thog ma'i sams skad cig ma dang po'i tshul khrims kyi rnam par rig byed kyi gzugs ni lus zhes kyang bya/ las kyi lam nas kyang bya'o/ sems kyi skad cig ma phyi nas
khrims kyi rnam par rig byed kyig khrugs byung ba ni lasaM zhes bya 'i/ las kyi lam ma yin no// de lta bas na sems kyi skud cigan dang po las tshul khrims kyi rnam pa yag byed kyigazug
bsam pa yongs su rdzogs te/ bsam pa dang ldan pas/ bsam pa 'i las kyi lam zhes bya'o// tshul khrims snga mas rgyu byas te tshul khrims lhag ma 'a rnam par rig pyod
kyig zugs las kyis grub pas/ de bas na de las zhes bya'i las kyi lam ma yin no// dang po'i soms skad cig ma gcig gi khrims ni phyag dang
mAng bcas la// chog med pa'i ng yin no// phyir mgyi skye ba'i bims na cho ga med pa 'ba' zhig dang ldan gyi/ rtog dang bcas pam yin no// thogan 'i sems skad
cag ma gcig gi khrims na/ tshul khrims zhes kyang bya/ dge bar spyod pa zhes kyang bya/ 'dul ba zhes kyang bya'o/ phyis rims kyis de ma thag tu skyo ba'i tshul khrims
kyang don dang ldan no// de nas ma 'gags pas/ yang bcom ldan 'das la gsolong/ dus gsum du bkum pa'i nang na dus gang gis tshul khrims thob par 'gyur/
a bka' stsalapa/ da ltar gyi dus kyisams skyod cig ma gcig ba/sa khrims thob par 'gyur/[ ]'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa na chos yan te/ sems can ma yin pas khrims mi
'thob kyi/ da ltar gyi sems kyi skad gom gcig nasoms can yin bsan brams 'thob bo// gsal ba dge ba' sams kyis tshul khrims thob bam/ ma dag pa'i
sams kyis sam/ 'on te lung dum bstan pa'i sems kyis sam/ sams nad pas khrims thob par 'gyur/ bka' stsal pa/ thams cad kyis thob par 'gyur te
thog ma dge ba'i sems kyis dge 'dun kyi rkang pa la phyag byas la/ tshes gos dang lhung bzed blangs te/ mkhan bo gang yin pa la gsol ba gdab bo// da nus tsog tsog pur
'dug lu thalamo ra la/ gsol ba dang zhu ba bzhi'i sa bar chad mdu la dag brtsisems kyis khrims rdzogs pan/ dgu pa'i sams kyi tshul khrims thob pa zhes bya'o//
gal te de ltar ga rims kyis byed pan/ rtag tu dag pa'i sams dang ldan te/ las byed pa las gsol ba dang zhu ba bzhi'a'i sa khyud pa' 'dod chags dang zhe sdanga'//
sags pa mi dge ba'i bsam pa byungan/ sams de nyid kyis tshul khrims kyi rnam par go byed kyi gzugs dang ldan pa du ni/mi dag ba'i sems kyi khrinas thob pa zhes bya ste/ de'ang
thog ma'i dge ba'i sems dang/ ga ba'i las kyi shugs kyis khrims thob pa yin gyi/ mi dag ba'i sems kyis thob pa ma yumen// sngar dge ba'i sems kyi cho ga'i 'dus byas
la gsol ba dang zhu ba bzhi'i las byed pa'i tshe/ gral te gnyid leg gam yur na/ leg cing yur ba'i son sa la nas khrims kyi rnam par rig byed kyi gabrugs skye ba me lung du ma bstan
pa'i sems kyis khrims thob pa zhes bya'o// sngar dge ba'i sems kyis tsheg byas la/ gsol ba dang zhu ba bzhi'i las byed pa ste/ 'gog pa'i ting nge 'dzin 2snyomaMs pa/
du zhugs na/ de'i khrin kyi rnam pa ga le byed kyi gzugs dang ldan pa de ni/ sems mad pa las khrims thob pa zhes bya'o// ma 'gags pas nad
gsol pa/ gal te khyim pas khrims lnga ma mnos par thal byung khrims bcu mnosan/ khrims thob par 'gyur dum/ bka' su lapa/ dus gcig tu dag0snyan gyi
khrims dang/ dge sbyong gi khrims rnamar ga nyes thob bo// gal te khrims lnga'ang ma ma nas/ khrims bu'ang mAms par thal byung khrims rdzogs par mnos na'ang/ dus
tsag tu khrims gsum la thob par 'gyur ro// ma 'gags pas gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das ga te khrims rdzogs par mnos nga sa dus gcig tu khrims rnam pa gsum dan
thob par 'gyuwA/ mis kyis sngar khrims lnga mnos la/ de'i 'og tu drinas bcu mnos te phyis khrims rdzogs pa mnod do zhes bgyi'ang ni tsal/ bka' stsal pa// dus
gcig tshulaM khrims gsum kha thob mod kyi/ gang sangs rgyas kyis chos la lhag par mos pa ni/ gdon ni dra bar brtsis kyis sngar khrims lnga mnos te/ 'dul bor
byas la dad pa dang mos pa lhag pa skyes nas/ de'i 'og tu khrims bcu ma nod do// khrims bcu nos nas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba lhag par skyes nas/ de'i 'og tu tshul khrims
[p]na rdzogs par mnos shu/ de ltams kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi re thob nga mos rang rtan pa ma shes par 'gyur ro// dper na rgya mtsho na po'agu ba 'ang bags kyis brang ba dang
'dra ba'i sangs rgyas kyanyis kyi rgya mtshor 'jug pa'i ng de dang 'dra ste tshul khrims rdzogs na cig car mnosan/ go mis kyang shol/ spyod lam yang na sa nga 'gyur
gzhan du na tshul khrims kyang sems can kha cig ni khrims lnga mnos pas/ lam gyi 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ba'ang yod do// sems can kha cig na tshul brem saMbcu
mnos pa'i rkyen gyis lam gyi 'bras bu thob pa 'ang yod do// de ltar rgyu dang rkyen rnam pa tha dad pas nas/ de bzhin gshigs bas go 'as bstan pa yin no// gal te sngas
khrims lngamanos la/ de'i 'og tu khrims bcu mnos na/ bramis bsu mnos pa 'tshul ng khrims gnyis ka dang ldan na// khrims lnga dang khrims bshumanos nga 'i 'og tu/
khrims rdzogs pa mnosan rdzogs par mnos pa'i tsho khrims gsum dang yang ldan no// khrims ltadang/ khrims bcu dang/ khrims rdzogs par mnos pa rnam pa
bdun la gsol ba dang zhu bo bzhi'i las byang pa'i khrims 'ba' zhig rims kyis dus gsum du thob bo// lhag ma rnam pa drug nod bani dus gcig gis thob kyi dadus
gsum gyi pham pa med do// de ltar tshul khrems rnam pa gsum dus gcig tu thob pa 'ga'ate/ tshul khrims phyir 'bul ba'i tshe/ bdag ni deng phyin chung dge
sbyong yin te/ dge slong ma yin no zhes smras pas tshul khrims rdzogs pa med kyang/tshul khrims gnyis med pa ma yin te yod do// tshul khrims lnga dang tshul khrims bcu mnos
pa las/ da phyin chad bdug dag bstan yin te/ dge sbyong su yin no zhes smras na khrims bcu med par zad kyi/ khrims lnga yod de/ 'gal te bdag ni khyim pa dang rab tu byung ba'i
khrims thams cud dbul te/ bdag la skyabs su 'gro ba'i dge bsnyen du byung zhig ces smras na/ tshul khrims rnam pagasum rtsig tu med kyang skyabs su 'gro ba gsum nad pa ma
yin no// go rims kyis tshul khrims rnam pa gsum thob pa dang/ phyis dbul ba'i rig dang da ma pa ni ji ltar dus gcig tu khrims thob pa bstan pa dang 'dra'o//
gsol pa/ gal te sngon dag bstan las rab tu byung ste/ khrims bcu mnos na/ khrims lnga ma madris par mi 'gyur 'am/ bka' stsal pa// med pa'i m 'gyur te/
ming dang ge romis brjes pa'i khrod kyi/ khrims mang por 'gyur ba ma yin no// de'ang dge bsnyen gyi ming stos te/ dag sbyong gi ming thob bo/ khyim pa'i go rini sa ston gyi
rab byung ba'i go rims thob bo// gsol pa// dge slong gi tshul khrims rdzogs pa na nyes na khrims banu dang wems lnga ma tshig par mi 'gyur ma/ bka' stsal pa/ de
mad par ma 'gyur te/ de'ang ming dang go rags skor bar zad de/ dag sbyong gi ming stor nas dge slong gi ming thob bo/ dug sbyong ga gi mes stor nas/ ngag snying gi ga dzanis
theb sta/ thog ma dang tha ma'i bar du tshul khrims yin gyis/ mid tsam ni 'bral la 'dogs so// dngob na skyodashang dang shang gi lam lta bur dpyod dang dbyar ni sngo// ston ni
sar dkun na skya ste/ de'ang dus kyis bsgyur pas ngashing ga li ma kha dog tha dad par zad kyi/ thog ma nas tha ma'i bar du shing gi lamar zad de/ tshul khrims kyang de dang 'dra bar
rtag tu tshul khrims gcig tu zad na/ dus kyis tha dad du 'gyur ro// gzhan yang dper na 'o ma dang/ zho dang/ mar dang/ mar gyi snying po ni rnam pa bzhi'i tha dad de/ de
ltar dus kyi tha dad kyang gcig tu brad pa dang 'dra bar tshul khrims kyang de dang 'dra ste/ dus gsum gyi tha dad kyang tshul khrims la tha dad pa med de/ ma 'gags pa/sa yang gsa' da//
bcom ldan 'das dge bsnyen gyi tshul khrims nod pa nyams kyisadzegs par nod pa minus pa tshul khrims gcig gam/ gnyis sam/ pazhi'i da lta dumun san/ tshul khri'i sa martog
u@#// parud dam/ bka' stsal pa// des bramesal thob po// gsol pa/ gal te khrims ma thob na/ mdo sde dag las phyogs rlung bu'i dpe bstan dang
phyogs re ba'i dge bsnyen dang/ phyogs rdzogs pa'i dge bsnyen mas bar gsungs na de'i donAji lta bu lags/ gsol pa// de skad ces gsus pa'i ng khrims bsrungs
pa'i yon tan chung yod pa las dgongs te gsungs kyi/ de ltar tshul khrims mnod du rung ba ni ma yin no// ma 'gags pas yang gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das khrims
ldanod pa'i nazhag gracag gam/ nyin zhag gnyis nas/ nyin zhag bcu'i bar du de ltar mnos na/ khrims thob la 'gyur ram/ bka' stsalab/ de ltar ma rung ngo//
sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims bcas pa dang sa sos dus dang 'tshud yod de/ 'do 'du khrin sa lnga nad pa ni gdon mi za bar nam 'tsho'i bar dumanod dgos so// gal te gna' ga brgyud
pa'i khrims mnodon/ gdon mi za bar nyin zhag gcig pa mnod dgos te/ de lta bsan sdam medung ngo// gsol ba dang zhu ba bzhi'i las byas te/ khrims nod du 'ang
bab dang/ 'bring dang/ tha ma yod do// del khrims ldan khrims thama'o/ takhrims bcu ni khrims 'bring po'o// khrims rdzogs pa ni khrims rab ces bya'o//
[.]khregs lnga la'ang ba'akhrid rnam pa gsum ste/ gal te chung zhing zhan pa'i sams kyis khrims mnos pa ni/ khrims tham zhes bya'o// seg 'bring gis tshul khrims mnos pa ni/
khrims 'bring thob par 'gyur ro// gal te sems rab kyis tshul khrims mnos pa ni/ khrims 'ab thob par 'gyur go/ tshul khrims rdzogs pa las nga 'bring gsum yod pa 'du khrims
bstan pa bzhinano// gal te sngar sems thu mas brems gnas pa'i 'og tu/ sams 'bring gis khrims bcu mnos na khrims lnga ni snga ma las skye zhing lhag pa med kyi/ khrim/
lnga ma gtogs pa ba khras dus ma yin par mi bza' ba'i bar du/ khrims lhag ma'i lnga ni lhag pa'i khrims su bsgyur te/ tshul khrims sngar mnos pa lngan tha mar 'gyur// sam
thems snga khrims lnga mnos la/ de 'og tums rang dang 'khringags khrims rdzogs pa mnosan/ yang khrims sngar mnos pa ldan skyo ba 'am lhag pa med kyi khrims sngam
lnga ma gtogs par/ tshul khrims gzhan thams cung tshul khrims rdzogs pas gnod pa'i tsha/ rab dang lhag pa'i sems kyis mnos pas/ lhag pa'i tshul khrims rab thob
bar 'gyur ro// de bas na so sor ba pa'i tshul khrims ni/ rim du thob pa med de/ rim par dbye na/ khrims lnga ni than zhes bya'o// khrims btsuni 'bring zhes bya/
bya// tshul khrims rdzogs pa ni rab ces bya'o/ don gyi sgo nas dbyen/ sems rab kyis khrims lnga mnos na/ khrims de ni rab ces bya/ sems 'bri da
gis khrims bcu mnos na/ khrims 'bring zhes bya/ sams spa mas tshul khrims rdzogs par mnosan/ tshul khrims tha ma zhes bya'o// don dang sbyar na sems rab dang
'bring dang/ tham las tshul khrims thob pa mi mthun te/ nges pa gcig tu chud pamed do// galata mkhan po zhig la khrigus bcunod par gsol ba btab pa las/ khrims
bdunod pa'i mkhan po mngon sum du ma gyur kyang khrims bcu thob bo// gal te khrims banu nodapu'i tsho mkhan po shin shi bar shes sam/ thos nas khrims ma nas kyang khrims mi
thob bo// gal te shi ba ma shes ma thos na khrims thob bo// gsol ba dang zhu ba bzhi'i las byed pa'i tshul khrims mnod pa ni/ mkhan po mngon sum du ma gyur na/ khrims
mnod kyang khrims thob par mi 'gyur te/ ga 'dun gyi grangs ma tshang ba'i phyir ro// gal te dge 'dun gyi grangs tshadon khrigs bcu nod pa'i mkhan po mnon sum du ma gyur kyang
dran s du cu thob bo// gal ti mkhan po med kyang khrims mnod du rung re// ma 'gags pas yang gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das dbed lasnyan gyi khrims lnga dang ldan pa sa
rnying phyogs bgyis rung ma/ bka' stsal pa// tshong sogs byas rung ste// las rnam pa 'di lnga nam bya'o// rkang 'gros phyogs kyi tshod sogs kyi las ma bya'o// bdag nyid
kyi phyugs yodan 'tshong du gnang gis/ shan pa la btsong du mi rung pa dang/ mda' gzhu mtshon cha'i bag tshong sogs bas ni rung ba rung bdag la yod pa ni nga tseng du rud du
dang chung gi tshang sngogs kyis byar mi rung ste// bdag nyid la yod na 'tshong du nga ba dang/ srin bu mang du shi bas 'bru mar 'tshong du ma rung ba dang/ rgya gar gyi chos kyis
de ra na te/ ga bu sha tshun chad ni 'bru mar 'tshig pa'i nang srin bu med na nyes pa med do// kha dag tshon chen po rnam pa lnga pa drag byed pa 'ang srin bu mang dumachis pa sa mi rung ste/ yog
sha la sogs pa yul gzhan dag// tshon gyis btso blag byed pa las srin bu med du shi/ de bas na mi gnang ngo// yulargya yul mang ba dog mthing khra nga tsaban/ sran bu
mang du shi pa sa pa tso drug rnam pa lnga'i nang du gtogs so// ma 'gags pas mang gsog ba/ bcom ldan 'das nyin zhag gcog gis khrims brgyad ces bgyi ba dus ma lag
ban pa'i phrad kha zas mi 'tshol pa ma gagos pa dgur 'gyuran/ jiltar brgyad ces bgyi/ bka' stsal pa// khrims zhes bya ba ni chos kyis phyogs 'phrod dus ma yin par kho bras
ka @#// ma bar ba ba yin te/ khrims brgyad kyis yan lag yin te/ grogs su gyur pas yan lag gi khrims brgyad ces bya/ dgun ni ma yin no//
gsol ba yan lag brgyad pa'i khrims mnosana'ang brag du 'khor rnam pa bdun la 'khor gang gi nang du bsdu/ bka' stsal pa// nam 'tsho ba'i bar gyi khrames mamanos kyang
shA nyin zhag gcig gi khrims yod pas/ de la'ang dge bsnyen zhes bya// gzhan dge ba snyan zhes bya ni/ nam 'tsho ba'i bar du tshul khrims mnos pa mad la/ dgab
tsam yin zhes byar na u0f7a/ nyin zhag gcig gi khrims yod pas/ de ni gang brag bar ma do zhes mdo sde las kyang 'byung go/ ma 'gags pas mngagasab pa/ tsha
ldan 'das 'khor bdun ma gtogs par so sor thar pa'i tshul khrims nod parnyes sam/ bka' stsal pa/ mdo de yan lag brgyad kyi khrims nyid yin na// don de rang
spu na yan lag brgyad kyi khrims nod pa 'khor rnam pa bdun gyi nang du ma gtogs so// yan lag brgyad pa'i khrims nod pa'i chos kyis ni/ nyan zhag gcig gi bar du
srog me gcod do zhes ga re skad chad pas na/ khrims gzhan nam 'tsho'i bar mnos pa dang ba su yang mi rung ngo// gsol nga/ yan lag brgyad kyi
khrims mnod pa nyin zhag gnyis sam/ gsum mam/ bcu'i bar du cig car mnod du nang dam/ bka' stsal ra 1 thog ma sangs rgyas kyis
nyin zhag gcig gi mas su bcas pas/ de las 'bam rung ngo gal tatams kyis mnod nus na/ nyin zhag gcig cing lan re gnong dgos te/
nyin zhag du mnos kyang rung ngo// nyin zhag gcig ga yan lag brgyad kyi khrims mnas pa'i thabs ni pha rol po gzhan las mnod dgos te/ de'ang gad las mnad
can 'khor lnga po ba dang yang rung ba la mnod dgos so// yan lag brgyad kyi khrims mnos pa'i 'og dugal te sems can la brdeg pa tsagag byas na tshul khrims rnas
ba'i dag pa ma yin na// khrims mnos pa'i nyin par brdeg btsog ma byas la/ phyir de nyin brdeg pa cog bya ba'i dam bcas na'ang tshul khrims rnam pa ni dag pa
ma yin te// mdor na lus dang ngag gros ja tsam du tshul bzhin ma yin pa 'a las byas na/ khrims ma nyams mod kyi/ rnam par dag pa ma yin no// gal te lus dang ngag rnam
par dag kyang/ sams kyi 'dod chags kyi rnam par rtog pa bskyad ma zhe sdang gi 'tsho ba'i rnam pa ba skyed na 'ang rnam par dag pa ma yin no// gal te lus dang ngag yid kyi las gsum
rnam par dag kyang/ rjes su dran pa drug yid la ma byas na/ de'ang tshul khrims rnam par dag ces mi bya'o// yan lag brgyad kyi bams mnos pa'i 'og tu rjes su dran da drug
gdal byas na/ tshul khrims rnam par dag ces byagro/ mdo sde drag las 'dzam bu'i gling gi rgyal po 'dzan bu'agling gi khams su gtogs nga 'gi thams cad rung/ de'i nan
yod pa'i gsar dang/ dngul dang/ nor dbyig thams cad 'dabang nga 'ibasod nams kyi yan lag brgyad kyi tshul khrims rnam par dag pa'i bsonams bcu drugan yang dgos pa'i lhagacig tsam yang
tsam yod de zhes 'byung ngo// su'ang rung yan lag brgyad pa'i khrims nod pa byas la/ bag med par rang nyams su lo 'go 'am/ gal ten ba zas zhim po la ba med par ba 'a ba 'am/ rtsed rnam pa sna
tshogs med bzhin du bgamed par byas pa'i 'og tu khrims mnod pa ni snga dro'ang rung/ phyi bang 'du khrims thob pa mi 'gyur// gal te snga nas khrims manodapa'i somasamadal/ bgamed pa'i las
rnam pa sna tshogs byas pa'i 'og tu dge ba'i bshesagatan dang phrad de khrims manos dro'/ phyidzugad dung sathams cad du bramisathob bo/ khrims matshudang gas pa lagashagogs sam phug pad byung
sta dbang yid las phyis bgegs dang bar dmad pa'i 'og tu khrims manosan/ snga dro'ang rung/ phyi brogad rung/ dus thams cad du khrims thob go gsol pa// gal te nyin par khrims M/

ba/ bsrung la// mtshan mo mi bsrung ba'i khrims mnosan/ yan lag brgyad kyi khrims thobakham/ gal te mtshan mo khrims srung la/ nyin par mi srung pa'i khrims mnos// yan lag brgyad kyi khrims thob par 'gyur
ma/bka 'a stsal pa/ gang yab khrims mi thob bo// de bsan sas rgyas kyis thogs nas nyin zhag gcig pa'i khrims su bcas tu nges pa'i tshud yin pas 'gal bar bya mi rung de//
'gags pas ang gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'o na de ltar khrims ma thob na/ mdo dag las dge slong ig zhig 'brog dgon pa zhigan/ sa dgas ba cig sdug bsngal sna tshogs myong ste
la lanatin dag longs spyod bgyid la/ mdzan mo sdug bsngal bgyid pa'i ng mas/ la la nig ro longs spyod bgyid la/ na par sdug bsngal myong ba dog mthong ngo// da dang sa
na de dag kyang sngon ma'i nangan/ nyin dban khrims srung la/ mtshan mo ni sdig pa bgyid pa ma/ gnamatsan po khroms srung la/ nyin par sdig pa'i las bgyid pa mi mthun pa'i don de dag
ji lta bu lags/ bka' stsal pa/ skye ba snga ma'i rgyu dang skyon 'ba' zhig la ston du yang mi rung sta/ 'di skad du bshad pa 'ang mdo sa 'am 'dul ba las bshad pa ma yin te/de la bedan pa'i don nges
ba zhas bya bar mi rung ngo// gzhan du ni 'di skad bshod pa 'di'i 'phags pa ka ta ya nas ig zhig gdul ba'i phyir sprul pa yin gyi/ yang dag pa ma yin no zhes 'byung ngo// yan lag brgyad
pa'i khrims mnos pa las khrims phyi 'bul na/ nges par 'khor rnam pa lnga la dbulami gos kyi/ pha'ol po'i gang zagagacig la khrims phyi'i dbulalezhes tshig gcig smras/
khrims phul bar 'gyur// sosor thar ba'i khrims thob pa'i sgo nas dbye nalam rgyud ltar gtogs nga la/ ma'i rgyud gtogs pa 'ba' zhig gis khrims thob kyi/ rgyudalhag mgazhan khyim khrims mi thob
wA bo dbar na lha'i rgyud dugags pa ni bde ba'i longs spyod la chags shing zhen pas khrims mi thob bo// dpar na sngon 'phags pa mo'u 'gal gyi nye gnas shigand kyis btab pa las/ 'phags pa
ma'u 'galasum cu rtsa gsum gnam du sman pa 'tsho byed la dpyad 'bri song ba las/ 'di lha'i bu rnams rab tu dga' ba'iskyang mos tshal du rtsed 'dod ba'i khar babanas/ 'phagasapatsho lu'agal
sbu de dag 'gro ba'i lam kar sdod cing 'dug pa las/ lha'i bu rnams 'phags pa mo'u 'ga' 'amig gis ltatsam yang mi khom par song ngo//'tsho byed kyi phrad kas phyin pa dang/ rgyang ma nas
mo'u 'ga' lag pa bteg patsam zhig byas nas/ shing rta khrid de song ngo// de nas 'phags pa mo'u 'gal 'di snyam du sems so// 'tsho byed 'di sngoname'inangan 'dug nga' rdzobadagagi slob
ma yin na/ da ni lha longs spyod la chags te/ sngonagyi dran pa nyams par gyur to snyam bsams nas/ rdzu 'phrul gyis 'tshobyed kyi shing rta'agro med par byin gyis brlabs so// de nas 'tsho byed
shing rta lasababs te 'phags pa mo'u 'gal gyi rkang nga' phyag byas nas/ mo'u 'gal gyi rgya rkyen mang po rnam pa sna tshogs kyis gtams so// 'tsho ba dkyis 1 no'u 'ga' smras bag mi'i/
nang na 'dug pa'itshu/ btsun pa 'a'i slob ma yin pas lag pa tsam bteg ste bro dras kyis/ lha'i bu gzhan dag de ltar byed pa yod dam/ lhar skyes pa na bud pa'i longs spyod la zhen cing chags
pas dbang med de/ de ltar gyur pa yin no// mo'u 'gal gyis/ 'do byed bsdus pa// slobam zhagi nad kyis btab stanan de la ji ltar gso bar bya/ 'tsho byed kyis smras pa// ji zhig ba zas mib bral
bar bya'o// da nasamo'u 'ga'agyi bus/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad phyogs bskul lo// sangs rgyas 'jig rten du gshegs pa'i ng shin tuphrad dkan/ tsa'i phyi skabs skabs su dud du sod//
dam pa'i dus me gling/ de nas brgya byin lha'i dbang pos/ 'phags pa mo'u 'ga'agyi bsam pa sems kyis shes nas/ lha'i bu zhig mngags te/ lha'i bu zhig 'bod du btang ba 'dus lan/
gsum gyi bar du bos na ma 'ongs so// lha'i bu de la lha'i bu mo gcig dang rol mo byed pa gcig las med kyang 'adod pa la chags shing zhen pas/ lha'i dbang po tshig hatshan mod kyi/ gtong bod/
da phyis gdod 'ongs so// de nas brgya byin gyis ci'i phyin de ltar gyur ces drasan/ ji ltar gyur pa drang por gsol to// byin gyis/ mo'u'agala' gsolapa/ lha'i bu 'di la lha'i
[s/ ]@#// bu mo gcig dang rol mo byed pa gcig las med kyang gtong mi phod do// rtse dga' n lha'i debang por gyur te/ gzhal med khang sna tshogs mang po dang/ lha'i bu mo grasamed
pas bskor/lha'i zhal zas ro brgyadang ldan pa sna tshogs dang/ lha'i rol mo brgya stong snyed la longs spyod cing/ rtse dga' bas shar phyogs su bltas na/ nub phyogs kyang brjod pa de lta ci smos te/
pa/ sangs rgyas 'jig rten du gshegs pa drang phrad pa'i ng dka'/ dam pa'i chos thos ba'ang shin tu dka' bar shes mod kyi 'dod pa'i bde bas bcings glogs te/ rang dbang med pas shos kyang byar med
tsa par gyur to// tshul khrims mnos pa'i chos ni/ dpa' zhing rtul phod pa'i sems kyis chad par dam bcas pas khrims thob par 'gyur te/ lha'i bu lta bu ni 'dod pa'i bde ba la chags pas ma
dge ba'i sems kyi shas che sta/ dge ba'i sems kyi mthu chud na/ ci'i dbang gis khrims thob par 'gyur/ yi dgas lta bu ni bkres pa dang skoms pas sdug bsngal te/ lus dang sems
'bar zhing tshig pa'i phyir ro// sems can dmyal ba pa ni tsho grang sdug bsngal grangs med pas gzir te/ mi bzod pa sna tshogs myong zhing/ lus dang sems gdus par gyur bas khrims thob
pa'i rgyu med do// dud 'gro lta bu ni las kyis bsgribs te/ shes pa med pas khrims mnod pa'i cho ga med do// mdo sde kha cig las skabs kha cig tu/ klus tshul khrims mnos par 'byung ba
05 dge ba'i sems kyis yan lag brgyad pa'i khrims mnos pas/ nyin zhag gcig gi bar du dge bti sems kyi bsod nams ni thob kyi/ las kyis bsgribs pas tshul khAms ni thob pa ma/

yin no// gling bzhis dbye na lho'i 'dzam bu'i gling dang/nub kyi ba lang spyodadang/ shar gyi lus 'phags gling dang gling gsum po 'dir gtogs pa'i rgya mtsho'i gling phran na 'khod pa'i mi rnamA kyanges
khrims thob bo// dper na nub kyi ba glang spyod na/ 'phags ba pani 'du la gnas par sangs rgyas kyis lung bstanate/ da ltar sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa chen po rgyas par byed pas/ 'khor rnam
la pa zhi'ang yod do// shar gyi lus 'phags gling na'ang dge slong yod de/ de na 'ang sangs rgyas kyi chos byed pas 'khor bzhi po dag yod de// byang gi sgra ma snyan 'ba' zhig na sangs rgyas kya
chos med de/ tshul khrams kyang ma thob bo// de'ang bsod nams kyi las kyi rnam par smane pas bsgrubs shang/ gti mug gas bsgribs pa'i phyir/ 'phags pa'i chos kyi snod du ma
gyur to// gang zag la rnam pa bzhi ste/ gang zhe na/ skyes pa dang/ bung chad dang/ mning dang/ mtshan ma gnyis pa'o// rnam pa 'di bzhi la skyes pa dang bud med gnyis kyis ni brosA
glob par rung/ ma ning dang mtshan maganyis pa gnyis kyis ni khrims ma thob bo// de'ang skyes pa dang bud med la'ang/ gang pha ma bsad pa dang/ dgra bcom pa bsad dang/
sangs rgyas kyi sku la ngan sems kyis khrag phyung ba dang/ dge 'dun gyi dbyen byas pa dang/ dge slong ma la mi tshangs par spyad pa dang/ gca' 'thung du chom po dang rkun/
gnas byed pa dang/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bcad pa dang/ gang zab 'di dag ni gang yar tshul khrims ma thob bo// de la don chen po'i sgo nas brtags na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos la shan tu dad cing mos pa ni
'dir ma gtogs te/ lha 'am/ klu 'am 3/ yi dgas sam gnod spyin num/ byang gi sgra mi snyan nam ]ma ning ngam/ mtshan gnyis pa 'am/ sdig pa mi dge ba sna tshogs byas kyang//
skyabs su 'gro ba gsum mnod du rung ngo// gsol pa/ dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams tshul khrims brtes pa mnyam mam/ bka' stsal ba ma mnyam mo// tshul khrimu thob ces bya ba
nisims can dang/ sems can m yin pa'i ris la khrims thob par 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas shAtsage 'jig rten du gshegs na/ sems can grangs med pa ji snyid kyi don mdzad de/ lhag ma ma lus
ba' mya ngan las 'das bas/ phyis sangs rgyas 'jig rten du gshegs pa dag/ sems can de dag gang las kyang tshul khrims brnyes te/ de ltar na sangs rgyas rnams snga phyire tshul khrims b.res
pa ma mnyam mo// dper na sas rgyas 'od srungs kyise sems can grangs med pa zhig btul te lhag ma malus pa'i mya ngan las 'das kyang/ sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyis na sems can di/
0/ dag kun las tshul khrims brnyes na/ sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas ni/ sems can de dag gang las kyang/ tshul khrims ma b.res so/ sangs rgyas thams cad 'dra bar dngos po 'di gsum n
mnyam mo// gang zhen/ spyod pa'i tshogs mnyam pa dang/ chos kyi sku mnyam pa dang/ sems can gyi don mdzad pa mnyam pa'o// sangs rgyas thams cad khyod phar bskal ba grangs med pa
gsum gyi bar du byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyad de yan lag lnga'i chos kyi sku yongs rdzogs shing/ stobs bcu dang/ ma 'jigs pa bzhi der/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad/
yongs su rdzogs te/ thams cad kyis sems can grangs mod pa ji snyad mya ngan las 'dus so// gsol pa/ mdo sde dag las sangs rgyas gatshoge 'jage rten du gshegran/ sems can bye
ba khrag khrig dgu bcu snyed mya ngan las 'da' ba'i don mdzad dozhes byung na/ ci'i slad du sems can grangs med pa'i don mdzad ces gsus/ bka' stsal pa/ mdo sde las sangs rgyas gacig
la 'jig rtenadugshegs na sems can bye ba khrag khrig dgu bcu snyed kyi don mdzad ces smos pa ni/ sas rgyas de las grol bar gyur pa la bya ste/ grol ba'i sems can de dag kyang la
la ni sangs rgyas nyid kyis don mdzad pa'i ng yod/ gcig ni slob mas don mdzad pa'i ng yong/ kha cig ni bzhag pa'i chos kyis grol ba'ang yod de/ sems can bye ba khrag khrig dgu bcu zhes
@#//smos pa ni/sangs rgyas nyid kyis don mdzad pa la bya sems can grangs med pa lhag ma ma lus pa mya ngan las 'das zhes bya ba ni/ spyir don mdzad pa la bya'o// dus
gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam pa na dus gsum mnyam kyi/ tshul khrims brnyes pa ni mi mnyam mo// gsol pa/ sdom pa ma yin pa'i khrims zhes bgyi ba sems can dang sems can ma
yin pa las thob par 'gyur ram/ zan pa dang ma zin pa kun gyis khrims thob par 'gyur/ bka' stsal pa/ sems can las sdom pa ma yin pa'i khrimA thob par 'gyur gyi/ sems can ma yin/
'tsho pa las sdom pa ma yin pa'i khrims mi thob bo// gzhan du nu bsad du rung ba'i sems can las sdom pa ma yin pa'i khrims thob kyi/ bsad du ma rung ba'i sems can las khrims ma thob bo// yang gzhan
dun gsod du rung ba dang/ gsod du ma rung ba'i sems can gnyis ka las sbom pa ma yin pa'i khrims glob ces bya'o//dper nanab lug gsod pa ni rtag tu gsod pa'i sems dang chas te/ lug gsod pa

'ba' zhig yade la byed pas de'i tshad gzung du med do/ ci ste lha dang mar skyo na 'phrul du gsod pa'i las ma byed kyang/ skye ba gcig nas gcig tu 'khor bas phyir lug tu skye ba'i chos yod do// de bas
kany+tsin sems can thams cad las sdom pa ma yin pa'i khrims thob par 'gyur te/ sdom ba ma yin pa'i khrims 'du gnyis kyang de dang 'dra'o// sdom pa ma yin pa'i khriles bcu gnyis zhes bya ba ni
'di lta ste/ shin pa dang/ gshed ma dang/ phag gso ba drang/ bya gso ba dang/ nya bshor ba dang/ ljon pa pa drang/ byabashong ba dang/ sbrul shor ba dang klu sngagrwa 'bas pa dang/ btson tshwa
byed pa dang/ rkun po byed pa dang/ rkun po 'dzin pa dang bcu gnyis so// dur gyi srin bu gso ba'ang sdom pa ma yin pa'i khrims kyi nang du 'dus so// sdom pa ma yin pa'i khrims nyams pa ni dus gsum
yod de/ shi ba'i dus dang/ chags shing zhen pa zad pa'i dus dang/ sdom pa'i tshul khrims mnod pa'i dus so// dpon skyabs su 'gro ba gsum mnod pa'i tshe/ thog ma'i tshoge dung po shAtshoge smras
pas/ sdom pa ma yin pa'i khrims nyams so// de'i 'og tu tshig gnyis dang/ gsum pa smras pa'i tshe na dge ba'i tshul khrims thob par 'gyur ro// gsol pa/ gang zag gis sdom pa me/
yin pa'i las byed pa na/ dus tshod gang gAtshadage ba'i khrims nyams shing ma dge ba'i khrims blob par 'gyur// bka' stsal pa/ shan pa'i chos tshig gcig dang por skya ba'i tshe dge ba'i
khrims nyams par 'gyur ba shun pa 'o zhes lan gnyis lan gsum smras pas ma dge ba'i khrims thob par 'gyur ro// yang gzhan du nagang ga tshadag ba'i khrims btang ba de nyid kyi tsho mngag
pa'i khrimA thob bo//ma ste dge ba'i khrims srung ba'i gang zag gcig bdag shan pa'o zhes dam ni bcas/ khe dang rnyed patsam la chags te phag phrug gso zhing gsod pa'i las byed na/de'i tshe dge
kya// ba'i khrims nyams pa zhes bya ste/ nadage ba'i khrims btung ba mi dge ba'i khrims thob pa zhes bya'o// gal te pa dag shan pa'o zhes nges par dam bcas na'ang ma dge ba'i khrims thob pa
'gyur ro// mi dge ba'akhrims nod pan badrag gis dam bcas patsam gyis thob par 'gyur te/ pha rol po gzhan las mnodAmi dgos so// gal te dge ba'i khrims nyin zhag gcig gam gnyis nas/ lin/
zhag bcu bas/ lo gcig gam/ lo gnyis kyi bar dumanod par dam bcas na/ dmabacas pa'idus ring thung las de bzhin thob par 'gyur te/ de bas na sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos ni skye shi 'khor ba la/

gzhol bar byed kyi/ gong nas gong du 'phar ba'i don med do// de ltar na mi dge ba'i khrims ni dngos po de nyid kyis thob pa yin te/ dge ba'i tshul khrims dang mi 'dra'o// thabs mkhas pa chen po sangs rgyas
drin lan bsab pa'i mdo las/ ma 'gags pa'i le'u zhes bya ste brgyad pa'o// thabs mkhas pa chen po sangs rgyas drin lan bsab pa'i mdo/ bam po bdun pa/
gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po na la shes pa dang/ drin lan bsab pa dang/ thabs mkhas pa chen pos sems can rnams la phan pa dang/ bde ba'i
na byed pa dag dus dang skabs shes na bstan cing bcos pa la gnod par mi 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas mngon par 'jig rten du 'byung ba/ 'jigs pa med pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba de bzhin/
gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sa ngas rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan// bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen ra/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha la sgyur pa/ thun med pa// ston
pa rgyal ba 'jig rten du gshegs te/ skal ba dang ldan pa'i don mdzad de// skal ba dang ldan pa rnams kyi don mdzad nas/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das so// yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas dam pa'i chos

la spyod pa'i tshe/ bram ze'i bu yid gzhungs shing rno ba 'api shes rab dang ldan pa/ gtan khrims lta srung ba/ dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa zhig byung ngo// dus gzhan zhagan bram ze'i bu de yul gzhan zhig tu don
gnyer du gong song ba las gron du 'gro ba'i lam de 'jigasas che bas/ lam grogs lnga brgya dang 'grogs te song ngo// lam grogs de dag dang 'jigs sar phyin nas/'jigs sa de na mi rgod lta brgya zhig

gnas te/ rtag tu 'gron po rgyu ba rnams 'dzoms so// de'i tshon mi rgod de dag gis 'gron po de dag gzhom par byas nas mi rgod kyi dpon po des/ mi gcig sngar 'gron po dedag ji ltar 'gro ba lta zhing rtog
tu btang ngo// de'i tshe mi rgod de dag gi nang na mig gcig sngon bram ze'i bu de dang mdza' zhing ba shes pas sngar mi de dag gnang du 'ongs te/ bram ze'i bu de la 'di skad ces bsgo'i// rigs
kyi bu khyod 'di ltar rig par byas shig/ donub nam gyi cha stod la dgra 'ong gis ci nas kyang khyod nyid la gnod pa dang rmas par ma gyur par khyod nyid kyis byol ba'i thabs byos shig par bsgo'o//
ga/ de'i tshe bram ze'i bu des tshagi de dag thos nas/ dper na mi brnangs pa ltar med bu'ang med la/ ba skyag tu 'ang med pa bzhin mi bde bar gyur nas/ grogs po rnams la gtam bya
na grogs po rnams kyis na de gsad kyis dogs/ ca lta grogs po rnams kyis mi de bsad na/ grogs po rnams ngan 'gro gsum du sdug bsngal grangs med pa myong bar 'gyur pa ste/ gal te grogs po
rnams la ma smras nadakras grogs po rnams bsad par 'gyur ro// gal te grogs po rnams chas dan dgra rnams ngan 'gro gsum du ltung shing sdug bsngal grangs med pa myong ngo snyam bsams nas/ bdag gis
sems can la phan pa dang bde ba'i thabs byas te/ bdag nyid ngan 'gro gsum du ltung zhing sdug bsngal myong yar blo'o snyam bsams nas/ ral gri thogs nas/ sngon ma mid bsad nas grogs po
rnams bde bar byas so// de'i tshin grogs po rnams kyis de ltar gyur pa mthong nas/ bram ze'i bu de la 'di skad ces smras so// bram ze'i khu khyed mo'inang na mchog tu gyur pa/ shin tu dge
ba lan// ci'i phyi'i deng 'dir 'di lta bu'i sbrag l chen po byed ces smras so// de'i tshe bram ze'i bu des dus mo sa la btsugs nas thal mo sbyar te/ ngomtshan dang ldan pa'i sems kyis grogs po dag la
'di skad ces smras so// bdag de ring bya ba'i rigs pa'i sngag pa chen po byas te/ de'ang sems can rnams la phan pa dang/ grogs po rnams la bde bar bya ba'i phyir ro// grogs po rnams kyis
smras pa/ khyod nyid kyis mi bsad pa la red bde bar byas so zhes brjod du'ang cu yod/ bram ze'i bus smras ra/ bdag gis bsad pa'i mi 'di ni dgra ma rungs pa yan te/ dgra 'dis grogs
bo khyed gsod du 'ongs pas/ bdag ni grogs po byed kyi phyir ma 'di'i srog gcod pas na/ khyed rnams ni bde bar yuladu phyin te/ bdag na sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal myong ya nga
bla'o// de nas grogs po lnga brgya rnams kyis skad phyung ste dus nas/ 'di skad ces smras so// gnam mtha' 'ogan 'phangs par bya ba na srog las 'da' ba med do// 'jigs pa'i nang na/
'tshig las 'da' ba med de/ debasan sems can thamasacad ni lus dang srog gi phyir gser dang/ dngul dwang/na po che dang/ yul sa dang chung ma dang/ bu dang/ zas dang/ gos kyang
yongs su gtong ste/ bdag cag deng du phyir lan cig 'tsho ba'i srog thob bo zhes smras nas/ bram ze'i bu khyod sems can gyi phyir ngan 'grogasum gyi sdug bsngal khyad du bsad pas/ bdag cagan/

khyod kyi drin shin tu lci ba dran par byed do// sngon lci badran pas na nged bdag cag thun mdal yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de zhes smras nas/ thams cad byang chub tu sems bskyed do// de'i
tshon mi rgod lta brgya rnams kyis kyang 'di skad ces smras so// khyod ni kun gyi mchog shin tu dge ba yin no zhes zer na/ ci'i phyir 'di lta bu'i sdig pa chen po byed/ bram ze'i bus smras pa/ bdag
bya khar ma rigs pa'i sdig pa chen po byas te/ de'ang sems can thams cad la ldan pa dang/ khyed rnams kyi lus dang srog gi skyabs bya ba'i phyir ro// de nas mi rgor de dag gis
bram ze'i bu la smras pa/ khyod nyid kyis ma bsad pa la bdag cag la phan pa'i ng ci zhig yod/ khrim ze'i bus smras ra/ mi rgod khyed rnams 'din 'dug par sdu nus shes kyang/ bdag cang ma
smras te/ rgyal po 'ang ma sbran/ bdag gi grogs po rnams la'ang ma smras/ gtam ma byas pas khyed kyi lus dang srogabade bar gyur pa yin no// de'i tshim rgod de drag gis de skad ces smras
pa thos nas 'di snyam du gyur to/ bdag cag gis lus dang srog kyang gzod gsonan snyam bsams nas/ bram ze'i bu la thal mo sbyar te/ skyes bu chen po shin tu legs so// snying rje chen po dang

lhan pa bdag cag gis deng phyin chad ci dang cu bya ba bstan du gsol/ bram ze'i bus smras pa/ khyen rnams myur du bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sems spyod cig/ de nas mi rgod rnams kyang zhi ba ba pa'i/
phyir re ma thag tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to/ khacom ldan 'das kyis/ kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dapa' brtson 'grus la
gnas pa/ byang chub lo ngas su brgyan pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi bka' rngan la bsab par 'dod pa dag rtag tu sems can thams cad la bu gcig pa dang 'dra bar 'du shes bskyed cing dran par bya'o// rigs/
de ltar rig rar bya ste/ de'i dus de'i tshon bram ze'i bu de gzhan yin rar ma sems shig/ de ltar mi blta'o// de ni tshe bram ze'i bur gyur ba de ni da ltar nga nyid yin no// de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis
bskal pa dgu bcu byed kyi 'khor ba las 'das na myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas so// gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' thabs mkhas pa chen po spyod
cing drin lan shes pa dang/ drin lan bsab pa ni 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od ma'i tshalan bzhugs pa na/ dge slong gcig lus la 'brum pa 'and kyis btab nas/ lus la
kun s rnag khrag rgyun du zags pas thams cad kyis ma 'dod de/ gtsug lag khang gi phyi rol gnas khang zhig par gyur lab mazhig gi nang du bzhag go/ de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pas rdzu 'phrul gyi
mkhrus/ 'khor mang pos gcig gis kyang mi shes par byin gyis brlabs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyag gcig dge slongand pa'i thad du gshegs te/ chus bkrus par dgongs nas 'dod pa'i khams

kyi lha rnams shes par bya ba'i phyir/ brgya byin lha'i dbang po lha'i 'khor tshad med pa brgya stong gsabaskorati/ lha rdzas kyi mi tog char bzhin du phab/ lha rdzas kyi rol mo rnam pa sna tshogs byas nas/

stong gi nam mkha' la 'khod do// de'i tshe na sum cu rtsa gsum gnam gyi lha'i dbang po bsod nams brgya las grub pa'i bum pa dmapa'i nangam snying rje chen po'i chu gtsang mas bkang nas lag na thogs te//
de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs la go bos phyag 'tshal nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mdun nas bsu ste/ phyogs gcig tu sdod do// de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pas

bsod nams brgya dang ldan pa'i phyag brkyang nas/ phyag sor mnyon zhing ring ba lnga las 'od zer chen po bkye nas/ lha dang 'khor mang po de dag rnams snang bar byas te/'khor mang po de dag 'dug nas/ de bzhin/
gshegs pa nyid dge slong nad pa'i drung du gshegs te/ dbu'i spyi gtsug nas 'od zer bkra nas/ dge slong nad pa snang bar byas so// dge slongand pa de la'agam thag tu na ba'i sdug bsngal myong
bar gyur te/ rma'i rnag khrug dang bcas pa'i lus kyi skyabs su gsol nas lus kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshalag nus pas/ de bzhin gshegs pas phyag g.yas pas brgya na lha'i
dbang po las rin po che'i bum pa blangs te/ dge slong nad pa'i spyi bo nas chu blugs te/ phyag g.yon pas dge slong nad pa'i lus kyi rma bkrus shing byugs pas dge slong nad pa'i rma Thams cad
de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag ga rjes su sos par gyur to// de ltar ma kun sos nas dge slong de dga' mgu rangs par gyur te/ sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo// thugs rje chen pa'i
